/blogs/plugins/tinymce_plugin/tiny_mce/ -> tiny_mce_src.js (source)

[Summary view] [Print] [Text view] 

   1  (function(win) {
   2      var whiteSpaceRe = /^\s*|\s*$/g,
   3          undefined, isRegExpBroken = 'B'.replace(/A(.)|B/, '$1') === '$1';
   4  
   5      var tinymce = {
   6          majorVersion : '3',
   7  
   8          minorVersion : '4.8',
   9  
  10          releaseDate : '2012-02-02',
  11  
  12          _init : function() {
  13              var t = this, d = document, na = navigator, ua = na.userAgent, i, nl, n, base, p, v;
  14  
  15              t.isOpera = win.opera && opera.buildNumber;
  16  
  17              t.isWebKit = /WebKit/.test(ua);
  18  
  19              t.isIE = !t.isWebKit && !t.isOpera && (/MSIE/gi).test(ua) && (/Explorer/gi).test(na.appName);
  20  
  21              t.isIE6 = t.isIE && /MSIE [56]/.test(ua);
  22  
  23              t.isIE7 = t.isIE && /MSIE [7]/.test(ua);
  24  
  25              t.isIE8 = t.isIE && /MSIE [8]/.test(ua);
  26  
  27              t.isIE9 = t.isIE && /MSIE [9]/.test(ua);
  28  
  29              t.isGecko = !t.isWebKit && /Gecko/.test(ua);
  30  
  31              t.isMac = ua.indexOf('Mac') != -1;
  32  
  33              t.isAir = /adobeair/i.test(ua);
  34  
  35              t.isIDevice = /(iPad|iPhone)/.test(ua);
  36              
  37              t.isIOS5 = t.isIDevice && ua.match(/AppleWebKit\/(\d*)/)[1]>=534;
  38  
  39              // TinyMCE .NET webcontrol might be setting the values for TinyMCE
  40              if (win.tinyMCEPreInit) {
  41                  t.suffix = tinyMCEPreInit.suffix;
  42                  t.baseURL = tinyMCEPreInit.base;
  43                  t.query = tinyMCEPreInit.query;
  44                  return;
  45              }
  46  
  47              // Get suffix and base
  48              t.suffix = '';
  49  
  50              // If base element found, add that infront of baseURL
  51              nl = d.getElementsByTagName('base');
  52              for (i=0; i<nl.length; i++) {
  53                  if (v = nl[i].href) {
  54                      // Host only value like http://site.com or http://site.com:8008
  55                      if (/^https?:\/\/[^\/]+$/.test(v))
  56                          v += '/';
  57  
  58                      base = v ? v.match(/.*\//)[0] : ''; // Get only directory
  59                  }
  60              }
  61  
  62  			function getBase(n) {
  63                  if (n.src && /tiny_mce(|_gzip|_jquery|_prototype|_full)(_dev|_src)?.js/.test(n.src)) {
  64                      if (/_(src|dev)\.js/g.test(n.src))
  65                          t.suffix = '_src';
  66  
  67                      if ((p = n.src.indexOf('?')) != -1)
  68                          t.query = n.src.substring(p + 1);
  69  
  70                      t.baseURL = n.src.substring(0, n.src.lastIndexOf('/'));
  71  
  72                      // If path to script is relative and a base href was found add that one infront
  73                      // the src property will always be an absolute one on non IE browsers and IE 8
  74                      // so this logic will basically only be executed on older IE versions
  75                      if (base && t.baseURL.indexOf('://') == -1 && t.baseURL.indexOf('/') !== 0)
  76                          t.baseURL = base + t.baseURL;
  77  
  78                      return t.baseURL;
  79                  }
  80  
  81                  return null;
  82              };
  83  
  84              // Check document
  85              nl = d.getElementsByTagName('script');
  86              for (i=0; i<nl.length; i++) {
  87                  if (getBase(nl[i]))
  88                      return;
  89              }
  90  
  91              // Check head
  92              n = d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
  93              if (n) {
  94                  nl = n.getElementsByTagName('script');
  95                  for (i=0; i<nl.length; i++) {
  96                      if (getBase(nl[i]))
  97                          return;
  98                  }
  99              }
 100  
 101              return;
 102          },
 103  
 104          is : function(o, t) {
 105              if (!t)
 106                  return o !== undefined;
 107  
 108              if (t == 'array' && (o.hasOwnProperty && o instanceof Array))
 109                  return true;
 110  
 111              return typeof(o) == t;
 112          },
 113  
 114          makeMap : function(items, delim, map) {
 115              var i;
 116  
 117              items = items || [];
 118              delim = delim || ',';
 119  
 120              if (typeof(items) == "string")
 121                  items = items.split(delim);
 122  
 123              map = map || {};
 124  
 125              i = items.length;
 126              while (i--)
 127                  map[items[i]] = {};
 128  
 129              return map;
 130          },
 131  
 132          each : function(o, cb, s) {
 133              var n, l;
 134  
 135              if (!o)
 136                  return 0;
 137  
 138              s = s || o;
 139  
 140              if (o.length !== undefined) {
 141                  // Indexed arrays, needed for Safari
 142                  for (n=0, l = o.length; n < l; n++) {
 143                      if (cb.call(s, o[n], n, o) === false)
 144                          return 0;
 145                  }
 146              } else {
 147                  // Hashtables
 148                  for (n in o) {
 149                      if (o.hasOwnProperty(n)) {
 150                          if (cb.call(s, o[n], n, o) === false)
 151                              return 0;
 152                      }
 153                  }
 154              }
 155  
 156              return 1;
 157          },
 158  
 159  
 160          map : function(a, f) {
 161              var o = [];
 162  
 163              tinymce.each(a, function(v) {
 164                  o.push(f(v));
 165              });
 166  
 167              return o;
 168          },
 169  
 170          grep : function(a, f) {
 171              var o = [];
 172  
 173              tinymce.each(a, function(v) {
 174                  if (!f || f(v))
 175                      o.push(v);
 176              });
 177  
 178              return o;
 179          },
 180  
 181          inArray : function(a, v) {
 182              var i, l;
 183  
 184              if (a) {
 185                  for (i = 0, l = a.length; i < l; i++) {
 186                      if (a[i] === v)
 187                          return i;
 188                  }
 189              }
 190  
 191              return -1;
 192          },
 193  
 194          extend : function(o, e) {
 195              var i, l, a = arguments;
 196  
 197              for (i = 1, l = a.length; i < l; i++) {
 198                  e = a[i];
 199  
 200                  tinymce.each(e, function(v, n) {
 201                      if (v !== undefined)
 202                          o[n] = v;
 203                  });
 204              }
 205  
 206              return o;
 207          },
 208  
 209  
 210          trim : function(s) {
 211              return (s ? '' + s : '').replace(whiteSpaceRe, '');
 212          },
 213  
 214          create : function(s, p, root) {
 215              var t = this, sp, ns, cn, scn, c, de = 0;
 216  
 217              // Parse : <prefix> <class>:<super class>
 218              s = /^((static) )?([\w.]+)(:([\w.]+))?/.exec(s);
 219              cn = s[3].match(/(^|\.)(\w+)$/i)[2]; // Class name
 220  
 221              // Create namespace for new class
 222              ns = t.createNS(s[3].replace(/\.\w+$/, ''), root);
 223  
 224              // Class already exists
 225              if (ns[cn])
 226                  return;
 227  
 228              // Make pure static class
 229              if (s[2] == 'static') {
 230                  ns[cn] = p;
 231  
 232                  if (this.onCreate)
 233                      this.onCreate(s[2], s[3], ns[cn]);
 234  
 235                  return;
 236              }
 237  
 238              // Create default constructor
 239              if (!p[cn]) {
 240                  p[cn] = function() {};
 241                  de = 1;
 242              }
 243  
 244              // Add constructor and methods
 245              ns[cn] = p[cn];
 246              t.extend(ns[cn].prototype, p);
 247  
 248              // Extend
 249              if (s[5]) {
 250                  sp = t.resolve(s[5]).prototype;
 251                  scn = s[5].match(/\.(\w+)$/i)[1]; // Class name
 252  
 253                  // Extend constructor
 254                  c = ns[cn];
 255                  if (de) {
 256                      // Add passthrough constructor
 257                      ns[cn] = function() {
 258                          return sp[scn].apply(this, arguments);
 259                      };
 260                  } else {
 261                      // Add inherit constructor
 262                      ns[cn] = function() {
 263                          this.parent = sp[scn];
 264                          return c.apply(this, arguments);
 265                      };
 266                  }
 267                  ns[cn].prototype[cn] = ns[cn];
 268  
 269                  // Add super methods
 270                  t.each(sp, function(f, n) {
 271                      ns[cn].prototype[n] = sp[n];
 272                  });
 273  
 274                  // Add overridden methods
 275                  t.each(p, function(f, n) {
 276                      // Extend methods if needed
 277                      if (sp[n]) {
 278                          ns[cn].prototype[n] = function() {
 279                              this.parent = sp[n];
 280                              return f.apply(this, arguments);
 281                          };
 282                      } else {
 283                          if (n != cn)
 284                              ns[cn].prototype[n] = f;
 285                      }
 286                  });
 287              }
 288  
 289              // Add static methods
 290              t.each(p['static'], function(f, n) {
 291                  ns[cn][n] = f;
 292              });
 293  
 294              if (this.onCreate)
 295                  this.onCreate(s[2], s[3], ns[cn].prototype);
 296          },
 297  
 298          walk : function(o, f, n, s) {
 299              s = s || this;
 300  
 301              if (o) {
 302                  if (n)
 303                      o = o[n];
 304  
 305                  tinymce.each(o, function(o, i) {
 306                      if (f.call(s, o, i, n) === false)
 307                          return false;
 308  
 309                      tinymce.walk(o, f, n, s);
 310                  });
 311              }
 312          },
 313  
 314          createNS : function(n, o) {
 315              var i, v;
 316  
 317              o = o || win;
 318  
 319              n = n.split('.');
 320              for (i=0; i<n.length; i++) {
 321                  v = n[i];
 322  
 323                  if (!o[v])
 324                      o[v] = {};
 325  
 326                  o = o[v];
 327              }
 328  
 329              return o;
 330          },
 331  
 332          resolve : function(n, o) {
 333              var i, l;
 334  
 335              o = o || win;
 336  
 337              n = n.split('.');
 338              for (i = 0, l = n.length; i < l; i++) {
 339                  o = o[n[i]];
 340  
 341                  if (!o)
 342                      break;
 343              }
 344  
 345              return o;
 346          },
 347  
 348          addUnload : function(f, s) {
 349              var t = this;
 350  
 351              f = {func : f, scope : s || this};
 352  
 353              if (!t.unloads) {
 354  				function unload() {
 355                      var li = t.unloads, o, n;
 356  
 357                      if (li) {
 358                          // Call unload handlers
 359                          for (n in li) {
 360                              o = li[n];
 361  
 362                              if (o && o.func)
 363                                  o.func.call(o.scope, 1); // Send in one arg to distinct unload and user destroy
 364                          }
 365  
 366                          // Detach unload function
 367                          if (win.detachEvent) {
 368                              win.detachEvent('onbeforeunload', fakeUnload);
 369                              win.detachEvent('onunload', unload);
 370                          } else if (win.removeEventListener)
 371                              win.removeEventListener('unload', unload, false);
 372  
 373                          // Destroy references
 374                          t.unloads = o = li = w = unload = 0;
 375  
 376                          // Run garbarge collector on IE
 377                          if (win.CollectGarbage)
 378                              CollectGarbage();
 379                      }
 380                  };
 381  
 382  				function fakeUnload() {
 383                      var d = document;
 384  
 385                      // Is there things still loading, then do some magic
 386                      if (d.readyState == 'interactive') {
 387  						function stop() {
 388                              // Prevent memory leak
 389                              d.detachEvent('onstop', stop);
 390  
 391                              // Call unload handler
 392                              if (unload)
 393                                  unload();
 394  
 395                              d = 0;
 396                          };
 397  
 398                          // Fire unload when the currently loading page is stopped
 399                          if (d)
 400                              d.attachEvent('onstop', stop);
 401  
 402                          // Remove onstop listener after a while to prevent the unload function
 403                          // to execute if the user presses cancel in an onbeforeunload
 404                          // confirm dialog and then presses the browser stop button
 405                          win.setTimeout(function() {
 406                              if (d)
 407                                  d.detachEvent('onstop', stop);
 408                          }, 0);
 409                      }
 410                  };
 411  
 412                  // Attach unload handler
 413                  if (win.attachEvent) {
 414                      win.attachEvent('onunload', unload);
 415                      win.attachEvent('onbeforeunload', fakeUnload);
 416                  } else if (win.addEventListener)
 417                      win.addEventListener('unload', unload, false);
 418  
 419                  // Setup initial unload handler array
 420                  t.unloads = [f];
 421              } else
 422                  t.unloads.push(f);
 423  
 424              return f;
 425          },
 426  
 427          removeUnload : function(f) {
 428              var u = this.unloads, r = null;
 429  
 430              tinymce.each(u, function(o, i) {
 431                  if (o && o.func == f) {
 432                      u.splice(i, 1);
 433                      r = f;
 434                      return false;
 435                  }
 436              });
 437  
 438              return r;
 439          },
 440  
 441          explode : function(s, d) {
 442              return s ? tinymce.map(s.split(d || ','), tinymce.trim) : s;
 443          },
 444  
 445          _addVer : function(u) {
 446              var v;
 447  
 448              if (!this.query)
 449                  return u;
 450  
 451              v = (u.indexOf('?') == -1 ? '?' : '&') + this.query;
 452  
 453              if (u.indexOf('#') == -1)
 454                  return u + v;
 455  
 456              return u.replace('#', v + '#');
 457          },
 458  
 459          // Fix function for IE 9 where regexps isn't working correctly
 460          // Todo: remove me once MS fixes the bug
 461          _replace : function(find, replace, str) {
 462              // On IE9 we have to fake $x replacement
 463              if (isRegExpBroken) {
 464                  return str.replace(find, function() {
 465                      var val = replace, args = arguments, i;
 466  
 467                      for (i = 0; i < args.length - 2; i++) {
 468                          if (args[i] === undefined) {
 469                              val = val.replace(new RegExp('\\$' + i, 'g'), '');
 470                          } else {
 471                              val = val.replace(new RegExp('\\$' + i, 'g'), args[i]);
 472                          }
 473                      }
 474  
 475                      return val;
 476                  });
 477              }
 478  
 479              return str.replace(find, replace);
 480          }
 481  
 482          };
 483  
 484      // Initialize the API
 485      tinymce._init();
 486  
 487      // Expose tinymce namespace to the global namespace (window)
 488      win.tinymce = win.tinyMCE = tinymce;
 489  
 490      // Describe the different namespaces
 491  
 492      })(window);
 493  
 494  
 495  
 496  tinymce.create('tinymce.util.Dispatcher', {
 497      scope : null,
 498      listeners : null,
 499  
 500      Dispatcher : function(s) {
 501          this.scope = s || this;
 502          this.listeners = [];
 503      },
 504  
 505      add : function(cb, s) {
 506          this.listeners.push({cb : cb, scope : s || this.scope});
 507  
 508          return cb;
 509      },
 510  
 511      addToTop : function(cb, s) {
 512          this.listeners.unshift({cb : cb, scope : s || this.scope});
 513  
 514          return cb;
 515      },
 516  
 517      remove : function(cb) {
 518          var l = this.listeners, o = null;
 519  
 520          tinymce.each(l, function(c, i) {
 521              if (cb == c.cb) {
 522                  o = cb;
 523                  l.splice(i, 1);
 524                  return false;
 525              }
 526          });
 527  
 528          return o;
 529      },
 530  
 531      dispatch : function() {
 532          var s, a = arguments, i, li = this.listeners, c;
 533  
 534          // Needs to be a real loop since the listener count might change while looping
 535          // And this is also more efficient
 536          for (i = 0; i<li.length; i++) {
 537              c = li[i];
 538              s = c.cb.apply(c.scope, a.length > 0 ? a : [c.scope]);
 539  
 540              if (s === false)
 541                  break;
 542          }
 543  
 544          return s;
 545      }
 546  
 547      });
 548  
 549  (function() {
 550      var each = tinymce.each;
 551  
 552      tinymce.create('tinymce.util.URI', {
 553          URI : function(u, s) {
 554              var t = this, o, a, b, base_url;
 555  
 556              // Trim whitespace
 557              u = tinymce.trim(u);
 558  
 559              // Default settings
 560              s = t.settings = s || {};
 561  
 562              // Strange app protocol that isn't http/https or local anchor
 563              // For example: mailto,skype,tel etc.
 564              if (/^([\w\-]+):([^\/]{2})/i.test(u) || /^\s*#/.test(u)) {
 565                  t.source = u;
 566                  return;
 567              }
 568  
 569              // Absolute path with no host, fake host and protocol
 570              if (u.indexOf('/') === 0 && u.indexOf('//') !== 0)
 571                  u = (s.base_uri ? s.base_uri.protocol || 'http' : 'http') + '://mce_host' + u;
 572  
 573              // Relative path http:// or protocol relative //path
 574              if (!/^[\w-]*:?\/\//.test(u)) {
 575                  base_url = s.base_uri ? s.base_uri.path : new tinymce.util.URI(location.href).directory;
 576                  u = ((s.base_uri && s.base_uri.protocol) || 'http') + '://mce_host' + t.toAbsPath(base_url, u);
 577              }
 578  
 579              // Parse URL (Credits goes to Steave, http://blog.stevenlevithan.com/archives/parseuri)
 580              u = u.replace(/@@/g, '(mce_at)'); // Zope 3 workaround, they use @@something
 581              u = /^(?:(?![^:@]+:[^:@\/]*@)([^:\/?#.]+):)?(?:\/\/)?((?:(([^:@\/]*):?([^:@\/]*))?@)?([^:\/?#]*)(?::(\d*))?)(((\/(?:[^?#](?![^?#\/]*\.[^?#\/.]+(?:[?#]|$)))*\/?)?([^?#\/]*))(?:\?([^#]*))?(?:#(.*))?)/.exec(u);
 582              each(["source","protocol","authority","userInfo","user","password","host","port","relative","path","directory","file","query","anchor"], function(v, i) {
 583                  var s = u[i];
 584  
 585                  // Zope 3 workaround, they use @@something
 586                  if (s)
 587                      s = s.replace(/\(mce_at\)/g, '@@');
 588  
 589                  t[v] = s;
 590              });
 591  
 592              if (b = s.base_uri) {
 593                  if (!t.protocol)
 594                      t.protocol = b.protocol;
 595  
 596                  if (!t.userInfo)
 597                      t.userInfo = b.userInfo;
 598  
 599                  if (!t.port && t.host == 'mce_host')
 600                      t.port = b.port;
 601  
 602                  if (!t.host || t.host == 'mce_host')
 603                      t.host = b.host;
 604  
 605                  t.source = '';
 606              }
 607  
 608              //t.path = t.path || '/';
 609          },
 610  
 611          setPath : function(p) {
 612              var t = this;
 613  
 614              p = /^(.*?)\/?(\w+)?$/.exec(p);
 615  
 616              // Update path parts
 617              t.path = p[0];
 618              t.directory = p[1];
 619              t.file = p[2];
 620  
 621              // Rebuild source
 622              t.source = '';
 623              t.getURI();
 624          },
 625  
 626          toRelative : function(u) {
 627              var t = this, o;
 628  
 629              if (u === "./")
 630                  return u;
 631  
 632              u = new tinymce.util.URI(u, {base_uri : t});
 633  
 634              // Not on same domain/port or protocol
 635              if ((u.host != 'mce_host' && t.host != u.host && u.host) || t.port != u.port || t.protocol != u.protocol)
 636                  return u.getURI();
 637  
 638              o = t.toRelPath(t.path, u.path);
 639  
 640              // Add query
 641              if (u.query)
 642                  o += '?' + u.query;
 643  
 644              // Add anchor
 645              if (u.anchor)
 646                  o += '#' + u.anchor;
 647  
 648              return o;
 649          },
 650      
 651          toAbsolute : function(u, nh) {
 652              var u = new tinymce.util.URI(u, {base_uri : this});
 653  
 654              return u.getURI(this.host == u.host && this.protocol == u.protocol ? nh : 0);
 655          },
 656  
 657          toRelPath : function(base, path) {
 658              var items, bp = 0, out = '', i, l;
 659  
 660              // Split the paths
 661              base = base.substring(0, base.lastIndexOf('/'));
 662              base = base.split('/');
 663              items = path.split('/');
 664  
 665              if (base.length >= items.length) {
 666                  for (i = 0, l = base.length; i < l; i++) {
 667                      if (i >= items.length || base[i] != items[i]) {
 668                          bp = i + 1;
 669                          break;
 670                      }
 671                  }
 672              }
 673  
 674              if (base.length < items.length) {
 675                  for (i = 0, l = items.length; i < l; i++) {
 676                      if (i >= base.length || base[i] != items[i]) {
 677                          bp = i + 1;
 678                          break;
 679                      }
 680                  }
 681              }
 682  
 683              if (bp == 1)
 684                  return path;
 685  
 686              for (i = 0, l = base.length - (bp - 1); i < l; i++)
 687                  out += "../";
 688  
 689              for (i = bp - 1, l = items.length; i < l; i++) {
 690                  if (i != bp - 1)
 691                      out += "/" + items[i];
 692                  else
 693                      out += items[i];
 694              }
 695  
 696              return out;
 697          },
 698  
 699          toAbsPath : function(base, path) {
 700              var i, nb = 0, o = [], tr, outPath;
 701  
 702              // Split paths
 703              tr = /\/$/.test(path) ? '/' : '';
 704              base = base.split('/');
 705              path = path.split('/');
 706  
 707              // Remove empty chunks
 708              each(base, function(k) {
 709                  if (k)
 710                      o.push(k);
 711              });
 712  
 713              base = o;
 714  
 715              // Merge relURLParts chunks
 716              for (i = path.length - 1, o = []; i >= 0; i--) {
 717                  // Ignore empty or .
 718                  if (path[i].length == 0 || path[i] == ".")
 719                      continue;
 720  
 721                  // Is parent
 722                  if (path[i] == '..') {
 723                      nb++;
 724                      continue;
 725                  }
 726  
 727                  // Move up
 728                  if (nb > 0) {
 729                      nb--;
 730                      continue;
 731                  }
 732  
 733                  o.push(path[i]);
 734              }
 735  
 736              i = base.length - nb;
 737  
 738              // If /a/b/c or /
 739              if (i <= 0)
 740                  outPath = o.reverse().join('/');
 741              else
 742                  outPath = base.slice(0, i).join('/') + '/' + o.reverse().join('/');
 743  
 744              // Add front / if it's needed
 745              if (outPath.indexOf('/') !== 0)
 746                  outPath = '/' + outPath;
 747  
 748              // Add traling / if it's needed
 749              if (tr && outPath.lastIndexOf('/') !== outPath.length - 1)
 750                  outPath += tr;
 751  
 752              return outPath;
 753          },
 754  
 755          getURI : function(nh) {
 756              var s, t = this;
 757  
 758              // Rebuild source
 759              if (!t.source || nh) {
 760                  s = '';
 761  
 762                  if (!nh) {
 763                      if (t.protocol)
 764                          s += t.protocol + '://';
 765  
 766                      if (t.userInfo)
 767                          s += t.userInfo + '@';
 768  
 769                      if (t.host)
 770                          s += t.host;
 771  
 772                      if (t.port)
 773                          s += ':' + t.port;
 774                  }
 775  
 776                  if (t.path)
 777                      s += t.path;
 778  
 779                  if (t.query)
 780                      s += '?' + t.query;
 781  
 782                  if (t.anchor)
 783                      s += '#' + t.anchor;
 784  
 785                  t.source = s;
 786              }
 787  
 788              return t.source;
 789          }
 790      });
 791  })();
 792  
 793  (function() {
 794      var each = tinymce.each;
 795  
 796      tinymce.create('static tinymce.util.Cookie', {
 797          getHash : function(n) {
 798              var v = this.get(n), h;
 799  
 800              if (v) {
 801                  each(v.split('&'), function(v) {
 802                      v = v.split('=');
 803                      h = h || {};
 804                      h[unescape(v[0])] = unescape(v[1]);
 805                  });
 806              }
 807  
 808              return h;
 809          },
 810  
 811          setHash : function(n, v, e, p, d, s) {
 812              var o = '';
 813  
 814              each(v, function(v, k) {
 815                  o += (!o ? '' : '&') + escape(k) + '=' + escape(v);
 816              });
 817  
 818              this.set(n, o, e, p, d, s);
 819          },
 820  
 821          get : function(n) {
 822              var c = document.cookie, e, p = n + "=", b;
 823  
 824              // Strict mode
 825              if (!c)
 826                  return;
 827  
 828              b = c.indexOf("; " + p);
 829  
 830              if (b == -1) {
 831                  b = c.indexOf(p);
 832  
 833                  if (b != 0)
 834                      return null;
 835              } else
 836                  b += 2;
 837  
 838              e = c.indexOf(";", b);
 839  
 840              if (e == -1)
 841                  e = c.length;
 842  
 843              return unescape(c.substring(b + p.length, e));
 844          },
 845  
 846          set : function(n, v, e, p, d, s) {
 847              document.cookie = n + "=" + escape(v) +
 848                  ((e) ? "; expires=" + e.toGMTString() : "") +
 849                  ((p) ? "; path=" + escape(p) : "") +
 850                  ((d) ? "; domain=" + d : "") +
 851                  ((s) ? "; secure" : "");
 852          },
 853  
 854          remove : function(n, p) {
 855              var d = new Date();
 856  
 857              d.setTime(d.getTime() - 1000);
 858  
 859              this.set(n, '', d, p, d);
 860          }
 861      });
 862  })();
 863  
 864  (function() {
 865  	function serialize(o, quote) {
 866          var i, v, t;
 867  
 868          quote = quote || '"';
 869  
 870          if (o == null)
 871              return 'null';
 872  
 873          t = typeof o;
 874  
 875          if (t == 'string') {
 876              v = '\bb\tt\nn\ff\rr\""\'\'\\\\';
 877  
 878              return quote + o.replace(/([\u0080-\uFFFF\x00-\x1f\"\'\\])/g, function(a, b) {
 879                  // Make sure single quotes never get encoded inside double quotes for JSON compatibility
 880                  if (quote === '"' && a === "'")
 881                      return a;
 882  
 883                  i = v.indexOf(b);
 884  
 885                  if (i + 1)
 886                      return '\\' + v.charAt(i + 1);
 887  
 888                  a = b.charCodeAt().toString(16);
 889  
 890                  return '\\u' + '0000'.substring(a.length) + a;
 891              }) + quote;
 892          }
 893  
 894          if (t == 'object') {
 895              if (o.hasOwnProperty && o instanceof Array) {
 896                      for (i=0, v = '['; i<o.length; i++)
 897                          v += (i > 0 ? ',' : '') + serialize(o[i], quote);
 898  
 899                      return v + ']';
 900                  }
 901  
 902                  v = '{';
 903  
 904                  for (i in o) {
 905                      if (o.hasOwnProperty(i)) {
 906                          v += typeof o[i] != 'function' ? (v.length > 1 ? ',' + quote : quote) + i + quote +':' + serialize(o[i], quote) : '';
 907                      }
 908                  }
 909  
 910                  return v + '}';
 911          }
 912  
 913          return '' + o;
 914      };
 915  
 916      tinymce.util.JSON = {
 917          serialize: serialize,
 918  
 919          parse: function(s) {
 920              try {
 921                  return eval('(' + s + ')');
 922              } catch (ex) {
 923                  // Ignore
 924              }
 925          }
 926  
 927          };
 928  })();
 929  
 930  tinymce.create('static tinymce.util.XHR', {
 931      send : function(o) {
 932          var x, t, w = window, c = 0;
 933  
 934          // Default settings
 935          o.scope = o.scope || this;
 936          o.success_scope = o.success_scope || o.scope;
 937          o.error_scope = o.error_scope || o.scope;
 938          o.async = o.async === false ? false : true;
 939          o.data = o.data || '';
 940  
 941  		function get(s) {
 942              x = 0;
 943  
 944              try {
 945                  x = new ActiveXObject(s);
 946              } catch (ex) {
 947              }
 948  
 949              return x;
 950          };
 951  
 952          x = w.XMLHttpRequest ? new XMLHttpRequest() : get('Microsoft.XMLHTTP') || get('Msxml2.XMLHTTP');
 953  
 954          if (x) {
 955              if (x.overrideMimeType)
 956                  x.overrideMimeType(o.content_type);
 957  
 958              x.open(o.type || (o.data ? 'POST' : 'GET'), o.url, o.async);
 959  
 960              if (o.content_type)
 961                  x.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', o.content_type);
 962  
 963              x.setRequestHeader('X-Requested-With', 'XMLHttpRequest');
 964  
 965              x.send(o.data);
 966  
 967  			function ready() {
 968                  if (!o.async || x.readyState == 4 || c++ > 10000) {
 969                      if (o.success && c < 10000 && x.status == 200)
 970                          o.success.call(o.success_scope, '' + x.responseText, x, o);
 971                      else if (o.error)
 972                          o.error.call(o.error_scope, c > 10000 ? 'TIMED_OUT' : 'GENERAL', x, o);
 973  
 974                      x = null;
 975                  } else
 976                      w.setTimeout(ready, 10);
 977              };
 978  
 979              // Syncronous request
 980              if (!o.async)
 981                  return ready();
 982  
 983              // Wait for response, onReadyStateChange can not be used since it leaks memory in IE
 984              t = w.setTimeout(ready, 10);
 985          }
 986      }
 987  });
 988  
 989  (function() {
 990      var extend = tinymce.extend, JSON = tinymce.util.JSON, XHR = tinymce.util.XHR;
 991  
 992      tinymce.create('tinymce.util.JSONRequest', {
 993          JSONRequest : function(s) {
 994              this.settings = extend({
 995              }, s);
 996              this.count = 0;
 997          },
 998  
 999          send : function(o) {
1000              var ecb = o.error, scb = o.success;
1001  
1002              o = extend(this.settings, o);
1003  
1004              o.success = function(c, x) {
1005                  c = JSON.parse(c);
1006  
1007                  if (typeof(c) == 'undefined') {
1008                      c = {
1009                          error : 'JSON Parse error.'
1010                      };
1011                  }
1012  
1013                  if (c.error)
1014                      ecb.call(o.error_scope || o.scope, c.error, x);
1015                  else
1016                      scb.call(o.success_scope || o.scope, c.result);
1017              };
1018  
1019              o.error = function(ty, x) {
1020                  if (ecb)
1021                      ecb.call(o.error_scope || o.scope, ty, x);
1022              };
1023  
1024              o.data = JSON.serialize({
1025                  id : o.id || 'c' + (this.count++),
1026                  method : o.method,
1027                  params : o.params
1028              });
1029  
1030              // JSON content type for Ruby on rails. Bug: #1883287
1031              o.content_type = 'application/json';
1032  
1033              XHR.send(o);
1034          },
1035  
1036          'static' : {
1037              sendRPC : function(o) {
1038                  return new tinymce.util.JSONRequest().send(o);
1039              }
1040          }
1041      });
1042  }());
1043  (function(tinymce){
1044      tinymce.VK = {
1045          DELETE: 46,
1046          BACKSPACE: 8,
1047          ENTER: 13,
1048          TAB: 9,
1049          SPACEBAR: 32,
1050          UP: 38,
1051          DOWN: 40,
1052          modifierPressed: function (e) {
1053              return e.shiftKey || e.ctrlKey || e.altKey;
1054          }
1055      }
1056  })(tinymce);
1057  
1058  (function(tinymce) {
1059      var VK = tinymce.VK, BACKSPACE = VK.BACKSPACE, DELETE = VK.DELETE;
1060  
1061  	function cleanupStylesWhenDeleting(ed) {
1062          var dom = ed.dom, selection = ed.selection;
1063  
1064          ed.onKeyDown.add(function(ed, e) {
1065              var rng, blockElm, node, clonedSpan, isDelete;
1066  
1067              isDelete = e.keyCode == DELETE;
1068              if ((isDelete || e.keyCode == BACKSPACE) && !VK.modifierPressed(e)) {
1069                  e.preventDefault();
1070                  rng = selection.getRng();
1071  
1072                  // Find root block
1073                  blockElm = dom.getParent(rng.startContainer, dom.isBlock);
1074  
1075                  // On delete clone the root span of the next block element
1076                  if (isDelete)
1077                      blockElm = dom.getNext(blockElm, dom.isBlock);
1078  
1079                  // Locate root span element and clone it since it would otherwise get merged by the "apple-style-span" on delete/backspace
1080                  if (blockElm) {
1081                      node = blockElm.firstChild;
1082  
1083                      // Ignore empty text nodes
1084                      while (node && node.nodeType == 3 && node.nodeValue.length == 0)
1085                          node = node.nextSibling;
1086  
1087                      if (node && node.nodeName === 'SPAN') {
1088                          clonedSpan = node.cloneNode(false);
1089                      }
1090                  }
1091  
1092                  // Do the backspace/delete actiopn
1093                  ed.getDoc().execCommand(isDelete ? 'ForwardDelete' : 'Delete', false, null);
1094  
1095                  // Find all odd apple-style-spans
1096                  blockElm = dom.getParent(rng.startContainer, dom.isBlock);
1097                  tinymce.each(dom.select('span.Apple-style-span,font.Apple-style-span', blockElm), function(span) {
1098                      var bm = selection.getBookmark();
1099  
1100                      if (clonedSpan) {
1101                          dom.replace(clonedSpan.cloneNode(false), span, true);
1102                      } else {
1103                          dom.remove(span, true);
1104                      }
1105  
1106                      // Restore the selection
1107                      selection.moveToBookmark(bm);
1108                  });
1109              }
1110          });
1111      };
1112  
1113  	function emptyEditorWhenDeleting(ed) {
1114          ed.onKeyUp.add(function(ed, e) {
1115              var keyCode = e.keyCode;
1116  
1117              if (keyCode == DELETE || keyCode == BACKSPACE) {
1118                  if (ed.dom.isEmpty(ed.getBody())) {
1119                      ed.setContent('', {format : 'raw'});
1120                      ed.nodeChanged();
1121                      return;
1122                  }
1123              }
1124          });
1125      };
1126  
1127  	function inputMethodFocus(ed) {
1128          ed.dom.bind(ed.getDoc(), 'focusin', function() {
1129              ed.selection.setRng(ed.selection.getRng());
1130          });
1131      };
1132  
1133  	function removeHrOnBackspace(ed) {
1134          ed.onKeyDown.add(function(ed, e) {
1135              if (e.keyCode === BACKSPACE) {
1136                  if (ed.selection.isCollapsed() && ed.selection.getRng(true).startOffset === 0) {
1137                      var node = ed.selection.getNode();
1138                      var previousSibling = node.previousSibling;
1139                      if (previousSibling && previousSibling.nodeName && previousSibling.nodeName.toLowerCase() === "hr") {
1140                          ed.dom.remove(previousSibling);
1141                          tinymce.dom.Event.cancel(e);
1142                      }
1143                  }
1144              }
1145          })
1146      }
1147  
1148  	function focusBody(ed) {
1149          // Fix for a focus bug in FF 3.x where the body element
1150          // wouldn't get proper focus if the user clicked on the HTML element
1151          if (!Range.prototype.getClientRects) { // Detect getClientRects got introduced in FF 4
1152              ed.onMouseDown.add(function(ed, e) {
1153                  if (e.target.nodeName === "HTML") {
1154                      var body = ed.getBody();
1155  
1156                      // Blur the body it's focused but not correctly focused
1157                      body.blur();
1158  
1159                      // Refocus the body after a little while
1160                      setTimeout(function() {
1161                          body.focus();
1162                      }, 0);
1163                  }
1164              });
1165          }
1166      };
1167  
1168  	function selectControlElements(ed) {
1169          ed.onClick.add(function(ed, e) {
1170              e = e.target;
1171  
1172              // Workaround for bug, http://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=12250
1173              // WebKit can't even do simple things like selecting an image
1174              // Needs tobe the setBaseAndExtend or it will fail to select floated images
1175              if (/^(IMG|HR)$/.test(e.nodeName))
1176                  ed.selection.getSel().setBaseAndExtent(e, 0, e, 1);
1177  
1178              if (e.nodeName == 'A' && ed.dom.hasClass(e, 'mceItemAnchor'))
1179                  ed.selection.select(e);
1180  
1181              ed.nodeChanged();
1182          });
1183      };
1184  
1185  	function removeStylesOnPTagsInheritedFromHeadingTag(ed) {
1186          ed.onKeyDown.add(function(ed, event) {
1187  			function checkInHeadingTag(ed) {
1188                  var currentNode = ed.selection.getNode();
1189                  var headingTags = 'h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6';
1190                  return ed.dom.is(currentNode, headingTags) || ed.dom.getParent(currentNode, headingTags) !== null;
1191              }
1192  
1193              if (event.keyCode === VK.ENTER && !VK.modifierPressed(event) && checkInHeadingTag(ed)) {
1194                  setTimeout(function() {
1195                      var currentNode = ed.selection.getNode();
1196                      if (ed.dom.is(currentNode, 'p')) {
1197                          ed.dom.setAttrib(currentNode, 'style', null);
1198                          // While tiny's content is correct after this method call, the content shown is not representative of it and needs to be 'repainted'
1199                          ed.execCommand('mceCleanup');
1200                      }
1201                  }, 0);
1202              }
1203          });
1204      }
1205  	function selectionChangeNodeChanged(ed) {
1206          var lastRng, selectionTimer;
1207  
1208          ed.dom.bind(ed.getDoc(), 'selectionchange', function() {
1209              if (selectionTimer) {
1210                  clearTimeout(selectionTimer);
1211                  selectionTimer = 0;
1212              }
1213  
1214              selectionTimer = window.setTimeout(function() {
1215                  var rng = ed.selection.getRng();
1216  
1217                  // Compare the ranges to see if it was a real change or not
1218                  if (!lastRng || !tinymce.dom.RangeUtils.compareRanges(rng, lastRng)) {
1219                      ed.nodeChanged();
1220                      lastRng = rng;
1221                  }
1222              }, 50);
1223          });
1224      }
1225  
1226  	function ensureBodyHasRoleApplication(ed) {
1227          document.body.setAttribute("role", "application");
1228      }
1229      
1230      tinymce.create('tinymce.util.Quirks', {
1231          Quirks: function(ed) {
1232              // WebKit
1233              if (tinymce.isWebKit) {
1234                  cleanupStylesWhenDeleting(ed);
1235                  emptyEditorWhenDeleting(ed);
1236                  inputMethodFocus(ed);
1237                  selectControlElements(ed);
1238  
1239                  // iOS
1240                  if (tinymce.isIDevice) {
1241                      selectionChangeNodeChanged(ed);
1242                  }
1243              }
1244  
1245              // IE
1246              if (tinymce.isIE) {
1247                  removeHrOnBackspace(ed);
1248                  emptyEditorWhenDeleting(ed);
1249                  ensureBodyHasRoleApplication(ed);
1250                  removeStylesOnPTagsInheritedFromHeadingTag(ed)
1251              }
1252  
1253              // Gecko
1254              if (tinymce.isGecko) {
1255                  removeHrOnBackspace(ed);
1256                  focusBody(ed);
1257              }
1258          }
1259      });
1260  })(tinymce);
1261  
1262  (function(tinymce) {
1263      var namedEntities, baseEntities, reverseEntities,
1264          attrsCharsRegExp = /[&<>\"\u007E-\uD7FF\uE000-\uFFEF]|[\uD800-\uDBFF][\uDC00-\uDFFF]/g,
1265          textCharsRegExp = /[<>&\u007E-\uD7FF\uE000-\uFFEF]|[\uD800-\uDBFF][\uDC00-\uDFFF]/g,
1266          rawCharsRegExp = /[<>&\"\']/g,
1267          entityRegExp = /&(#x|#)?([\w]+);/g,
1268          asciiMap = {
1269                  128 : "\u20AC", 130 : "\u201A", 131 : "\u0192", 132 : "\u201E", 133 : "\u2026", 134 : "\u2020",
1270                  135 : "\u2021", 136 : "\u02C6", 137 : "\u2030", 138 : "\u0160", 139 : "\u2039", 140 : "\u0152",
1271                  142 : "\u017D", 145 : "\u2018", 146 : "\u2019", 147 : "\u201C", 148 : "\u201D", 149 : "\u2022",
1272                  150 : "\u2013", 151 : "\u2014", 152 : "\u02DC", 153 : "\u2122", 154 : "\u0161", 155 : "\u203A",
1273                  156 : "\u0153", 158 : "\u017E", 159 : "\u0178"
1274          };
1275  
1276      // Raw entities
1277      baseEntities = {
1278          '\"' : '&quot;', // Needs to be escaped since the YUI compressor would otherwise break the code
1279          "'" : '&#39;',
1280          '<' : '&lt;',
1281          '>' : '&gt;',
1282          '&' : '&amp;'
1283      };
1284  
1285      // Reverse lookup table for raw entities
1286      reverseEntities = {
1287          '&lt;' : '<',
1288          '&gt;' : '>',
1289          '&amp;' : '&',
1290          '&quot;' : '"',
1291          '&apos;' : "'"
1292      };
1293  
1294      // Decodes text by using the browser
1295  	function nativeDecode(text) {
1296          var elm;
1297  
1298          elm = document.createElement("div");
1299          elm.innerHTML = text;
1300  
1301          return elm.textContent || elm.innerText || text;
1302      };
1303  
1304      // Build a two way lookup table for the entities
1305  	function buildEntitiesLookup(items, radix) {
1306          var i, chr, entity, lookup = {};
1307  
1308          if (items) {
1309              items = items.split(',');
1310              radix = radix || 10;
1311  
1312              // Build entities lookup table
1313              for (i = 0; i < items.length; i += 2) {
1314                  chr = String.fromCharCode(parseInt(items[i], radix));
1315  
1316                  // Only add non base entities
1317                  if (!baseEntities[chr]) {
1318                      entity = '&' + items[i + 1] + ';';
1319                      lookup[chr] = entity;
1320                      lookup[entity] = chr;
1321                  }
1322              }
1323  
1324              return lookup;
1325          }
1326      };
1327  
1328      // Unpack entities lookup where the numbers are in radix 32 to reduce the size
1329      namedEntities = buildEntitiesLookup(
1330          '50,nbsp,51,iexcl,52,cent,53,pound,54,curren,55,yen,56,brvbar,57,sect,58,uml,59,copy,' +
1331          '5a,ordf,5b,laquo,5c,not,5d,shy,5e,reg,5f,macr,5g,deg,5h,plusmn,5i,sup2,5j,sup3,5k,acute,' +
1332          '5l,micro,5m,para,5n,middot,5o,cedil,5p,sup1,5q,ordm,5r,raquo,5s,frac14,5t,frac12,5u,frac34,' +
1333          '5v,iquest,60,Agrave,61,Aacute,62,Acirc,63,Atilde,64,Auml,65,Aring,66,AElig,67,Ccedil,' +
1334          '68,Egrave,69,Eacute,6a,Ecirc,6b,Euml,6c,Igrave,6d,Iacute,6e,Icirc,6f,Iuml,6g,ETH,6h,Ntilde,' +
1335          '6i,Ograve,6j,Oacute,6k,Ocirc,6l,Otilde,6m,Ouml,6n,times,6o,Oslash,6p,Ugrave,6q,Uacute,' +
1336          '6r,Ucirc,6s,Uuml,6t,Yacute,6u,THORN,6v,szlig,70,agrave,71,aacute,72,acirc,73,atilde,74,auml,' +
1337          '75,aring,76,aelig,77,ccedil,78,egrave,79,eacute,7a,ecirc,7b,euml,7c,igrave,7d,iacute,7e,icirc,' +
1338          '7f,iuml,7g,eth,7h,ntilde,7i,ograve,7j,oacute,7k,ocirc,7l,otilde,7m,ouml,7n,divide,7o,oslash,' +
1339          '7p,ugrave,7q,uacute,7r,ucirc,7s,uuml,7t,yacute,7u,thorn,7v,yuml,ci,fnof,sh,Alpha,si,Beta,' +
1340          'sj,Gamma,sk,Delta,sl,Epsilon,sm,Zeta,sn,Eta,so,Theta,sp,Iota,sq,Kappa,sr,Lambda,ss,Mu,' +
1341          'st,Nu,su,Xi,sv,Omicron,t0,Pi,t1,Rho,t3,Sigma,t4,Tau,t5,Upsilon,t6,Phi,t7,Chi,t8,Psi,' +
1342          't9,Omega,th,alpha,ti,beta,tj,gamma,tk,delta,tl,epsilon,tm,zeta,tn,eta,to,theta,tp,iota,' +
1343          'tq,kappa,tr,lambda,ts,mu,tt,nu,tu,xi,tv,omicron,u0,pi,u1,rho,u2,sigmaf,u3,sigma,u4,tau,' +
1344          'u5,upsilon,u6,phi,u7,chi,u8,psi,u9,omega,uh,thetasym,ui,upsih,um,piv,812,bull,816,hellip,' +
1345          '81i,prime,81j,Prime,81u,oline,824,frasl,88o,weierp,88h,image,88s,real,892,trade,89l,alefsym,' +
1346          '8cg,larr,8ch,uarr,8ci,rarr,8cj,darr,8ck,harr,8dl,crarr,8eg,lArr,8eh,uArr,8ei,rArr,8ej,dArr,' +
1347          '8ek,hArr,8g0,forall,8g2,part,8g3,exist,8g5,empty,8g7,nabla,8g8,isin,8g9,notin,8gb,ni,8gf,prod,' +
1348          '8gh,sum,8gi,minus,8gn,lowast,8gq,radic,8gt,prop,8gu,infin,8h0,ang,8h7,and,8h8,or,8h9,cap,8ha,cup,' +
1349          '8hb,int,8hk,there4,8hs,sim,8i5,cong,8i8,asymp,8j0,ne,8j1,equiv,8j4,le,8j5,ge,8k2,sub,8k3,sup,8k4,' +
1350          'nsub,8k6,sube,8k7,supe,8kl,oplus,8kn,otimes,8l5,perp,8m5,sdot,8o8,lceil,8o9,rceil,8oa,lfloor,8ob,' +
1351          'rfloor,8p9,lang,8pa,rang,9ea,loz,9j0,spades,9j3,clubs,9j5,hearts,9j6,diams,ai,OElig,aj,oelig,b0,' +
1352          'Scaron,b1,scaron,bo,Yuml,m6,circ,ms,tilde,802,ensp,803,emsp,809,thinsp,80c,zwnj,80d,zwj,80e,lrm,' +
1353          '80f,rlm,80j,ndash,80k,mdash,80o,lsquo,80p,rsquo,80q,sbquo,80s,ldquo,80t,rdquo,80u,bdquo,810,dagger,' +
1354          '811,Dagger,81g,permil,81p,lsaquo,81q,rsaquo,85c,euro'
1355      , 32);
1356  
1357      tinymce.html = tinymce.html || {};
1358  
1359      tinymce.html.Entities = {
1360          encodeRaw : function(text, attr) {
1361              return text.replace(attr ? attrsCharsRegExp : textCharsRegExp, function(chr) {
1362                  return baseEntities[chr] || chr;
1363              });
1364          },
1365  
1366          encodeAllRaw : function(text) {
1367              return ('' + text).replace(rawCharsRegExp, function(chr) {
1368                  return baseEntities[chr] || chr;
1369              });
1370          },
1371  
1372          encodeNumeric : function(text, attr) {
1373              return text.replace(attr ? attrsCharsRegExp : textCharsRegExp, function(chr) {
1374                  // Multi byte sequence convert it to a single entity
1375                  if (chr.length > 1)
1376                      return '&#' + (((chr.charCodeAt(0) - 0xD800) * 0x400) + (chr.charCodeAt(1) - 0xDC00) + 0x10000) + ';';
1377  
1378                  return baseEntities[chr] || '&#' + chr.charCodeAt(0) + ';';
1379              });
1380          },
1381  
1382          encodeNamed : function(text, attr, entities) {
1383              entities = entities || namedEntities;
1384  
1385              return text.replace(attr ? attrsCharsRegExp : textCharsRegExp, function(chr) {
1386                  return baseEntities[chr] || entities[chr] || chr;
1387              });
1388          },
1389  
1390          getEncodeFunc : function(name, entities) {
1391              var Entities = tinymce.html.Entities;
1392  
1393              entities = buildEntitiesLookup(entities) || namedEntities;
1394  
1395  			function encodeNamedAndNumeric(text, attr) {
1396                  return text.replace(attr ? attrsCharsRegExp : textCharsRegExp, function(chr) {
1397                      return baseEntities[chr] || entities[chr] || '&#' + chr.charCodeAt(0) + ';' || chr;
1398                  });
1399              };
1400  
1401  			function encodeCustomNamed(text, attr) {
1402                  return Entities.encodeNamed(text, attr, entities);
1403              };
1404  
1405              // Replace + with , to be compatible with previous TinyMCE versions
1406              name = tinymce.makeMap(name.replace(/\+/g, ','));
1407  
1408              // Named and numeric encoder
1409              if (name.named && name.numeric)
1410                  return encodeNamedAndNumeric;
1411  
1412              // Named encoder
1413              if (name.named) {
1414                  // Custom names
1415                  if (entities)
1416                      return encodeCustomNamed;
1417  
1418                  return Entities.encodeNamed;
1419              }
1420  
1421              // Numeric
1422              if (name.numeric)
1423                  return Entities.encodeNumeric;
1424  
1425              // Raw encoder
1426              return Entities.encodeRaw;
1427          },
1428  
1429          decode : function(text) {
1430              return text.replace(entityRegExp, function(all, numeric, value) {
1431                  if (numeric) {
1432                      value = parseInt(value, numeric.length === 2 ? 16 : 10);
1433  
1434                      // Support upper UTF
1435                      if (value > 0xFFFF) {
1436                          value -= 0x10000;
1437  
1438                          return String.fromCharCode(0xD800 + (value >> 10), 0xDC00 + (value & 0x3FF));
1439                      } else
1440                          return asciiMap[value] || String.fromCharCode(value);
1441                  }
1442  
1443                  return reverseEntities[all] || namedEntities[all] || nativeDecode(all);
1444              });
1445          }
1446      };
1447  })(tinymce);
1448  
1449  tinymce.html.Styles = function(settings, schema) {
1450      var rgbRegExp = /rgb\s*\(\s*([0-9]+)\s*,\s*([0-9]+)\s*,\s*([0-9]+)\s*\)/gi,
1451          urlOrStrRegExp = /(?:url(?:(?:\(\s*\"([^\"]+)\"\s*\))|(?:\(\s*\'([^\']+)\'\s*\))|(?:\(\s*([^)\s]+)\s*\))))|(?:\'([^\']+)\')|(?:\"([^\"]+)\")/gi,
1452          styleRegExp = /\s*([^:]+):\s*([^;]+);?/g,
1453          trimRightRegExp = /\s+$/,
1454          urlColorRegExp = /rgb/,
1455          undef, i, encodingLookup = {}, encodingItems;
1456  
1457      settings = settings || {};
1458  
1459      encodingItems = '\\" \\\' \\; \\: ; : \uFEFF'.split(' ');
1460      for (i = 0; i < encodingItems.length; i++) {
1461          encodingLookup[encodingItems[i]] = '\uFEFF' + i;
1462          encodingLookup['\uFEFF' + i] = encodingItems[i];
1463      }
1464  
1465  	function toHex(match, r, g, b) {
1466  		function hex(val) {
1467              val = parseInt(val).toString(16);
1468  
1469              return val.length > 1 ? val : '0' + val; // 0 -> 00
1470          };
1471  
1472          return '#' + hex(r) + hex(g) + hex(b);
1473      };
1474  
1475      return {
1476          toHex : function(color) {
1477              return color.replace(rgbRegExp, toHex);
1478          },
1479  
1480          parse : function(css) {
1481              var styles = {}, matches, name, value, isEncoded, urlConverter = settings.url_converter, urlConverterScope = settings.url_converter_scope || this;
1482  
1483  			function compress(prefix, suffix) {
1484                  var top, right, bottom, left;
1485  
1486                  // Get values and check it it needs compressing
1487                  top = styles[prefix + '-top' + suffix];
1488                  if (!top)
1489                      return;
1490  
1491                  right = styles[prefix + '-right' + suffix];
1492                  if (top != right)
1493                      return;
1494  
1495                  bottom = styles[prefix + '-bottom' + suffix];
1496                  if (right != bottom)
1497                      return;
1498  
1499                  left = styles[prefix + '-left' + suffix];
1500                  if (bottom != left)
1501                      return;
1502  
1503                  // Compress
1504                  styles[prefix + suffix] = left;
1505                  delete styles[prefix + '-top' + suffix];
1506                  delete styles[prefix + '-right' + suffix];
1507                  delete styles[prefix + '-bottom' + suffix];
1508                  delete styles[prefix + '-left' + suffix];
1509              };
1510  
1511  			function canCompress(key) {
1512                  var value = styles[key], i;
1513  
1514                  if (!value || value.indexOf(' ') < 0)
1515                      return;
1516  
1517                  value = value.split(' ');
1518                  i = value.length;
1519                  while (i--) {
1520                      if (value[i] !== value[0])
1521                          return false;
1522                  }
1523  
1524                  styles[key] = value[0];
1525  
1526                  return true;
1527              };
1528  
1529  			function compress2(target, a, b, c) {
1530                  if (!canCompress(a))
1531                      return;
1532  
1533                  if (!canCompress(b))
1534                      return;
1535  
1536                  if (!canCompress(c))
1537                      return;
1538  
1539                  // Compress
1540                  styles[target] = styles[a] + ' ' + styles[b] + ' ' + styles[c];
1541                  delete styles[a];
1542                  delete styles[b];
1543                  delete styles[c];
1544              };
1545  
1546              // Encodes the specified string by replacing all \" \' ; : with _<num>
1547  			function encode(str) {
1548                  isEncoded = true;
1549  
1550                  return encodingLookup[str];
1551              };
1552  
1553              // Decodes the specified string by replacing all _<num> with it's original value \" \' etc
1554              // It will also decode the \" \' if keep_slashes is set to fale or omitted
1555  			function decode(str, keep_slashes) {
1556                  if (isEncoded) {
1557                      str = str.replace(/\uFEFF[0-9]/g, function(str) {
1558                          return encodingLookup[str];
1559                      });
1560                  }
1561  
1562                  if (!keep_slashes)
1563                      str = str.replace(/\\([\'\";:])/g, "$1");
1564  
1565                  return str;
1566              }
1567  
1568              if (css) {
1569                  // Encode \" \' % and ; and : inside strings so they don't interfere with the style parsing
1570                  css = css.replace(/\\[\"\';:\uFEFF]/g, encode).replace(/\"[^\"]+\"|\'[^\']+\'/g, function(str) {
1571                      return str.replace(/[;:]/g, encode);
1572                  });
1573  
1574                  // Parse styles
1575                  while (matches = styleRegExp.exec(css)) {
1576                      name = matches[1].replace(trimRightRegExp, '').toLowerCase();
1577                      value = matches[2].replace(trimRightRegExp, '');
1578  
1579                      if (name && value.length > 0) {
1580                          // Opera will produce 700 instead of bold in their style values
1581                          if (name === 'font-weight' && value === '700')
1582                              value = 'bold';
1583                          else if (name === 'color' || name === 'background-color') // Lowercase colors like RED
1584                              value = value.toLowerCase();        
1585  
1586                          // Convert RGB colors to HEX
1587                          value = value.replace(rgbRegExp, toHex);
1588  
1589                          // Convert URLs and force them into url('value') format
1590                          value = value.replace(urlOrStrRegExp, function(match, url, url2, url3, str, str2) {
1591                              str = str || str2;
1592  
1593                              if (str) {
1594                                  str = decode(str);
1595  
1596                                  // Force strings into single quote format
1597                                  return "'" + str.replace(/\'/g, "\\'") + "'";
1598                              }
1599  
1600                              url = decode(url || url2 || url3);
1601  
1602                              // Convert the URL to relative/absolute depending on config
1603                              if (urlConverter)
1604                                  url = urlConverter.call(urlConverterScope, url, 'style');
1605  
1606                              // Output new URL format
1607                              return "url('" + url.replace(/\'/g, "\\'") + "')";
1608                          });
1609  
1610                          styles[name] = isEncoded ? decode(value, true) : value;
1611                      }
1612  
1613                      styleRegExp.lastIndex = matches.index + matches[0].length;
1614                  }
1615  
1616                  // Compress the styles to reduce it's size for example IE will expand styles
1617                  compress("border", "");
1618                  compress("border", "-width");
1619                  compress("border", "-color");
1620                  compress("border", "-style");
1621                  compress("padding", "");
1622                  compress("margin", "");
1623                  compress2('border', 'border-width', 'border-style', 'border-color');
1624  
1625                  // Remove pointless border, IE produces these
1626                  if (styles.border === 'medium none')
1627                      delete styles.border;
1628              }
1629  
1630              return styles;
1631          },
1632  
1633          serialize : function(styles, element_name) {
1634              var css = '', name, value;
1635  
1636  			function serializeStyles(name) {
1637                  var styleList, i, l, value;
1638  
1639                  styleList = schema.styles[name];
1640                  if (styleList) {
1641                      for (i = 0, l = styleList.length; i < l; i++) {
1642                          name = styleList[i];
1643                          value = styles[name];
1644  
1645                          if (value !== undef && value.length > 0)
1646                              css += (css.length > 0 ? ' ' : '') + name + ': ' + value + ';';
1647                      }
1648                  }
1649              };
1650  
1651              // Serialize styles according to schema
1652              if (element_name && schema && schema.styles) {
1653                  // Serialize global styles and element specific styles
1654                  serializeStyles('*');
1655                  serializeStyles(element_name);
1656              } else {
1657                  // Output the styles in the order they are inside the object
1658                  for (name in styles) {
1659                      value = styles[name];
1660  
1661                      if (value !== undef && value.length > 0)
1662                          css += (css.length > 0 ? ' ' : '') + name + ': ' + value + ';';
1663                  }
1664              }
1665  
1666              return css;
1667          }
1668      };
1669  };
1670  
1671  (function(tinymce) {
1672      var transitional = {}, boolAttrMap, blockElementsMap, shortEndedElementsMap, nonEmptyElementsMap, customElementsMap = {},
1673          defaultWhiteSpaceElementsMap, selfClosingElementsMap, makeMap = tinymce.makeMap, each = tinymce.each;
1674  
1675  	function split(str, delim) {
1676          return str.split(delim || ',');
1677      };
1678  
1679  	function unpack(lookup, data) {
1680          var key, elements = {};
1681  
1682  		function replace(value) {
1683              return value.replace(/[A-Z]+/g, function(key) {
1684                  return replace(lookup[key]);
1685              });
1686          };
1687  
1688          // Unpack lookup
1689          for (key in lookup) {
1690              if (lookup.hasOwnProperty(key))
1691                  lookup[key] = replace(lookup[key]);
1692          }
1693  
1694          // Unpack and parse data into object map
1695          replace(data).replace(/#/g, '#text').replace(/(\w+)\[([^\]]+)\]\[([^\]]*)\]/g, function(str, name, attributes, children) {
1696              attributes = split(attributes, '|');
1697  
1698              elements[name] = {
1699                  attributes : makeMap(attributes),
1700                  attributesOrder : attributes,
1701                  children : makeMap(children, '|', {'#comment' : {}})
1702              }
1703          });
1704  
1705          return elements;
1706      };
1707  
1708      // Build a lookup table for block elements both lowercase and uppercase
1709      blockElementsMap = 'h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,hr,p,div,address,pre,form,table,tbody,thead,tfoot,' + 
1710                          'th,tr,td,li,ol,ul,caption,blockquote,center,dl,dt,dd,dir,fieldset,' + 
1711                          'noscript,menu,isindex,samp,header,footer,article,section,hgroup';
1712      blockElementsMap = makeMap(blockElementsMap, ',', makeMap(blockElementsMap.toUpperCase()));
1713  
1714      // This is the XHTML 1.0 transitional elements with it's attributes and children packed to reduce it's size
1715      transitional = unpack({
1716          Z : 'H|K|N|O|P',
1717          Y : 'X|form|R|Q',
1718          ZG : 'E|span|width|align|char|charoff|valign',
1719          X : 'p|T|div|U|W|isindex|fieldset|table',
1720          ZF : 'E|align|char|charoff|valign',
1721          W : 'pre|hr|blockquote|address|center|noframes',
1722          ZE : 'abbr|axis|headers|scope|rowspan|colspan|align|char|charoff|valign|nowrap|bgcolor|width|height',
1723          ZD : '[E][S]',
1724          U : 'ul|ol|dl|menu|dir',
1725          ZC : 'p|Y|div|U|W|table|br|span|bdo|object|applet|img|map|K|N|Q',
1726          T : 'h1|h2|h3|h4|h5|h6',
1727          ZB : 'X|S|Q',
1728          S : 'R|P',
1729          ZA : 'a|G|J|M|O|P',
1730          R : 'a|H|K|N|O',
1731          Q : 'noscript|P',
1732          P : 'ins|del|script',
1733          O : 'input|select|textarea|label|button',
1734          N : 'M|L',
1735          M : 'em|strong|dfn|code|q|samp|kbd|var|cite|abbr|acronym',
1736          L : 'sub|sup',
1737          K : 'J|I',
1738          J : 'tt|i|b|u|s|strike',
1739          I : 'big|small|font|basefont',
1740          H : 'G|F',
1741          G : 'br|span|bdo',
1742          F : 'object|applet|img|map|iframe',
1743          E : 'A|B|C',
1744          D : 'accesskey|tabindex|onfocus|onblur',
1745          C : 'onclick|ondblclick|onmousedown|onmouseup|onmouseover|onmousemove|onmouseout|onkeypress|onkeydown|onkeyup',
1746          B : 'lang|xml:lang|dir',
1747          A : 'id|class|style|title'
1748      }, 'script[id|charset|type|language|src|defer|xml:space][]' + 
1749          'style[B|id|type|media|title|xml:space][]' + 
1750          'object[E|declare|classid|codebase|data|type|codetype|archive|standby|width|height|usemap|name|tabindex|align|border|hspace|vspace][#|param|Y]' + 
1751          'param[id|name|value|valuetype|type][]' + 
1752          'p[E|align][#|S]' + 
1753          'a[E|D|charset|type|name|href|hreflang|rel|rev|shape|coords|target][#|Z]' + 
1754          'br[A|clear][]' + 
1755          'span[E][#|S]' + 
1756          'bdo[A|C|B][#|S]' + 
1757          'applet[A|codebase|archive|code|object|alt|name|width|height|align|hspace|vspace][#|param|Y]' + 
1758          'h1[E|align][#|S]' + 
1759          'img[E|src|alt|name|longdesc|width|height|usemap|ismap|align|border|hspace|vspace][]' + 
1760          'map[B|C|A|name][X|form|Q|area]' + 
1761          'h2[E|align][#|S]' + 
1762          'iframe[A|longdesc|name|src|frameborder|marginwidth|marginheight|scrolling|align|width|height][#|Y]' + 
1763          'h3[E|align][#|S]' + 
1764          'tt[E][#|S]' + 
1765          'i[E][#|S]' + 
1766          'b[E][#|S]' + 
1767          'u[E][#|S]' + 
1768          's[E][#|S]' + 
1769          'strike[E][#|S]' + 
1770          'big[E][#|S]' + 
1771          'small[E][#|S]' + 
1772          'font[A|B|size|color|face][#|S]' + 
1773          'basefont[id|size|color|face][]' + 
1774          'em[E][#|S]' + 
1775          'strong[E][#|S]' + 
1776          'dfn[E][#|S]' + 
1777          'code[E][#|S]' + 
1778          'q[E|cite][#|S]' + 
1779          'samp[E][#|S]' + 
1780          'kbd[E][#|S]' + 
1781          'var[E][#|S]' + 
1782          'cite[E][#|S]' + 
1783          'abbr[E][#|S]' + 
1784          'acronym[E][#|S]' + 
1785          'sub[E][#|S]' + 
1786          'sup[E][#|S]' + 
1787          'input[E|D|type|name|value|checked|disabled|readonly|size|maxlength|src|alt|usemap|onselect|onchange|accept|align][]' + 
1788          'select[E|name|size|multiple|disabled|tabindex|onfocus|onblur|onchange][optgroup|option]' + 
1789          'optgroup[E|disabled|label][option]' + 
1790          'option[E|selected|disabled|label|value][]' + 
1791          'textarea[E|D|name|rows|cols|disabled|readonly|onselect|onchange][]' + 
1792          'label[E|for|accesskey|onfocus|onblur][#|S]' + 
1793          'button[E|D|name|value|type|disabled][#|p|T|div|U|W|table|G|object|applet|img|map|K|N|Q]' + 
1794          'h4[E|align][#|S]' + 
1795          'ins[E|cite|datetime][#|Y]' + 
1796          'h5[E|align][#|S]' + 
1797          'del[E|cite|datetime][#|Y]' + 
1798          'h6[E|align][#|S]' + 
1799          'div[E|align][#|Y]' + 
1800          'ul[E|type|compact][li]' + 
1801          'li[E|type|value][#|Y]' + 
1802          'ol[E|type|compact|start][li]' + 
1803          'dl[E|compact][dt|dd]' + 
1804          'dt[E][#|S]' + 
1805          'dd[E][#|Y]' + 
1806          'menu[E|compact][li]' + 
1807          'dir[E|compact][li]' + 
1808          'pre[E|width|xml:space][#|ZA]' + 
1809          'hr[E|align|noshade|size|width][]' + 
1810          'blockquote[E|cite][#|Y]' + 
1811          'address[E][#|S|p]' + 
1812          'center[E][#|Y]' + 
1813          'noframes[E][#|Y]' + 
1814          'isindex[A|B|prompt][]' + 
1815          'fieldset[E][#|legend|Y]' + 
1816          'legend[E|accesskey|align][#|S]' + 
1817          'table[E|summary|width|border|frame|rules|cellspacing|cellpadding|align|bgcolor][caption|col|colgroup|thead|tfoot|tbody|tr]' + 
1818          'caption[E|align][#|S]' + 
1819          'col[ZG][]' + 
1820          'colgroup[ZG][col]' + 
1821          'thead[ZF][tr]' + 
1822          'tr[ZF|bgcolor][th|td]' + 
1823          'th[E|ZE][#|Y]' + 
1824          'form[E|action|method|name|enctype|onsubmit|onreset|accept|accept-charset|target][#|X|R|Q]' + 
1825          'noscript[E][#|Y]' + 
1826          'td[E|ZE][#|Y]' + 
1827          'tfoot[ZF][tr]' + 
1828          'tbody[ZF][tr]' + 
1829          'area[E|D|shape|coords|href|nohref|alt|target][]' + 
1830          'base[id|href|target][]' + 
1831          'body[E|onload|onunload|background|bgcolor|text|link|vlink|alink][#|Y]'
1832      );
1833  
1834      boolAttrMap = makeMap('checked,compact,declare,defer,disabled,ismap,multiple,nohref,noresize,noshade,nowrap,readonly,selected,autoplay,loop,controls');
1835      shortEndedElementsMap = makeMap('area,base,basefont,br,col,frame,hr,img,input,isindex,link,meta,param,embed,source');
1836      nonEmptyElementsMap = tinymce.extend(makeMap('td,th,iframe,video,audio,object'), shortEndedElementsMap);
1837      defaultWhiteSpaceElementsMap = makeMap('pre,script,style,textarea');
1838      selfClosingElementsMap = makeMap('colgroup,dd,dt,li,options,p,td,tfoot,th,thead,tr');
1839  
1840      tinymce.html.Schema = function(settings) {
1841          var self = this, elements = {}, children = {}, patternElements = [], validStyles, whiteSpaceElementsMap;
1842  
1843          settings = settings || {};
1844  
1845          // Allow all elements and attributes if verify_html is set to false
1846          if (settings.verify_html === false)
1847              settings.valid_elements = '*[*]';
1848  
1849          // Build styles list
1850          if (settings.valid_styles) {
1851              validStyles = {};
1852  
1853              // Convert styles into a rule list
1854              each(settings.valid_styles, function(value, key) {
1855                  validStyles[key] = tinymce.explode(value);
1856              });
1857          }
1858  
1859          whiteSpaceElementsMap = settings.whitespace_elements ? makeMap(settings.whitespace_elements) : defaultWhiteSpaceElementsMap;
1860  
1861          // Converts a wildcard expression string to a regexp for example *a will become /.*a/.
1862  		function patternToRegExp(str) {
1863              return new RegExp('^' + str.replace(/([?+*])/g, '.$1') + '$');
1864          };
1865  
1866          // Parses the specified valid_elements string and adds to the current rules
1867          // This function is a bit hard to read since it's heavily optimized for speed
1868  		function addValidElements(valid_elements) {
1869              var ei, el, ai, al, yl, matches, element, attr, attrData, elementName, attrName, attrType, attributes, attributesOrder,
1870                  prefix, outputName, globalAttributes, globalAttributesOrder, transElement, key, childKey, value,
1871                  elementRuleRegExp = /^([#+-])?([^\[\/]+)(?:\/([^\[]+))?(?:\[([^\]]+)\])?$/,
1872                  attrRuleRegExp = /^([!\-])?(\w+::\w+|[^=:<]+)?(?:([=:<])(.*))?$/,
1873                  hasPatternsRegExp = /[*?+]/;
1874  
1875              if (valid_elements) {
1876                  // Split valid elements into an array with rules
1877                  valid_elements = split(valid_elements);
1878  
1879                  if (elements['@']) {
1880                      globalAttributes = elements['@'].attributes;
1881                      globalAttributesOrder = elements['@'].attributesOrder;
1882                  }
1883  
1884                  // Loop all rules
1885                  for (ei = 0, el = valid_elements.length; ei < el; ei++) {
1886                      // Parse element rule
1887                      matches = elementRuleRegExp.exec(valid_elements[ei]);
1888                      if (matches) {
1889                          // Setup local names for matches
1890                          prefix = matches[1];
1891                          elementName = matches[2];
1892                          outputName = matches[3];
1893                          attrData = matches[4];
1894  
1895                          // Create new attributes and attributesOrder
1896                          attributes = {};
1897                          attributesOrder = [];
1898  
1899                          // Create the new element
1900                          element = {
1901                              attributes : attributes,
1902                              attributesOrder : attributesOrder
1903                          };
1904  
1905                          // Padd empty elements prefix
1906                          if (prefix === '#')
1907                              element.paddEmpty = true;
1908  
1909                          // Remove empty elements prefix
1910                          if (prefix === '-')
1911                              element.removeEmpty = true;
1912  
1913                          // Copy attributes from global rule into current rule
1914                          if (globalAttributes) {
1915                              for (key in globalAttributes)
1916                                  attributes[key] = globalAttributes[key];
1917  
1918                              attributesOrder.push.apply(attributesOrder, globalAttributesOrder);
1919                          }
1920  
1921                          // Attributes defined
1922                          if (attrData) {
1923                              attrData = split(attrData, '|');
1924                              for (ai = 0, al = attrData.length; ai < al; ai++) {
1925                                  matches = attrRuleRegExp.exec(attrData[ai]);
1926                                  if (matches) {
1927                                      attr = {};
1928                                      attrType = matches[1];
1929                                      attrName = matches[2].replace(/::/g, ':');
1930                                      prefix = matches[3];
1931                                      value = matches[4];
1932  
1933                                      // Required
1934                                      if (attrType === '!') {
1935                                          element.attributesRequired = element.attributesRequired || [];
1936                                          element.attributesRequired.push(attrName);
1937                                          attr.required = true;
1938                                      }
1939  
1940                                      // Denied from global
1941                                      if (attrType === '-') {
1942                                          delete attributes[attrName];
1943                                          attributesOrder.splice(tinymce.inArray(attributesOrder, attrName), 1);
1944                                          continue;
1945                                      }
1946  
1947                                      // Default value
1948                                      if (prefix) {
1949                                          // Default value
1950                                          if (prefix === '=') {
1951                                              element.attributesDefault = element.attributesDefault || [];
1952                                              element.attributesDefault.push({name: attrName, value: value});
1953                                              attr.defaultValue = value;
1954                                          }
1955  
1956                                          // Forced value
1957                                          if (prefix === ':') {
1958                                              element.attributesForced = element.attributesForced || [];
1959                                              element.attributesForced.push({name: attrName, value: value});
1960                                              attr.forcedValue = value;
1961                                          }
1962  
1963                                          // Required values
1964                                          if (prefix === '<')
1965                                              attr.validValues = makeMap(value, '?');
1966                                      }
1967  
1968                                      // Check for attribute patterns
1969                                      if (hasPatternsRegExp.test(attrName)) {
1970                                          element.attributePatterns = element.attributePatterns || [];
1971                                          attr.pattern = patternToRegExp(attrName);
1972                                          element.attributePatterns.push(attr);
1973                                      } else {
1974                                          // Add attribute to order list if it doesn't already exist
1975                                          if (!attributes[attrName])
1976                                              attributesOrder.push(attrName);
1977  
1978                                          attributes[attrName] = attr;
1979                                      }
1980                                  }
1981                              }
1982                          }
1983  
1984                          // Global rule, store away these for later usage
1985                          if (!globalAttributes && elementName == '@') {
1986                              globalAttributes = attributes;
1987                              globalAttributesOrder = attributesOrder;
1988                          }
1989
