1990                          // Handle substitute elements such as b/strong
1991                          if (outputName) {
1992                              element.outputName = elementName;
1993                              elements[outputName] = element;
1994                          }
1995  
1996                          // Add pattern or exact element
1997                          if (hasPatternsRegExp.test(elementName)) {
1998                              element.pattern = patternToRegExp(elementName);
1999                              patternElements.push(element);
2000                          } else
2001                              elements[elementName] = element;
2002                      }
2003                  }
2004              }
2005          };
2006  
2007  		function setValidElements(valid_elements) {
2008              elements = {};
2009              patternElements = [];
2010  
2011              addValidElements(valid_elements);
2012  
2013              each(transitional, function(element, name) {
2014                  children[name] = element.children;
2015              });
2016          };
2017  
2018          // Adds custom non HTML elements to the schema
2019  		function addCustomElements(custom_elements) {
2020              var customElementRegExp = /^(~)?(.+)$/;
2021  
2022              if (custom_elements) {
2023                  each(split(custom_elements), function(rule) {
2024                      var matches = customElementRegExp.exec(rule),
2025                          inline = matches[1] === '~',
2026                          cloneName = inline ? 'span' : 'div',
2027                          name = matches[2];
2028  
2029                      children[name] = children[cloneName];
2030                      customElementsMap[name] = cloneName;
2031  
2032                      // If it's not marked as inline then add it to valid block elements
2033                      if (!inline)
2034                          blockElementsMap[name] = {};
2035  
2036                      // Add custom elements at span/div positions
2037                      each(children, function(element, child) {
2038                          if (element[cloneName])
2039                              element[name] = element[cloneName];
2040                      });
2041                  });
2042              }
2043          };
2044  
2045          // Adds valid children to the schema object
2046  		function addValidChildren(valid_children) {
2047              var childRuleRegExp = /^([+\-]?)(\w+)\[([^\]]+)\]$/;
2048  
2049              if (valid_children) {
2050                  each(split(valid_children), function(rule) {
2051                      var matches = childRuleRegExp.exec(rule), parent, prefix;
2052  
2053                      if (matches) {
2054                          prefix = matches[1];
2055  
2056                          // Add/remove items from default
2057                          if (prefix)
2058                              parent = children[matches[2]];
2059                          else
2060                              parent = children[matches[2]] = {'#comment' : {}};
2061  
2062                          parent = children[matches[2]];
2063  
2064                          each(split(matches[3], '|'), function(child) {
2065                              if (prefix === '-')
2066                                  delete parent[child];
2067                              else
2068                                  parent[child] = {};
2069                          });
2070                      }
2071                  });
2072              }
2073          };
2074  
2075  		function getElementRule(name) {
2076              var element = elements[name], i;
2077  
2078              // Exact match found
2079              if (element)
2080                  return element;
2081  
2082              // No exact match then try the patterns
2083              i = patternElements.length;
2084              while (i--) {
2085                  element = patternElements[i];
2086  
2087                  if (element.pattern.test(name))
2088                      return element;
2089              }
2090          };
2091  
2092          if (!settings.valid_elements) {
2093              // No valid elements defined then clone the elements from the transitional spec
2094              each(transitional, function(element, name) {
2095                  elements[name] = {
2096                      attributes : element.attributes,
2097                      attributesOrder : element.attributesOrder
2098                  };
2099  
2100                  children[name] = element.children;
2101              });
2102  
2103              // Switch these
2104              each(split('strong/b,em/i'), function(item) {
2105                  item = split(item, '/');
2106                  elements[item[1]].outputName = item[0];
2107              });
2108  
2109              // Add default alt attribute for images
2110              elements.img.attributesDefault = [{name: 'alt', value: ''}];
2111  
2112              // Remove these if they are empty by default
2113              each(split('ol,ul,sub,sup,blockquote,span,font,a,table,tbody,tr'), function(name) {
2114                  elements[name].removeEmpty = true;
2115              });
2116  
2117              // Padd these by default
2118              each(split('p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,th,td,pre,div,address,caption'), function(name) {
2119                  elements[name].paddEmpty = true;
2120              });
2121          } else
2122              setValidElements(settings.valid_elements);
2123  
2124          addCustomElements(settings.custom_elements);
2125          addValidChildren(settings.valid_children);
2126          addValidElements(settings.extended_valid_elements);
2127  
2128          // Todo: Remove this when we fix list handling to be valid
2129          addValidChildren('+ol[ul|ol],+ul[ul|ol]');
2130  
2131          // If the user didn't allow span only allow internal spans
2132          if (!getElementRule('span'))
2133              addValidElements('span[!data-mce-type|*]');
2134  
2135          // Delete invalid elements
2136          if (settings.invalid_elements) {
2137              tinymce.each(tinymce.explode(settings.invalid_elements), function(item) {
2138                  if (elements[item])
2139                      delete elements[item];
2140              });
2141          }
2142  
2143          self.children = children;
2144  
2145          self.styles = validStyles;
2146  
2147          self.getBoolAttrs = function() {
2148              return boolAttrMap;
2149          };
2150  
2151          self.getBlockElements = function() {
2152              return blockElementsMap;
2153          };
2154  
2155          self.getShortEndedElements = function() {
2156              return shortEndedElementsMap;
2157          };
2158  
2159          self.getSelfClosingElements = function() {
2160              return selfClosingElementsMap;
2161          };
2162  
2163          self.getNonEmptyElements = function() {
2164              return nonEmptyElementsMap;
2165          };
2166  
2167          self.getWhiteSpaceElements = function() {
2168              return whiteSpaceElementsMap;
2169          };
2170  
2171          self.isValidChild = function(name, child) {
2172              var parent = children[name];
2173  
2174              return !!(parent && parent[child]);
2175          };
2176  
2177          self.getElementRule = getElementRule;
2178  
2179          self.getCustomElements = function() {
2180              return customElementsMap;
2181          };
2182  
2183          self.addValidElements = addValidElements;
2184  
2185          self.setValidElements = setValidElements;
2186  
2187          self.addCustomElements = addCustomElements;
2188  
2189          self.addValidChildren = addValidChildren;
2190      };
2191  
2192      // Expose boolMap and blockElementMap as static properties for usage in DOMUtils
2193      tinymce.html.Schema.boolAttrMap = boolAttrMap;
2194      tinymce.html.Schema.blockElementsMap = blockElementsMap;
2195  })(tinymce);
2196  
2197  (function(tinymce) {
2198      tinymce.html.SaxParser = function(settings, schema) {
2199          var self = this, noop = function() {};
2200  
2201          settings = settings || {};
2202          self.schema = schema = schema || new tinymce.html.Schema();
2203  
2204          if (settings.fix_self_closing !== false)
2205              settings.fix_self_closing = true;
2206  
2207          // Add handler functions from settings and setup default handlers
2208          tinymce.each('comment cdata text start end pi doctype'.split(' '), function(name) {
2209              if (name)
2210                  self[name] = settings[name] || noop;
2211          });
2212  
2213          self.parse = function(html) {
2214              var self = this, matches, index = 0, value, endRegExp, stack = [], attrList, i, text, name, isInternalElement, removeInternalElements,
2215                  shortEndedElements, fillAttrsMap, isShortEnded, validate, elementRule, isValidElement, attr, attribsValue, invalidPrefixRegExp,
2216                  validAttributesMap, validAttributePatterns, attributesRequired, attributesDefault, attributesForced, selfClosing,
2217                  tokenRegExp, attrRegExp, specialElements, attrValue, idCount = 0, decode = tinymce.html.Entities.decode, fixSelfClosing, isIE;
2218  
2219  			function processEndTag(name) {
2220                  var pos, i;
2221  
2222                  // Find position of parent of the same type
2223                  pos = stack.length;
2224                  while (pos--) {
2225                      if (stack[pos].name === name)
2226                          break;                        
2227                  }
2228  
2229                  // Found parent
2230                  if (pos >= 0) {
2231                      // Close all the open elements
2232                      for (i = stack.length - 1; i >= pos; i--) {
2233                          name = stack[i];
2234  
2235                          if (name.valid)
2236                              self.end(name.name);
2237                      }
2238  
2239                      // Remove the open elements from the stack
2240                      stack.length = pos;
2241                  }
2242              };
2243  
2244              // Precompile RegExps and map objects
2245              tokenRegExp = new RegExp('<(?:' +
2246                  '(?:!--([\\w\\W]*?)-->)|' + // Comment
2247                  '(?:!\\[CDATA\\[([\\w\\W]*?)\\]\\]>)|' + // CDATA
2248                  '(?:!DOCTYPE([\\w\\W]*?)>)|' + // DOCTYPE
2249                  '(?:\\?([^\\s\\/<>]+) ?([\\w\\W]*?)[?/]>)|' + // PI
2250                  '(?:\\/([^>]+)>)|' + // End element
2251                  '(?:([^\\s\\/<>]+)((?:\\s+[^"\'>]+(?:(?:"[^"]*")|(?:\'[^\']*\')|[^>]*))*|\\/)>)' + // Start element
2252              ')', 'g');
2253  
2254              attrRegExp = /([\w:\-]+)(?:\s*=\s*(?:(?:\"((?:\\.|[^\"])*)\")|(?:\'((?:\\.|[^\'])*)\')|([^>\s]+)))?/g;
2255              specialElements = {
2256                  'script' : /<\/script[^>]*>/gi,
2257                  'style' : /<\/style[^>]*>/gi,
2258                  'noscript' : /<\/noscript[^>]*>/gi
2259              };
2260  
2261              // Setup lookup tables for empty elements and boolean attributes
2262              shortEndedElements = schema.getShortEndedElements();
2263              selfClosing = schema.getSelfClosingElements();
2264              fillAttrsMap = schema.getBoolAttrs();
2265              validate = settings.validate;
2266              removeInternalElements = settings.remove_internals;
2267              fixSelfClosing = settings.fix_self_closing;
2268              isIE = tinymce.isIE;
2269              invalidPrefixRegExp = /^:/;
2270  
2271              while (matches = tokenRegExp.exec(html)) {
2272                  // Text
2273                  if (index < matches.index)
2274                      self.text(decode(html.substr(index, matches.index - index)));
2275  
2276                  if (value = matches[6]) { // End element
2277                      value = value.toLowerCase();
2278  
2279                      // IE will add a ":" in front of elements it doesn't understand like custom elements or HTML5 elements
2280                      if (isIE && invalidPrefixRegExp.test(value))
2281                          value = value.substr(1);
2282  
2283                      processEndTag(value);
2284                  } else if (value = matches[7]) { // Start element
2285                      value = value.toLowerCase();
2286  
2287                      // IE will add a ":" in front of elements it doesn't understand like custom elements or HTML5 elements
2288                      if (isIE && invalidPrefixRegExp.test(value))
2289                          value = value.substr(1);
2290  
2291                      isShortEnded = value in shortEndedElements;
2292  
2293                      // Is self closing tag for example an <li> after an open <li>
2294                      if (fixSelfClosing && selfClosing[value] && stack.length > 0 && stack[stack.length - 1].name === value)
2295                          processEndTag(value);
2296  
2297                      // Validate element
2298                      if (!validate || (elementRule = schema.getElementRule(value))) {
2299                          isValidElement = true;
2300  
2301                          // Grab attributes map and patters when validation is enabled
2302                          if (validate) {
2303                              validAttributesMap = elementRule.attributes;
2304                              validAttributePatterns = elementRule.attributePatterns;
2305                          }
2306  
2307                          // Parse attributes
2308                          if (attribsValue = matches[8]) {
2309                              isInternalElement = attribsValue.indexOf('data-mce-type') !== -1; // Check if the element is an internal element
2310  
2311                              // If the element has internal attributes then remove it if we are told to do so
2312                              if (isInternalElement && removeInternalElements)
2313                                  isValidElement = false;
2314  
2315                              attrList = [];
2316                              attrList.map = {};
2317  
2318                              attribsValue.replace(attrRegExp, function(match, name, value, val2, val3) {
2319                                  var attrRule, i;
2320  
2321                                  name = name.toLowerCase();
2322                                  value = name in fillAttrsMap ? name : decode(value || val2 || val3 || ''); // Handle boolean attribute than value attribute
2323  
2324                                  // Validate name and value
2325                                  if (validate && !isInternalElement && name.indexOf('data-') !== 0) {
2326                                      attrRule = validAttributesMap[name];
2327  
2328                                      // Find rule by pattern matching
2329                                      if (!attrRule && validAttributePatterns) {
2330                                          i = validAttributePatterns.length;
2331                                          while (i--) {
2332                                              attrRule = validAttributePatterns[i];
2333                                              if (attrRule.pattern.test(name))
2334                                                  break;
2335                                          }
2336  
2337                                          // No rule matched
2338                                          if (i === -1)
2339                                              attrRule = null;
2340                                      }
2341  
2342                                      // No attribute rule found
2343                                      if (!attrRule)
2344                                          return;
2345  
2346                                      // Validate value
2347                                      if (attrRule.validValues && !(value in attrRule.validValues))
2348                                          return;
2349                                  }
2350  
2351                                  // Add attribute to list and map
2352                                  attrList.map[name] = value;
2353                                  attrList.push({
2354                                      name: name,
2355                                      value: value
2356                                  });
2357                              });
2358                          } else {
2359                              attrList = [];
2360                              attrList.map = {};
2361                          }
2362  
2363                          // Process attributes if validation is enabled
2364                          if (validate && !isInternalElement) {
2365                              attributesRequired = elementRule.attributesRequired;
2366                              attributesDefault = elementRule.attributesDefault;
2367                              attributesForced = elementRule.attributesForced;
2368  
2369                              // Handle forced attributes
2370                              if (attributesForced) {
2371                                  i = attributesForced.length;
2372                                  while (i--) {
2373                                      attr = attributesForced[i];
2374                                      name = attr.name;
2375                                      attrValue = attr.value;
2376  
2377                                      if (attrValue === '{$uid}')
2378                                          attrValue = 'mce_' + idCount++;
2379  
2380                                      attrList.map[name] = attrValue;
2381                                      attrList.push({name: name, value: attrValue});
2382                                  }
2383                              }
2384  
2385                              // Handle default attributes
2386                              if (attributesDefault) {
2387                                  i = attributesDefault.length;
2388                                  while (i--) {
2389                                      attr = attributesDefault[i];
2390                                      name = attr.name;
2391  
2392                                      if (!(name in attrList.map)) {
2393                                          attrValue = attr.value;
2394  
2395                                          if (attrValue === '{$uid}')
2396                                              attrValue = 'mce_' + idCount++;
2397  
2398                                          attrList.map[name] = attrValue;
2399                                          attrList.push({name: name, value: attrValue});
2400                                      }
2401                                  }
2402                              }
2403  
2404                              // Handle required attributes
2405                              if (attributesRequired) {
2406                                  i = attributesRequired.length;
2407                                  while (i--) {
2408                                      if (attributesRequired[i] in attrList.map)
2409                                          break;
2410                                  }
2411  
2412                                  // None of the required attributes where found
2413                                  if (i === -1)
2414                                      isValidElement = false;
2415                              }
2416  
2417                              // Invalidate element if it's marked as bogus
2418                              if (attrList.map['data-mce-bogus'])
2419                                  isValidElement = false;
2420                          }
2421  
2422                          if (isValidElement)
2423                              self.start(value, attrList, isShortEnded);
2424                      } else
2425                          isValidElement = false;
2426  
2427                      // Treat script, noscript and style a bit different since they may include code that looks like elements
2428                      if (endRegExp = specialElements[value]) {
2429                          endRegExp.lastIndex = index = matches.index + matches[0].length;
2430  
2431                          if (matches = endRegExp.exec(html)) {
2432                              if (isValidElement)
2433                                  text = html.substr(index, matches.index - index);
2434  
2435                              index = matches.index + matches[0].length;
2436                          } else {
2437                              text = html.substr(index);
2438                              index = html.length;
2439                          }
2440  
2441                          if (isValidElement && text.length > 0)
2442                              self.text(text, true);
2443  
2444                          if (isValidElement)
2445                              self.end(value);
2446  
2447                          tokenRegExp.lastIndex = index;
2448                          continue;
2449                      }
2450  
2451                      // Push value on to stack
2452                      if (!isShortEnded) {
2453                          if (!attribsValue || attribsValue.indexOf('/') != attribsValue.length - 1)
2454                              stack.push({name: value, valid: isValidElement});
2455                          else if (isValidElement)
2456                              self.end(value);
2457                      }
2458                  } else if (value = matches[1]) { // Comment
2459                      self.comment(value);
2460                  } else if (value = matches[2]) { // CDATA
2461                      self.cdata(value);
2462                  } else if (value = matches[3]) { // DOCTYPE
2463                      self.doctype(value);
2464                  } else if (value = matches[4]) { // PI
2465                      self.pi(value, matches[5]);
2466                  }
2467  
2468                  index = matches.index + matches[0].length;
2469              }
2470  
2471              // Text
2472              if (index < html.length)
2473                  self.text(decode(html.substr(index)));
2474  
2475              // Close any open elements
2476              for (i = stack.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
2477                  value = stack[i];
2478  
2479                  if (value.valid)
2480                      self.end(value.name);
2481              }
2482          };
2483      }
2484  })(tinymce);
2485  
2486  (function(tinymce) {
2487      var whiteSpaceRegExp = /^[ \t\r\n]*$/, typeLookup = {
2488          '#text' : 3,
2489          '#comment' : 8,
2490          '#cdata' : 4,
2491          '#pi' : 7,
2492          '#doctype' : 10,
2493          '#document-fragment' : 11
2494      };
2495  
2496      // Walks the tree left/right
2497  	function walk(node, root_node, prev) {
2498          var sibling, parent, startName = prev ? 'lastChild' : 'firstChild', siblingName = prev ? 'prev' : 'next';
2499  
2500          // Walk into nodes if it has a start
2501          if (node[startName])
2502              return node[startName];
2503  
2504          // Return the sibling if it has one
2505          if (node !== root_node) {
2506              sibling = node[siblingName];
2507  
2508              if (sibling)
2509                  return sibling;
2510  
2511              // Walk up the parents to look for siblings
2512              for (parent = node.parent; parent && parent !== root_node; parent = parent.parent) {
2513                  sibling = parent[siblingName];
2514  
2515                  if (sibling)
2516                      return sibling;
2517              }
2518          }
2519      };
2520  
2521  	function Node(name, type) {
2522          this.name = name;
2523          this.type = type;
2524  
2525          if (type === 1) {
2526              this.attributes = [];
2527              this.attributes.map = {};
2528          }
2529      }
2530  
2531      tinymce.extend(Node.prototype, {
2532          replace : function(node) {
2533              var self = this;
2534  
2535              if (node.parent)
2536                  node.remove();
2537  
2538              self.insert(node, self);
2539              self.remove();
2540  
2541              return self;
2542          },
2543  
2544          attr : function(name, value) {
2545              var self = this, attrs, i, undef;
2546  
2547              if (typeof name !== "string") {
2548                  for (i in name)
2549                      self.attr(i, name[i]);
2550  
2551                  return self;
2552              }
2553  
2554              if (attrs = self.attributes) {
2555                  if (value !== undef) {
2556                      // Remove attribute
2557                      if (value === null) {
2558                          if (name in attrs.map) {
2559                              delete attrs.map[name];
2560  
2561                              i = attrs.length;
2562                              while (i--) {
2563                                  if (attrs[i].name === name) {
2564                                      attrs = attrs.splice(i, 1);
2565                                      return self;
2566                                  }
2567                              }
2568                          }
2569  
2570                          return self;
2571                      }
2572  
2573                      // Set attribute
2574                      if (name in attrs.map) {
2575                          // Set attribute
2576                          i = attrs.length;
2577                          while (i--) {
2578                              if (attrs[i].name === name) {
2579                                  attrs[i].value = value;
2580                                  break;
2581                              }
2582                          }
2583                      } else
2584                          attrs.push({name: name, value: value});
2585  
2586                      attrs.map[name] = value;
2587  
2588                      return self;
2589                  } else {
2590                      return attrs.map[name];
2591                  }
2592              }
2593          },
2594  
2595          clone : function() {
2596              var self = this, clone = new Node(self.name, self.type), i, l, selfAttrs, selfAttr, cloneAttrs;
2597  
2598              // Clone element attributes
2599              if (selfAttrs = self.attributes) {
2600                  cloneAttrs = [];
2601                  cloneAttrs.map = {};
2602  
2603                  for (i = 0, l = selfAttrs.length; i < l; i++) {
2604                      selfAttr = selfAttrs[i];
2605  
2606                      // Clone everything except id
2607                      if (selfAttr.name !== 'id') {
2608                          cloneAttrs[cloneAttrs.length] = {name: selfAttr.name, value: selfAttr.value};
2609                          cloneAttrs.map[selfAttr.name] = selfAttr.value;
2610                      }
2611                  }
2612  
2613                  clone.attributes = cloneAttrs;
2614              }
2615  
2616              clone.value = self.value;
2617              clone.shortEnded = self.shortEnded;
2618  
2619              return clone;
2620          },
2621  
2622          wrap : function(wrapper) {
2623              var self = this;
2624  
2625              self.parent.insert(wrapper, self);
2626              wrapper.append(self);
2627  
2628              return self;
2629          },
2630  
2631          unwrap : function() {
2632              var self = this, node, next;
2633  
2634              for (node = self.firstChild; node; ) {
2635                  next = node.next;
2636                  self.insert(node, self, true);
2637                  node = next;
2638              }
2639  
2640              self.remove();
2641          },
2642  
2643          remove : function() {
2644              var self = this, parent = self.parent, next = self.next, prev = self.prev;
2645  
2646              if (parent) {
2647                  if (parent.firstChild === self) {
2648                      parent.firstChild = next;
2649  
2650                      if (next)
2651                          next.prev = null;
2652                  } else {
2653                      prev.next = next;
2654                  }
2655  
2656                  if (parent.lastChild === self) {
2657                      parent.lastChild = prev;
2658  
2659                      if (prev)
2660                          prev.next = null;
2661                  } else {
2662                      next.prev = prev;
2663                  }
2664  
2665                  self.parent = self.next = self.prev = null;
2666              }
2667  
2668              return self;
2669          },
2670  
2671          append : function(node) {
2672              var self = this, last;
2673  
2674              if (node.parent)
2675                  node.remove();
2676  
2677              last = self.lastChild;
2678              if (last) {
2679                  last.next = node;
2680                  node.prev = last;
2681                  self.lastChild = node;
2682              } else
2683                  self.lastChild = self.firstChild = node;
2684  
2685              node.parent = self;
2686  
2687              return node;
2688          },
2689  
2690          insert : function(node, ref_node, before) {
2691              var parent;
2692  
2693              if (node.parent)
2694                  node.remove();
2695  
2696              parent = ref_node.parent || this;
2697  
2698              if (before) {
2699                  if (ref_node === parent.firstChild)
2700                      parent.firstChild = node;
2701                  else
2702                      ref_node.prev.next = node;
2703  
2704                  node.prev = ref_node.prev;
2705                  node.next = ref_node;
2706                  ref_node.prev = node;
2707              } else {
2708                  if (ref_node === parent.lastChild)
2709                      parent.lastChild = node;
2710                  else
2711                      ref_node.next.prev = node;
2712  
2713                  node.next = ref_node.next;
2714                  node.prev = ref_node;
2715                  ref_node.next = node;
2716              }
2717  
2718              node.parent = parent;
2719  
2720              return node;
2721          },
2722  
2723          getAll : function(name) {
2724              var self = this, node, collection = [];
2725  
2726              for (node = self.firstChild; node; node = walk(node, self)) {
2727                  if (node.name === name)
2728                      collection.push(node);
2729              }
2730  
2731              return collection;
2732          },
2733  
2734          empty : function() {
2735              var self = this, nodes, i, node;
2736  
2737              // Remove all children
2738              if (self.firstChild) {
2739                  nodes = [];
2740  
2741                  // Collect the children
2742                  for (node = self.firstChild; node; node = walk(node, self))
2743                      nodes.push(node);
2744  
2745                  // Remove the children
2746                  i = nodes.length;
2747                  while (i--) {
2748                      node = nodes[i];
2749                      node.parent = node.firstChild = node.lastChild = node.next = node.prev = null;
2750                  }
2751              }
2752  
2753              self.firstChild = self.lastChild = null;
2754  
2755              return self;
2756          },
2757  
2758          isEmpty : function(elements) {
2759              var self = this, node = self.firstChild, i, name;
2760  
2761              if (node) {
2762                  do {
2763                      if (node.type === 1) {
2764                          // Ignore bogus elements
2765                          if (node.attributes.map['data-mce-bogus'])
2766                              continue;
2767  
2768                          // Keep empty elements like <img />
2769                          if (elements[node.name])
2770                              return false;
2771  
2772                          // Keep elements with data attributes or name attribute like <a name="1"></a>
2773                          i = node.attributes.length;
2774                          while (i--) {
2775                              name = node.attributes[i].name;
2776                              if (name === "name" || name.indexOf('data-') === 0)
2777                                  return false;
2778                          }
2779                      }
2780  
2781                      // Keep non whitespace text nodes
2782                      if ((node.type === 3 && !whiteSpaceRegExp.test(node.value)))
2783                          return false;
2784                  } while (node = walk(node, self));
2785              }
2786  
2787              return true;
2788          },
2789  
2790          walk : function(prev) {
2791              return walk(this, null, prev);
2792          }
2793      });
2794  
2795      tinymce.extend(Node, {
2796          create : function(name, attrs) {
2797              var node, attrName;
2798  
2799              // Create node
2800              node = new Node(name, typeLookup[name] || 1);
2801  
2802              // Add attributes if needed
2803              if (attrs) {
2804                  for (attrName in attrs)
2805                      node.attr(attrName, attrs[attrName]);
2806              }
2807  
2808              return node;
2809          }
2810      });
2811  
2812      tinymce.html.Node = Node;
2813  })(tinymce);
2814  
2815  (function(tinymce) {
2816      var Node = tinymce.html.Node;
2817  
2818      tinymce.html.DomParser = function(settings, schema) {
2819          var self = this, nodeFilters = {}, attributeFilters = [], matchedNodes = {}, matchedAttributes = {};
2820  
2821          settings = settings || {};
2822          settings.validate = "validate" in settings ? settings.validate : true;
2823          settings.root_name = settings.root_name || 'body';
2824          self.schema = schema = schema || new tinymce.html.Schema();
2825  
2826  		function fixInvalidChildren(nodes) {
2827              var ni, node, parent, parents, newParent, currentNode, tempNode, childNode, i,
2828                  childClone, nonEmptyElements, nonSplitableElements, sibling, nextNode;
2829  
2830              nonSplitableElements = tinymce.makeMap('tr,td,th,tbody,thead,tfoot,table');
2831              nonEmptyElements = schema.getNonEmptyElements();
2832  
2833              for (ni = 0; ni < nodes.length; ni++) {
2834                  node = nodes[ni];
2835  
2836                  // Already removed
2837                  if (!node.parent)
2838                      continue;
2839  
2840                  // Get list of all parent nodes until we find a valid parent to stick the child into
2841                  parents = [node];
2842                  for (parent = node.parent; parent && !schema.isValidChild(parent.name, node.name) && !nonSplitableElements[parent.name]; parent = parent.parent)
2843                      parents.push(parent);
2844  
2845                  // Found a suitable parent
2846                  if (parent && parents.length > 1) {
2847                      // Reverse the array since it makes looping easier
2848                      parents.reverse();
2849  
2850                      // Clone the related parent and insert that after the moved node
2851                      newParent = currentNode = self.filterNode(parents[0].clone());
2852  
2853                      // Start cloning and moving children on the left side of the target node
2854                      for (i = 0; i < parents.length - 1; i++) {
2855                          if (schema.isValidChild(currentNode.name, parents[i].name)) {
2856                              tempNode = self.filterNode(parents[i].clone());
2857                              currentNode.append(tempNode);
2858                          } else
2859                              tempNode = currentNode;
2860  
2861                          for (childNode = parents[i].firstChild; childNode && childNode != parents[i + 1]; ) {
2862                              nextNode = childNode.next;
2863                              tempNode.append(childNode);
2864                              childNode = nextNode;
2865                          }
2866  
2867                          currentNode = tempNode;
2868                      }
2869  
2870                      if (!newParent.isEmpty(nonEmptyElements)) {
2871                          parent.insert(newParent, parents[0], true);
2872                          parent.insert(node, newParent);
2873                      } else {
2874                          parent.insert(node, parents[0], true);
2875                      }
2876  
2877                      // Check if the element is empty by looking through it's contents and special treatment for <p><br /></p>
2878                      parent = parents[0];
2879                      if (parent.isEmpty(nonEmptyElements) || parent.firstChild === parent.lastChild && parent.firstChild.name === 'br') {
2880                          parent.empty().remove();
2881                      }
2882                  } else if (node.parent) {
2883                      // If it's an LI try to find a UL/OL for it or wrap it
2884                      if (node.name === 'li') {
2885                          sibling = node.prev;
2886                          if (sibling && (sibling.name === 'ul' || sibling.name === 'ul')) {
2887                              sibling.append(node);
2888                              continue;
2889                          }
2890  
2891                          sibling = node.next;
2892                          if (sibling && (sibling.name === 'ul' || sibling.name === 'ul')) {
2893                              sibling.insert(node, sibling.firstChild, true);
2894                              continue;
2895                          }
2896  
2897                          node.wrap(self.filterNode(new Node('ul', 1)));
2898                          continue;
2899                      }
2900  
2901                      // Try wrapping the element in a DIV
2902                      if (schema.isValidChild(node.parent.name, 'div') && schema.isValidChild('div', node.name)) {
2903                          node.wrap(self.filterNode(new Node('div', 1)));
2904                      } else {
2905                          // We failed wrapping it, then remove or unwrap it
2906                          if (node.name === 'style' || node.name === 'script')
2907                              node.empty().remove();
2908                          else
2909                              node.unwrap();
2910                      }
2911                  }
2912              }
2913          };
2914  
2915          self.filterNode = function(node) {
2916              var i, name, list;
2917  
2918              // Run element filters
2919              if (name in nodeFilters) {
2920                  list = matchedNodes[name];
2921  
2922                  if (list)
2923                      list.push(node);
2924                  else
2925                      matchedNodes[name] = [node];
2926              }
2927  
2928              // Run attribute filters
2929              i = attributeFilters.length;
2930              while (i--) {
2931                  name = attributeFilters[i].name;
2932  
2933                  if (name in node.attributes.map) {
2934                      list = matchedAttributes[name];
2935  
2936                      if (list)
2937                          list.push(node);
2938                      else
2939                          matchedAttributes[name] = [node];
2940                  }
2941              }
2942  
2943              return node;
2944          };
2945  
2946          self.addNodeFilter = function(name, callback) {
2947              tinymce.each(tinymce.explode(name), function(name) {
2948                  var list = nodeFilters[name];
2949  
2950                  if (!list)
2951                      nodeFilters[name] = list = [];
2952  
2953                  list.push(callback);
2954              });
2955          };
2956  
2957          self.addAttributeFilter = function(name, callback) {
2958              tinymce.each(tinymce.explode(name), function(name) {
2959                  var i;
2960  
2961                  for (i = 0; i < attributeFilters.length; i++) {
2962                      if (attributeFilters[i].name === name) {
2963                          attributeFilters[i].callbacks.push(callback);
2964                          return;
2965                      }
2966                  }
2967  
2968                  attributeFilters.push({name: name, callbacks: [callback]});
2969              });
2970          };
2971  
2972          self.parse = function(html, args) {
2973              var parser, rootNode, node, nodes, i, l, fi, fl, list, name, validate,
2974                  blockElements, startWhiteSpaceRegExp, invalidChildren = [],
2975                  endWhiteSpaceRegExp, allWhiteSpaceRegExp, whiteSpaceElements, children, nonEmptyElements, rootBlockName;
2976  
2977              args = args || {};
2978              matchedNodes = {};
2979              matchedAttributes = {};
2980              blockElements = tinymce.extend(tinymce.makeMap('script,style,head,html,body,title,meta,param'), schema.getBlockElements());
2981              nonEmptyElements = schema.getNonEmptyElements();
2982              children = schema.children;
2983              validate = settings.validate;
2984              rootBlockName = "forced_root_block" in args ? args.forced_root_block : settings.forced_root_block;
2985  
2986              whiteSpaceElements = schema.getWhiteSpaceElements();
2987              startWhiteSpaceRegExp = /^[ \t\r\n]+/;
2988              endWhiteSpaceRegExp = /[ \t\r\n]+$/;
2989              allWhiteSpaceRegExp = /[ \t\r\n]+/g;
2990  
2991  			function addRootBlocks() {
2992                  var node = rootNode.firstChild, next, rootBlockNode;
2993  
2994                  while (node) {
2995                      next = node.next;
2996  
2997                      if (node.type == 3 || (node.type == 1 && node.name !== 'p' && !blockElements[node.name] && !node.attr('data-mce-type'))) {
2998                          if (!rootBlockNode) {
2999                              // Create a new root block element
3000                              rootBlockNode = createNode(rootBlockName, 1);
3001                              rootNode.insert(rootBlockNode, node);
3002                              rootBlockNode.append(node);
3003                          } else
3004                              rootBlockNode.append(node);
3005                      } else {
3006                          rootBlockNode = null;
3007                      }
3008  
3009                      node = next;
3010                  };
3011              };
3012  
3013  			function createNode(name, type) {
3014                  var node = new Node(name, type), list;
3015  
3016                  if (name in nodeFilters) {
3017                      list = matchedNodes[name];
3018  
3019                      if (list)
3020                          list.push(node);
3021                      else
3022                          matchedNodes[name] = [node];
3023                  }
3024  
3025                  return node;
3026              };
3027  
3028  			function removeWhitespaceBefore(node) {
3029                  var textNode, textVal, sibling;
3030  
3031                  for (textNode = node.prev; textNode && textNode.type === 3; ) {
3032                      textVal = textNode.value.replace(endWhiteSpaceRegExp, '');
3033  
3034                      if (textVal.length > 0) {
3035                          textNode.value = textVal;
3036                          textNode = textNode.prev;
3037                      } else {
3038                          sibling = textNode.prev;
3039                          textNode.remove();
3040                          textNode = sibling;
3041                      }
3042                  }
3043              };
3044  
3045              parser = new tinymce.html.SaxParser({
3046                  validate : validate,
3047                  fix_self_closing : !validate, // Let the DOM parser handle <li> in <li> or <p> in <p> for better results
3048  
3049                  cdata: function(text) {
3050                      node.append(createNode('#cdata', 4)).value = text;
3051                  },
3052  
3053                  text: function(text, raw) {
3054                      var textNode;
3055  
3056                      // Trim all redundant whitespace on non white space elements
3057                      if (!whiteSpaceElements[node.name]) {
3058                          text = text.replace(allWhiteSpaceRegExp, ' ');
3059  
3060                          if (node.lastChild && blockElements[node.lastChild.name])
3061                              text = text.replace(startWhiteSpaceRegExp, '');
3062                      }
3063  
3064                      // Do we need to create the node
3065                      if (text.length !== 0) {
3066                          textNode = createNode('#text', 3);
3067                          textNode.raw = !!raw;
3068                          node.append(textNode).value = text;
3069                      }
3070                  },
3071  
3072                  comment: function(text) {
3073                      node.append(createNode('#comment', 8)).value = text;
3074                  },
3075  
3076                  pi: function(name, text) {
3077                      node.append(createNode(name, 7)).value = text;
3078                      removeWhitespaceBefore(node);
3079                  },
3080  
3081                  doctype: function(text) {
3082                      var newNode;
3083          
3084                      newNode = node.append(createNode('#doctype', 10));
3085                      newNode.value = text;
3086                      removeWhitespaceBefore(node);
3087                  },
3088  
3089                  start: function(name, attrs, empty) {
3090                      var newNode, attrFiltersLen, elementRule, textNode, attrName, text, sibling, parent;
3091  
3092                      elementRule = validate ? schema.getElementRule(name) : {};
3093                      if (elementRule) {
3094                          newNode = createNode(elementRule.outputName || name, 1);
3095                          newNode.attributes = attrs;
3096                          newNode.shortEnded = empty;
3097  
3098                          node.append(newNode);
3099  
3100                          // Check if node is valid child of the parent node is the child is
3101                          // unknown we don't collect it since it's probably a custom element
3102                          parent = children[node.name];
3103                          if (parent && children[newNode.name] && !parent[newNode.name])
3104                              invalidChildren.push(newNode);
3105  
3106                          attrFiltersLen = attributeFilters.length;
3107                          while (attrFiltersLen--) {
3108                              attrName = attributeFilters[attrFiltersLen].name;
3109  
3110                              if (attrName in attrs.map) {
3111                                  list = matchedAttributes[attrName];
3112  
3113                                  if (list)
3114                                      list.push(newNode);
3115                                  else
3116                                      matchedAttributes[attrName] = [newNode];
3117                              }
3118                          }
3119  
3120                          // Trim whitespace before block
3121                          if (blockElements[name])
3122                              removeWhitespaceBefore(newNode);
3123  
3124                          // Change current node if the element wasn't empty i.e not <br /> or <img />
3125                          if (!empty)
3126                              node = newNode;
3127                      }
3128                  },
3129  
3130                  end: function(name) {
3131                      var textNode, elementRule, text, sibling, tempNode;
3132  
3133                      elementRule = validate ? schema.getElementRule(name) : {};
3134                      if (elementRule) {
3135                          if (blockElements[name]) {
3136                              if (!whiteSpaceElements[node.name]) {
3137                                  // Trim whitespace at beginning of block
3138                                  for (textNode = node.firstChild; textNode && textNode.type === 3; ) {
3139                                      text = textNode.value.replace(startWhiteSpaceRegExp, '');
3140  
3141                                      if (text.length > 0) {
3142                                          textNode.value = text;
3143                                          textNode = textNode.next;
3144                                      } else {
3145                                          sibling = textNode.next;
3146                                          textNode.remove();
3147                                          textNode = sibling;
3148                                      }
3149                                  }
3150  
3151                                  // Trim whitespace at end of block
3152                                  for (textNode = node.lastChild; textNode && textNode.type === 3; ) {
3153                                      text = textNode.value.replace(endWhiteSpaceRegExp, '');
3154  
3155                                      if (text.length > 0) {
3156                                          textNode.value = text;
3157                                          textNode = textNode.prev;
3158                                      } else {
3159                                          sibling = textNode.prev;
3160                                          textNode.remove();
3161                                          textNode = sibling;
3162                                      }
3163                                  }
3164                              }
3165  
3166                              // Trim start white space
3167                              textNode = node.prev;
3168                              if (textNode && textNode.type === 3) {
3169                                  text = textNode.value.replace(startWhiteSpaceRegExp, '');
3170  
3171                                  if (text.length > 0)
3172                                      textNode.value = text;
3173                                  else
3174                                      textNode.remove();
3175                              }
3176                          }
3177  
3178                          // Handle empty nodes
3179                          if (elementRule.removeEmpty || elementRule.paddEmpty) {
3180                              if (node.isEmpty(nonEmptyElements)) {
3181                                  if (elementRule.paddEmpty)
3182                                      node.empty().append(new Node('#text', '3')).value = '\u00a0';
3183                                  else {
3184                                      // Leave nodes that have a name like <a name="name">
3185                                      if (!node.attributes.map.name) {
3186                                          tempNode = node.parent;
3187                                          node.empty().remove();
3188                                          node = tempNode;
3189                                          return;
3190                                      }
3191                                  }
3192                              }
3193                          }
3194  
3195                          node = node.parent;
3196                      }
3197                  }
3198              }, schema);
3199  
3200              rootNode = node = new Node(args.context || settings.root_name, 11);
3201  
3202              parser.parse(html);
3203  
3204              // Fix invalid children or report invalid children in a contextual parsing
3205              if (validate && invalidChildren.length) {
3206                  if (!args.context)
3207                      fixInvalidChildren(invalidChildren);
3208                  else
3209                      args.invalid = true;
3210              }
3211  
3212              // Wrap nodes in the root into block elements if the root is body
3213              if (rootBlockName && rootNode.name == 'body')
3214                  addRootBlocks();
3215  
3216              // Run filters only when the contents is valid
3217              if (!args.invalid) {
3218                  // Run node filters
3219                  for (name in matchedNodes) {
3220                      list = nodeFilters[name];
3221                      nodes = matchedNodes[name];
3222  
3223                      // Remove already removed children
3224                      fi = nodes.length;
3225                      while (fi--) {
3226                          if (!nodes[fi].parent)
3227                              nodes.splice(fi, 1);
3228                      }
3229  
3230                      for (i = 0, l = list.length; i < l; i++)
3231                          list[i](nodes, name, args);
3232                  }
3233  
3234                  // Run attribute filters
3235                  for (i = 0, l = attributeFilters.length; i < l; i++) {
3236                      list = attributeFilters[i];
3237  
3238                      if (list.name in matchedAttributes) {
3239                          nodes = matchedAttributes[list.name];
3240  
3241                          // Remove already removed children
3242                          fi = nodes.length;
3243                          while (fi--) {
3244                              if (!nodes[fi].parent)
3245                                  nodes.splice(fi, 1);
3246                          }
3247  
3248                          for (fi = 0, fl = list.callbacks.length; fi < fl; fi++)
3249                              list.callbacks[fi](nodes, list.name, args);
3250                      }
3251                  }
3252              }
3253  
3254              return rootNode;
3255          };
3256  
3257          // Remove <br> at end of block elements Gecko and WebKit injects BR elements to
3258          // make it possible to place the caret inside empty blocks. This logic tries to remove
3259          // these elements and keep br elements that where intended to be there intact
3260          if (settings.remove_trailing_brs) {
3261              self.addNodeFilter('br', function(nodes, name) {
3262                  var i, l = nodes.length, node, blockElements = schema.getBlockElements(),
3263                      nonEmptyElements = schema.getNonEmptyElements(), parent, prev, prevName;
3264  
3265                  // Remove brs from body element as well
3266                  blockElements.body = 1;
3267  
3268                  // Must loop forwards since it will otherwise remove all brs in <p>a<br><br><br></p>
3269                  for (i = 0; i < l; i++) {
3270                      node = nodes[i];
3271                      parent = node.parent;
3272  
3273                      if (blockElements[node.parent.name] && node === parent.lastChild) {
3274                          // Loop all nodes to the right of the current node and check for other BR elements
3275                          // excluding bookmarks since they are invisible
3276                          prev = node.prev;
3277                          while (prev) {
3278                              prevName = prev.name;
3279  
3280                              // Ignore bookmarks
3281                              if (prevName !== "span" || prev.attr('data-mce-type') !== 'bookmark') {
3282                                  // Found a non BR element
3283                                  if (prevName !== "br")
3284                                      break;
3285      
3286                                  // Found another br it's a <br><br> structure then don't remove anything
3287                                  if (prevName === 'br') {
3288                                      node = null;
3289                                      break;
3290                                  }
3291                              }
3292  
3293                              prev = prev.prev;
3294                          }
3295  
3296                          if (node) {
3297                              node.remove();
3298  
3299                              // Is the parent to be considered empty after we removed the BR
3300                              if (parent.isEmpty(nonEmptyElements)) {
3301                                  elementRule = schema.getElementRule(parent.name);
3302  
3303                                  // Remove or padd the element depending on schema rule
3304                                  if (elementRule) {
3305                                    if (elementRule.removeEmpty)
3306                                        parent.remove();
3307                                    else if (elementRule.paddEmpty)
3308                                        parent.empty().append(new tinymce.html.Node('#text', 3)).value = '\u00a0';
3309                                }
3310                }
3311                          }
3312                      }
3313                  }
3314              });
3315          }
3316      }
3317  })(tinymce);
3318  
3319  tinymce.html.Writer = function(settings) {
3320      var html = [], indent, indentBefore, indentAfter, encode, htmlOutput;
3321  
3322      settings = settings || {};
3323      indent = settings.indent;
3324      indentBefore = tinymce.makeMap(settings.indent_before || '');
3325      indentAfter = tinymce.makeMap(settings.indent_after || '');
3326      encode = tinymce.html.Entities.getEncodeFunc(settings.entity_encoding || 'raw', settings.entities);
3327      htmlOutput = settings.element_format == "html";
3328  
3329      return {
3330          start: function(name, attrs, empty) {
3331              var i, l, attr, value;
3332  
3333              if (indent && indentBefore[name] && html.length > 0) {
3334                  value = html[html.length - 1];
3335  
3336                  if (value.length > 0 && value !== '\n')
3337                      html.push('\n');
3338              }
3339  
3340              html.push('<', name);
3341  
3342              if (attrs) {
3343                  for (i = 0, l = attrs.length; i < l; i++) {
3344                      attr = attrs[i];
3345                      html.push(' ', attr.name, '="', encode(attr.value, true), '"');
3346                  }
3347              }
3348  
3349              if (!empty || htmlOutput)
3350                  html[html.length] = '>';
3351              else
3352                  html[html.length] = ' />';
3353  
3354              if (empty && indent && indentAfter[name] && html.length > 0) {
3355                  value = html[html.length - 1];
3356  
3357                  if (value.length > 0 && value !== '\n')
3358                      html.push('\n');
3359              }
3360          },
3361  
3362          end: function(name) {
3363              var value;
3364  
3365              /*if (indent && indentBefore[name] && html.length > 0) {
3366                  value = html[html.length - 1];
3367  
3368                  if (value.length > 0 && value !== '\n')
3369                      html.push('\n');
3370              }*/
3371  
3372              html.push('</', name, '>');
3373  
3374              if (indent && indentAfter[name] && html.length > 0) {
3375                  value = html[html.length - 1];
3376  
3377                  if (value.length > 0 && value !== '\n')
3378                      html.push('\n');
3379              }
3380          },
3381  
3382          text: function(text, raw) {
3383              if (text.length > 0)
3384                  html[html.length] = raw ? text : encode(text);
3385          },
3386  
3387          cdata: function(text) {
3388              html.push('<![CDATA[', text, ']]>');
3389          },
3390  
3391          comment: function(text) {
3392              html.push('<!--', text, '-->');
3393          },
3394  
3395          pi: function(name, text) {
3396              if (text)
3397                  html.push('<?', name, ' ', text, '?>');
3398              else
3399                  html.push('<?', name, '?>');
3400  
3401              if (indent)
3402                  html.push('\n');
3403          },
3404  
3405          doctype: function(text) {
3406              html.push('<!DOCTYPE', text, '>', indent ? '\n' : '');
3407          },
3408  
3409          reset: function() {
3410              html.length = 0;
3411          },
3412  
3413          getContent: function() {
3414              return html.join('').replace(/\n$/, '');
3415          }
3416      };
3417  };
3418  
3419  (function(tinymce) {
3420      tinymce.html.Serializer = function(settings, schema) {
3421          var self = this, writer = new tinymce.html.Writer(settings);
3422  
3423          settings = settings || {};
3424          settings.validate = "validate" in settings ? settings.validate : true;
3425  
3426          self.schema = schema = schema || new tinymce.html.Schema();
3427          self.writer = writer;
3428  
3429          self.serialize = function(node) {
3430              var handlers, validate;
3431  
3432              validate = settings.validate;
3433  
3434              handlers = {
3435                  // #text
3436                  3: function(node, raw) {
3437                      writer.text(node.value, node.raw);
3438                  },
3439  
3440                  // #comment
3441                  8: function(node) {
3442                      writer.comment(node.value);
3443                  },
3444  
3445                  // Processing instruction
3446                  7: function(node) {
3447                      writer.pi(node.name, node.value);
3448                  },
3449  
3450                  // Doctype
3451                  10: function(node) {
3452                      writer.doctype(node.value);
3453                  },
3454  
3455                  // CDATA
3456                  4: function(node) {
3457                      writer.cdata(node.value);
3458                  },
3459  
3460                   // Document fragment
3461                  11: function(node) {
3462                      if ((node = node.firstChild)) {
3463                          do {
3464                              walk(node);
3465                          } while (node = node.next);
3466                      }
3467                  }
3468              };
3469  
3470              writer.reset();
3471  
3472  			function walk(node) {
3473                  var handler = handlers[node.type], name, isEmpty, attrs, attrName, attrValue, sortedAttrs, i, l, elementRule;
3474  
3475                  if (!handler) {
3476                      name = node.name;
3477                      isEmpty = node.shortEnded;
3478                      attrs = node.attributes;
3479  
3480                      // Sort attributes
3481                      if (validate && attrs && attrs.length > 1) {
3482                          sortedAttrs = [];
3483                          sortedAttrs.map = {};
3484  
3485                          elementRule = schema.getElementRule(node.name);
3486                          for (i = 0, l = elementRule.attributesOrder.length; i < l; i++) {
3487                              attrName = elementRule.attributesOrder[i];
3488  
3489                              if (attrName in attrs.map) {
3490                                  attrValue = attrs.map[attrName];
3491                                  sortedAttrs.map[attrName] = attrValue;
3492                                  sortedAttrs.push({name: attrName, value: attrValue});
3493                              }
3494                          }
3495  
3496                          for (i = 0, l = attrs.length; i < l; i++) {
3497                              attrName = attrs[i].name;
3498  
3499                              if (!(attrName in sortedAttrs.map)) {
3500                                  attrValue = attrs.map[attrName];
3501                                  sortedAttrs.map[attrName] = attrValue;
3502                                  sortedAttrs.push({name: attrName, value: attrValue});
3503                              }
3504                          }
3505  
3506                          attrs = sortedAttrs;
3507                      }
3508  
3509                      writer.start(node.name, attrs, isEmpty);
3510  
3511                      if (!isEmpty) {
3512                          if ((node = node.firstChild)) {
3513                              do {
3514                                  walk(node);
3515                              } while (node = node.next);
3516                          }
3517  
3518                          writer.end(name);
3519                      }
3520                  } else
3521                      handler(node);
3522              }
3523  
3524              // Serialize element and treat all non elements as fragments
3525              if (node.type == 1 && !settings.inner)
3526                  walk(node);
3527              else
3528                  handlers[11](node);
3529  
3530              return writer.getContent();
3531          };
3532      }
3533  })(tinymce);
3534  
3535  (function(tinymce) {
3536      // Shorten names
3537      var each = tinymce.each,
3538          is = tinymce.is,
3539          isWebKit = tinymce.isWebKit,
3540          isIE = tinymce.isIE,
3541          Entities = tinymce.html.Entities,
3542          simpleSelectorRe = /^([a-z0-9],?)+$/i,
3543          blockElementsMap = tinymce.html.Schema.blockElementsMap,
3544          whiteSpaceRegExp = /^[ \t\r\n]*$/;
3545  
3546      tinymce.create('tinymce.dom.DOMUtils', {
3547          doc : null,
3548          root : null,
3549          files : null,
3550          pixelStyles : /^(top|left|bottom|right|width|height|borderWidth)$/,
3551          props : {
3552              "for" : "htmlFor",
3553              "class" : "className",
3554              className : "className",
3555              checked : "checked",
3556              disabled : "disabled",
3557              maxlength : "maxLength",
3558              readonly : "readOnly",
3559              selected : "selected",
3560              value : "value",
3561              id : "id",
3562              name : "name",
3563              type : "type"
3564          },
3565  
3566          DOMUtils : function(d, s) {
3567              var t = this, globalStyle, name;
3568  
3569              t.doc = d;
3570              t.win = window;
3571              t.files = {};
3572              t.cssFlicker = false;
3573              t.counter = 0;
3574              t.stdMode = !tinymce.isIE || d.documentMode >= 8;
3575              t.boxModel = !tinymce.isIE || d.compatMode == "CSS1Compat" || t.stdMode;
3576              t.hasOuterHTML = "outerHTML" in d.createElement("a");
3577  
3578              t.settings = s = tinymce.extend({
3579                  keep_values : false,
3580                  hex_colors : 1
3581              }, s);
3582              
3583              t.schema = s.schema;
3584              t.styles = new tinymce.html.Styles({
3585                  url_converter : s.url_converter,
3586                  url_converter_scope : s.url_converter_scope
3587              }, s.schema);
3588  
3589              // Fix IE6SP2 flicker and check it failed for pre SP2
3590              if (tinymce.isIE6) {
3591                  try {
3592                      d.execCommand('BackgroundImageCache', false, true);
3593                  } catch (e) {
3594                      t.cssFlicker = true;
3595                  }
3596              }
3597  
3598              if (isIE && s.schema) {
3599                  // Add missing HTML 4/5 elements to IE
3600                  ('abbr article aside audio canvas ' +
3601                  'details figcaption figure footer ' +
3602                  'header hgroup mark menu meter nav ' +
3603                  'output progress section summary ' +
3604                  'time video').replace(/\w+/g, function(name) {
3605                      d.createElement(name);
3606                  });
3607  
3608                  // Create all custom elements
3609                  for (name in s.schema.getCustomElements()) {
3610                      d.createElement(name);
3611                  }
3612              }
3613  
3614              tinymce.addUnload(t.destroy, t);
3615          },
3616  
3617          getRoot : function() {
3618              var t = this, s = t.settings;
3619  
3620              return (s && t.get(s.root_element)) || t.doc.body;
3621          },
3622  
3623          getViewPort : function(w) {
3624              var d, b;
3625  
3626              w = !w ? this.win : w;
3627              d = w.document;
3628              b = this.boxModel ? d.documentElement : d.body;
3629  
3630              // Returns viewport size excluding scrollbars
3631              return {
3632                  x : w.pageXOffset || b.scrollLeft,
3633                  y : w.pageYOffset || b.scrollTop,
3634                  w : w.innerWidth || b.clientWidth,
3635                  h : w.innerHeight || b.clientHeight
3636              };
3637          },
3638  
3639          getRect : function(e) {
3640              var p, t = this, sr;
3641  
3642              e = t.get(e);
3643              p = t.getPos(e);
3644              sr = t.getSize(e);
3645  
3646              return {
3647                  x : p.x,
3648                  y : p.y,
3649                  w : sr.w,
3650                  h : sr.h
3651              };
3652          },
3653  
3654          getSize : function(e) {
3655              var t = this, w, h;
3656  
3657              e = t.get(e);
3658              w = t.getStyle(e, 'width');
3659              h = t.getStyle(e, 'height');
3660  
3661              // Non pixel value, then force offset/clientWidth
3662              if (w.indexOf('px') === -1)
3663                  w = 0;
3664  
3665              // Non pixel value, then force offset/clientWidth
3666              if (h.indexOf('px') === -1)
3667                  h = 0;
3668  
3669              return {
3670                  w : parseInt(w) || e.offsetWidth || e.clientWidth,
3671                  h : parseInt(h) || e.offsetHeight || e.clientHeight
3672              };
3673          },
3674  
3675          getParent : function(n, f, r) {
3676              return this.getParents(n, f, r, false);
3677          },
3678  
3679          getParents : function(n, f, r, c) {
3680              var t = this, na, se = t.settings, o = [];
3681  
3682              n = t.get(n);
3683              c = c === undefined;
3684  
3685              if (se.strict_root)
3686                  r = r || t.getRoot();
3687  
3688              // Wrap node name as func
3689              if (is(f, 'string')) {
3690                  na = f;
3691  
3692                  if (f === '*') {
3693                      f = function(n) {return n.nodeType == 1;};
3694                  } else {
3695                      f = function(n) {
3696                          return t.is(n, na);
3697                      };
3698                  }
3699              }
3700  
3701              while (n) {
3702                  if (n == r || !n.nodeType || n.nodeType === 9)
3703                      break;
3704  
3705                  if (!f || f(n)) {
3706                      if (c)
3707                          o.push(n);
3708                      else
3709                          return n;
3710                  }
3711  
3712                  n = n.parentNode;
3713              }
3714  
3715              return c ? o : null;
3716          },
3717  
3718          get : function(e) {
3719              var n;
3720  
3721              if (e && this.doc && typeof(e) == 'string') {
3722                  n = e;
3723                  e = this.doc.getElementById(e);
3724  
3725                  // IE and Opera returns meta elements when they match the specified input ID, but getElementsByName seems to do the trick
3726                  if (e && e.id !== n)
3727                      return this.doc.getElementsByName(n)[1];
3728              }
3729  
3730              return e;
3731          },
3732  
3733          getNext : function(node, selector) {
3734              return this._findSib(node, selector, 'nextSibling');
3735          },
3736  
3737          getPrev : function(node, selector) {
3738              return this._findSib(node, selector, 'previousSibling');
3739          },
3740  
3741  
3742          select : function(pa, s) {
3743              var t = this;
3744  
3745              return tinymce.dom.Sizzle(pa, t.get(s) || t.get(t.settings.root_element) || t.doc, []);
3746          },
3747  
3748          is : function(n, selector) {
3749              var i;
3750  
3751              // If it isn't an array then try to do some simple selectors instead of Sizzle for to boost performance
3752              if (n.length === undefined) {
3753                  // Simple all selector
3754                  if (selector === '*')
3755                      return n.nodeType == 1;
3756  
3757                  // Simple selector just elements
3758                  if (simpleSelectorRe.test(selector)) {
3759                      selector = selector.toLowerCase().split(/,/);
3760                      n = n.nodeName.toLowerCase();
3761  
3762                      for (i = selector.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
3763                          if (selector[i] == n)
3764                              return true;
3765                      }
3766  
3767                      return false;
3768                  }
3769              }
3770  
3771              return tinymce.dom.Sizzle.matches(selector, n.nodeType ? [n] : n).length > 0;
3772          },
3773  
3774  
3775          add : function(p, n, a, h, c) {
3776              var t = this;
3777  
3778              return this.run(p, function(p) {
3779                  var e, k;
3780  
3781                  e = is(n, 'string') ? t.doc.createElement(n) : n;
3782                  t.setAttribs(e, a);
3783  
3784                  if (h) {
3785                      if (h.nodeType)
3786                          e.appendChild(h);
3787                      else
3788                          t.setHTML(e, h);
3789                  }
3790  
3791                  return !c ? p.appendChild(e) : e;
3792              });
3793          },
3794  
3795          create : function(n, a, h) {
3796              return this.add(this.doc.createElement(n), n, a, h, 1);
3797          },
3798  
3799          createHTML : function(n, a, h) {
3800              var o = '', t = this, k;
3801  
3802              o += '<' + n;
3803  
3804              for (k in a) {
3805                  if (a.hasOwnProperty(k))
3806                      o += ' ' + k + '="' + t.encode(a[k]) + '"';
3807              }
3808  
3809              // A call to tinymce.is doesn't work for some odd reason on IE9 possible bug inside their JS runtime
3810              if (typeof(h) != "undefined")
3811                  return o + '>' + h + '</' + n + '>';
3812  
3813              return o + ' />';
3814          },
3815  
3816          remove : function(node, keep_children) {
3817              return this.run(node, function(node) {
3818                  var child, parent = node.parentNode;
3819  
3820                  if (!parent)
3821                      return null;
3822  
3823                  if (keep_children) {
3824                      while (child = node.firstChild) {
3825                          // IE 8 will crash if you don't remove completely empty text nodes
3826                          if (!tinymce.isIE || child.nodeType !== 3 || child.nodeValue)
3827                              parent.insertBefore(child, node);
3828                          else
3829                              node.removeChild(child);
3830                      }
3831                  }
3832  
3833                  return parent.removeChild(node);
3834              });
3835          },
3836  
3837          setStyle : function(n, na, v) {
3838              var t = this;
3839  
3840              return t.run(n, function(e) {
3841                  var s, i;
3842  
3843                  s = e.style;
3844  
3845                  // Camelcase it, if needed
3846                  na = na.replace(/-(\D)/g, function(a, b){
3847                      return b.toUpperCase();
3848                  });
3849  
3850                  // Default px suffix on these
3851                  if (t.pixelStyles.test(na) && (tinymce.is(v, 'number') || /^[\-0-9\.]+$/.test(v)))
3852                      v += 'px';
3853  
3854                  switch (na) {
3855                      case 'opacity':
3856                          // IE specific opacity
3857                          if (isIE) {
3858                              s.filter = v === '' ? '' : "alpha(opacity=" + (v * 100) + ")";
3859  
3860                              if (!n.currentStyle || !n.currentStyle.hasLayout)
3861                                  s.display = 'inline-block';
3862                          }
3863  
3864                          // Fix for older browsers
3865                          s[na] = s['-moz-opacity'] = s['-khtml-opacity'] = v || '';
3866                          break;
3867  
3868                      case 'float':
3869                          isIE ? s.styleFloat = v : s.cssFloat = v;
3870                          break;
3871                      
3872                      default:
3873                          s[na] = v || '';
3874                  }
3875  
3876                  // Force update of the style data
3877                  if (t.settings.update_styles)
3878                      t.setAttrib(e, 'data-mce-style');
3879              });
3880          },
3881  
3882          getStyle : function(n, na, c) {
3883              n = this.get(n);
3884  
3885              if (!n)
3886                  return;
3887  
3888              // Gecko
3889              if (this.doc.defaultView && c) {
3890                  // Remove camelcase
3891                  na = na.replace(/[A-Z]/g, function(a){
3892                      return '-' + a;
3893                  });
3894  
3895                  try {
3896                      return this.doc.defaultView.getComputedStyle(n, null).getPropertyValue(na);
3897                  } catch (ex) {
3898                      // Old safari might fail
3899                      return null;
3900                  }
3901              }
3902  
3903              // Camelcase it, if needed
3904              na = na.replace(/-(\D)/g, function(a, b){
3905                  return b.toUpperCase();
