3906              });
3907  
3908              if (na == 'float')
3909                  na = isIE ? 'styleFloat' : 'cssFloat';
3910  
3911              // IE & Opera
3912              if (n.currentStyle && c)
3913                  return n.currentStyle[na];
3914  
3915              return n.style ? n.style[na] : undefined;
3916          },
3917  
3918          setStyles : function(e, o) {
3919              var t = this, s = t.settings, ol;
3920  
3921              ol = s.update_styles;
3922              s.update_styles = 0;
3923  
3924              each(o, function(v, n) {
3925                  t.setStyle(e, n, v);
3926              });
3927  
3928              // Update style info
3929              s.update_styles = ol;
3930              if (s.update_styles)
3931                  t.setAttrib(e, s.cssText);
3932          },
3933  
3934          removeAllAttribs: function(e) {
3935              return this.run(e, function(e) {
3936                  var i, attrs = e.attributes;
3937                  for (i = attrs.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
3938                      e.removeAttributeNode(attrs.item(i));
3939                  }
3940              });
3941          },
3942  
3943          setAttrib : function(e, n, v) {
3944              var t = this;
3945  
3946              // Whats the point
3947              if (!e || !n)
3948                  return;
3949  
3950              // Strict XML mode
3951              if (t.settings.strict)
3952                  n = n.toLowerCase();
3953  
3954              return this.run(e, function(e) {
3955                  var s = t.settings;
3956                  var originalValue = e.getAttribute(n);
3957                  if (v !== null) {
3958                      switch (n) {
3959                          case "style":
3960                              if (!is(v, 'string')) {
3961                                  each(v, function(v, n) {
3962                                      t.setStyle(e, n, v);
3963                                  });
3964  
3965                                  return;
3966                              }
3967  
3968                              // No mce_style for elements with these since they might get resized by the user
3969                              if (s.keep_values) {
3970                                  if (v && !t._isRes(v))
3971                                      e.setAttribute('data-mce-style', v, 2);
3972                                  else
3973                                      e.removeAttribute('data-mce-style', 2);
3974                              }
3975  
3976                              e.style.cssText = v;
3977                              break;
3978  
3979                          case "class":
3980                              e.className = v || ''; // Fix IE null bug
3981                              break;
3982  
3983                          case "src":
3984                          case "href":
3985                              if (s.keep_values) {
3986                                  if (s.url_converter)
3987                                      v = s.url_converter.call(s.url_converter_scope || t, v, n, e);
3988  
3989                                  t.setAttrib(e, 'data-mce-' + n, v, 2);
3990                              }
3991  
3992                              break;
3993  
3994                          case "shape":
3995                              e.setAttribute('data-mce-style', v);
3996                              break;
3997                      }
3998                  }
3999                  if (is(v) && v !== null && v.length !== 0)
4000                      e.setAttribute(n, '' + v, 2);
4001                  else
4002                      e.removeAttribute(n, 2);
4003  
4004                  // fire onChangeAttrib event for attributes that have changed
4005                  if (tinyMCE.activeEditor && originalValue != v) {
4006                      var ed = tinyMCE.activeEditor;
4007                      ed.onSetAttrib.dispatch(ed, e, n, v);
4008                  }
4009              });
4010          },
4011  
4012          setAttribs : function(e, o) {
4013              var t = this;
4014  
4015              return this.run(e, function(e) {
4016                  each(o, function(v, n) {
4017                      t.setAttrib(e, n, v);
4018                  });
4019              });
4020          },
4021  
4022          getAttrib : function(e, n, dv) {
4023              var v, t = this, undef;
4024  
4025              e = t.get(e);
4026  
4027              if (!e || e.nodeType !== 1)
4028                  return dv === undef ? false : dv;
4029  
4030              if (!is(dv))
4031                  dv = '';
4032  
4033              // Try the mce variant for these
4034              if (/^(src|href|style|coords|shape)$/.test(n)) {
4035                  v = e.getAttribute("data-mce-" + n);
4036  
4037                  if (v)
4038                      return v;
4039              }
4040  
4041              if (isIE && t.props[n]) {
4042                  v = e[t.props[n]];
4043                  v = v && v.nodeValue ? v.nodeValue : v;
4044              }
4045  
4046              if (!v)
4047                  v = e.getAttribute(n, 2);
4048  
4049              // Check boolean attribs
4050              if (/^(checked|compact|declare|defer|disabled|ismap|multiple|nohref|noshade|nowrap|readonly|selected)$/.test(n)) {
4051                  if (e[t.props[n]] === true && v === '')
4052                      return n;
4053  
4054                  return v ? n : '';
4055              }
4056  
4057              // Inner input elements will override attributes on form elements
4058              if (e.nodeName === "FORM" && e.getAttributeNode(n))
4059                  return e.getAttributeNode(n).nodeValue;
4060  
4061              if (n === 'style') {
4062                  v = v || e.style.cssText;
4063  
4064                  if (v) {
4065                      v = t.serializeStyle(t.parseStyle(v), e.nodeName);
4066  
4067                      if (t.settings.keep_values && !t._isRes(v))
4068                          e.setAttribute('data-mce-style', v);
4069                  }
4070              }
4071  
4072              // Remove Apple and WebKit stuff
4073              if (isWebKit && n === "class" && v)
4074                  v = v.replace(/(apple|webkit)\-[a-z\-]+/gi, '');
4075  
4076              // Handle IE issues
4077              if (isIE) {
4078                  switch (n) {
4079                      case 'rowspan':
4080                      case 'colspan':
4081                          // IE returns 1 as default value
4082                          if (v === 1)
4083                              v = '';
4084  
4085                          break;
4086  
4087                      case 'size':
4088                          // IE returns +0 as default value for size
4089                          if (v === '+0' || v === 20 || v === 0)
4090                              v = '';
4091  
4092                          break;
4093  
4094                      case 'width':
4095                      case 'height':
4096                      case 'vspace':
4097                      case 'checked':
4098                      case 'disabled':
4099                      case 'readonly':
4100                          if (v === 0)
4101                              v = '';
4102  
4103                          break;
4104  
4105                      case 'hspace':
4106                          // IE returns -1 as default value
4107                          if (v === -1)
4108                              v = '';
4109  
4110                          break;
4111  
4112                      case 'maxlength':
4113                      case 'tabindex':
4114                          // IE returns default value
4115                          if (v === 32768 || v === 2147483647 || v === '32768')
4116                              v = '';
4117  
4118                          break;
4119  
4120                      case 'multiple':
4121                      case 'compact':
4122                      case 'noshade':
4123                      case 'nowrap':
4124                          if (v === 65535)
4125                              return n;
4126  
4127                          return dv;
4128  
4129                      case 'shape':
4130                          v = v.toLowerCase();
4131                          break;
4132  
4133                      default:
4134                          // IE has odd anonymous function for event attributes
4135                          if (n.indexOf('on') === 0 && v)
4136                              v = tinymce._replace(/^function\s+\w+\(\)\s+\{\s+(.*)\s+\}$/, '$1', '' + v);
4137                  }
4138              }
4139  
4140              return (v !== undef && v !== null && v !== '') ? '' + v : dv;
4141          },
4142  
4143          getPos : function(n, ro) {
4144              var t = this, x = 0, y = 0, e, d = t.doc, r;
4145  
4146              n = t.get(n);
4147              ro = ro || d.body;
4148  
4149              if (n) {
4150                  // Use getBoundingClientRect if it exists since it's faster than looping offset nodes
4151                  if (n.getBoundingClientRect) {
4152                      n = n.getBoundingClientRect();
4153                      e = t.boxModel ? d.documentElement : d.body;
4154  
4155                      // Add scroll offsets from documentElement or body since IE with the wrong box model will use d.body and so do WebKit
4156                      // Also remove the body/documentelement clientTop/clientLeft on IE 6, 7 since they offset the position
4157                      x = n.left + (d.documentElement.scrollLeft || d.body.scrollLeft) - e.clientTop;
4158                      y = n.top + (d.documentElement.scrollTop || d.body.scrollTop) - e.clientLeft;
4159  
4160                      return {x : x, y : y};
4161                  }
4162  
4163                  r = n;
4164                  while (r && r != ro && r.nodeType) {
4165                      x += r.offsetLeft || 0;
4166                      y += r.offsetTop || 0;
4167                      r = r.offsetParent;
4168                  }
4169  
4170                  r = n.parentNode;
4171                  while (r && r != ro && r.nodeType) {
4172                      x -= r.scrollLeft || 0;
4173                      y -= r.scrollTop || 0;
4174                      r = r.parentNode;
4175                  }
4176              }
4177  
4178              return {x : x, y : y};
4179          },
4180  
4181          parseStyle : function(st) {
4182              return this.styles.parse(st);
4183          },
4184  
4185          serializeStyle : function(o, name) {
4186              return this.styles.serialize(o, name);
4187          },
4188  
4189          loadCSS : function(u) {
4190              var t = this, d = t.doc, head;
4191  
4192              if (!u)
4193                  u = '';
4194  
4195              head = t.select('head')[0];
4196  
4197              each(u.split(','), function(u) {
4198                  var link;
4199  
4200                  if (t.files[u])
4201                      return;
4202  
4203                  t.files[u] = true;
4204                  link = t.create('link', {rel : 'stylesheet', href : tinymce._addVer(u)});
4205  
4206                  // IE 8 has a bug where dynamically loading stylesheets would produce a 1 item remaining bug
4207                  // This fix seems to resolve that issue by realcing the document ones a stylesheet finishes loading
4208                  // It's ugly but it seems to work fine.
4209                  if (isIE && d.documentMode && d.recalc) {
4210                      link.onload = function() {
4211                          if (d.recalc)
4212                              d.recalc();
4213  
4214                          link.onload = null;
4215                      };
4216                  }
4217  
4218                  head.appendChild(link);
4219              });
4220          },
4221  
4222          addClass : function(e, c) {
4223              return this.run(e, function(e) {
4224                  var o;
4225  
4226                  if (!c)
4227                      return 0;
4228  
4229                  if (this.hasClass(e, c))
4230                      return e.className;
4231  
4232                  o = this.removeClass(e, c);
4233  
4234                  return e.className = (o != '' ? (o + ' ') : '') + c;
4235              });
4236          },
4237  
4238          removeClass : function(e, c) {
4239              var t = this, re;
4240  
4241              return t.run(e, function(e) {
4242                  var v;
4243  
4244                  if (t.hasClass(e, c)) {
4245                      if (!re)
4246                          re = new RegExp("(^|\\s+)" + c + "(\\s+|$)", "g");
4247  
4248                      v = e.className.replace(re, ' ');
4249                      v = tinymce.trim(v != ' ' ? v : '');
4250  
4251                      e.className = v;
4252  
4253                      // Empty class attr
4254                      if (!v) {
4255                          e.removeAttribute('class');
4256                          e.removeAttribute('className');
4257                      }
4258  
4259                      return v;
4260                  }
4261  
4262                  return e.className;
4263              });
4264          },
4265  
4266          hasClass : function(n, c) {
4267              n = this.get(n);
4268  
4269              if (!n || !c)
4270                  return false;
4271  
4272              return (' ' + n.className + ' ').indexOf(' ' + c + ' ') !== -1;
4273          },
4274  
4275          show : function(e) {
4276              return this.setStyle(e, 'display', 'block');
4277          },
4278  
4279          hide : function(e) {
4280              return this.setStyle(e, 'display', 'none');
4281          },
4282  
4283          isHidden : function(e) {
4284              e = this.get(e);
4285  
4286              return !e || e.style.display == 'none' || this.getStyle(e, 'display') == 'none';
4287          },
4288  
4289          uniqueId : function(p) {
4290              return (!p ? 'mce_' : p) + (this.counter++);
4291          },
4292  
4293          setHTML : function(element, html) {
4294              var self = this;
4295  
4296              return self.run(element, function(element) {
4297                  if (isIE) {
4298                      // Remove all child nodes, IE keeps empty text nodes in DOM
4299                      while (element.firstChild)
4300                          element.removeChild(element.firstChild);
4301  
4302                      try {
4303                          // IE will remove comments from the beginning
4304                          // unless you padd the contents with something
4305                          element.innerHTML = '<br />' + html;
4306                          element.removeChild(element.firstChild);
4307                      } catch (ex) {
4308                          // IE sometimes produces an unknown runtime error on innerHTML if it's an block element within a block element for example a div inside a p
4309                          // This seems to fix this problem
4310  
4311                          // Create new div with HTML contents and a BR infront to keep comments
4312                          element = self.create('div');
4313                          element.innerHTML = '<br />' + html;
4314  
4315                          // Add all children from div to target
4316                          each (element.childNodes, function(node, i) {
4317                              // Skip br element
4318                              if (i)
4319                                  element.appendChild(node);
4320                          });
4321                      }
4322                  } else
4323                      element.innerHTML = html;
4324  
4325                  return html;
4326              });
4327          },
4328  
4329          getOuterHTML : function(elm) {
4330              var doc, self = this;
4331  
4332              elm = self.get(elm);
4333  
4334              if (!elm)
4335                  return null;
4336  
4337              if (elm.nodeType === 1 && self.hasOuterHTML)
4338                  return elm.outerHTML;
4339  
4340              doc = (elm.ownerDocument || self.doc).createElement("body");
4341              doc.appendChild(elm.cloneNode(true));
4342  
4343              return doc.innerHTML;
4344          },
4345  
4346          setOuterHTML : function(e, h, d) {
4347              var t = this;
4348  
4349  			function setHTML(e, h, d) {
4350                  var n, tp;
4351  
4352                  tp = d.createElement("body");
4353                  tp.innerHTML = h;
4354  
4355                  n = tp.lastChild;
4356                  while (n) {
4357                      t.insertAfter(n.cloneNode(true), e);
4358                      n = n.previousSibling;
4359                  }
4360  
4361                  t.remove(e);
4362              };
4363  
4364              return this.run(e, function(e) {
4365                  e = t.get(e);
4366  
4367                  // Only set HTML on elements
4368                  if (e.nodeType == 1) {
4369                      d = d || e.ownerDocument || t.doc;
4370  
4371                      if (isIE) {
4372                          try {
4373                              // Try outerHTML for IE it sometimes produces an unknown runtime error
4374                              if (isIE && e.nodeType == 1)
4375                                  e.outerHTML = h;
4376                              else
4377                                  setHTML(e, h, d);
4378                          } catch (ex) {
4379                              // Fix for unknown runtime error
4380                              setHTML(e, h, d);
4381                          }
4382                      } else
4383                          setHTML(e, h, d);
4384                  }
4385              });
4386          },
4387  
4388          decode : Entities.decode,
4389  
4390          encode : Entities.encodeAllRaw,
4391  
4392          insertAfter : function(node, reference_node) {
4393              reference_node = this.get(reference_node);
4394  
4395              return this.run(node, function(node) {
4396                  var parent, nextSibling;
4397  
4398                  parent = reference_node.parentNode;
4399                  nextSibling = reference_node.nextSibling;
4400  
4401                  if (nextSibling)
4402                      parent.insertBefore(node, nextSibling);
4403                  else
4404                      parent.appendChild(node);
4405  
4406                  return node;
4407              });
4408          },
4409  
4410          isBlock : function(node) {
4411              var type = node.nodeType;
4412  
4413              // If it's a node then check the type and use the nodeName
4414              if (type)
4415                  return !!(type === 1 && blockElementsMap[node.nodeName]);
4416  
4417              return !!blockElementsMap[node];
4418          },
4419  
4420          replace : function(n, o, k) {
4421              var t = this;
4422  
4423              if (is(o, 'array'))
4424                  n = n.cloneNode(true);
4425  
4426              return t.run(o, function(o) {
4427                  if (k) {
4428                      each(tinymce.grep(o.childNodes), function(c) {
4429                          n.appendChild(c);
4430                      });
4431                  }
4432  
4433                  return o.parentNode.replaceChild(n, o);
4434              });
4435          },
4436  
4437          rename : function(elm, name) {
4438              var t = this, newElm;
4439  
4440              if (elm.nodeName != name.toUpperCase()) {
4441                  // Rename block element
4442                  newElm = t.create(name);
4443  
4444                  // Copy attribs to new block
4445                  each(t.getAttribs(elm), function(attr_node) {
4446                      t.setAttrib(newElm, attr_node.nodeName, t.getAttrib(elm, attr_node.nodeName));
4447                  });
4448  
4449                  // Replace block
4450                  t.replace(newElm, elm, 1);
4451              }
4452  
4453              return newElm || elm;
4454          },
4455  
4456          findCommonAncestor : function(a, b) {
4457              var ps = a, pe;
4458  
4459              while (ps) {
4460                  pe = b;
4461  
4462                  while (pe && ps != pe)
4463                      pe = pe.parentNode;
4464  
4465                  if (ps == pe)
4466                      break;
4467  
4468                  ps = ps.parentNode;
4469              }
4470  
4471              if (!ps && a.ownerDocument)
4472                  return a.ownerDocument.documentElement;
4473  
4474              return ps;
4475          },
4476  
4477          toHex : function(s) {
4478              var c = /^\s*rgb\s*?\(\s*?([0-9]+)\s*?,\s*?([0-9]+)\s*?,\s*?([0-9]+)\s*?\)\s*$/i.exec(s);
4479  
4480  			function hex(s) {
4481                  s = parseInt(s).toString(16);
4482  
4483                  return s.length > 1 ? s : '0' + s; // 0 -> 00
4484              };
4485  
4486              if (c) {
4487                  s = '#' + hex(c[1]) + hex(c[2]) + hex(c[3]);
4488  
4489                  return s;
4490              }
4491  
4492              return s;
4493          },
4494  
4495          getClasses : function() {
4496              var t = this, cl = [], i, lo = {}, f = t.settings.class_filter, ov;
4497  
4498              if (t.classes)
4499                  return t.classes;
4500  
4501  			function addClasses(s) {
4502                  // IE style imports
4503                  each(s.imports, function(r) {
4504                      addClasses(r);
4505                  });
4506  
4507                  each(s.cssRules || s.rules, function(r) {
4508                      // Real type or fake it on IE
4509                      switch (r.type || 1) {
4510                          // Rule
4511                          case 1:
4512                              if (r.selectorText) {
4513                                  each(r.selectorText.split(','), function(v) {
4514                                      v = v.replace(/^\s*|\s*$|^\s\./g, "");
4515  
4516                                      // Is internal or it doesn't contain a class
4517                                      if (/\.mce/.test(v) || !/\.[\w\-]+$/.test(v))
4518                                          return;
4519  
4520                                      // Remove everything but class name
4521                                      ov = v;
4522                                      v = tinymce._replace(/.*\.([a-z0-9_\-]+).*/i, '$1', v);
4523  
4524                                      // Filter classes
4525                                      if (f && !(v = f(v, ov)))
4526                                          return;
4527  
4528                                      if (!lo[v]) {
4529                                          cl.push({'class' : v});
4530                                          lo[v] = 1;
4531                                      }
4532                                  });
4533                              }
4534                              break;
4535  
4536                          // Import
4537                          case 3:
4538                              addClasses(r.styleSheet);
4539                              break;
4540                      }
4541                  });
4542              };
4543  
4544              try {
4545                  each(t.doc.styleSheets, addClasses);
4546              } catch (ex) {
4547                  // Ignore
4548              }
4549  
4550              if (cl.length > 0)
4551                  t.classes = cl;
4552  
4553              return cl;
4554          },
4555  
4556          run : function(e, f, s) {
4557              var t = this, o;
4558  
4559              if (t.doc && typeof(e) === 'string')
4560                  e = t.get(e);
4561  
4562              if (!e)
4563                  return false;
4564  
4565              s = s || this;
4566              if (!e.nodeType && (e.length || e.length === 0)) {
4567                  o = [];
4568  
4569                  each(e, function(e, i) {
4570                      if (e) {
4571                          if (typeof(e) == 'string')
4572                              e = t.doc.getElementById(e);
4573  
4574                          o.push(f.call(s, e, i));
4575                      }
4576                  });
4577  
4578                  return o;
4579              }
4580  
4581              return f.call(s, e);
4582          },
4583  
4584          getAttribs : function(n) {
4585              var o;
4586  
4587              n = this.get(n);
4588  
4589              if (!n)
4590                  return [];
4591  
4592              if (isIE) {
4593                  o = [];
4594  
4595                  // Object will throw exception in IE
4596                  if (n.nodeName == 'OBJECT')
4597                      return n.attributes;
4598  
4599                  // IE doesn't keep the selected attribute if you clone option elements
4600                  if (n.nodeName === 'OPTION' && this.getAttrib(n, 'selected'))
4601                      o.push({specified : 1, nodeName : 'selected'});
4602  
4603                  // It's crazy that this is faster in IE but it's because it returns all attributes all the time
4604                  n.cloneNode(false).outerHTML.replace(/<\/?[\w:\-]+ ?|=[\"][^\"]+\"|=\'[^\']+\'|=[\w\-]+|>/gi, '').replace(/[\w:\-]+/gi, function(a) {
4605                      o.push({specified : 1, nodeName : a});
4606                  });
4607  
4608                  return o;
4609              }
4610  
4611              return n.attributes;
4612          },
4613  
4614          isEmpty : function(node, elements) {
4615              var self = this, i, attributes, type, walker, name, parentNode;
4616  
4617              node = node.firstChild;
4618              if (node) {
4619                  walker = new tinymce.dom.TreeWalker(node);
4620                  elements = elements || self.schema ? self.schema.getNonEmptyElements() : null;
4621  
4622                  do {
4623                      type = node.nodeType;
4624  
4625                      if (type === 1) {
4626                          // Ignore bogus elements
4627                          if (node.getAttribute('data-mce-bogus'))
4628                              continue;
4629  
4630                          // Keep empty elements like <img />
4631                          name = node.nodeName.toLowerCase();
4632                          if (elements && elements[name]) {
4633                              // Ignore single BR elements in blocks like <p><br /></p>
4634                              parentNode = node.parentNode;
4635                              if (name === 'br' && self.isBlock(parentNode) && parentNode.firstChild === node && parentNode.lastChild === node) {
4636                                  continue;
4637                              }
4638  
4639                              return false;
4640                          }
4641  
4642                          // Keep elements with data-bookmark attributes or name attribute like <a name="1"></a>
4643                          attributes = self.getAttribs(node);
4644                          i = node.attributes.length;
4645                          while (i--) {
4646                              name = node.attributes[i].nodeName;
4647                              if (name === "name" || name === 'data-mce-bookmark')
4648                                  return false;
4649                          }
4650                      }
4651  
4652                      // Keep non whitespace text nodes
4653                      if ((type === 3 && !whiteSpaceRegExp.test(node.nodeValue)))
4654                          return false;
4655                  } while (node = walker.next());
4656              }
4657  
4658              return true;
4659          },
4660  
4661          destroy : function(s) {
4662              var t = this;
4663  
4664              if (t.events)
4665                  t.events.destroy();
4666  
4667              t.win = t.doc = t.root = t.events = null;
4668  
4669              // Manual destroy then remove unload handler
4670              if (!s)
4671                  tinymce.removeUnload(t.destroy);
4672          },
4673  
4674          createRng : function() {
4675              var d = this.doc;
4676  
4677              return d.createRange ? d.createRange() : new tinymce.dom.Range(this);
4678          },
4679  
4680          nodeIndex : function(node, normalized) {
4681              var idx = 0, lastNodeType, lastNode, nodeType;
4682  
4683              if (node) {
4684                  for (lastNodeType = node.nodeType, node = node.previousSibling, lastNode = node; node; node = node.previousSibling) {
4685                      nodeType = node.nodeType;
4686  
4687                      // Normalize text nodes
4688                      if (normalized && nodeType == 3) {
4689                          if (nodeType == lastNodeType || !node.nodeValue.length)
4690                              continue;
4691                      }
4692                      idx++;
4693                      lastNodeType = nodeType;
4694                  }
4695              }
4696  
4697              return idx;
4698          },
4699  
4700          split : function(pe, e, re) {
4701              var t = this, r = t.createRng(), bef, aft, pa;
4702  
4703              // W3C valid browsers tend to leave empty nodes to the left/right side of the contents, this makes sense
4704              // but we don't want that in our code since it serves no purpose for the end user
4705              // For example if this is chopped:
4706              //   <p>text 1<span><b>CHOP</b></span>text 2</p>
4707              // would produce:
4708              //   <p>text 1<span></span></p><b>CHOP</b><p><span></span>text 2</p>
4709              // this function will then trim of empty edges and produce:
4710              //   <p>text 1</p><b>CHOP</b><p>text 2</p>
4711  			function trim(node) {
4712                  var i, children = node.childNodes, type = node.nodeType;
4713  
4714  				function surroundedBySpans(node) {
4715                      var previousIsSpan = node.previousSibling && node.previousSibling.nodeName == 'SPAN';
4716                      var nextIsSpan = node.nextSibling && node.nextSibling.nodeName == 'SPAN';
4717                      return previousIsSpan && nextIsSpan;
4718                  }
4719  
4720                  if (type == 1 && node.getAttribute('data-mce-type') == 'bookmark')
4721                      return;
4722  
4723                  for (i = children.length - 1; i >= 0; i--)
4724                      trim(children[i]);
4725  
4726                  if (type != 9) {
4727                      // Keep non whitespace text nodes
4728                      if (type == 3 && node.nodeValue.length > 0) {
4729                          // If parent element isn't a block or there isn't any useful contents for example "<p>   </p>"
4730                          // Also keep text nodes with only spaces if surrounded by spans.
4731                          // eg. "<p><span>a</span> <span>b</span></p>" should keep space between a and b
4732                          var trimmedLength = tinymce.trim(node.nodeValue).length;
4733                          if (!t.isBlock(node.parentNode) || trimmedLength > 0 || trimmedLength == 0 && surroundedBySpans(node))
4734                              return;
4735                      } else if (type == 1) {
4736                          // If the only child is a bookmark then move it up
4737                          children = node.childNodes;
4738                          if (children.length == 1 && children[0] && children[0].nodeType == 1 && children[0].getAttribute('data-mce-type') == 'bookmark')
4739                              node.parentNode.insertBefore(children[0], node);
4740  
4741                          // Keep non empty elements or img, hr etc
4742                          if (children.length || /^(br|hr|input|img)$/i.test(node.nodeName))
4743                              return;
4744                      }
4745  
4746                      t.remove(node);
4747                  }
4748  
4749                  return node;
4750              };
4751  
4752              if (pe && e) {
4753                  // Get before chunk
4754                  r.setStart(pe.parentNode, t.nodeIndex(pe));
4755                  r.setEnd(e.parentNode, t.nodeIndex(e));
4756                  bef = r.extractContents();
4757  
4758                  // Get after chunk
4759                  r = t.createRng();
4760                  r.setStart(e.parentNode, t.nodeIndex(e) + 1);
4761                  r.setEnd(pe.parentNode, t.nodeIndex(pe) + 1);
4762                  aft = r.extractContents();
4763  
4764                  // Insert before chunk
4765                  pa = pe.parentNode;
4766                  pa.insertBefore(trim(bef), pe);
4767  
4768                  // Insert middle chunk
4769                  if (re)
4770                  pa.replaceChild(re, e);
4771              else
4772                  pa.insertBefore(e, pe);
4773  
4774                  // Insert after chunk
4775                  pa.insertBefore(trim(aft), pe);
4776                  t.remove(pe);
4777  
4778                  return re || e;
4779              }
4780          },
4781  
4782          bind : function(target, name, func, scope) {
4783              var t = this;
4784  
4785              if (!t.events)
4786                  t.events = new tinymce.dom.EventUtils();
4787  
4788              return t.events.add(target, name, func, scope || this);
4789          },
4790  
4791          unbind : function(target, name, func) {
4792              var t = this;
4793  
4794              if (!t.events)
4795                  t.events = new tinymce.dom.EventUtils();
4796  
4797              return t.events.remove(target, name, func);
4798          },
4799  
4800  
4801          _findSib : function(node, selector, name) {
4802              var t = this, f = selector;
4803  
4804              if (node) {
4805                  // If expression make a function of it using is
4806                  if (is(f, 'string')) {
4807                      f = function(node) {
4808                          return t.is(node, selector);
4809                      };
4810                  }
4811  
4812                  // Loop all siblings
4813                  for (node = node[name]; node; node = node[name]) {
4814                      if (f(node))
4815                          return node;
4816                  }
4817              }
4818  
4819              return null;
4820          },
4821  
4822          _isRes : function(c) {
4823              // Is live resizble element
4824              return /^(top|left|bottom|right|width|height)/i.test(c) || /;\s*(top|left|bottom|right|width|height)/i.test(c);
4825          }
4826  
4827          /*
4828          walk : function(n, f, s) {
4829              var d = this.doc, w;
4830  
4831              if (d.createTreeWalker) {
4832                  w = d.createTreeWalker(n, NodeFilter.SHOW_TEXT, null, false);
4833  
4834                  while ((n = w.nextNode()) != null)
4835                      f.call(s || this, n);
4836              } else
4837                  tinymce.walk(n, f, 'childNodes', s);
4838          }
4839          */
4840  
4841          /*
4842          toRGB : function(s) {
4843              var c = /^\s*?#([0-9A-F]{2})([0-9A-F]{1,2})([0-9A-F]{2})?\s*?$/.exec(s);
4844  
4845              if (c) {
4846                  // #FFF -> #FFFFFF
4847                  if (!is(c[3]))
4848                      c[3] = c[2] = c[1];
4849  
4850                  return "rgb(" + parseInt(c[1], 16) + "," + parseInt(c[2], 16) + "," + parseInt(c[3], 16) + ")";
4851              }
4852  
4853              return s;
4854          }
4855          */
4856      });
4857  
4858      tinymce.DOM = new tinymce.dom.DOMUtils(document, {process_html : 0});
4859  })(tinymce);
4860  
4861  (function(ns) {
4862      // Range constructor
4863  	function Range(dom) {
4864          var t = this,
4865              doc = dom.doc,
4866              EXTRACT = 0,
4867              CLONE = 1,
4868              DELETE = 2,
4869              TRUE = true,
4870              FALSE = false,
4871              START_OFFSET = 'startOffset',
4872              START_CONTAINER = 'startContainer',
4873              END_CONTAINER = 'endContainer',
4874              END_OFFSET = 'endOffset',
4875              extend = tinymce.extend,
4876              nodeIndex = dom.nodeIndex;
4877  
4878          extend(t, {
4879              // Inital states
4880              startContainer : doc,
4881              startOffset : 0,
4882              endContainer : doc,
4883              endOffset : 0,
4884              collapsed : TRUE,
4885              commonAncestorContainer : doc,
4886  
4887              // Range constants
4888              START_TO_START : 0,
4889              START_TO_END : 1,
4890              END_TO_END : 2,
4891              END_TO_START : 3,
4892  
4893              // Public methods
4894              setStart : setStart,
4895              setEnd : setEnd,
4896              setStartBefore : setStartBefore,
4897              setStartAfter : setStartAfter,
4898              setEndBefore : setEndBefore,
4899              setEndAfter : setEndAfter,
4900              collapse : collapse,
4901              selectNode : selectNode,
4902              selectNodeContents : selectNodeContents,
4903              compareBoundaryPoints : compareBoundaryPoints,
4904              deleteContents : deleteContents,
4905              extractContents : extractContents,
4906              cloneContents : cloneContents,
4907              insertNode : insertNode,
4908              surroundContents : surroundContents,
4909              cloneRange : cloneRange
4910          });
4911  
4912  		function setStart(n, o) {
4913              _setEndPoint(TRUE, n, o);
4914          };
4915  
4916  		function setEnd(n, o) {
4917              _setEndPoint(FALSE, n, o);
4918          };
4919  
4920  		function setStartBefore(n) {
4921              setStart(n.parentNode, nodeIndex(n));
4922          };
4923  
4924  		function setStartAfter(n) {
4925              setStart(n.parentNode, nodeIndex(n) + 1);
4926          };
4927  
4928  		function setEndBefore(n) {
4929              setEnd(n.parentNode, nodeIndex(n));
4930          };
4931  
4932  		function setEndAfter(n) {
4933              setEnd(n.parentNode, nodeIndex(n) + 1);
4934          };
4935  
4936  		function collapse(ts) {
4937              if (ts) {
4938                  t[END_CONTAINER] = t[START_CONTAINER];
4939                  t[END_OFFSET] = t[START_OFFSET];
4940              } else {
4941                  t[START_CONTAINER] = t[END_CONTAINER];
4942                  t[START_OFFSET] = t[END_OFFSET];
4943              }
4944  
4945              t.collapsed = TRUE;
4946          };
4947  
4948  		function selectNode(n) {
4949              setStartBefore(n);
4950              setEndAfter(n);
4951          };
4952  
4953  		function selectNodeContents(n) {
4954              setStart(n, 0);
4955              setEnd(n, n.nodeType === 1 ? n.childNodes.length : n.nodeValue.length);
4956          };
4957  
4958  		function compareBoundaryPoints(h, r) {
4959              var sc = t[START_CONTAINER], so = t[START_OFFSET], ec = t[END_CONTAINER], eo = t[END_OFFSET],
4960              rsc = r.startContainer, rso = r.startOffset, rec = r.endContainer, reo = r.endOffset;
4961  
4962              // Check START_TO_START
4963              if (h === 0)
4964                  return _compareBoundaryPoints(sc, so, rsc, rso);
4965      
4966              // Check START_TO_END
4967              if (h === 1)
4968                  return _compareBoundaryPoints(ec, eo, rsc, rso);
4969      
4970              // Check END_TO_END
4971              if (h === 2)
4972                  return _compareBoundaryPoints(ec, eo, rec, reo);
4973      
4974              // Check END_TO_START
4975              if (h === 3) 
4976                  return _compareBoundaryPoints(sc, so, rec, reo);
4977          };
4978  
4979  		function deleteContents() {
4980              _traverse(DELETE);
4981          };
4982  
4983  		function extractContents() {
4984              return _traverse(EXTRACT);
4985          };
4986  
4987  		function cloneContents() {
4988              return _traverse(CLONE);
4989          };
4990  
4991  		function insertNode(n) {
4992              var startContainer = this[START_CONTAINER],
4993                  startOffset = this[START_OFFSET], nn, o;
4994  
4995              // Node is TEXT_NODE or CDATA
4996              if ((startContainer.nodeType === 3 || startContainer.nodeType === 4) && startContainer.nodeValue) {
4997                  if (!startOffset) {
4998                      // At the start of text
4999                      startContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(n, startContainer);
5000                  } else if (startOffset >= startContainer.nodeValue.length) {
5001                      // At the end of text
5002                      dom.insertAfter(n, startContainer);
5003                  } else {
5004                      // Middle, need to split
5005                      nn = startContainer.splitText(startOffset);
5006                      startContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(n, nn);
5007                  }
5008              } else {
5009                  // Insert element node
5010                  if (startContainer.childNodes.length > 0)
5011                      o = startContainer.childNodes[startOffset];
5012  
5013                  if (o)
5014                      startContainer.insertBefore(n, o);
5015                  else
5016                      startContainer.appendChild(n);
5017              }
5018          };
5019  
5020  		function surroundContents(n) {
5021              var f = t.extractContents();
5022  
5023              t.insertNode(n);
5024              n.appendChild(f);
5025              t.selectNode(n);
5026          };
5027  
5028  		function cloneRange() {
5029              return extend(new Range(dom), {
5030                  startContainer : t[START_CONTAINER],
5031                  startOffset : t[START_OFFSET],
5032                  endContainer : t[END_CONTAINER],
5033                  endOffset : t[END_OFFSET],
5034                  collapsed : t.collapsed,
5035                  commonAncestorContainer : t.commonAncestorContainer
5036              });
5037          };
5038  
5039          // Private methods
5040  
5041  		function _getSelectedNode(container, offset) {
5042              var child;
5043  
5044              if (container.nodeType == 3 /* TEXT_NODE */)
5045                  return container;
5046  
5047              if (offset < 0)
5048                  return container;
5049  
5050              child = container.firstChild;
5051              while (child && offset > 0) {
5052                  --offset;
5053                  child = child.nextSibling;
5054              }
5055  
5056              if (child)
5057                  return child;
5058  
5059              return container;
5060          };
5061  
5062  		function _isCollapsed() {
5063              return (t[START_CONTAINER] == t[END_CONTAINER] && t[START_OFFSET] == t[END_OFFSET]);
5064          };
5065  
5066  		function _compareBoundaryPoints(containerA, offsetA, containerB, offsetB) {
5067              var c, offsetC, n, cmnRoot, childA, childB;
5068              
5069              // In the first case the boundary-points have the same container. A is before B
5070              // if its offset is less than the offset of B, A is equal to B if its offset is
5071              // equal to the offset of B, and A is after B if its offset is greater than the
5072              // offset of B.
5073              if (containerA == containerB) {
5074                  if (offsetA == offsetB)
5075                      return 0; // equal
5076  
5077                  if (offsetA < offsetB)
5078                      return -1; // before
5079  
5080                  return 1; // after
5081              }
5082  
5083              // In the second case a child node C of the container of A is an ancestor
5084              // container of B. In this case, A is before B if the offset of A is less than or
5085              // equal to the index of the child node C and A is after B otherwise.
5086              c = containerB;
5087              while (c && c.parentNode != containerA)
5088                  c = c.parentNode;
5089  
5090              if (c) {
5091                  offsetC = 0;
5092                  n = containerA.firstChild;
5093  
5094                  while (n != c && offsetC < offsetA) {
5095                      offsetC++;
5096                      n = n.nextSibling;
5097                  }
5098  
5099                  if (offsetA <= offsetC)
5100                      return -1; // before
5101  
5102                  return 1; // after
5103              }
5104  
5105              // In the third case a child node C of the container of B is an ancestor container
5106              // of A. In this case, A is before B if the index of the child node C is less than
5107              // the offset of B and A is after B otherwise.
5108              c = containerA;
5109              while (c && c.parentNode != containerB) {
5110                  c = c.parentNode;
5111              }
5112  
5113              if (c) {
5114                  offsetC = 0;
5115                  n = containerB.firstChild;
5116  
5117                  while (n != c && offsetC < offsetB) {
5118                      offsetC++;
5119                      n = n.nextSibling;
5120                  }
5121  
5122                  if (offsetC < offsetB)
5123                      return -1; // before
5124  
5125                  return 1; // after
5126              }
5127  
5128              // In the fourth case, none of three other cases hold: the containers of A and B
5129              // are siblings or descendants of sibling nodes. In this case, A is before B if
5130              // the container of A is before the container of B in a pre-order traversal of the
5131              // Ranges' context tree and A is after B otherwise.
5132              cmnRoot = dom.findCommonAncestor(containerA, containerB);
5133              childA = containerA;
5134  
5135              while (childA && childA.parentNode != cmnRoot)
5136                  childA = childA.parentNode;
5137  
5138              if (!childA)
5139                  childA = cmnRoot;
5140  
5141              childB = containerB;
5142              while (childB && childB.parentNode != cmnRoot)
5143                  childB = childB.parentNode;
5144  
5145              if (!childB)
5146                  childB = cmnRoot;
5147  
5148              if (childA == childB)
5149                  return 0; // equal
5150  
5151              n = cmnRoot.firstChild;
5152              while (n) {
5153                  if (n == childA)
5154                      return -1; // before
5155  
5156                  if (n == childB)
5157                      return 1; // after
5158  
5159                  n = n.nextSibling;
5160              }
5161          };
5162  
5163  		function _setEndPoint(st, n, o) {
5164              var ec, sc;
5165  
5166              if (st) {
5167                  t[START_CONTAINER] = n;
5168                  t[START_OFFSET] = o;
5169              } else {
5170                  t[END_CONTAINER] = n;
5171                  t[END_OFFSET] = o;
5172              }
5173  
5174              // If one boundary-point of a Range is set to have a root container
5175              // other than the current one for the Range, the Range is collapsed to
5176              // the new position. This enforces the restriction that both boundary-
5177              // points of a Range must have the same root container.
5178              ec = t[END_CONTAINER];
5179              while (ec.parentNode)
5180                  ec = ec.parentNode;
5181  
5182              sc = t[START_CONTAINER];
5183              while (sc.parentNode)
5184                  sc = sc.parentNode;
5185  
5186              if (sc == ec) {
5187                  // The start position of a Range is guaranteed to never be after the
5188                  // end position. To enforce this restriction, if the start is set to
5189                  // be at a position after the end, the Range is collapsed to that
5190                  // position.
5191                  if (_compareBoundaryPoints(t[START_CONTAINER], t[START_OFFSET], t[END_CONTAINER], t[END_OFFSET]) > 0)
5192                      t.collapse(st);
5193              } else
5194                  t.collapse(st);
5195  
5196              t.collapsed = _isCollapsed();
5197              t.commonAncestorContainer = dom.findCommonAncestor(t[START_CONTAINER], t[END_CONTAINER]);
5198          };
5199  
5200  		function _traverse(how) {
5201              var c, endContainerDepth = 0, startContainerDepth = 0, p, depthDiff, startNode, endNode, sp, ep;
5202  
5203              if (t[START_CONTAINER] == t[END_CONTAINER])
5204                  return _traverseSameContainer(how);
5205  
5206              for (c = t[END_CONTAINER], p = c.parentNode; p; c = p, p = p.parentNode) {
5207                  if (p == t[START_CONTAINER])
5208                      return _traverseCommonStartContainer(c, how);
5209  
5210                  ++endContainerDepth;
5211              }
5212  
5213              for (c = t[START_CONTAINER], p = c.parentNode; p; c = p, p = p.parentNode) {
5214                  if (p == t[END_CONTAINER])
5215                      return _traverseCommonEndContainer(c, how);
5216  
5217                  ++startContainerDepth;
5218              }
5219  
5220              depthDiff = startContainerDepth - endContainerDepth;
5221  
5222              startNode = t[START_CONTAINER];
5223              while (depthDiff > 0) {
5224                  startNode = startNode.parentNode;
5225                  depthDiff--;
5226              }
5227  
5228              endNode = t[END_CONTAINER];
5229              while (depthDiff < 0) {
5230                  endNode = endNode.parentNode;
5231                  depthDiff++;
5232              }
5233  
5234              // ascend the ancestor hierarchy until we have a common parent.
5235              for (sp = startNode.parentNode, ep = endNode.parentNode; sp != ep; sp = sp.parentNode, ep = ep.parentNode) {
5236                  startNode = sp;
5237                  endNode = ep;
5238              }
5239  
5240              return _traverseCommonAncestors(startNode, endNode, how);
5241          };
5242  
5243  		 function _traverseSameContainer(how) {
5244              var frag, s, sub, n, cnt, sibling, xferNode;
5245  
5246              if (how != DELETE)
5247                  frag = doc.createDocumentFragment();
5248  
5249              // If selection is empty, just return the fragment
5250              if (t[START_OFFSET] == t[END_OFFSET])
5251                  return frag;
5252  
5253              // Text node needs special case handling
5254              if (t[START_CONTAINER].nodeType == 3 /* TEXT_NODE */) {
5255                  // get the substring
5256                  s = t[START_CONTAINER].nodeValue;
5257                  sub = s.substring(t[START_OFFSET], t[END_OFFSET]);
5258  
5259                  // set the original text node to its new value
5260                  if (how != CLONE) {
5261                      t[START_CONTAINER].deleteData(t[START_OFFSET], t[END_OFFSET] - t[START_OFFSET]);
5262  
5263                      // Nothing is partially selected, so collapse to start point
5264                      t.collapse(TRUE);
5265                  }
5266  
5267                  if (how == DELETE)
5268                      return;
5269  
5270                  frag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(sub));
5271                  return frag;
5272              }
5273  
5274              // Copy nodes between the start/end offsets.
5275              n = _getSelectedNode(t[START_CONTAINER], t[START_OFFSET]);
5276              cnt = t[END_OFFSET] - t[START_OFFSET];
5277  
5278              while (cnt > 0) {
5279                  sibling = n.nextSibling;
5280                  xferNode = _traverseFullySelected(n, how);
5281  
5282                  if (frag)
5283                      frag.appendChild( xferNode );
5284  
5285                  --cnt;
5286                  n = sibling;
5287              }
5288  
5289              // Nothing is partially selected, so collapse to start point
5290              if (how != CLONE)
5291                  t.collapse(TRUE);
5292  
5293              return frag;
5294          };
5295  
5296  		function _traverseCommonStartContainer(endAncestor, how) {
5297              var frag, n, endIdx, cnt, sibling, xferNode;
5298  
5299              if (how != DELETE)
5300                  frag = doc.createDocumentFragment();
5301  
5302              n = _traverseRightBoundary(endAncestor, how);
5303  
5304              if (frag)
5305                  frag.appendChild(n);
5306  
5307              endIdx = nodeIndex(endAncestor);
5308              cnt = endIdx - t[START_OFFSET];
5309  
5310              if (cnt <= 0) {
5311                  // Collapse to just before the endAncestor, which
5312                  // is partially selected.
5313                  if (how != CLONE) {
5314                      t.setEndBefore(endAncestor);
5315                      t.collapse(FALSE);
5316                  }
5317  
5318                  return frag;
5319              }
5320  
5321              n = endAncestor.previousSibling;
5322              while (cnt > 0) {
5323                  sibling = n.previousSibling;
5324                  xferNode = _traverseFullySelected(n, how);
5325  
5326                  if (frag)
5327                      frag.insertBefore(xferNode, frag.firstChild);
5328  
5329                  --cnt;
5330                  n = sibling;
5331              }
5332  
5333              // Collapse to just before the endAncestor, which
5334              // is partially selected.
5335              if (how != CLONE) {
5336                  t.setEndBefore(endAncestor);
5337                  t.collapse(FALSE);
5338              }
5339  
5340              return frag;
5341          };
5342  
5343  		function _traverseCommonEndContainer(startAncestor, how) {
5344              var frag, startIdx, n, cnt, sibling, xferNode;
5345  
5346              if (how != DELETE)
5347                  frag = doc.createDocumentFragment();
5348  
5349              n = _traverseLeftBoundary(startAncestor, how);
5350              if (frag)
5351                  frag.appendChild(n);
5352  
5353              startIdx = nodeIndex(startAncestor);
5354              ++startIdx; // Because we already traversed it
5355  
5356              cnt = t[END_OFFSET] - startIdx;
5357              n = startAncestor.nextSibling;
5358              while (cnt > 0) {
5359                  sibling = n.nextSibling;
5360                  xferNode = _traverseFullySelected(n, how);
5361  
5362                  if (frag)
5363                      frag.appendChild(xferNode);
5364  
5365                  --cnt;
5366                  n = sibling;
5367              }
5368  
5369              if (how != CLONE) {
5370                  t.setStartAfter(startAncestor);
5371                  t.collapse(TRUE);
5372              }
5373  
5374              return frag;
5375          };
5376  
5377  		function _traverseCommonAncestors(startAncestor, endAncestor, how) {
5378              var n, frag, commonParent, startOffset, endOffset, cnt, sibling, nextSibling;
5379  
5380              if (how != DELETE)
5381                  frag = doc.createDocumentFragment();
5382  
5383              n = _traverseLeftBoundary(startAncestor, how);
5384              if (frag)
5385                  frag.appendChild(n);
5386  
5387              commonParent = startAncestor.parentNode;
5388              startOffset = nodeIndex(startAncestor);
5389              endOffset = nodeIndex(endAncestor);
5390              ++startOffset;
5391  
5392              cnt = endOffset - startOffset;
5393              sibling = startAncestor.nextSibling;
5394  
5395              while (cnt > 0) {
5396                  nextSibling = sibling.nextSibling;
5397                  n = _traverseFullySelected(sibling, how);
5398  
5399                  if (frag)
5400                      frag.appendChild(n);
5401  
5402                  sibling = nextSibling;
5403                  --cnt;
5404              }
5405  
5406              n = _traverseRightBoundary(endAncestor, how);
5407  
5408              if (frag)
5409                  frag.appendChild(n);
5410  
5411              if (how != CLONE) {
5412                  t.setStartAfter(startAncestor);
5413                  t.collapse(TRUE);
5414              }
5415  
5416              return frag;
5417          };
5418  
5419  		function _traverseRightBoundary(root, how) {
5420              var next = _getSelectedNode(t[END_CONTAINER], t[END_OFFSET] - 1), parent, clonedParent, prevSibling, clonedChild, clonedGrandParent, isFullySelected = next != t[END_CONTAINER];
5421  
5422              if (next == root)
5423                  return _traverseNode(next, isFullySelected, FALSE, how);
5424  
5425              parent = next.parentNode;
5426              clonedParent = _traverseNode(parent, FALSE, FALSE, how);
5427  
5428              while (parent) {
5429                  while (next) {
5430                      prevSibling = next.previousSibling;
5431                      clonedChild = _traverseNode(next, isFullySelected, FALSE, how);
5432  
5433                      if (how != DELETE)
5434                          clonedParent.insertBefore(clonedChild, clonedParent.firstChild);
5435  
5436                      isFullySelected = TRUE;
5437                      next = prevSibling;
5438                  }
5439  
5440                  if (parent == root)
5441                      return clonedParent;
5442  
5443                  next = parent.previousSibling;
5444                  parent = parent.parentNode;
5445  
5446                  clonedGrandParent = _traverseNode(parent, FALSE, FALSE, how);
5447  
5448                  if (how != DELETE)
5449                      clonedGrandParent.appendChild(clonedParent);
5450  
5451                  clonedParent = clonedGrandParent;
5452              }
5453          };
5454  
5455  		function _traverseLeftBoundary(root, how) {
5456              var next = _getSelectedNode(t[START_CONTAINER], t[START_OFFSET]), isFullySelected = next != t[START_CONTAINER], parent, clonedParent, nextSibling, clonedChild, clonedGrandParent;
5457  
5458              if (next == root)
5459                  return _traverseNode(next, isFullySelected, TRUE, how);
5460  
5461              parent = next.parentNode;
5462              clonedParent = _traverseNode(parent, FALSE, TRUE, how);
5463  
5464              while (parent) {
5465                  while (next) {
5466                      nextSibling = next.nextSibling;
5467                      clonedChild = _traverseNode(next, isFullySelected, TRUE, how);
5468  
5469                      if (how != DELETE)
5470                          clonedParent.appendChild(clonedChild);
5471  
5472                      isFullySelected = TRUE;
5473                      next = nextSibling;
5474                  }
5475  
5476                  if (parent == root)
5477                      return clonedParent;
5478  
5479                  next = parent.nextSibling;
5480                  parent = parent.parentNode;
5481  
5482                  clonedGrandParent = _traverseNode(parent, FALSE, TRUE, how);
5483  
5484                  if (how != DELETE)
5485                      clonedGrandParent.appendChild(clonedParent);
5486  
5487                  clonedParent = clonedGrandParent;
5488              }
5489          };
5490  
5491  		function _traverseNode(n, isFullySelected, isLeft, how) {
5492              var txtValue, newNodeValue, oldNodeValue, offset, newNode;
5493  
5494              if (isFullySelected)
5495                  return _traverseFullySelected(n, how);
5496  
5497              if (n.nodeType == 3 /* TEXT_NODE */) {
5498                  txtValue = n.nodeValue;
5499  
5500                  if (isLeft) {
5501                      offset = t[START_OFFSET];
5502                      newNodeValue = txtValue.substring(offset);
5503                      oldNodeValue = txtValue.substring(0, offset);
5504                  } else {
5505                      offset = t[END_OFFSET];
5506                      newNodeValue = txtValue.substring(0, offset);
5507                      oldNodeValue = txtValue.substring(offset);
5508                  }
5509  
5510                  if (how != CLONE)
5511                      n.nodeValue = oldNodeValue;
5512  
5513                  if (how == DELETE)
5514                      return;
5515  
5516                  newNode = n.cloneNode(FALSE);
5517                  newNode.nodeValue = newNodeValue;
5518  
5519                  return newNode;
5520              }
5521  
5522              if (how == DELETE)
5523                  return;
5524  
5525              return n.cloneNode(FALSE);
5526          };
5527  
5528  		function _traverseFullySelected(n, how) {
5529              if (how != DELETE)
5530                  return how == CLONE ? n.cloneNode(TRUE) : n;
5531  
5532              n.parentNode.removeChild(n);
5533          };
5534      };
5535  
5536      ns.Range = Range;
5537  })(tinymce.dom);
5538  
5539  (function() {
5540  	function Selection(selection) {
5541          var self = this, dom = selection.dom, TRUE = true, FALSE = false;
5542  
5543  		function getPosition(rng, start) {
5544              var checkRng, startIndex = 0, endIndex, inside,
5545                  children, child, offset, index, position = -1, parent;
5546  
5547              // Setup test range, collapse it and get the parent
5548              checkRng = rng.duplicate();
5549              checkRng.collapse(start);
5550              parent = checkRng.parentElement();
5551  
5552              // Check if the selection is within the right document
5553              if (parent.ownerDocument !== selection.dom.doc)
5554                  return;
5555  
5556              // IE will report non editable elements as it's parent so look for an editable one
5557              while (parent.contentEditable === "false") {
5558                  parent = parent.parentNode;
5559              }
5560  
5561              // If parent doesn't have any children then return that we are inside the element
5562              if (!parent.hasChildNodes()) {
5563                  return {node : parent, inside : 1};
5564              }
5565  
5566              // Setup node list and endIndex
5567              children = parent.children;
5568              endIndex = children.length - 1;
5569  
5570              // Perform a binary search for the position
5571              while (startIndex <= endIndex) {
5572                  index = Math.floor((startIndex + endIndex) / 2);
5573  
5574                  // Move selection to node and compare the ranges
5575                  child = children[index];
5576                  checkRng.moveToElementText(child);
5577                  position = checkRng.compareEndPoints(start ? 'StartToStart' : 'EndToEnd', rng);
5578  
5579                  // Before/after or an exact match
5580                  if (position > 0) {
5581                      endIndex = index - 1;
5582                  } else if (position < 0) {
5583                      startIndex = index + 1;
5584                  } else {
5585                      return {node : child};
5586                  }
5587              }
5588  
5589              // Check if child position is before or we didn't find a position
5590              if (position < 0) {
5591                  // No element child was found use the parent element and the offset inside that
5592                  if (!child) {
5593                      checkRng.moveToElementText(parent);
5594                      checkRng.collapse(true);
5595                      child = parent;
5596                      inside = true;
5597                  } else
5598                      checkRng.collapse(false);
5599  
5600                  checkRng.setEndPoint(start ? 'EndToStart' : 'EndToEnd', rng);
5601  
5602                  // Fix for edge case: <div style="width: 100px; height:100px;"><table>..</table>ab|c</div>
5603                  if (checkRng.compareEndPoints(start ? 'StartToStart' : 'StartToEnd', rng) > 0) {
5604                      checkRng = rng.duplicate();
5605                      checkRng.collapse(start);
5606  
5607                      offset = -1;
5608                      while (parent == checkRng.parentElement()) {
5609                          if (checkRng.move('character', -1) == 0)
5610                              break;
5611  
5612                          offset++;
5613                      }
5614                  }
5615  
5616                  offset = offset || checkRng.text.replace('\r\n', ' ').length;
5617              } else {
5618                  // Child position is after the selection endpoint
5619                  checkRng.collapse(true);
5620                  checkRng.setEndPoint(start ? 'StartToStart' : 'StartToEnd', rng);
5621  
5622                  // Get the length of the text to find where the endpoint is relative to it's container
5623                  offset = checkRng.text.replace('\r\n', ' ').length;
5624              }
5625  
5626              return {node : child, position : position, offset : offset, inside : inside};
5627          };
5628  
5629          // Returns a W3C DOM compatible range object by using the IE Range API
5630  		function getRange() {
5631              var ieRange = selection.getRng(), domRange = dom.createRng(), element, collapsed, tmpRange, element2, bookmark, fail;
5632  
5633              // If selection is outside the current document just return an empty range
5634              element = ieRange.item ? ieRange.item(0) : ieRange.parentElement();
5635              if (element.ownerDocument != dom.doc)
5636                  return domRange;
5637  
5638              collapsed = selection.isCollapsed();
5639  
5640              // Handle control selection
5641              if (ieRange.item) {
5642                  domRange.setStart(element.parentNode, dom.nodeIndex(element));
5643                  domRange.setEnd(domRange.startContainer, domRange.startOffset + 1);
5644  
5645                  return domRange;
5646              }
5647  
5648  			function findEndPoint(start) {
5649                  var endPoint = getPosition(ieRange, start), container, offset, textNodeOffset = 0, sibling, undef, nodeValue;
5650  
5651                  container = endPoint.node;
5652                  offset = endPoint.offset;
5653  
5654                  if (endPoint.inside && !container.hasChildNodes()) {
5655                      domRange[start ? 'setStart' : 'setEnd'](container, 0);
5656                      return;
5657                  }
5658  
5659                  if (offset === undef) {
5660                      domRange[start ? 'setStartBefore' : 'setEndAfter'](container);
5661                      return;
5662                  }
5663  
5664                  if (endPoint.position < 0) {
5665                      sibling = endPoint.inside ? container.firstChild : container.nextSibling;
5666  
5667                      if (!sibling) {
5668                          domRange[start ? 'setStartAfter' : 'setEndAfter'](container);
5669                          return;
5670                      }
5671  
5672                      if (!offset) {
5673                          if (sibling.nodeType == 3)
5674                              domRange[start ? 'setStart' : 'setEnd'](sibling, 0);
5675                          else
5676                              domRange[start ? 'setStartBefore' : 'setEndBefore'](sibling);
5677  
5678                          return;
5679                      }
5680  
5681                      // Find the text node and offset
5682                      while (sibling) {
5683                          nodeValue = sibling.nodeValue;
5684                          textNodeOffset += nodeValue.length;
5685  
5686                          // We are at or passed the position we where looking for
5687                          if (textNodeOffset >= offset) {
5688                              container = sibling;
5689                              textNodeOffset -= offset;
5690                              textNodeOffset = nodeValue.length - textNodeOffset;
5691                              break;
5692                          }
5693  
5694                          sibling = sibling.nextSibling;
5695                      }
5696                  } else {
5697                      // Find the text node and offset
5698                      sibling = container.previousSibling;
5699  
5700                      if (!sibling)
5701                          return domRange[start ? 'setStartBefore' : 'setEndBefore'](container);
5702  
5703                      // If there isn't any text to loop then use the first position
5704                      if (!offset) {
5705                          if (container.nodeType == 3)
5706                              domRange[start ? 'setStart' : 'setEnd'](sibling, container.nodeValue.length);
5707                          else
5708                              domRange[start ? 'setStartAfter' : 'setEndAfter'](sibling);
5709  
5710                          return;
5711                      }
5712  
5713                      while (sibling) {
5714                          textNodeOffset += sibling.nodeValue.length;
5715  
5716                          // We are at or passed the position we where looking for
5717                          if (textNodeOffset >= offset) {
5718                              container = sibling;
5719                              textNodeOffset -= offset;
5720                              break;
5721                          }
5722  
5723                          sibling = sibling.previousSibling;
5724                      }
5725                  }
5726  
5727                  domRange[start ? 'setStart' : 'setEnd'](container, textNodeOffset);
5728              };
5729  
5730              try {
5731                  // Find start point
5732                  findEndPoint(true);
5733  
5734                  // Find end point if needed
5735                  if (!collapsed)
5736                      findEndPoint();
5737              } catch (ex) {
5738                  // IE has a nasty bug where text nodes might throw "invalid argument" when you
5739                  // access the nodeValue or other properties of text nodes. This seems to happend when
5740                  // text nodes are split into two nodes by a delete/backspace call. So lets detect it and try to fix it.
5741                  if (ex.number == -2147024809) {
5742                      // Get the current selection
5743                      bookmark = self.getBookmark(2);
5744  
5745                      // Get start element
5746                      tmpRange = ieRange.duplicate();
5747                      tmpRange.collapse(true);
5748                      element = tmpRange.parentElement();
5749  
5750                      // Get end element
5751                      if (!collapsed) {
5752                          tmpRange = ieRange.duplicate();
5753                          tmpRange.collapse(false);
5754                          element2 = tmpRange.parentElement();
5755                          element2.innerHTML = element2.innerHTML;
5756                      }
5757  
5758                      // Remove the broken elements
5759                      element.innerHTML = element.innerHTML;
5760  
5761                      // Restore the selection
5762                      self.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
5763  
5764                      // Since the range has moved we need to re-get it
5765                      ieRange = selection.getRng();
5766  
5767                      // Find start point
5768                      findEndPoint(true);
5769  
5770                      // Find end point if needed
5771                      if (!collapsed)
5772                          findEndPoint();
5773                  } else
5774                      throw ex; // Throw other errors
5775              }
5776  
5777              return domRange;
5778          };
5779  
5780          this.getBookmark = function(type) {
5781              var rng = selection.getRng(), start, end, bookmark = {};
5782  
5783  			function getIndexes(node) {
5784                  var node, parent, root, children, i, indexes = [];
5785  
5786                  parent = node.parentNode;
5787                  root = dom.getRoot().parentNode;
5788  
5789                  while (parent != root && parent.nodeType !== 9) {
5790                      children = parent.children;
5791  
5792                      i = children.length;
5793                      while (i--) {
5794                          if (node === children[i]) {
5795                              indexes.push(i);
5796                              break;
5797                          }
5798                      }
5799  
5800                      node = parent;
5801                      parent = parent.parentNode;
5802                  }
5803  
5804                  return indexes;
5805              };
5806  
5807  			function getBookmarkEndPoint(start) {
5808                  var position;
5809  
5810                  position = getPosition(rng, start);
5811                  if (position) {
5812                      return {
5813                          position : position.position,
5814                          offset : position.offset,
5815                          indexes : getIndexes(position.node),
5816                          inside : position.inside
5817                      };
5818                  }
5819              };
5820  
5821              // Non ubstructive bookmark
5822              if (type === 2) {
5823                  // Handle text selection
5824                  if (!rng.item) {
5825                      bookmark.start = getBookmarkEndPoint(true);
5826  
5827                      if (!selection.isCollapsed())
5828                          bookmark.end = getBookmarkEndPoint();
5829                  } else
5830                      bookmark.start = {ctrl : true, indexes : getIndexes(rng.item(0))};
5831              }
5832  
5833              return bookmark;
5834          };
5835  
5836          this.moveToBookmark = function(bookmark) {
5837              var rng, body = dom.doc.body;
5838  
5839  			function resolveIndexes(indexes) {
5840                  var node, i, idx, children;
5841  
5842                  node = dom.getRoot();
5843                  for (i = indexes.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
5844                      children = node.children;
5845                      idx = indexes[i];
5846  
5847                      if (idx <= children.length - 1) {
5848                          node = children[idx];
5849                      }
5850                  }
5851  
5852                  return node;
5853              };
5854              
5855  			function setBookmarkEndPoint(start) {
5856                  var endPoint = bookmark[start ? 'start' : 'end'], moveLeft, moveRng, undef;
5857  
5858                  if (endPoint) {
5859                      moveLeft = endPoint.position > 0;
5860  
5861                      moveRng = body.createTextRange();
5862                      moveRng.moveToElementText(resolveIndexes(endPoint.indexes));
5863  
5864                      offset = endPoint.offset;
5865                      if (offset !== undef) {
5866                          moveRng.collapse(endPoint.inside || moveLeft);
5867                          moveRng.moveStart('character', moveLeft ? -offset : offset);
5868                      } else
5869                          moveRng.collapse(start);
5870  
5871                      rng.setEndPoint(start ? 'StartToStart' : 'EndToStart', moveRng);
5872  
5873                      if (start)
5874                          rng.collapse(true);
5875                  }
5876              };
5877  
5878              if (bookmark.start) {
5879                  if (bookmark.start.ctrl) {
5880                      rng = body.createControlRange();
5881                      rng.addElement(resolveIndexes(bookmark.start.indexes));
5882                      rng.select();
5883                  } else {
5884                      rng = body.createTextRange();
5885                      setBookmarkEndPoint(true);
5886                      setBookmarkEndPoint();
5887                      rng.select();
5888                  }
5889              }
5890          };
5891  
5892          this.addRange = function(rng) {
5893              var ieRng, ctrlRng, startContainer, startOffset, endContainer, endOffset, doc = selection.dom.doc, body = doc.body;
5894  
5895  			function setEndPoint(start) {
5896                  var container, offset, marker, tmpRng, nodes;
5897  
5898                  marker = dom.create('a');
5899                  container = start ? startContainer : endContainer;
5900                  offset = start ? startOffset : endOffset;
5901                  tmpRng = ieRng.duplicate();
5902  
5903                  if (container == doc || container == doc.documentElement) {
5904                      container = body;
5905                      offset = 0;
5906                  }
5907  
5908                  if (container.nodeType == 3) {
5909                      container.parentNode.insertBefore(marker, container);
5910                      tmpRng.moveToElementText(marker);
5911                      tmpRng.moveStart('character', offset);
5912                      dom.remove(marker);
5913                      ieRng.setEndPoint(start ? 'StartToStart' : 'EndToEnd', tmpRng);
5914                  } else {
5915                      nodes = container.childNodes;
5916  
5917                      if (nodes.length) {
5918                          if (offset >= nodes.length) {
5919                              dom.insertAfter(marker, nodes[nodes.length - 1]);
5920                          } else {
5921                              container.insertBefore(marker, nodes[offset]);
5922                          }
5923  
5924                          tmpRng.moveToElementText(marker);
5925                      } else {
5926                          // Empty node selection for example <div>|</div>
5927                          marker = doc.createTextNode('\uFEFF');
5928                          container.appendChild(marker);
5929                          tmpRng.moveToElementText(marker.parentNode);
5930                          tmpRng.collapse(TRUE);
5931                      }
5932  
5933                      ieRng.setEndPoint(start ? 'StartToStart' : 'EndToEnd', tmpRng);
5934                      dom.remove(marker);
5935                  }
5936              }
5937  
5938              // Setup some shorter versions
5939              startContainer = rng.startContainer;
