5940              startOffset = rng.startOffset;
5941              endContainer = rng.endContainer;
5942              endOffset = rng.endOffset;
5943              ieRng = body.createTextRange();
5944  
5945              // If single element selection then try making a control selection out of it
5946              if (startContainer == endContainer && startContainer.nodeType == 1 && startOffset == endOffset - 1) {
5947                  if (startOffset == endOffset - 1) {
5948                      try {
5949                          ctrlRng = body.createControlRange();
5950                          ctrlRng.addElement(startContainer.childNodes[startOffset]);
5951                          ctrlRng.select();
5952                          return;
5953                      } catch (ex) {
5954                          // Ignore
5955                      }
5956                  }
5957              }
5958  
5959              // Set start/end point of selection
5960              setEndPoint(true);
5961              setEndPoint();
5962  
5963              // Select the new range and scroll it into view
5964              ieRng.select();
5965          };
5966  
5967          // Expose range method
5968          this.getRangeAt = getRange;
5969      };
5970  
5971      // Expose the selection object
5972      tinymce.dom.TridentSelection = Selection;
5973  })();
5974  
5975  
5976  /*
5977   * Sizzle CSS Selector Engine - v1.0
5978   *  Copyright 2009, The Dojo Foundation
5979   *  Released under the MIT, BSD, and GPL Licenses.
5980   *  More information: http://sizzlejs.com/
5981   */
5982  (function(){
5983  
5984  var chunker = /((?:\((?:\([^()]+\)|[^()]+)+\)|\[(?:\[[^\[\]]*\]|['"][^'"]*['"]|[^\[\]'"]+)+\]|\\.|[^ >+~,(\[\\]+)+|[>+~])(\s*,\s*)?((?:.|\r|\n)*)/g,
5985      done = 0,
5986      toString = Object.prototype.toString,
5987      hasDuplicate = false,
5988      baseHasDuplicate = true;
5989  
5990  // Here we check if the JavaScript engine is using some sort of
5991  // optimization where it does not always call our comparision
5992  // function. If that is the case, discard the hasDuplicate value.
5993  //   Thus far that includes Google Chrome.
5994  [0, 0].sort(function(){
5995      baseHasDuplicate = false;
5996      return 0;
5997  });
5998  
5999  var Sizzle = function(selector, context, results, seed) {
6000      results = results || [];
6001      context = context || document;
6002  
6003      var origContext = context;
6004  
6005      if ( context.nodeType !== 1 && context.nodeType !== 9 ) {
6006          return [];
6007      }
6008      
6009      if ( !selector || typeof selector !== "string" ) {
6010          return results;
6011      }
6012  
6013      var parts = [], m, set, checkSet, extra, prune = true, contextXML = Sizzle.isXML(context),
6014          soFar = selector, ret, cur, pop, i;
6015      
6016      // Reset the position of the chunker regexp (start from head)
6017      do {
6018          chunker.exec("");
6019          m = chunker.exec(soFar);
6020  
6021          if ( m ) {
6022              soFar = m[3];
6023          
6024              parts.push( m[1] );
6025          
6026              if ( m[2] ) {
6027                  extra = m[3];
6028                  break;
6029              }
6030          }
6031      } while ( m );
6032  
6033      if ( parts.length > 1 && origPOS.exec( selector ) ) {
6034          if ( parts.length === 2 && Expr.relative[ parts[0] ] ) {
6035              set = posProcess( parts[0] + parts[1], context );
6036          } else {
6037              set = Expr.relative[ parts[0] ] ?
6038                  [ context ] :
6039                  Sizzle( parts.shift(), context );
6040  
6041              while ( parts.length ) {
6042                  selector = parts.shift();
6043  
6044                  if ( Expr.relative[ selector ] ) {
6045                      selector += parts.shift();
6046                  }
6047                  
6048                  set = posProcess( selector, set );
6049              }
6050          }
6051      } else {
6052          // Take a shortcut and set the context if the root selector is an ID
6053          // (but not if it'll be faster if the inner selector is an ID)
6054          if ( !seed && parts.length > 1 && context.nodeType === 9 && !contextXML &&
6055                  Expr.match.ID.test(parts[0]) && !Expr.match.ID.test(parts[parts.length - 1]) ) {
6056              ret = Sizzle.find( parts.shift(), context, contextXML );
6057              context = ret.expr ? Sizzle.filter( ret.expr, ret.set )[0] : ret.set[0];
6058          }
6059  
6060          if ( context ) {
6061              ret = seed ?
6062                  { expr: parts.pop(), set: makeArray(seed) } :
6063                  Sizzle.find( parts.pop(), parts.length === 1 && (parts[0] === "~" || parts[0] === "+") && context.parentNode ? context.parentNode : context, contextXML );
6064              set = ret.expr ? Sizzle.filter( ret.expr, ret.set ) : ret.set;
6065  
6066              if ( parts.length > 0 ) {
6067                  checkSet = makeArray(set);
6068              } else {
6069                  prune = false;
6070              }
6071  
6072              while ( parts.length ) {
6073                  cur = parts.pop();
6074                  pop = cur;
6075  
6076                  if ( !Expr.relative[ cur ] ) {
6077                      cur = "";
6078                  } else {
6079                      pop = parts.pop();
6080                  }
6081  
6082                  if ( pop == null ) {
6083                      pop = context;
6084                  }
6085  
6086                  Expr.relative[ cur ]( checkSet, pop, contextXML );
6087              }
6088          } else {
6089              checkSet = parts = [];
6090          }
6091      }
6092  
6093      if ( !checkSet ) {
6094          checkSet = set;
6095      }
6096  
6097      if ( !checkSet ) {
6098          Sizzle.error( cur || selector );
6099      }
6100  
6101      if ( toString.call(checkSet) === "[object Array]" ) {
6102          if ( !prune ) {
6103              results.push.apply( results, checkSet );
6104          } else if ( context && context.nodeType === 1 ) {
6105              for ( i = 0; checkSet[i] != null; i++ ) {
6106                  if ( checkSet[i] && (checkSet[i] === true || checkSet[i].nodeType === 1 && Sizzle.contains(context, checkSet[i])) ) {
6107                      results.push( set[i] );
6108                  }
6109              }
6110          } else {
6111              for ( i = 0; checkSet[i] != null; i++ ) {
6112                  if ( checkSet[i] && checkSet[i].nodeType === 1 ) {
6113                      results.push( set[i] );
6114                  }
6115              }
6116          }
6117      } else {
6118          makeArray( checkSet, results );
6119      }
6120  
6121      if ( extra ) {
6122          Sizzle( extra, origContext, results, seed );
6123          Sizzle.uniqueSort( results );
6124      }
6125  
6126      return results;
6127  };
6128  
6129  Sizzle.uniqueSort = function(results){
6130      if ( sortOrder ) {
6131          hasDuplicate = baseHasDuplicate;
6132          results.sort(sortOrder);
6133  
6134          if ( hasDuplicate ) {
6135              for ( var i = 1; i < results.length; i++ ) {
6136                  if ( results[i] === results[i-1] ) {
6137                      results.splice(i--, 1);
6138                  }
6139              }
6140          }
6141      }
6142  
6143      return results;
6144  };
6145  
6146  Sizzle.matches = function(expr, set){
6147      return Sizzle(expr, null, null, set);
6148  };
6149  
6150  Sizzle.find = function(expr, context, isXML){
6151      var set;
6152  
6153      if ( !expr ) {
6154          return [];
6155      }
6156  
6157      for ( var i = 0, l = Expr.order.length; i < l; i++ ) {
6158          var type = Expr.order[i], match;
6159          
6160          if ( (match = Expr.leftMatch[ type ].exec( expr )) ) {
6161              var left = match[1];
6162              match.splice(1,1);
6163  
6164              if ( left.substr( left.length - 1 ) !== "\\" ) {
6165                  match[1] = (match[1] || "").replace(/\\/g, "");
6166                  set = Expr.find[ type ]( match, context, isXML );
6167                  if ( set != null ) {
6168                      expr = expr.replace( Expr.match[ type ], "" );
6169                      break;
6170                  }
6171              }
6172          }
6173      }
6174  
6175      if ( !set ) {
6176          set = context.getElementsByTagName("*");
6177      }
6178  
6179      return {set: set, expr: expr};
6180  };
6181  
6182  Sizzle.filter = function(expr, set, inplace, not){
6183      var old = expr, result = [], curLoop = set, match, anyFound,
6184          isXMLFilter = set && set[0] && Sizzle.isXML(set[0]);
6185  
6186      while ( expr && set.length ) {
6187          for ( var type in Expr.filter ) {
6188              if ( (match = Expr.leftMatch[ type ].exec( expr )) != null && match[2] ) {
6189                  var filter = Expr.filter[ type ], found, item, left = match[1];
6190                  anyFound = false;
6191  
6192                  match.splice(1,1);
6193  
6194                  if ( left.substr( left.length - 1 ) === "\\" ) {
6195                      continue;
6196                  }
6197  
6198                  if ( curLoop === result ) {
6199                      result = [];
6200                  }
6201  
6202                  if ( Expr.preFilter[ type ] ) {
6203                      match = Expr.preFilter[ type ]( match, curLoop, inplace, result, not, isXMLFilter );
6204  
6205                      if ( !match ) {
6206                          anyFound = found = true;
6207                      } else if ( match === true ) {
6208                          continue;
6209                      }
6210                  }
6211  
6212                  if ( match ) {
6213                      for ( var i = 0; (item = curLoop[i]) != null; i++ ) {
6214                          if ( item ) {
6215                              found = filter( item, match, i, curLoop );
6216                              var pass = not ^ !!found;
6217  
6218                              if ( inplace && found != null ) {
6219                                  if ( pass ) {
6220                                      anyFound = true;
6221                                  } else {
6222                                      curLoop[i] = false;
6223                                  }
6224                              } else if ( pass ) {
6225                                  result.push( item );
6226                                  anyFound = true;
6227                              }
6228                          }
6229                      }
6230                  }
6231  
6232                  if ( found !== undefined ) {
6233                      if ( !inplace ) {
6234                          curLoop = result;
6235                      }
6236  
6237                      expr = expr.replace( Expr.match[ type ], "" );
6238  
6239                      if ( !anyFound ) {
6240                          return [];
6241                      }
6242  
6243                      break;
6244                  }
6245              }
6246          }
6247  
6248          // Improper expression
6249          if ( expr === old ) {
6250              if ( anyFound == null ) {
6251                  Sizzle.error( expr );
6252              } else {
6253                  break;
6254              }
6255          }
6256  
6257          old = expr;
6258      }
6259  
6260      return curLoop;
6261  };
6262  
6263  Sizzle.error = function( msg ) {
6264      throw "Syntax error, unrecognized expression: " + msg;
6265  };
6266  
6267  var Expr = Sizzle.selectors = {
6268      order: [ "ID", "NAME", "TAG" ],
6269      match: {
6270          ID: /#((?:[\w\u00c0-\uFFFF\-]|\\.)+)/,
6271          CLASS: /\.((?:[\w\u00c0-\uFFFF\-]|\\.)+)/,
6272          NAME: /\[name=['"]*((?:[\w\u00c0-\uFFFF\-]|\\.)+)['"]*\]/,
6273          ATTR: /\[\s*((?:[\w\u00c0-\uFFFF\-]|\\.)+)\s*(?:(\S?=)\s*(['"]*)(.*?)\3|)\s*\]/,
6274          TAG: /^((?:[\w\u00c0-\uFFFF\*\-]|\\.)+)/,
6275          CHILD: /:(only|nth|last|first)-child(?:\((even|odd|[\dn+\-]*)\))?/,
6276          POS: /:(nth|eq|gt|lt|first|last|even|odd)(?:\((\d*)\))?(?=[^\-]|$)/,
6277          PSEUDO: /:((?:[\w\u00c0-\uFFFF\-]|\\.)+)(?:\((['"]?)((?:\([^\)]+\)|[^\(\)]*)+)\2\))?/
6278      },
6279      leftMatch: {},
6280      attrMap: {
6281          "class": "className",
6282          "for": "htmlFor"
6283      },
6284      attrHandle: {
6285          href: function(elem){
6286              return elem.getAttribute("href");
6287          }
6288      },
6289      relative: {
6290          "+": function(checkSet, part){
6291              var isPartStr = typeof part === "string",
6292                  isTag = isPartStr && !/\W/.test(part),
6293                  isPartStrNotTag = isPartStr && !isTag;
6294  
6295              if ( isTag ) {
6296                  part = part.toLowerCase();
6297              }
6298  
6299              for ( var i = 0, l = checkSet.length, elem; i < l; i++ ) {
6300                  if ( (elem = checkSet[i]) ) {
6301                      while ( (elem = elem.previousSibling) && elem.nodeType !== 1 ) {}
6302  
6303                      checkSet[i] = isPartStrNotTag || elem && elem.nodeName.toLowerCase() === part ?
6304                          elem || false :
6305                          elem === part;
6306                  }
6307              }
6308  
6309              if ( isPartStrNotTag ) {
6310                  Sizzle.filter( part, checkSet, true );
6311              }
6312          },
6313          ">": function(checkSet, part){
6314              var isPartStr = typeof part === "string",
6315                  elem, i = 0, l = checkSet.length;
6316  
6317              if ( isPartStr && !/\W/.test(part) ) {
6318                  part = part.toLowerCase();
6319  
6320                  for ( ; i < l; i++ ) {
6321                      elem = checkSet[i];
6322                      if ( elem ) {
6323                          var parent = elem.parentNode;
6324                          checkSet[i] = parent.nodeName.toLowerCase() === part ? parent : false;
6325                      }
6326                  }
6327              } else {
6328                  for ( ; i < l; i++ ) {
6329                      elem = checkSet[i];
6330                      if ( elem ) {
6331                          checkSet[i] = isPartStr ?
6332                              elem.parentNode :
6333                              elem.parentNode === part;
6334                      }
6335                  }
6336  
6337                  if ( isPartStr ) {
6338                      Sizzle.filter( part, checkSet, true );
6339                  }
6340              }
6341          },
6342          "": function(checkSet, part, isXML){
6343              var doneName = done++, checkFn = dirCheck, nodeCheck;
6344  
6345              if ( typeof part === "string" && !/\W/.test(part) ) {
6346                  part = part.toLowerCase();
6347                  nodeCheck = part;
6348                  checkFn = dirNodeCheck;
6349              }
6350  
6351              checkFn("parentNode", part, doneName, checkSet, nodeCheck, isXML);
6352          },
6353          "~": function(checkSet, part, isXML){
6354              var doneName = done++, checkFn = dirCheck, nodeCheck;
6355  
6356              if ( typeof part === "string" && !/\W/.test(part) ) {
6357                  part = part.toLowerCase();
6358                  nodeCheck = part;
6359                  checkFn = dirNodeCheck;
6360              }
6361  
6362              checkFn("previousSibling", part, doneName, checkSet, nodeCheck, isXML);
6363          }
6364      },
6365      find: {
6366          ID: function(match, context, isXML){
6367              if ( typeof context.getElementById !== "undefined" && !isXML ) {
6368                  var m = context.getElementById(match[1]);
6369                  return m ? [m] : [];
6370              }
6371          },
6372          NAME: function(match, context){
6373              if ( typeof context.getElementsByName !== "undefined" ) {
6374                  var ret = [], results = context.getElementsByName(match[1]);
6375  
6376                  for ( var i = 0, l = results.length; i < l; i++ ) {
6377                      if ( results[i].getAttribute("name") === match[1] ) {
6378                          ret.push( results[i] );
6379                      }
6380                  }
6381  
6382                  return ret.length === 0 ? null : ret;
6383              }
6384          },
6385          TAG: function(match, context){
6386              return context.getElementsByTagName(match[1]);
6387          }
6388      },
6389      preFilter: {
6390          CLASS: function(match, curLoop, inplace, result, not, isXML){
6391              match = " " + match[1].replace(/\\/g, "") + " ";
6392  
6393              if ( isXML ) {
6394                  return match;
6395              }
6396  
6397              for ( var i = 0, elem; (elem = curLoop[i]) != null; i++ ) {
6398                  if ( elem ) {
6399                      if ( not ^ (elem.className && (" " + elem.className + " ").replace(/[\t\n]/g, " ").indexOf(match) >= 0) ) {
6400                          if ( !inplace ) {
6401                              result.push( elem );
6402                          }
6403                      } else if ( inplace ) {
6404                          curLoop[i] = false;
6405                      }
6406                  }
6407              }
6408  
6409              return false;
6410          },
6411          ID: function(match){
6412              return match[1].replace(/\\/g, "");
6413          },
6414          TAG: function(match, curLoop){
6415              return match[1].toLowerCase();
6416          },
6417          CHILD: function(match){
6418              if ( match[1] === "nth" ) {
6419                  // parse equations like 'even', 'odd', '5', '2n', '3n+2', '4n-1', '-n+6'
6420                  var test = /(-?)(\d*)n((?:\+|-)?\d*)/.exec(
6421                      match[2] === "even" && "2n" || match[2] === "odd" && "2n+1" ||
6422                      !/\D/.test( match[2] ) && "0n+" + match[2] || match[2]);
6423  
6424                  // calculate the numbers (first)n+(last) including if they are negative
6425                  match[2] = (test[1] + (test[2] || 1)) - 0;
6426                  match[3] = test[3] - 0;
6427              }
6428  
6429              // TODO: Move to normal caching system
6430              match[0] = done++;
6431  
6432              return match;
6433          },
6434          ATTR: function(match, curLoop, inplace, result, not, isXML){
6435              var name = match[1].replace(/\\/g, "");
6436              
6437              if ( !isXML && Expr.attrMap[name] ) {
6438                  match[1] = Expr.attrMap[name];
6439              }
6440  
6441              if ( match[2] === "~=" ) {
6442                  match[4] = " " + match[4] + " ";
6443              }
6444  
6445              return match;
6446          },
6447          PSEUDO: function(match, curLoop, inplace, result, not){
6448              if ( match[1] === "not" ) {
6449                  // If we're dealing with a complex expression, or a simple one
6450                  if ( ( chunker.exec(match[3]) || "" ).length > 1 || /^\w/.test(match[3]) ) {
6451                      match[3] = Sizzle(match[3], null, null, curLoop);
6452                  } else {
6453                      var ret = Sizzle.filter(match[3], curLoop, inplace, true ^ not);
6454                      if ( !inplace ) {
6455                          result.push.apply( result, ret );
6456                      }
6457                      return false;
6458                  }
6459              } else if ( Expr.match.POS.test( match[0] ) || Expr.match.CHILD.test( match[0] ) ) {
6460                  return true;
6461              }
6462              
6463              return match;
6464          },
6465          POS: function(match){
6466              match.unshift( true );
6467              return match;
6468          }
6469      },
6470      filters: {
6471          enabled: function(elem){
6472              return elem.disabled === false && elem.type !== "hidden";
6473          },
6474          disabled: function(elem){
6475              return elem.disabled === true;
6476          },
6477          checked: function(elem){
6478              return elem.checked === true;
6479          },
6480          selected: function(elem){
6481              // Accessing this property makes selected-by-default
6482              // options in Safari work properly
6483              elem.parentNode.selectedIndex;
6484              return elem.selected === true;
6485          },
6486          parent: function(elem){
6487              return !!elem.firstChild;
6488          },
6489          empty: function(elem){
6490              return !elem.firstChild;
6491          },
6492          has: function(elem, i, match){
6493              return !!Sizzle( match[3], elem ).length;
6494          },
6495          header: function(elem){
6496              return (/h\d/i).test( elem.nodeName );
6497          },
6498          text: function(elem){
6499              return "text" === elem.type;
6500          },
6501          radio: function(elem){
6502              return "radio" === elem.type;
6503          },
6504          checkbox: function(elem){
6505              return "checkbox" === elem.type;
6506          },
6507          file: function(elem){
6508              return "file" === elem.type;
6509          },
6510          password: function(elem){
6511              return "password" === elem.type;
6512          },
6513          submit: function(elem){
6514              return "submit" === elem.type;
6515          },
6516          image: function(elem){
6517              return "image" === elem.type;
6518          },
6519          reset: function(elem){
6520              return "reset" === elem.type;
6521          },
6522          button: function(elem){
6523              return "button" === elem.type || elem.nodeName.toLowerCase() === "button";
6524          },
6525          input: function(elem){
6526              return (/input|select|textarea|button/i).test(elem.nodeName);
6527          }
6528      },
6529      setFilters: {
6530          first: function(elem, i){
6531              return i === 0;
6532          },
6533          last: function(elem, i, match, array){
6534              return i === array.length - 1;
6535          },
6536          even: function(elem, i){
6537              return i % 2 === 0;
6538          },
6539          odd: function(elem, i){
6540              return i % 2 === 1;
6541          },
6542          lt: function(elem, i, match){
6543              return i < match[3] - 0;
6544          },
6545          gt: function(elem, i, match){
6546              return i > match[3] - 0;
6547          },
6548          nth: function(elem, i, match){
6549              return match[3] - 0 === i;
6550          },
6551          eq: function(elem, i, match){
6552              return match[3] - 0 === i;
6553          }
6554      },
6555      filter: {
6556          PSEUDO: function(elem, match, i, array){
6557              var name = match[1], filter = Expr.filters[ name ];
6558  
6559              if ( filter ) {
6560                  return filter( elem, i, match, array );
6561              } else if ( name === "contains" ) {
6562                  return (elem.textContent || elem.innerText || Sizzle.getText([ elem ]) || "").indexOf(match[3]) >= 0;
6563              } else if ( name === "not" ) {
6564                  var not = match[3];
6565  
6566                  for ( var j = 0, l = not.length; j < l; j++ ) {
6567                      if ( not[j] === elem ) {
6568                          return false;
6569                      }
6570                  }
6571  
6572                  return true;
6573              } else {
6574                  Sizzle.error( "Syntax error, unrecognized expression: " + name );
6575              }
6576          },
6577          CHILD: function(elem, match){
6578              var type = match[1], node = elem;
6579              switch (type) {
6580                  case 'only':
6581                  case 'first':
6582                      while ( (node = node.previousSibling) )     {
6583                          if ( node.nodeType === 1 ) { 
6584                              return false; 
6585                          }
6586                      }
6587                      if ( type === "first" ) { 
6588                          return true; 
6589                      }
6590                      node = elem;
6591                  case 'last':
6592                      while ( (node = node.nextSibling) )     {
6593                          if ( node.nodeType === 1 ) { 
6594                              return false; 
6595                          }
6596                      }
6597                      return true;
6598                  case 'nth':
6599                      var first = match[2], last = match[3];
6600  
6601                      if ( first === 1 && last === 0 ) {
6602                          return true;
6603                      }
6604                      
6605                      var doneName = match[0],
6606                          parent = elem.parentNode;
6607      
6608                      if ( parent && (parent.sizcache !== doneName || !elem.nodeIndex) ) {
6609                          var count = 0;
6610                          for ( node = parent.firstChild; node; node = node.nextSibling ) {
6611                              if ( node.nodeType === 1 ) {
6612                                  node.nodeIndex = ++count;
6613                              }
6614                          } 
6615                          parent.sizcache = doneName;
6616                      }
6617                      
6618                      var diff = elem.nodeIndex - last;
6619                      if ( first === 0 ) {
6620                          return diff === 0;
6621                      } else {
6622                          return ( diff % first === 0 && diff / first >= 0 );
6623                      }
6624              }
6625          },
6626          ID: function(elem, match){
6627              return elem.nodeType === 1 && elem.getAttribute("id") === match;
6628          },
6629          TAG: function(elem, match){
6630              return (match === "*" && elem.nodeType === 1) || elem.nodeName.toLowerCase() === match;
6631          },
6632          CLASS: function(elem, match){
6633              return (" " + (elem.className || elem.getAttribute("class")) + " ")
6634                  .indexOf( match ) > -1;
6635          },
6636          ATTR: function(elem, match){
6637              var name = match[1],
6638                  result = Expr.attrHandle[ name ] ?
6639                      Expr.attrHandle[ name ]( elem ) :
6640                      elem[ name ] != null ?
6641                          elem[ name ] :
6642                          elem.getAttribute( name ),
6643                  value = result + "",
6644                  type = match[2],
6645                  check = match[4];
6646  
6647              return result == null ?
6648                  type === "!=" :
6649                  type === "=" ?
6650                  value === check :
6651                  type === "*=" ?
6652                  value.indexOf(check) >= 0 :
6653                  type === "~=" ?
6654                  (" " + value + " ").indexOf(check) >= 0 :
6655                  !check ?
6656                  value && result !== false :
6657                  type === "!=" ?
6658                  value !== check :
6659                  type === "^=" ?
6660                  value.indexOf(check) === 0 :
6661                  type === "$=" ?
6662                  value.substr(value.length - check.length) === check :
6663                  type === "|=" ?
6664                  value === check || value.substr(0, check.length + 1) === check + "-" :
6665                  false;
6666          },
6667          POS: function(elem, match, i, array){
6668              var name = match[2], filter = Expr.setFilters[ name ];
6669  
6670              if ( filter ) {
6671                  return filter( elem, i, match, array );
6672              }
6673          }
6674      }
6675  };
6676  
6677  var origPOS = Expr.match.POS,
6678      fescape = function(all, num){
6679          return "\\" + (num - 0 + 1);
6680      };
6681  
6682  for ( var type in Expr.match ) {
6683      Expr.match[ type ] = new RegExp( Expr.match[ type ].source + (/(?![^\[]*\])(?![^\(]*\))/.source) );
6684      Expr.leftMatch[ type ] = new RegExp( /(^(?:.|\r|\n)*?)/.source + Expr.match[ type ].source.replace(/\\(\d+)/g, fescape) );
6685  }
6686  
6687  var makeArray = function(array, results) {
6688      array = Array.prototype.slice.call( array, 0 );
6689  
6690      if ( results ) {
6691          results.push.apply( results, array );
6692          return results;
6693      }
6694      
6695      return array;
6696  };
6697  
6698  // Perform a simple check to determine if the browser is capable of
6699  // converting a NodeList to an array using builtin methods.
6700  // Also verifies that the returned array holds DOM nodes
6701  // (which is not the case in the Blackberry browser)
6702  try {
6703      Array.prototype.slice.call( document.documentElement.childNodes, 0 )[0].nodeType;
6704  
6705  // Provide a fallback method if it does not work
6706  } catch(e){
6707      makeArray = function(array, results) {
6708          var ret = results || [], i = 0;
6709  
6710          if ( toString.call(array) === "[object Array]" ) {
6711              Array.prototype.push.apply( ret, array );
6712          } else {
6713              if ( typeof array.length === "number" ) {
6714                  for ( var l = array.length; i < l; i++ ) {
6715                      ret.push( array[i] );
6716                  }
6717              } else {
6718                  for ( ; array[i]; i++ ) {
6719                      ret.push( array[i] );
6720                  }
6721              }
6722          }
6723  
6724          return ret;
6725      };
6726  }
6727  
6728  var sortOrder;
6729  
6730  if ( document.documentElement.compareDocumentPosition ) {
6731      sortOrder = function( a, b ) {
6732          if ( !a.compareDocumentPosition || !b.compareDocumentPosition ) {
6733              if ( a == b ) {
6734                  hasDuplicate = true;
6735              }
6736              return a.compareDocumentPosition ? -1 : 1;
6737          }
6738  
6739          var ret = a.compareDocumentPosition(b) & 4 ? -1 : a === b ? 0 : 1;
6740          if ( ret === 0 ) {
6741              hasDuplicate = true;
6742          }
6743          return ret;
6744      };
6745  } else if ( "sourceIndex" in document.documentElement ) {
6746      sortOrder = function( a, b ) {
6747          if ( !a.sourceIndex || !b.sourceIndex ) {
6748              if ( a == b ) {
6749                  hasDuplicate = true;
6750              }
6751              return a.sourceIndex ? -1 : 1;
6752          }
6753  
6754          var ret = a.sourceIndex - b.sourceIndex;
6755          if ( ret === 0 ) {
6756              hasDuplicate = true;
6757          }
6758          return ret;
6759      };
6760  } else if ( document.createRange ) {
6761      sortOrder = function( a, b ) {
6762          if ( !a.ownerDocument || !b.ownerDocument ) {
6763              if ( a == b ) {
6764                  hasDuplicate = true;
6765              }
6766              return a.ownerDocument ? -1 : 1;
6767          }
6768  
6769          var aRange = a.ownerDocument.createRange(), bRange = b.ownerDocument.createRange();
6770          aRange.setStart(a, 0);
6771          aRange.setEnd(a, 0);
6772          bRange.setStart(b, 0);
6773          bRange.setEnd(b, 0);
6774          var ret = aRange.compareBoundaryPoints(Range.START_TO_END, bRange);
6775          if ( ret === 0 ) {
6776              hasDuplicate = true;
6777          }
6778          return ret;
6779      };
6780  }
6781  
6782  // Utility function for retreiving the text value of an array of DOM nodes
6783  Sizzle.getText = function( elems ) {
6784      var ret = "", elem;
6785  
6786      for ( var i = 0; elems[i]; i++ ) {
6787          elem = elems[i];
6788  
6789          // Get the text from text nodes and CDATA nodes
6790          if ( elem.nodeType === 3 || elem.nodeType === 4 ) {
6791              ret += elem.nodeValue;
6792  
6793          // Traverse everything else, except comment nodes
6794          } else if ( elem.nodeType !== 8 ) {
6795              ret += Sizzle.getText( elem.childNodes );
6796          }
6797      }
6798  
6799      return ret;
6800  };
6801  
6802  // Check to see if the browser returns elements by name when
6803  // querying by getElementById (and provide a workaround)
6804  (function(){
6805      // We're going to inject a fake input element with a specified name
6806      var form = document.createElement("div"),
6807          id = "script" + (new Date()).getTime();
6808      form.innerHTML = "<a name='" + id + "'/>";
6809  
6810      // Inject it into the root element, check its status, and remove it quickly
6811      var root = document.documentElement;
6812      root.insertBefore( form, root.firstChild );
6813  
6814      // The workaround has to do additional checks after a getElementById
6815      // Which slows things down for other browsers (hence the branching)
6816      if ( document.getElementById( id ) ) {
6817          Expr.find.ID = function(match, context, isXML){
6818              if ( typeof context.getElementById !== "undefined" && !isXML ) {
6819                  var m = context.getElementById(match[1]);
6820                  return m ? m.id === match[1] || typeof m.getAttributeNode !== "undefined" && m.getAttributeNode("id").nodeValue === match[1] ? [m] : undefined : [];
6821              }
6822          };
6823  
6824          Expr.filter.ID = function(elem, match){
6825              var node = typeof elem.getAttributeNode !== "undefined" && elem.getAttributeNode("id");
6826              return elem.nodeType === 1 && node && node.nodeValue === match;
6827          };
6828      }
6829  
6830      root.removeChild( form );
6831      root = form = null; // release memory in IE
6832  })();
6833  
6834  (function(){
6835      // Check to see if the browser returns only elements
6836      // when doing getElementsByTagName("*")
6837  
6838      // Create a fake element
6839      var div = document.createElement("div");
6840      div.appendChild( document.createComment("") );
6841  
6842      // Make sure no comments are found
6843      if ( div.getElementsByTagName("*").length > 0 ) {
6844          Expr.find.TAG = function(match, context){
6845              var results = context.getElementsByTagName(match[1]);
6846  
6847              // Filter out possible comments
6848              if ( match[1] === "*" ) {
6849                  var tmp = [];
6850  
6851                  for ( var i = 0; results[i]; i++ ) {
6852                      if ( results[i].nodeType === 1 ) {
6853                          tmp.push( results[i] );
6854                      }
6855                  }
6856  
6857                  results = tmp;
6858              }
6859  
6860              return results;
6861          };
6862      }
6863  
6864      // Check to see if an attribute returns normalized href attributes
6865      div.innerHTML = "<a href='#'></a>";
6866      if ( div.firstChild && typeof div.firstChild.getAttribute !== "undefined" &&
6867              div.firstChild.getAttribute("href") !== "#" ) {
6868          Expr.attrHandle.href = function(elem){
6869              return elem.getAttribute("href", 2);
6870          };
6871      }
6872  
6873      div = null; // release memory in IE
6874  })();
6875  
6876  if ( document.querySelectorAll ) {
6877      (function(){
6878          var oldSizzle = Sizzle, div = document.createElement("div");
6879          div.innerHTML = "<p class='TEST'></p>";
6880  
6881          // Safari can't handle uppercase or unicode characters when
6882          // in quirks mode.
6883          if ( div.querySelectorAll && div.querySelectorAll(".TEST").length === 0 ) {
6884              return;
6885          }
6886      
6887          Sizzle = function(query, context, extra, seed){
6888              context = context || document;
6889  
6890              // Only use querySelectorAll on non-XML documents
6891              // (ID selectors don't work in non-HTML documents)
6892              if ( !seed && context.nodeType === 9 && !Sizzle.isXML(context) ) {
6893                  try {
6894                      return makeArray( context.querySelectorAll(query), extra );
6895                  } catch(e){}
6896              }
6897          
6898              return oldSizzle(query, context, extra, seed);
6899          };
6900  
6901          for ( var prop in oldSizzle ) {
6902              Sizzle[ prop ] = oldSizzle[ prop ];
6903          }
6904  
6905          div = null; // release memory in IE
6906      })();
6907  }
6908  
6909  (function(){
6910      var div = document.createElement("div");
6911  
6912      div.innerHTML = "<div class='test e'></div><div class='test'></div>";
6913  
6914      // Opera can't find a second classname (in 9.6)
6915      // Also, make sure that getElementsByClassName actually exists
6916      if ( !div.getElementsByClassName || div.getElementsByClassName("e").length === 0 ) {
6917          return;
6918      }
6919  
6920      // Safari caches class attributes, doesn't catch changes (in 3.2)
6921      div.lastChild.className = "e";
6922  
6923      if ( div.getElementsByClassName("e").length === 1 ) {
6924          return;
6925      }
6926      
6927      Expr.order.splice(1, 0, "CLASS");
6928      Expr.find.CLASS = function(match, context, isXML) {
6929          if ( typeof context.getElementsByClassName !== "undefined" && !isXML ) {
6930              return context.getElementsByClassName(match[1]);
6931          }
6932      };
6933  
6934      div = null; // release memory in IE
6935  })();
6936  
6937  function dirNodeCheck( dir, cur, doneName, checkSet, nodeCheck, isXML ) {
6938      for ( var i = 0, l = checkSet.length; i < l; i++ ) {
6939          var elem = checkSet[i];
6940          if ( elem ) {
6941              elem = elem[dir];
6942              var match = false;
6943  
6944              while ( elem ) {
6945                  if ( elem.sizcache === doneName ) {
6946                      match = checkSet[elem.sizset];
6947                      break;
6948                  }
6949  
6950                  if ( elem.nodeType === 1 && !isXML ){
6951                      elem.sizcache = doneName;
6952                      elem.sizset = i;
6953                  }
6954  
6955                  if ( elem.nodeName.toLowerCase() === cur ) {
6956                      match = elem;
6957                      break;
6958                  }
6959  
6960                  elem = elem[dir];
6961              }
6962  
6963              checkSet[i] = match;
6964          }
6965      }
6966  }
6967  
6968  function dirCheck( dir, cur, doneName, checkSet, nodeCheck, isXML ) {
6969      for ( var i = 0, l = checkSet.length; i < l; i++ ) {
6970          var elem = checkSet[i];
6971          if ( elem ) {
6972              elem = elem[dir];
6973              var match = false;
6974  
6975              while ( elem ) {
6976                  if ( elem.sizcache === doneName ) {
6977                      match = checkSet[elem.sizset];
6978                      break;
6979                  }
6980  
6981                  if ( elem.nodeType === 1 ) {
6982                      if ( !isXML ) {
6983                          elem.sizcache = doneName;
6984                          elem.sizset = i;
6985                      }
6986                      if ( typeof cur !== "string" ) {
6987                          if ( elem === cur ) {
6988                              match = true;
6989                              break;
6990                          }
6991  
6992                      } else if ( Sizzle.filter( cur, [elem] ).length > 0 ) {
6993                          match = elem;
6994                          break;
6995                      }
6996                  }
6997  
6998                  elem = elem[dir];
6999              }
7000  
7001              checkSet[i] = match;
7002          }
7003      }
7004  }
7005  
7006  Sizzle.contains = document.compareDocumentPosition ? function(a, b){
7007      return !!(a.compareDocumentPosition(b) & 16);
7008  } : function(a, b){
7009      return a !== b && (a.contains ? a.contains(b) : true);
7010  };
7011  
7012  Sizzle.isXML = function(elem){
7013      // documentElement is verified for cases where it doesn't yet exist
7014      // (such as loading iframes in IE - #4833) 
7015      var documentElement = (elem ? elem.ownerDocument || elem : 0).documentElement;
7016      return documentElement ? documentElement.nodeName !== "HTML" : false;
7017  };
7018  
7019  var posProcess = function(selector, context){
7020      var tmpSet = [], later = "", match,
7021          root = context.nodeType ? [context] : context;
7022  
7023      // Position selectors must be done after the filter
7024      // And so must :not(positional) so we move all PSEUDOs to the end
7025      while ( (match = Expr.match.PSEUDO.exec( selector )) ) {
7026          later += match[0];
7027          selector = selector.replace( Expr.match.PSEUDO, "" );
7028      }
7029  
7030      selector = Expr.relative[selector] ? selector + "*" : selector;
7031  
7032      for ( var i = 0, l = root.length; i < l; i++ ) {
7033          Sizzle( selector, root[i], tmpSet );
7034      }
7035  
7036      return Sizzle.filter( later, tmpSet );
7037  };
7038  
7039  // EXPOSE
7040  
7041  window.tinymce.dom.Sizzle = Sizzle;
7042  
7043  })();
7044  
7045  
7046  (function(tinymce) {
7047      // Shorten names
7048      var each = tinymce.each, DOM = tinymce.DOM, isIE = tinymce.isIE, isWebKit = tinymce.isWebKit, Event;
7049  
7050      tinymce.create('tinymce.dom.EventUtils', {
7051          EventUtils : function() {
7052              this.inits = [];
7053              this.events = [];
7054          },
7055  
7056          add : function(o, n, f, s) {
7057              var cb, t = this, el = t.events, r;
7058  
7059              if (n instanceof Array) {
7060                  r = [];
7061  
7062                  each(n, function(n) {
7063                      r.push(t.add(o, n, f, s));
7064                  });
7065  
7066                  return r;
7067              }
7068  
7069              // Handle array
7070              if (o && o.hasOwnProperty && o instanceof Array) {
7071                  r = [];
7072  
7073                  each(o, function(o) {
7074                      o = DOM.get(o);
7075                      r.push(t.add(o, n, f, s));
7076                  });
7077  
7078                  return r;
7079              }
7080  
7081              o = DOM.get(o);
7082  
7083              if (!o)
7084                  return;
7085  
7086              // Setup event callback
7087              cb = function(e) {
7088                  // Is all events disabled
7089                  if (t.disabled)
7090                      return;
7091  
7092                  e = e || window.event;
7093  
7094                  // Patch in target, preventDefault and stopPropagation in IE it's W3C valid
7095                  if (e && isIE) {
7096                      if (!e.target)
7097                          e.target = e.srcElement;
7098  
7099                      // Patch in preventDefault, stopPropagation methods for W3C compatibility
7100                      tinymce.extend(e, t._stoppers);
7101                  }
7102  
7103                  if (!s)
7104                      return f(e);
7105  
7106                  return f.call(s, e);
7107              };
7108  
7109              if (n == 'unload') {
7110                  tinymce.unloads.unshift({func : cb});
7111                  return cb;
7112              }
7113  
7114              if (n == 'init') {
7115                  if (t.domLoaded)
7116                      cb();
7117                  else
7118                      t.inits.push(cb);
7119  
7120                  return cb;
7121              }
7122  
7123              // Store away listener reference
7124              el.push({
7125                  obj : o,
7126                  name : n,
7127                  func : f,
7128                  cfunc : cb,
7129                  scope : s
7130              });
7131  
7132              t._add(o, n, cb);
7133  
7134              return f;
7135          },
7136  
7137          remove : function(o, n, f) {
7138              var t = this, a = t.events, s = false, r;
7139  
7140              // Handle array
7141              if (o && o.hasOwnProperty && o instanceof Array) {
7142                  r = [];
7143  
7144                  each(o, function(o) {
7145                      o = DOM.get(o);
7146                      r.push(t.remove(o, n, f));
7147                  });
7148  
7149                  return r;
7150              }
7151  
7152              o = DOM.get(o);
7153  
7154              each(a, function(e, i) {
7155                  if (e.obj == o && e.name == n && (!f || (e.func == f || e.cfunc == f))) {
7156                      a.splice(i, 1);
7157                      t._remove(o, n, e.cfunc);
7158                      s = true;
7159                      return false;
7160                  }
7161              });
7162  
7163              return s;
7164          },
7165  
7166          clear : function(o) {
7167              var t = this, a = t.events, i, e;
7168  
7169              if (o) {
7170                  o = DOM.get(o);
7171  
7172                  for (i = a.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
7173                      e = a[i];
7174  
7175                      if (e.obj === o) {
7176                          t._remove(e.obj, e.name, e.cfunc);
7177                          e.obj = e.cfunc = null;
7178                          a.splice(i, 1);
7179                      }
7180                  }
7181              }
7182          },
7183  
7184          cancel : function(e) {
7185              if (!e)
7186                  return false;
7187  
7188              this.stop(e);
7189  
7190              return this.prevent(e);
7191          },
7192  
7193          stop : function(e) {
7194              if (e.stopPropagation)
7195                  e.stopPropagation();
7196              else
7197                  e.cancelBubble = true;
7198  
7199              return false;
7200          },
7201  
7202          prevent : function(e) {
7203              if (e.preventDefault)
7204                  e.preventDefault();
7205              else
7206                  e.returnValue = false;
7207  
7208              return false;
7209          },
7210  
7211          destroy : function() {
7212              var t = this;
7213  
7214              each(t.events, function(e, i) {
7215                  t._remove(e.obj, e.name, e.cfunc);
7216                  e.obj = e.cfunc = null;
7217              });
7218  
7219              t.events = [];
7220              t = null;
7221          },
7222  
7223          _add : function(o, n, f) {
7224              if (o.attachEvent)
7225                  o.attachEvent('on' + n, f);
7226              else if (o.addEventListener)
7227                  o.addEventListener(n, f, false);
7228              else
7229                  o['on' + n] = f;
7230          },
7231  
7232          _remove : function(o, n, f) {
7233              if (o) {
7234                  try {
7235                      if (o.detachEvent)
7236                          o.detachEvent('on' + n, f);
7237                      else if (o.removeEventListener)
7238                          o.removeEventListener(n, f, false);
7239                      else
7240                          o['on' + n] = null;
7241                  } catch (ex) {
7242                      // Might fail with permission denined on IE so we just ignore that
7243                  }
7244              }
7245          },
7246  
7247          _pageInit : function(win) {
7248              var t = this;
7249  
7250              // Keep it from running more than once
7251              if (t.domLoaded)
7252                  return;
7253  
7254              t.domLoaded = true;
7255  
7256              each(t.inits, function(c) {
7257                  c();
7258              });
7259  
7260              t.inits = [];
7261          },
7262  
7263          _wait : function(win) {
7264              var t = this, doc = win.document;
7265  
7266              // No need since the document is already loaded
7267              if (win.tinyMCE_GZ && tinyMCE_GZ.loaded) {
7268                  t.domLoaded = 1;
7269                  return;
7270              }
7271  
7272              // Use IE method
7273              if (doc.attachEvent) {
7274                  doc.attachEvent("onreadystatechange", function() {
7275                      if (doc.readyState === "complete") {
7276                          doc.detachEvent("onreadystatechange", arguments.callee);
7277                          t._pageInit(win);
7278                      }
7279                  });
7280  
7281                  if (doc.documentElement.doScroll && win == win.top) {
7282                      (function() {
7283                          if (t.domLoaded)
7284                              return;
7285  
7286                          try {
7287                              // If IE is used, use the trick by Diego Perini licensed under MIT by request to the author.
7288                              // http://javascript.nwbox.com/IEContentLoaded/
7289                              doc.documentElement.doScroll("left");
7290                          } catch (ex) {
7291                              setTimeout(arguments.callee, 0);
7292                              return;
7293                          }
7294  
7295                          t._pageInit(win);
7296                      })();
7297                  }
7298              } else if (doc.addEventListener) {
7299                  t._add(win, 'DOMContentLoaded', function() {
7300                      t._pageInit(win);
7301                  });
7302              }
7303  
7304              t._add(win, 'load', function() {
7305                  t._pageInit(win);
7306              });
7307          },
7308  
7309          _stoppers : {
7310              preventDefault : function() {
7311                  this.returnValue = false;
7312              },
7313  
7314              stopPropagation : function() {
7315                  this.cancelBubble = true;
7316              }
7317          }
7318      });
7319  
7320      Event = tinymce.dom.Event = new tinymce.dom.EventUtils();
7321  
7322      // Dispatch DOM content loaded event for IE and Safari
7323      Event._wait(window);
7324  
7325      tinymce.addUnload(function() {
7326          Event.destroy();
7327      });
7328  })(tinymce);
7329  
7330  (function(tinymce) {
7331      tinymce.dom.Element = function(id, settings) {
7332          var t = this, dom, el;
7333  
7334          t.settings = settings = settings || {};
7335          t.id = id;
7336          t.dom = dom = settings.dom || tinymce.DOM;
7337  
7338          // Only IE leaks DOM references, this is a lot faster
7339          if (!tinymce.isIE)
7340              el = dom.get(t.id);
7341  
7342          tinymce.each(
7343                  ('getPos,getRect,getParent,add,setStyle,getStyle,setStyles,' + 
7344                  'setAttrib,setAttribs,getAttrib,addClass,removeClass,' + 
7345                  'hasClass,getOuterHTML,setOuterHTML,remove,show,hide,' + 
7346                  'isHidden,setHTML,get').split(/,/)
7347              , function(k) {
7348                  t[k] = function() {
7349                      var a = [id], i;
7350  
7351                      for (i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++)
7352                          a.push(arguments[i]);
7353  
7354                      a = dom[k].apply(dom, a);
7355                      t.update(k);
7356  
7357                      return a;
7358                  };
7359          });
7360  
7361          tinymce.extend(t, {
7362              on : function(n, f, s) {
7363                  return tinymce.dom.Event.add(t.id, n, f, s);
7364              },
7365  
7366              getXY : function() {
7367                  return {
7368                      x : parseInt(t.getStyle('left')),
7369                      y : parseInt(t.getStyle('top'))
7370                  };
7371              },
7372  
7373              getSize : function() {
7374                  var n = dom.get(t.id);
7375  
7376                  return {
7377                      w : parseInt(t.getStyle('width') || n.clientWidth),
7378                      h : parseInt(t.getStyle('height') || n.clientHeight)
7379                  };
7380              },
7381  
7382              moveTo : function(x, y) {
7383                  t.setStyles({left : x, top : y});
7384              },
7385  
7386              moveBy : function(x, y) {
7387                  var p = t.getXY();
7388  
7389                  t.moveTo(p.x + x, p.y + y);
7390              },
7391  
7392              resizeTo : function(w, h) {
7393                  t.setStyles({width : w, height : h});
7394              },
7395  
7396              resizeBy : function(w, h) {
7397                  var s = t.getSize();
7398  
7399                  t.resizeTo(s.w + w, s.h + h);
7400              },
7401  
7402              update : function(k) {
7403                  var b;
7404  
7405                  if (tinymce.isIE6 && settings.blocker) {
7406                      k = k || '';
7407  
7408                      // Ignore getters
7409                      if (k.indexOf('get') === 0 || k.indexOf('has') === 0 || k.indexOf('is') === 0)
7410                          return;
7411  
7412                      // Remove blocker on remove
7413                      if (k == 'remove') {
7414                          dom.remove(t.blocker);
7415                          return;
7416                      }
7417  
7418                      if (!t.blocker) {
7419                          t.blocker = dom.uniqueId();
7420                          b = dom.add(settings.container || dom.getRoot(), 'iframe', {id : t.blocker, style : 'position:absolute;', frameBorder : 0, src : 'javascript:""'});
7421                          dom.setStyle(b, 'opacity', 0);
7422                      } else
7423                          b = dom.get(t.blocker);
7424  
7425                      dom.setStyles(b, {
7426                          left : t.getStyle('left', 1),
7427                          top : t.getStyle('top', 1),
7428                          width : t.getStyle('width', 1),
7429                          height : t.getStyle('height', 1),
7430                          display : t.getStyle('display', 1),
7431                          zIndex : parseInt(t.getStyle('zIndex', 1) || 0) - 1
7432                      });
7433                  }
7434              }
7435          });
7436      };
7437  })(tinymce);
7438  
7439  (function(tinymce) {
7440  	function trimNl(s) {
7441          return s.replace(/[\n\r]+/g, '');
7442      };
7443  
7444      // Shorten names
7445      var is = tinymce.is, isIE = tinymce.isIE, each = tinymce.each;
7446  
7447      tinymce.create('tinymce.dom.Selection', {
7448          Selection : function(dom, win, serializer) {
7449              var t = this;
7450  
7451              t.dom = dom;
7452              t.win = win;
7453              t.serializer = serializer;
7454  
7455              // Add events
7456              each([
7457                  'onBeforeSetContent',
7458  
7459                  'onBeforeGetContent',
7460  
7461                  'onSetContent',
7462  
7463                  'onGetContent'
7464              ], function(e) {
7465                  t[e] = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(t);
7466              });
7467  
7468              // No W3C Range support
7469              if (!t.win.getSelection)
7470                  t.tridentSel = new tinymce.dom.TridentSelection(t);
7471  
7472              if (tinymce.isIE && dom.boxModel)
7473                  this._fixIESelection();
7474  
7475              // Prevent leaks
7476              tinymce.addUnload(t.destroy, t);
7477          },
7478  
7479          setCursorLocation: function(node, offset) {
7480              var t = this; var r = t.dom.createRng();
7481              r.setStart(node, offset);
7482              r.setEnd(node, offset);
7483              t.setRng(r);
7484              t.collapse(false);
7485          },
7486          getContent : function(s) {
7487              var t = this, r = t.getRng(), e = t.dom.create("body"), se = t.getSel(), wb, wa, n;
7488  
7489              s = s || {};
7490              wb = wa = '';
7491              s.get = true;
7492              s.format = s.format || 'html';
7493              s.forced_root_block = '';
7494              t.onBeforeGetContent.dispatch(t, s);
7495  
7496              if (s.format == 'text')
7497                  return t.isCollapsed() ? '' : (r.text || (se.toString ? se.toString() : ''));
7498  
7499              if (r.cloneContents) {
7500                  n = r.cloneContents();
7501  
7502                  if (n)
7503                      e.appendChild(n);
7504              } else if (is(r.item) || is(r.htmlText)) {
7505                  // IE will produce invalid markup if elements are present that
7506                  // it doesn't understand like custom elements or HTML5 elements.
7507                  // Adding a BR in front of the contents and then remoiving it seems to fix it though.
7508                  e.innerHTML = '<br>' + (r.item ? r.item(0).outerHTML : r.htmlText);
7509                  e.removeChild(e.firstChild);
7510              } else
7511                  e.innerHTML = r.toString();
7512  
7513              // Keep whitespace before and after
7514              if (/^\s/.test(e.innerHTML))
7515                  wb = ' ';
7516  
7517              if (/\s+$/.test(e.innerHTML))
7518                  wa = ' ';
7519  
7520              s.getInner = true;
7521  
7522              s.content = t.isCollapsed() ? '' : wb + t.serializer.serialize(e, s) + wa;
7523              t.onGetContent.dispatch(t, s);
7524  
7525              return s.content;
7526          },
7527  
7528          setContent : function(content, args) {
7529              var self = this, rng = self.getRng(), caretNode, doc = self.win.document, frag, temp;
7530  
7531              args = args || {format : 'html'};
7532              args.set = true;
7533              content = args.content = content;
7534  
7535              // Dispatch before set content event
7536              if (!args.no_events)
7537                  self.onBeforeSetContent.dispatch(self, args);
7538  
7539              content = args.content;
7540  
7541              if (rng.insertNode) {
7542                  // Make caret marker since insertNode places the caret in the beginning of text after insert
7543                  content += '<span id="__caret">_</span>';
7544  
7545                  // Delete and insert new node
7546                  if (rng.startContainer == doc && rng.endContainer == doc) {
7547                      // WebKit will fail if the body is empty since the range is then invalid and it can't insert contents
7548                      doc.body.innerHTML = content;
7549                  } else {
7550                      rng.deleteContents();
7551  
7552                      if (doc.body.childNodes.length == 0) {
7553                          doc.body.innerHTML = content;
7554                      } else {
7555                          // createContextualFragment doesn't exists in IE 9 DOMRanges
7556                          if (rng.createContextualFragment) {
7557                              rng.insertNode(rng.createContextualFragment(content));
7558                          } else {
7559                              // Fake createContextualFragment call in IE 9
7560                              frag = doc.createDocumentFragment();
7561                              temp = doc.createElement('div');
7562  
7563                              frag.appendChild(temp);
7564                              temp.outerHTML = content;
7565  
7566                              rng.insertNode(frag);
7567                          }
7568                      }
7569                  }
7570  
7571                  // Move to caret marker
7572                  caretNode = self.dom.get('__caret');
7573  
7574                  // Make sure we wrap it compleatly, Opera fails with a simple select call
7575                  rng = doc.createRange();
7576                  rng.setStartBefore(caretNode);
7577                  rng.setEndBefore(caretNode);
7578                  self.setRng(rng);
7579  
7580                  // Remove the caret position
7581                  self.dom.remove('__caret');
7582  
7583                  try {
7584                      self.setRng(rng);
7585                  } catch (ex) {
7586                      // Might fail on Opera for some odd reason
7587                  }
7588              } else {
7589                  if (rng.item) {
7590                      // Delete content and get caret text selection
7591                      doc.execCommand('Delete', false, null);
7592                      rng = self.getRng();
7593                  }
7594  
7595                  // Explorer removes spaces from the beginning of pasted contents
7596                  if (/^\s+/.test(content)) {
7597                      rng.pasteHTML('<span id="__mce_tmp">_</span>' + content);
7598                      self.dom.remove('__mce_tmp');
7599                  } else
7600                      rng.pasteHTML(content);
7601              }
7602  
7603              // Dispatch set content event
7604              if (!args.no_events)
7605                  self.onSetContent.dispatch(self, args);
7606          },
7607  
7608          getStart : function() {
7609              var rng = this.getRng(), startElement, parentElement, checkRng, node;
7610  
7611              if (rng.duplicate || rng.item) {
7612                  // Control selection, return first item
7613                  if (rng.item)
7614                      return rng.item(0);
7615  
7616                  // Get start element
7617                  checkRng = rng.duplicate();
7618                  checkRng.collapse(1);
7619                  startElement = checkRng.parentElement();
7620  
7621                  // Check if range parent is inside the start element, then return the inner parent element
7622                  // This will fix issues when a single element is selected, IE would otherwise return the wrong start element
7623                  parentElement = node = rng.parentElement();
7624                  while (node = node.parentNode) {
7625                      if (node == startElement) {
7626                          startElement = parentElement;
7627                          break;
7628                      }
7629                  }
7630  
7631                  return startElement;
7632              } else {
7633                  startElement = rng.startContainer;
7634  
7635                  if (startElement.nodeType == 1 && startElement.hasChildNodes())
7636                      startElement = startElement.childNodes[Math.min(startElement.childNodes.length - 1, rng.startOffset)];
7637  
7638                  if (startElement && startElement.nodeType == 3)
7639                      return startElement.parentNode;
7640  
7641                  return startElement;
7642              }
7643          },
7644  
7645          getEnd : function() {
7646              var t = this, r = t.getRng(), e, eo;
7647  
7648              if (r.duplicate || r.item) {
7649                  if (r.item)
7650                      return r.item(0);
7651  
7652                  r = r.duplicate();
7653                  r.collapse(0);
7654                  e = r.parentElement();
7655  
7656                  if (e && e.nodeName == 'BODY')
7657                      return e.lastChild || e;
7658  
7659                  return e;
7660              } else {
7661                  e = r.endContainer;
7662                  eo = r.endOffset;
7663  
7664                  if (e.nodeType == 1 && e.hasChildNodes())
7665                      e = e.childNodes[eo > 0 ? eo - 1 : eo];
7666  
7667                  if (e && e.nodeType == 3)
7668                      return e.parentNode;
7669  
7670                  return e;
7671              }
7672          },
7673  
7674          getBookmark : function(type, normalized) {
7675              var t = this, dom = t.dom, rng, rng2, id, collapsed, name, element, index, chr = '\uFEFF', styles;
7676  
7677  			function findIndex(name, element) {
7678                  var index = 0;
7679  
7680                  each(dom.select(name), function(node, i) {
7681                      if (node == element)
7682                          index = i;
7683                  });
7684  
7685                  return index;
7686              };
7687  
7688              if (type == 2) {
7689  				function getLocation() {
7690                      var rng = t.getRng(true), root = dom.getRoot(), bookmark = {};
7691  
7692  					function getPoint(rng, start) {
7693                          var container = rng[start ? 'startContainer' : 'endContainer'],
7694                              offset = rng[start ? 'startOffset' : 'endOffset'], point = [], node, childNodes, after = 0;
7695  
7696                          if (container.nodeType == 3) {
7697                              if (normalized) {
7698                                  for (node = container.previousSibling; node && node.nodeType == 3; node = node.previousSibling)
7699                                      offset += node.nodeValue.length;
7700                              }
7701  
7702                              point.push(offset);
7703                          } else {
7704                              childNodes = container.childNodes;
7705  
7706                              if (offset >= childNodes.length && childNodes.length) {
7707                                  after = 1;
7708                                  offset = Math.max(0, childNodes.length - 1);
7709                              }
7710  
7711                              point.push(t.dom.nodeIndex(childNodes[offset], normalized) + after);
7712                          }
7713  
7714                          for (; container && container != root; container = container.parentNode)
7715                              point.push(t.dom.nodeIndex(container, normalized));
7716  
7717                          return point;
7718                      };
7719  
7720                      bookmark.start = getPoint(rng, true);
7721  
7722                      if (!t.isCollapsed())
7723                          bookmark.end = getPoint(rng);
7724  
7725                      return bookmark;
7726                  };
7727  
7728                  if (t.tridentSel)
7729                      return t.tridentSel.getBookmark(type);
7730  
7731                  return getLocation();
7732              }
7733  
7734              // Handle simple range
7735              if (type)
7736                  return {rng : t.getRng()};
7737  
7738              rng = t.getRng();
7739              id = dom.uniqueId();
7740              collapsed = tinyMCE.activeEditor.selection.isCollapsed();
7741              styles = 'overflow:hidden;line-height:0px';
7742  
7743              // Explorer method
7744              if (rng.duplicate || rng.item) {
7745                  // Text selection
7746                  if (!rng.item) {
7747                      rng2 = rng.duplicate();
7748  
7749                      try {
7750                          // Insert start marker
7751                          rng.collapse();
7752                          rng.pasteHTML('<span data-mce-type="bookmark" id="' + id + '_start" style="' + styles + '">' + chr + '</span>');
7753  
7754                          // Insert end marker
7755                          if (!collapsed) {
7756                              rng2.collapse(false);
7757  
7758                              // Detect the empty space after block elements in IE and move the end back one character <p></p>] becomes <p>]</p>
7759                              rng.moveToElementText(rng2.parentElement());
7760                              if (rng.compareEndPoints('StartToEnd', rng2) == 0)
7761                                  rng2.move('character', -1);
7762  
7763                              rng2.pasteHTML('<span data-mce-type="bookmark" id="' + id + '_end" style="' + styles + '">' + chr + '</span>');
7764                          }
7765                      } catch (ex) {
7766                          // IE might throw unspecified error so lets ignore it
7767                          return null;
7768                      }
7769                  } else {
7770                      // Control selection
7771                      element = rng.item(0);
7772                      name = element.nodeName;
7773  
7774                      return {name : name, index : findIndex(name, element)};
7775                  }
7776              } else {
7777                  element = t.getNode();
7778                  name = element.nodeName;
7779                  if (name == 'IMG')
7780                      return {name : name, index : findIndex(name, element)};
7781  
7782                  // W3C method
7783                  rng2 = rng.cloneRange();
7784  
7785                  // Insert end marker
7786                  if (!collapsed) {
7787                      rng2.collapse(false);
7788                      rng2.insertNode(dom.create('span', {'data-mce-type' : "bookmark", id : id + '_end', style : styles}, chr));
7789                  }
7790  
7791                  rng.collapse(true);
7792                  rng.insertNode(dom.create('span', {'data-mce-type' : "bookmark", id : id + '_start', style : styles}, chr));
7793              }
7794  
7795              t.moveToBookmark({id : id, keep : 1});
7796  
7797              return {id : id};
7798          },
7799  
7800          moveToBookmark : function(bookmark) {
7801              var t = this, dom = t.dom, marker1, marker2, rng, root, startContainer, endContainer, startOffset, endOffset;
7802  
7803              if (bookmark) {
7804                  if (bookmark.start) {
7805                      rng = dom.createRng();
7806                      root = dom.getRoot();
7807  
7808  					function setEndPoint(start) {
7809                          var point = bookmark[start ? 'start' : 'end'], i, node, offset, children;
7810  
7811                          if (point) {
7812                              offset = point[0];
7813  
7814                              // Find container node
7815                              for (node = root, i = point.length - 1; i >= 1; i--) {
7816                                  children = node.childNodes;
7817  
7818                                  if (point[i] > children.length - 1)
7819                                      return;
7820  
7821                                  node = children[point[i]];
7822                              }
7823  
7824                              // Move text offset to best suitable location
7825                              if (node.nodeType === 3)
7826                                  offset = Math.min(point[0], node.nodeValue.length);
7827  
7828                              // Move element offset to best suitable location
7829                              if (node.nodeType === 1)
7830                                  offset = Math.min(point[0], node.childNodes.length);
7831  
7832                              // Set offset within container node
7833                              if (start)
7834                                  rng.setStart(node, offset);
7835                              else
7836                                  rng.setEnd(node, offset);
7837                          }
7838  
7839                          return true;
7840                      };
7841  
7842                      if (t.tridentSel)
7843                          return t.tridentSel.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
7844  
7845                      if (setEndPoint(true) && setEndPoint()) {
7846                          t.setRng(rng);
7847                      }
7848                  } else if (bookmark.id) {
7849  					function restoreEndPoint(suffix) {
7850                          var marker = dom.get(bookmark.id + '_' + suffix), node, idx, next, prev, keep = bookmark.keep;
7851  
7852                          if (marker) {
7853                              node = marker.parentNode;
7854  
7855                              if (suffix == 'start') {
7856                                  if (!keep) {
7857                                      idx = dom.nodeIndex(marker);
7858                                  } else {
7859                                      node = marker.firstChild;
7860                                      idx = 1;
7861                                  }
7862  
7863                                  startContainer = endContainer = node;
7864                                  startOffset = endOffset = idx;
7865                              } else {
7866                                  if (!keep) {
7867                                      idx = dom.nodeIndex(marker);
7868                                  } else {
7869                                      node = marker.firstChild;
7870                                      idx = 1;
7871                                  }
7872  
7873                                  endContainer = node;
7874                                  endOffset = idx;
7875                              }
7876  
7877                              if (!keep) {
7878                                  prev = marker.previousSibling;
7879                                  next = marker.nextSibling;
7880  
7881                                  // Remove all marker text nodes
7882                                  each(tinymce.grep(marker.childNodes), function(node) {
7883                                      if (node.nodeType == 3)
7884                                          node.nodeValue = node.nodeValue.replace(/\uFEFF/g, '');
7885                                  });
7886  
7887                                  // Remove marker but keep children if for example contents where inserted into the marker
7888                                  // Also remove duplicated instances of the marker for example by a split operation or by WebKit auto split on paste feature
7889                                  while (marker = dom.get(bookmark.id + '_' + suffix))
7890                                      dom.remove(marker, 1);
7891  
7892                                  // If siblings are text nodes then merge them unless it's Opera since it some how removes the node
7893                                  // and we are sniffing since adding a lot of detection code for a browser with 3% of the market isn't worth the effort. Sorry, Opera but it's just a fact
7894                                  if (prev && next && prev.nodeType == next.nodeType && prev.nodeType == 3 && !tinymce.isOpera) {
7895                                      idx = prev.nodeValue.length;
7896                                      prev.appendData(next.nodeValue);
7897                                      dom.remove(next);
7898  
7899                                      if (suffix == 'start') {
7900                                          startContainer = endContainer = prev;
7901                                          startOffset = endOffset = idx;
7902                                      } else {
7903                                          endContainer = prev;
7904                                          endOffset = idx;
7905                                      }
7906                                  }
7907                              }
7908                          }
7909                      };
7910  
7911  					function addBogus(node) {
7912                          // Adds a bogus BR element for empty block elements or just a space on IE since it renders BR elements incorrectly
7913                          if (dom.isBlock(node) && !node.innerHTML)
7914                              node.innerHTML = !isIE ? '<br data-mce-bogus="1" />' : ' ';
7915  
7916                          return node;
7917                      };
7918  
7919                      // Restore start/end points
7920                      restoreEndPoint('start');
7921                      restoreEndPoint('end');
7922  
7923                      if (startContainer) {
7924                          rng = dom.createRng();
7925                          rng.setStart(addBogus(startContainer), startOffset);
7926                          rng.setEnd(addBogus(endContainer), endOffset);
7927                          t.setRng(rng);
7928                      }
7929                  } else if (bookmark.name) {
7930                      t.select(dom.select(bookmark.name)[bookmark.index]);
7931                  } else if (bookmark.rng)
7932                      t.setRng(bookmark.rng);
7933              }
7934          },
7935  
7936          select : function(node, content) {
7937              var t = this, dom = t.dom, rng = dom.createRng(), idx;
7938  
7939              if (node) {
7940                  idx = dom.nodeIndex(node);
7941                  rng.setStart(node.parentNode, idx);
7942                  rng.setEnd(node.parentNode, idx + 1);
7943  
7944                  // Find first/last text node or BR element
7945                  if (content) {
7946  					function setPoint(node, start) {
7947                          var walker = new tinymce.dom.TreeWalker(node, node);
7948  
7949                          do {
7950                              // Text node
7951                              if (node.nodeType == 3 && tinymce.trim(node.nodeValue).length != 0) {
7952                                  if (start)
7953                                      rng.setStart(node, 0);
7954                                  else
7955                                      rng.setEnd(node, node.nodeValue.length);
7956  
7957                                  return;
7958                              }
7959  
7960                              // BR element
7961                              if (node.nodeName == 'BR') {
7962                                  if (start)
7963                                      rng.setStartBefore(node);
7964                                  else
7965                                      rng.setEndBefore(node);
7966  
7967                                  return;
7968                              }
7969                          } while (node = (start ? walker.next() : walker.prev()));
7970                      };
7971  
7972                      setPoint(node, 1);
7973                      setPoint(node);
7974                  }
7975  
7976                  t.setRng(rng);
7977              }
7978  
7979              return node;
7980          },
7981  
7982          isCollapsed : function() {
7983              var t = this, r = t.getRng(), s = t.getSel();
7984  
7985              if (!r || r.item)
