7986                  return false;
7987  
7988              if (r.compareEndPoints)
7989                  return r.compareEndPoints('StartToEnd', r) === 0;
7990  
7991              return !s || r.collapsed;
7992          },
7993  
7994          collapse : function(to_start) {
7995              var self = this, rng = self.getRng(), node;
7996  
7997              // Control range on IE
7998              if (rng.item) {
7999                  node = rng.item(0);
8000                  rng = self.win.document.body.createTextRange();
8001                  rng.moveToElementText(node);
8002              }
8003  
8004              rng.collapse(!!to_start);
8005              self.setRng(rng);
8006          },
8007  
8008          getSel : function() {
8009              var t = this, w = this.win;
8010  
8011              return w.getSelection ? w.getSelection() : w.document.selection;
8012          },
8013  
8014          getRng : function(w3c) {
8015              var t = this, s, r, elm, doc = t.win.document;
8016  
8017              // Found tridentSel object then we need to use that one
8018              if (w3c && t.tridentSel)
8019                  return t.tridentSel.getRangeAt(0);
8020  
8021              try {
8022                  if (s = t.getSel())
8023                      r = s.rangeCount > 0 ? s.getRangeAt(0) : (s.createRange ? s.createRange() : doc.createRange());
8024              } catch (ex) {
8025                  // IE throws unspecified error here if TinyMCE is placed in a frame/iframe
8026              }
8027  
8028              // We have W3C ranges and it's IE then fake control selection since IE9 doesn't handle that correctly yet
8029              if (tinymce.isIE && r && r.setStart && doc.selection.createRange().item) {
8030                  elm = doc.selection.createRange().item(0);
8031                  r = doc.createRange();
8032                  r.setStartBefore(elm);
8033                  r.setEndAfter(elm);
8034              }
8035  
8036              // No range found then create an empty one
8037              // This can occur when the editor is placed in a hidden container element on Gecko
8038              // Or on IE when there was an exception
8039              if (!r)
8040                  r = doc.createRange ? doc.createRange() : doc.body.createTextRange();
8041  
8042              if (t.selectedRange && t.explicitRange) {
8043                  if (r.compareBoundaryPoints(r.START_TO_START, t.selectedRange) === 0 && r.compareBoundaryPoints(r.END_TO_END, t.selectedRange) === 0) {
8044                      // Safari, Opera and Chrome only ever select text which causes the range to change.
8045                      // This lets us use the originally set range if the selection hasn't been changed by the user.
8046                      r = t.explicitRange;
8047                  } else {
8048                      t.selectedRange = null;
8049                      t.explicitRange = null;
8050                  }
8051              }
8052  
8053              return r;
8054          },
8055  
8056          setRng : function(r) {
8057              var s, t = this;
8058              
8059              if (!t.tridentSel) {
8060                  s = t.getSel();
8061  
8062                  if (s) {
8063                      t.explicitRange = r;
8064  
8065                      try {
8066                          s.removeAllRanges();
8067                      } catch (ex) {
8068                          // IE9 might throw errors here don't know why
8069                      }
8070  
8071                      s.addRange(r);
8072                      // adding range isn't always successful so we need to check range count otherwise an exception can occur
8073                      t.selectedRange = s.rangeCount > 0 ? s.getRangeAt(0) : null;
8074                  }
8075              } else {
8076                  // Is W3C Range
8077                  if (r.cloneRange) {
8078                      t.tridentSel.addRange(r);
8079                      return;
8080                  }
8081  
8082                  // Is IE specific range
8083                  try {
8084                      r.select();
8085                  } catch (ex) {
8086                      // Needed for some odd IE bug #1843306
8087                  }
8088              }
8089          },
8090  
8091          setNode : function(n) {
8092              var t = this;
8093  
8094              t.setContent(t.dom.getOuterHTML(n));
8095  
8096              return n;
8097          },
8098  
8099          getNode : function() {
8100              var t = this, rng = t.getRng(), sel = t.getSel(), elm, start = rng.startContainer, end = rng.endContainer;
8101  
8102              // Range maybe lost after the editor is made visible again
8103              if (!rng)
8104                  return t.dom.getRoot();
8105  
8106              if (rng.setStart) {
8107                  elm = rng.commonAncestorContainer;
8108  
8109                  // Handle selection a image or other control like element such as anchors
8110                  if (!rng.collapsed) {
8111                      if (rng.startContainer == rng.endContainer) {
8112                          if (rng.endOffset - rng.startOffset < 2) {
8113                              if (rng.startContainer.hasChildNodes())
8114                                  elm = rng.startContainer.childNodes[rng.startOffset];
8115                          }
8116                      }
8117  
8118                      // If the anchor node is a element instead of a text node then return this element
8119                      //if (tinymce.isWebKit && sel.anchorNode && sel.anchorNode.nodeType == 1) 
8120                      //    return sel.anchorNode.childNodes[sel.anchorOffset];
8121  
8122                      // Handle cases where the selection is immediately wrapped around a node and return that node instead of it's parent.
8123                      // This happens when you double click an underlined word in FireFox.
8124                      if (start.nodeType === 3 && end.nodeType === 3) {
8125  						function skipEmptyTextNodes(n, forwards) {
8126                              var orig = n;
8127                              while (n && n.nodeType === 3 && n.length === 0) {
8128                                  n = forwards ? n.nextSibling : n.previousSibling;
8129                              }
8130                              return n || orig;
8131                          }
8132                          if (start.length === rng.startOffset) {
8133                              start = skipEmptyTextNodes(start.nextSibling, true);
8134                          } else {
8135                              start = start.parentNode;
8136                          }
8137                          if (rng.endOffset === 0) {
8138                              end = skipEmptyTextNodes(end.previousSibling, false);
8139                          } else {
8140                              end = end.parentNode;
8141                          }
8142  
8143                          if (start && start === end)
8144                              return start;
8145                      }
8146                  }
8147  
8148                  if (elm && elm.nodeType == 3)
8149                      return elm.parentNode;
8150  
8151                  return elm;
8152              }
8153  
8154              return rng.item ? rng.item(0) : rng.parentElement();
8155          },
8156  
8157          getSelectedBlocks : function(st, en) {
8158              var t = this, dom = t.dom, sb, eb, n, bl = [];
8159  
8160              sb = dom.getParent(st || t.getStart(), dom.isBlock);
8161              eb = dom.getParent(en || t.getEnd(), dom.isBlock);
8162  
8163              if (sb)
8164                  bl.push(sb);
8165  
8166              if (sb && eb && sb != eb) {
8167                  n = sb;
8168  
8169                  var walker = new tinymce.dom.TreeWalker(sb, dom.getRoot());
8170                  while ((n = walker.next()) && n != eb) {
8171                      if (dom.isBlock(n))
8172                          bl.push(n);
8173                  }
8174              }
8175  
8176              if (eb && sb != eb)
8177                  bl.push(eb);
8178  
8179              return bl;
8180          },
8181  
8182          normalize : function() {
8183              var self = this, rng, normalized;
8184  
8185              // TODO:
8186              // Retain selection direction.
8187              // Lean left/right on Gecko for inline elements.
8188              // Run this on mouse up/key up when the user manually moves the selection
8189              
8190              // Normalize only on non IE browsers for now
8191              if (tinymce.isIE)
8192                  return;
8193  
8194  			function normalizeEndPoint(start) {
8195                  var container, offset, walker, dom = self.dom, body = dom.getRoot(), node;
8196  
8197                  container = rng[(start ? 'start' : 'end') + 'Container'];
8198                  offset = rng[(start ? 'start' : 'end') + 'Offset'];
8199  
8200                  // If the container is a document move it to the body element
8201                  if (container.nodeType === 9) {
8202                      container = container.body;
8203                      offset = 0;
8204                  }
8205  
8206                  // If the container is body try move it into the closest text node or position
8207                  // TODO: Add more logic here to handle element selection cases
8208                  if (container === body) {
8209                      // Resolve the index
8210                      if (container.hasChildNodes()) {
8211                          container = container.childNodes[Math.min(!start && offset > 0 ? offset - 1 : offset, container.childNodes.length - 1)];
8212                          offset = 0;
8213  
8214                          // Don't walk into elements that doesn't have any child nodes like a IMG
8215                          if (container.hasChildNodes()) {
8216                              // Walk the DOM to find a text node to place the caret at or a BR
8217                              node = container;
8218                              walker = new tinymce.dom.TreeWalker(container, body);
8219                              do {
8220                                  // Found a text node use that position
8221                                  if (node.nodeType === 3) {
8222                                      offset = start ? 0 : node.nodeValue.length - 1;
8223                                      container = node;
8224                                      normalized = true;
8225                                      break;
8226                                  }
8227  
8228                                  // Found a BR/IMG element that we can place the caret before
8229                                  if (/^(BR|IMG)$/.test(node.nodeName)) {
8230                                      offset = dom.nodeIndex(node);
8231                                      container = node.parentNode;
8232  
8233                                      // Put caret after image when moving the end point
8234                                      if (node.nodeName ==  "IMG" && !start) {
8235                                          offset++;
8236                                      }
8237  
8238                                      normalized = true;
8239                                      break;
8240                                  }
8241                              } while (node = (start ? walker.next() : walker.prev()));
8242                          }
8243                      }
8244                  }
8245  
8246                  // Set endpoint if it was normalized
8247                  if (normalized)
8248                      rng['set' + (start ? 'Start' : 'End')](container, offset);
8249              };
8250  
8251              rng = self.getRng();
8252  
8253              // Normalize the end points
8254              normalizeEndPoint(true);
8255              
8256              if (!rng.collapsed)
8257                  normalizeEndPoint();
8258  
8259              // Set the selection if it was normalized
8260              if (normalized) {
8261                  //console.log(self.dom.dumpRng(rng));
8262                  self.setRng(rng);
8263              }
8264          },
8265  
8266          destroy : function(s) {
8267              var t = this;
8268  
8269              t.win = null;
8270  
8271              // Manual destroy then remove unload handler
8272              if (!s)
8273                  tinymce.removeUnload(t.destroy);
8274          },
8275  
8276          // IE has an issue where you can't select/move the caret by clicking outside the body if the document is in standards mode
8277          _fixIESelection : function() {
8278              var dom = this.dom, doc = dom.doc, body = doc.body, started, startRng, htmlElm;
8279  
8280              // Make HTML element unselectable since we are going to handle selection by hand
8281              doc.documentElement.unselectable = true;
8282  
8283              // Return range from point or null if it failed
8284  			function rngFromPoint(x, y) {
8285                  var rng = body.createTextRange();
8286  
8287                  try {
8288                      rng.moveToPoint(x, y);
8289                  } catch (ex) {
8290                      // IE sometimes throws and exception, so lets just ignore it
8291                      rng = null;
8292                  }
8293  
8294                  return rng;
8295              };
8296  
8297              // Fires while the selection is changing
8298  			function selectionChange(e) {
8299                  var pointRng;
8300  
8301                  // Check if the button is down or not
8302                  if (e.button) {
8303                      // Create range from mouse position
8304                      pointRng = rngFromPoint(e.x, e.y);
8305  
8306                      if (pointRng) {
8307                          // Check if pointRange is before/after selection then change the endPoint
8308                          if (pointRng.compareEndPoints('StartToStart', startRng) > 0)
8309                              pointRng.setEndPoint('StartToStart', startRng);
8310                          else
8311                              pointRng.setEndPoint('EndToEnd', startRng);
8312  
8313                          pointRng.select();
8314                      }
8315                  } else
8316                      endSelection();
8317              }
8318  
8319              // Removes listeners
8320  			function endSelection() {
8321                  var rng = doc.selection.createRange();
8322  
8323                  // If the range is collapsed then use the last start range
8324                  if (startRng && !rng.item && rng.compareEndPoints('StartToEnd', rng) === 0)
8325                      startRng.select();
8326  
8327                  dom.unbind(doc, 'mouseup', endSelection);
8328                  dom.unbind(doc, 'mousemove', selectionChange);
8329                  startRng = started = 0;
8330              };
8331  
8332              // Detect when user selects outside BODY
8333              dom.bind(doc, ['mousedown', 'contextmenu'], function(e) {
8334                  if (e.target.nodeName === 'HTML') {
8335                      if (started)
8336                          endSelection();
8337  
8338                      // Detect vertical scrollbar, since IE will fire a mousedown on the scrollbar and have target set as HTML
8339                      htmlElm = doc.documentElement;
8340                      if (htmlElm.scrollHeight > htmlElm.clientHeight)
8341                          return;
8342  
8343                      started = 1;
8344                      // Setup start position
8345                      startRng = rngFromPoint(e.x, e.y);
8346                      if (startRng) {
8347                          // Listen for selection change events
8348                          dom.bind(doc, 'mouseup', endSelection);
8349                          dom.bind(doc, 'mousemove', selectionChange);
8350  
8351                          dom.win.focus();
8352                          startRng.select();
8353                      }
8354                  }
8355              });
8356          }
8357      });
8358  })(tinymce);
8359  
8360  (function(tinymce) {
8361      tinymce.dom.Serializer = function(settings, dom, schema) {
8362          var onPreProcess, onPostProcess, isIE = tinymce.isIE, each = tinymce.each, htmlParser;
8363  
8364          // Support the old apply_source_formatting option
8365          if (!settings.apply_source_formatting)
8366              settings.indent = false;
8367  
8368          // Default DOM and Schema if they are undefined
8369          dom = dom || tinymce.DOM;
8370          schema = schema || new tinymce.html.Schema(settings);
8371          settings.entity_encoding = settings.entity_encoding || 'named';
8372          settings.remove_trailing_brs = "remove_trailing_brs" in settings ? settings.remove_trailing_brs : true;
8373  
8374          onPreProcess = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(self);
8375  
8376          onPostProcess = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(self);
8377  
8378          htmlParser = new tinymce.html.DomParser(settings, schema);
8379  
8380          // Convert move data-mce-src, data-mce-href and data-mce-style into nodes or process them if needed
8381          htmlParser.addAttributeFilter('src,href,style', function(nodes, name) {
8382              var i = nodes.length, node, value, internalName = 'data-mce-' + name, urlConverter = settings.url_converter, urlConverterScope = settings.url_converter_scope, undef;
8383  
8384              while (i--) {
8385                  node = nodes[i];
8386  
8387                  value = node.attributes.map[internalName];
8388                  if (value !== undef) {
8389                      // Set external name to internal value and remove internal
8390                      node.attr(name, value.length > 0 ? value : null);
8391                      node.attr(internalName, null);
8392                  } else {
8393                      // No internal attribute found then convert the value we have in the DOM
8394                      value = node.attributes.map[name];
8395  
8396                      if (name === "style")
8397                          value = dom.serializeStyle(dom.parseStyle(value), node.name);
8398                      else if (urlConverter)
8399                          value = urlConverter.call(urlConverterScope, value, name, node.name);
8400  
8401                      node.attr(name, value.length > 0 ? value : null);
8402                  }
8403              }
8404          });
8405  
8406          // Remove internal classes mceItem<..>
8407          htmlParser.addAttributeFilter('class', function(nodes, name) {
8408              var i = nodes.length, node, value;
8409  
8410              while (i--) {
8411                  node = nodes[i];
8412                  value = node.attr('class').replace(/\s*mce(Item\w+|Selected)\s*/g, '');
8413                  node.attr('class', value.length > 0 ? value : null);
8414              }
8415          });
8416  
8417          // Remove bookmark elements
8418          htmlParser.addAttributeFilter('data-mce-type', function(nodes, name, args) {
8419              var i = nodes.length, node;
8420  
8421              while (i--) {
8422                  node = nodes[i];
8423  
8424                  if (node.attributes.map['data-mce-type'] === 'bookmark' && !args.cleanup)
8425                      node.remove();
8426              }
8427          });
8428  
8429          // Force script into CDATA sections and remove the mce- prefix also add comments around styles
8430          htmlParser.addNodeFilter('script,style', function(nodes, name) {
8431              var i = nodes.length, node, value;
8432  
8433  			function trim(value) {
8434                  return value.replace(/(<!--\[CDATA\[|\]\]-->)/g, '\n')
8435                          .replace(/^[\r\n]*|[\r\n]*$/g, '')
8436                          .replace(/^\s*((<!--)?(\s*\/\/)?\s*<!\[CDATA\[|(<!--\s*)?\/\*\s*<!\[CDATA\[\s*\*\/|(\/\/)?\s*<!--|\/\*\s*<!--\s*\*\/)\s*[\r\n]*/gi, '')
8437                          .replace(/\s*(\/\*\s*\]\]>\s*\*\/(-->)?|\s*\/\/\s*\]\]>(-->)?|\/\/\s*(-->)?|\]\]>|\/\*\s*-->\s*\*\/|\s*-->\s*)\s*$/g, '');
8438              };
8439  
8440              while (i--) {
8441                  node = nodes[i];
8442                  value = node.firstChild ? node.firstChild.value : '';
8443  
8444                  if (name === "script") {
8445                      // Remove mce- prefix from script elements
8446                      node.attr('type', (node.attr('type') || 'text/javascript').replace(/^mce\-/, ''));
8447  
8448                      if (value.length > 0)
8449                          node.firstChild.value = '// <![CDATA[\n' + trim(value) + '\n// ]]>';
8450                  } else {
8451                      if (value.length > 0)
8452                          node.firstChild.value = '<!--\n' + trim(value) + '\n-->';
8453                  }
8454              }
8455          });
8456  
8457          // Convert comments to cdata and handle protected comments
8458          htmlParser.addNodeFilter('#comment', function(nodes, name) {
8459              var i = nodes.length, node;
8460  
8461              while (i--) {
8462                  node = nodes[i];
8463  
8464                  if (node.value.indexOf('[CDATA[') === 0) {
8465                      node.name = '#cdata';
8466                      node.type = 4;
8467                      node.value = node.value.replace(/^\[CDATA\[|\]\]$/g, '');
8468                  } else if (node.value.indexOf('mce:protected ') === 0) {
8469                      node.name = "#text";
8470                      node.type = 3;
8471                      node.raw = true;
8472                      node.value = unescape(node.value).substr(14);
8473                  }
8474              }
8475          });
8476  
8477          htmlParser.addNodeFilter('xml:namespace,input', function(nodes, name) {
8478              var i = nodes.length, node;
8479  
8480              while (i--) {
8481                  node = nodes[i];
8482                  if (node.type === 7)
8483                      node.remove();
8484                  else if (node.type === 1) {
8485                      if (name === "input" && !("type" in node.attributes.map))
8486                          node.attr('type', 'text');
8487                  }
8488              }
8489          });
8490  
8491          // Fix list elements, TODO: Replace this later
8492          if (settings.fix_list_elements) {
8493              htmlParser.addNodeFilter('ul,ol', function(nodes, name) {
8494                  var i = nodes.length, node, parentNode;
8495  
8496                  while (i--) {
8497                      node = nodes[i];
8498                      parentNode = node.parent;
8499  
8500                      if (parentNode.name === 'ul' || parentNode.name === 'ol') {
8501                          if (node.prev && node.prev.name === 'li') {
8502                              node.prev.append(node);
8503                          }
8504                      }
8505                  }
8506              });
8507          }
8508  
8509          // Remove internal data attributes
8510          htmlParser.addAttributeFilter('data-mce-src,data-mce-href,data-mce-style', function(nodes, name) {
8511              var i = nodes.length;
8512  
8513              while (i--) {
8514                  nodes[i].attr(name, null);
8515              }
8516          });
8517  
8518          // Return public methods
8519          return {
8520              schema : schema,
8521  
8522              addNodeFilter : htmlParser.addNodeFilter,
8523  
8524              addAttributeFilter : htmlParser.addAttributeFilter,
8525  
8526              onPreProcess : onPreProcess,
8527  
8528              onPostProcess : onPostProcess,
8529  
8530              serialize : function(node, args) {
8531                  var impl, doc, oldDoc, htmlSerializer, content;
8532  
8533                  // Explorer won't clone contents of script and style and the
8534                  // selected index of select elements are cleared on a clone operation.
8535                  if (isIE && dom.select('script,style,select,map').length > 0) {
8536                      content = node.innerHTML;
8537                      node = node.cloneNode(false);
8538                      dom.setHTML(node, content);
8539                  } else
8540                      node = node.cloneNode(true);
8541  
8542                  // Nodes needs to be attached to something in WebKit/Opera
8543                  // Older builds of Opera crashes if you attach the node to an document created dynamically
8544                  // and since we can't feature detect a crash we need to sniff the acutal build number
8545                  // This fix will make DOM ranges and make Sizzle happy!
8546                  impl = node.ownerDocument.implementation;
8547                  if (impl.createHTMLDocument) {
8548                      // Create an empty HTML document
8549                      doc = impl.createHTMLDocument("");
8550  
8551                      // Add the element or it's children if it's a body element to the new document
8552                      each(node.nodeName == 'BODY' ? node.childNodes : [node], function(node) {
8553                          doc.body.appendChild(doc.importNode(node, true));
8554                      });
8555  
8556                      // Grab first child or body element for serialization
8557                      if (node.nodeName != 'BODY')
8558                          node = doc.body.firstChild;
8559                      else
8560                          node = doc.body;
8561  
8562                      // set the new document in DOMUtils so createElement etc works
8563                      oldDoc = dom.doc;
8564                      dom.doc = doc;
8565                  }
8566  
8567                  args = args || {};
8568                  args.format = args.format || 'html';
8569  
8570                  // Pre process
8571                  if (!args.no_events) {
8572                      args.node = node;
8573                      onPreProcess.dispatch(self, args);
8574                  }
8575  
8576                  // Setup serializer
8577                  htmlSerializer = new tinymce.html.Serializer(settings, schema);
8578  
8579                  // Parse and serialize HTML
8580                  args.content = htmlSerializer.serialize(
8581                      htmlParser.parse(args.getInner ? node.innerHTML : tinymce.trim(dom.getOuterHTML(node), args), args)
8582                  );
8583  
8584                  // Replace all BOM characters for now until we can find a better solution
8585                  if (!args.cleanup)
8586                      args.content = args.content.replace(/\uFEFF|\u200B/g, '');
8587  
8588                  // Post process
8589                  if (!args.no_events)
8590                      onPostProcess.dispatch(self, args);
8591  
8592                  // Restore the old document if it was changed
8593                  if (oldDoc)
8594                      dom.doc = oldDoc;
8595  
8596                  args.node = null;
8597  
8598                  return args.content;
8599              },
8600  
8601              addRules : function(rules) {
8602                  schema.addValidElements(rules);
8603              },
8604  
8605              setRules : function(rules) {
8606                  schema.setValidElements(rules);
8607              }
8608          };
8609      };
8610  })(tinymce);
8611  (function(tinymce) {
8612      tinymce.dom.ScriptLoader = function(settings) {
8613          var QUEUED = 0,
8614              LOADING = 1,
8615              LOADED = 2,
8616              states = {},
8617              queue = [],
8618              scriptLoadedCallbacks = {},
8619              queueLoadedCallbacks = [],
8620              loading = 0,
8621              undefined;
8622  
8623  		function loadScript(url, callback) {
8624              var t = this, dom = tinymce.DOM, elm, uri, loc, id;
8625  
8626              // Execute callback when script is loaded
8627  			function done() {
8628                  dom.remove(id);
8629  
8630                  if (elm)
8631                      elm.onreadystatechange = elm.onload = elm = null;
8632  
8633                  callback();
8634              };
8635              
8636  			function error() {
8637                  // Report the error so it's easier for people to spot loading errors
8638                  if (typeof(console) !== "undefined" && console.log)
8639                      console.log("Failed to load: " + url);
8640  
8641                  // We can't mark it as done if there is a load error since
8642                  // A) We don't want to produce 404 errors on the server and
8643                  // B) the onerror event won't fire on all browsers.
8644                  // done();
8645              };
8646  
8647              id = dom.uniqueId();
8648  
8649              if (tinymce.isIE6) {
8650                  uri = new tinymce.util.URI(url);
8651                  loc = location;
8652  
8653                  // If script is from same domain and we
8654                  // use IE 6 then use XHR since it's more reliable
8655                  if (uri.host == loc.hostname && uri.port == loc.port && (uri.protocol + ':') == loc.protocol && uri.protocol.toLowerCase() != 'file') {
8656                      tinymce.util.XHR.send({
8657                          url : tinymce._addVer(uri.getURI()),
8658                          success : function(content) {
8659                              // Create new temp script element
8660                              var script = dom.create('script', {
8661                                  type : 'text/javascript'
8662                              });
8663  
8664                              // Evaluate script in global scope
8665                              script.text = content;
8666                              document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script);
8667                              dom.remove(script);
8668  
8669                              done();
8670                          },
8671                          
8672                          error : error
8673                      });
8674  
8675                      return;
8676                  }
8677              }
8678  
8679              // Create new script element
8680              elm = dom.create('script', {
8681                  id : id,
8682                  type : 'text/javascript',
8683                  src : tinymce._addVer(url)
8684              });
8685  
8686              // Add onload listener for non IE browsers since IE9
8687              // fires onload event before the script is parsed and executed
8688              if (!tinymce.isIE)
8689                  elm.onload = done;
8690  
8691              // Add onerror event will get fired on some browsers but not all of them
8692              elm.onerror = error;
8693  
8694              // Opera 9.60 doesn't seem to fire the onreadystate event at correctly
8695              if (!tinymce.isOpera) {
8696                  elm.onreadystatechange = function() {
8697                      var state = elm.readyState;
8698  
8699                      // Loaded state is passed on IE 6 however there
8700                      // are known issues with this method but we can't use
8701                      // XHR in a cross domain loading
8702                      if (state == 'complete' || state == 'loaded')
8703                          done();
8704                  };
8705              }
8706  
8707              // Most browsers support this feature so we report errors
8708              // for those at least to help users track their missing plugins etc
8709              // todo: Removed since it produced error if the document is unloaded by navigating away, re-add it as an option
8710              /*elm.onerror = function() {
8711                  alert('Failed to load: ' + url);
8712              };*/
8713  
8714              // Add script to document
8715              (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.body).appendChild(elm);
8716          };
8717  
8718          this.isDone = function(url) {
8719              return states[url] == LOADED;
8720          };
8721  
8722          this.markDone = function(url) {
8723              states[url] = LOADED;
8724          };
8725  
8726          this.add = this.load = function(url, callback, scope) {
8727              var item, state = states[url];
8728  
8729              // Add url to load queue
8730              if (state == undefined) {
8731                  queue.push(url);
8732                  states[url] = QUEUED;
8733              }
8734  
8735              if (callback) {
8736                  // Store away callback for later execution
8737                  if (!scriptLoadedCallbacks[url])
8738                      scriptLoadedCallbacks[url] = [];
8739  
8740                  scriptLoadedCallbacks[url].push({
8741                      func : callback,
8742                      scope : scope || this
8743                  });
8744              }
8745          };
8746  
8747          this.loadQueue = function(callback, scope) {
8748              this.loadScripts(queue, callback, scope);
8749          };
8750  
8751          this.loadScripts = function(scripts, callback, scope) {
8752              var loadScripts;
8753  
8754  			function execScriptLoadedCallbacks(url) {
8755                  // Execute URL callback functions
8756                  tinymce.each(scriptLoadedCallbacks[url], function(callback) {
8757                      callback.func.call(callback.scope);
8758                  });
8759  
8760                  scriptLoadedCallbacks[url] = undefined;
8761              };
8762  
8763              queueLoadedCallbacks.push({
8764                  func : callback,
8765                  scope : scope || this
8766              });
8767  
8768              loadScripts = function() {
8769                  var loadingScripts = tinymce.grep(scripts);
8770  
8771                  // Current scripts has been handled
8772                  scripts.length = 0;
8773  
8774                  // Load scripts that needs to be loaded
8775                  tinymce.each(loadingScripts, function(url) {
8776                      // Script is already loaded then execute script callbacks directly
8777                      if (states[url] == LOADED) {
8778                          execScriptLoadedCallbacks(url);
8779                          return;
8780                      }
8781  
8782                      // Is script not loading then start loading it
8783                      if (states[url] != LOADING) {
8784                          states[url] = LOADING;
8785                          loading++;
8786  
8787                          loadScript(url, function() {
8788                              states[url] = LOADED;
8789                              loading--;
8790  
8791                              execScriptLoadedCallbacks(url);
8792  
8793                              // Load more scripts if they where added by the recently loaded script
8794                              loadScripts();
8795                          });
8796                      }
8797                  });
8798  
8799                  // No scripts are currently loading then execute all pending queue loaded callbacks
8800                  if (!loading) {
8801                      tinymce.each(queueLoadedCallbacks, function(callback) {
8802                          callback.func.call(callback.scope);
8803                      });
8804  
8805                      queueLoadedCallbacks.length = 0;
8806                  }
8807              };
8808  
8809              loadScripts();
8810          };
8811      };
8812  
8813      // Global script loader
8814      tinymce.ScriptLoader = new tinymce.dom.ScriptLoader();
8815  })(tinymce);
8816  
8817  tinymce.dom.TreeWalker = function(start_node, root_node) {
8818      var node = start_node;
8819  
8820  	function findSibling(node, start_name, sibling_name, shallow) {
8821          var sibling, parent;
8822  
8823          if (node) {
8824              // Walk into nodes if it has a start
8825              if (!shallow && node[start_name])
8826                  return node[start_name];
8827  
8828              // Return the sibling if it has one
8829              if (node != root_node) {
8830                  sibling = node[sibling_name];
8831                  if (sibling)
8832                      return sibling;
8833  
8834                  // Walk up the parents to look for siblings
8835                  for (parent = node.parentNode; parent && parent != root_node; parent = parent.parentNode) {
8836                      sibling = parent[sibling_name];
8837                      if (sibling)
8838                          return sibling;
8839                  }
8840              }
8841          }
8842      };
8843  
8844      this.current = function() {
8845          return node;
8846      };
8847  
8848      this.next = function(shallow) {
8849          return (node = findSibling(node, 'firstChild', 'nextSibling', shallow));
8850      };
8851  
8852      this.prev = function(shallow) {
8853          return (node = findSibling(node, 'lastChild', 'previousSibling', shallow));
8854      };
8855  };
8856  
8857  (function(tinymce) {
8858      tinymce.dom.RangeUtils = function(dom) {
8859          var INVISIBLE_CHAR = '\uFEFF';
8860  
8861          this.walk = function(rng, callback) {
8862              var startContainer = rng.startContainer,
8863                  startOffset = rng.startOffset,
8864                  endContainer = rng.endContainer,
8865                  endOffset = rng.endOffset,
8866                  ancestor, startPoint,
8867                  endPoint, node, parent, siblings, nodes;
8868  
8869              // Handle table cell selection the table plugin enables
8870              // you to fake select table cells and perform formatting actions on them
8871              nodes = dom.select('td.mceSelected,th.mceSelected');
8872              if (nodes.length > 0) {
8873                  tinymce.each(nodes, function(node) {
8874                      callback([node]);
8875                  });
8876  
8877                  return;
8878              }
8879  
8880  			function exclude(nodes) {
8881                  var node;
8882  
8883                  // First node is excluded
8884                  node = nodes[0];
8885                  if (node.nodeType === 3 && node === startContainer && startOffset >= node.nodeValue.length) {
8886                      nodes.splice(0, 1);
8887                  }
8888  
8889                  // Last node is excluded
8890                  node = nodes[nodes.length - 1];
8891                  if (endOffset === 0 && nodes.length > 0 && node === endContainer && node.nodeType === 3) {
8892                      nodes.splice(nodes.length - 1, 1);
8893                  }
8894  
8895                  return nodes;
8896              };
8897  
8898  			function collectSiblings(node, name, end_node) {
8899                  var siblings = [];
8900  
8901                  for (; node && node != end_node; node = node[name])
8902                      siblings.push(node);
8903  
8904                  return siblings;
8905              };
8906  
8907  			function findEndPoint(node, root) {
8908                  do {
8909                      if (node.parentNode == root)
8910                          return node;
8911  
8912                      node = node.parentNode;
8913                  } while(node);
8914              };
8915  
8916  			function walkBoundary(start_node, end_node, next) {
8917                  var siblingName = next ? 'nextSibling' : 'previousSibling';
8918  
8919                  for (node = start_node, parent = node.parentNode; node && node != end_node; node = parent) {
8920                      parent = node.parentNode;
8921                      siblings = collectSiblings(node == start_node ? node : node[siblingName], siblingName);
8922  
8923                      if (siblings.length) {
8924                          if (!next)
8925                              siblings.reverse();
8926  
8927                          callback(exclude(siblings));
8928                      }
8929                  }
8930              };
8931  
8932              // If index based start position then resolve it
8933              if (startContainer.nodeType == 1 && startContainer.hasChildNodes())
8934                  startContainer = startContainer.childNodes[startOffset];
8935  
8936              // If index based end position then resolve it
8937              if (endContainer.nodeType == 1 && endContainer.hasChildNodes())
8938                  endContainer = endContainer.childNodes[Math.min(endOffset - 1, endContainer.childNodes.length - 1)];
8939  
8940              // Same container
8941              if (startContainer == endContainer)
8942                  return callback(exclude([startContainer]));
8943  
8944              // Find common ancestor and end points
8945              ancestor = dom.findCommonAncestor(startContainer, endContainer);
8946                  
8947              // Process left side
8948              for (node = startContainer; node; node = node.parentNode) {
8949                  if (node === endContainer)
8950                      return walkBoundary(startContainer, ancestor, true);
8951  
8952                  if (node === ancestor)
8953                      break;
8954              }
8955  
8956              // Process right side
8957              for (node = endContainer; node; node = node.parentNode) {
8958                  if (node === startContainer)
8959                      return walkBoundary(endContainer, ancestor);
8960  
8961                  if (node === ancestor)
8962                      break;
8963              }
8964  
8965              // Find start/end point
8966              startPoint = findEndPoint(startContainer, ancestor) || startContainer;
8967              endPoint = findEndPoint(endContainer, ancestor) || endContainer;
8968  
8969              // Walk left leaf
8970              walkBoundary(startContainer, startPoint, true);
8971  
8972              // Walk the middle from start to end point
8973              siblings = collectSiblings(
8974                  startPoint == startContainer ? startPoint : startPoint.nextSibling,
8975                  'nextSibling',
8976                  endPoint == endContainer ? endPoint.nextSibling : endPoint
8977              );
8978  
8979              if (siblings.length)
8980                  callback(exclude(siblings));
8981  
8982              // Walk right leaf
8983              walkBoundary(endContainer, endPoint);
8984          };
8985  
8986          this.split = function(rng) {
8987              var startContainer = rng.startContainer,
8988                  startOffset = rng.startOffset,
8989                  endContainer = rng.endContainer,
8990                  endOffset = rng.endOffset;
8991  
8992  			function splitText(node, offset) {
8993                  return node.splitText(offset);
8994              };
8995  
8996              // Handle single text node
8997              if (startContainer == endContainer && startContainer.nodeType == 3) {
8998                  if (startOffset > 0 && startOffset < startContainer.nodeValue.length) {
8999                      endContainer = splitText(startContainer, startOffset);
9000                      startContainer = endContainer.previousSibling;
9001  
9002                      if (endOffset > startOffset) {
9003                          endOffset = endOffset - startOffset;
9004                          startContainer = endContainer = splitText(endContainer, endOffset).previousSibling;
9005                          endOffset = endContainer.nodeValue.length;
9006                          startOffset = 0;
9007                      } else {
9008                          endOffset = 0;
9009                      }
9010                  }
9011              } else {
9012                  // Split startContainer text node if needed
9013                  if (startContainer.nodeType == 3 && startOffset > 0 && startOffset < startContainer.nodeValue.length) {
9014                      startContainer = splitText(startContainer, startOffset);
9015                      startOffset = 0;
9016                  }
9017  
9018                  // Split endContainer text node if needed
9019                  if (endContainer.nodeType == 3 && endOffset > 0 && endOffset < endContainer.nodeValue.length) {
9020                      endContainer = splitText(endContainer, endOffset).previousSibling;
9021                      endOffset = endContainer.nodeValue.length;
9022                  }
9023              }
9024  
9025              return {
9026                  startContainer : startContainer,
9027                  startOffset : startOffset,
9028                  endContainer : endContainer,
9029                  endOffset : endOffset
9030              };
9031          };
9032  
9033      };
9034  
9035      tinymce.dom.RangeUtils.compareRanges = function(rng1, rng2) {
9036          if (rng1 && rng2) {
9037              // Compare native IE ranges
9038              if (rng1.item || rng1.duplicate) {
9039                  // Both are control ranges and the selected element matches
9040                  if (rng1.item && rng2.item && rng1.item(0) === rng2.item(0))
9041                      return true;
9042  
9043                  // Both are text ranges and the range matches
9044                  if (rng1.isEqual && rng2.isEqual && rng2.isEqual(rng1))
9045                      return true;
9046              } else {
9047                  // Compare w3c ranges
9048                  return rng1.startContainer == rng2.startContainer && rng1.startOffset == rng2.startOffset;
9049              }
9050          }
9051  
9052          return false;
9053      };
9054  })(tinymce);
9055  
9056  (function(tinymce) {
9057      var Event = tinymce.dom.Event, each = tinymce.each;
9058  
9059      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.KeyboardNavigation', {
9060          KeyboardNavigation: function(settings, dom) {
9061              var t = this, root = settings.root, items = settings.items,
9062                      enableUpDown = settings.enableUpDown, enableLeftRight = settings.enableLeftRight || !settings.enableUpDown,
9063                      excludeFromTabOrder = settings.excludeFromTabOrder,
9064                      itemFocussed, itemBlurred, rootKeydown, rootFocussed, focussedId;
9065  
9066              dom = dom || tinymce.DOM;
9067  
9068              itemFocussed = function(evt) {
9069                  focussedId = evt.target.id;
9070              };
9071              
9072              itemBlurred = function(evt) {
9073                  dom.setAttrib(evt.target.id, 'tabindex', '-1');
9074              };
9075              
9076              rootFocussed = function(evt) {
9077                  var item = dom.get(focussedId);
9078                  dom.setAttrib(item, 'tabindex', '0');
9079                  item.focus();
9080              };
9081              
9082              t.focus = function() {
9083                  dom.get(focussedId).focus();
9084              };
9085  
9086              t.destroy = function() {
9087                  each(items, function(item) {
9088                      dom.unbind(dom.get(item.id), 'focus', itemFocussed);
9089                      dom.unbind(dom.get(item.id), 'blur', itemBlurred);
9090                  });
9091  
9092                  dom.unbind(dom.get(root), 'focus', rootFocussed);
9093                  dom.unbind(dom.get(root), 'keydown', rootKeydown);
9094  
9095                  items = dom = root = t.focus = itemFocussed = itemBlurred = rootKeydown = rootFocussed = null;
9096                  t.destroy = function() {};
9097              };
9098              
9099              t.moveFocus = function(dir, evt) {
9100                  var idx = -1, controls = t.controls, newFocus;
9101  
9102                  if (!focussedId)
9103                      return;
9104  
9105                  each(items, function(item, index) {
9106                      if (item.id === focussedId) {
9107                          idx = index;
9108                          return false;
9109                      }
9110                  });
9111  
9112                  idx += dir;
9113                  if (idx < 0) {
9114                      idx = items.length - 1;
9115                  } else if (idx >= items.length) {
9116                      idx = 0;
9117                  }
9118                  
9119                  newFocus = items[idx];
9120                  dom.setAttrib(focussedId, 'tabindex', '-1');
9121                  dom.setAttrib(newFocus.id, 'tabindex', '0');
9122                  dom.get(newFocus.id).focus();
9123  
9124                  if (settings.actOnFocus) {
9125                      settings.onAction(newFocus.id);
9126                  }
9127  
9128                  if (evt)
9129                      Event.cancel(evt);
9130              };
9131              
9132              rootKeydown = function(evt) {
9133                  var DOM_VK_LEFT = 37, DOM_VK_RIGHT = 39, DOM_VK_UP = 38, DOM_VK_DOWN = 40, DOM_VK_ESCAPE = 27, DOM_VK_ENTER = 14, DOM_VK_RETURN = 13, DOM_VK_SPACE = 32;
9134                  
9135                  switch (evt.keyCode) {
9136                      case DOM_VK_LEFT:
9137                          if (enableLeftRight) t.moveFocus(-1);
9138                          break;
9139      
9140                      case DOM_VK_RIGHT:
9141                          if (enableLeftRight) t.moveFocus(1);
9142                          break;
9143      
9144                      case DOM_VK_UP:
9145                          if (enableUpDown) t.moveFocus(-1);
9146                          break;
9147  
9148                      case DOM_VK_DOWN:
9149                          if (enableUpDown) t.moveFocus(1);
9150                          break;
9151  
9152                      case DOM_VK_ESCAPE:
9153                          if (settings.onCancel) {
9154                              settings.onCancel();
9155                              Event.cancel(evt);
9156                          }
9157                          break;
9158  
9159                      case DOM_VK_ENTER:
9160                      case DOM_VK_RETURN:
9161                      case DOM_VK_SPACE:
9162                          if (settings.onAction) {
9163                              settings.onAction(focussedId);
9164                              Event.cancel(evt);
9165                          }
9166                          break;
9167                  }
9168              };
9169  
9170              // Set up state and listeners for each item.
9171              each(items, function(item, idx) {
9172                  var tabindex;
9173  
9174                  if (!item.id) {
9175                      item.id = dom.uniqueId('_mce_item_');
9176                  }
9177  
9178                  if (excludeFromTabOrder) {
9179                      dom.bind(item.id, 'blur', itemBlurred);
9180                      tabindex = '-1';
9181                  } else {
9182                      tabindex = (idx === 0 ? '0' : '-1');
9183                  }
9184  
9185                  dom.setAttrib(item.id, 'tabindex', tabindex);
9186                  dom.bind(dom.get(item.id), 'focus', itemFocussed);
9187              });
9188              
9189              // Setup initial state for root element.
9190              if (items[0]){
9191                  focussedId = items[0].id;
9192              }
9193  
9194              dom.setAttrib(root, 'tabindex', '-1');
9195              
9196              // Setup listeners for root element.
9197              dom.bind(dom.get(root), 'focus', rootFocussed);
9198              dom.bind(dom.get(root), 'keydown', rootKeydown);
9199          }
9200      });
9201  })(tinymce);
9202  
9203  (function(tinymce) {
9204      // Shorten class names
9205      var DOM = tinymce.DOM, is = tinymce.is;
9206  
9207      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.Control', {
9208          Control : function(id, s, editor) {
9209              this.id = id;
9210              this.settings = s = s || {};
9211              this.rendered = false;
9212              this.onRender = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(this);
9213              this.classPrefix = '';
9214              this.scope = s.scope || this;
9215              this.disabled = 0;
9216              this.active = 0;
9217              this.editor = editor;
9218          },
9219          
9220          setAriaProperty : function(property, value) {
9221              var element = DOM.get(this.id + '_aria') || DOM.get(this.id);
9222              if (element) {
9223                  DOM.setAttrib(element, 'aria-' + property, !!value);
9224              }
9225          },
9226          
9227          focus : function() {
9228              DOM.get(this.id).focus();
9229          },
9230  
9231          setDisabled : function(s) {
9232              if (s != this.disabled) {
9233                  this.setAriaProperty('disabled', s);
9234  
9235                  this.setState('Disabled', s);
9236                  this.setState('Enabled', !s);
9237                  this.disabled = s;
9238              }
9239          },
9240  
9241          isDisabled : function() {
9242              return this.disabled;
9243          },
9244  
9245          setActive : function(s) {
9246              if (s != this.active) {
9247                  this.setState('Active', s);
9248                  this.active = s;
9249                  this.setAriaProperty('pressed', s);
9250              }
9251          },
9252  
9253          isActive : function() {
9254              return this.active;
9255          },
9256  
9257          setState : function(c, s) {
9258              var n = DOM.get(this.id);
9259  
9260              c = this.classPrefix + c;
9261  
9262              if (s)
9263                  DOM.addClass(n, c);
9264              else
9265                  DOM.removeClass(n, c);
9266          },
9267  
9268          isRendered : function() {
9269              return this.rendered;
9270          },
9271  
9272          renderHTML : function() {
9273          },
9274  
9275          renderTo : function(n) {
9276              DOM.setHTML(n, this.renderHTML());
9277          },
9278  
9279          postRender : function() {
9280              var t = this, b;
9281  
9282              // Set pending states
9283              if (is(t.disabled)) {
9284                  b = t.disabled;
9285                  t.disabled = -1;
9286                  t.setDisabled(b);
9287              }
9288  
9289              if (is(t.active)) {
9290                  b = t.active;
9291                  t.active = -1;
9292                  t.setActive(b);
9293              }
9294          },
9295  
9296          remove : function() {
9297              DOM.remove(this.id);
9298              this.destroy();
9299          },
9300  
9301          destroy : function() {
9302              tinymce.dom.Event.clear(this.id);
9303          }
9304      });
9305  })(tinymce);
9306  tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.Container:tinymce.ui.Control', {
9307      Container : function(id, s, editor) {
9308          this.parent(id, s, editor);
9309  
9310          this.controls = [];
9311  
9312          this.lookup = {};
9313      },
9314  
9315      add : function(c) {
9316          this.lookup[c.id] = c;
9317          this.controls.push(c);
9318  
9319          return c;
9320      },
9321  
9322      get : function(n) {
9323          return this.lookup[n];
9324      }
9325  });
9326  
9327  
9328  tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.Separator:tinymce.ui.Control', {
9329      Separator : function(id, s) {
9330          this.parent(id, s);
9331          this.classPrefix = 'mceSeparator';
9332          this.setDisabled(true);
9333      },
9334  
9335      renderHTML : function() {
9336          return tinymce.DOM.createHTML('span', {'class' : this.classPrefix, role : 'separator', 'aria-orientation' : 'vertical', tabindex : '-1'});
9337      }
9338  });
9339  
9340  (function(tinymce) {
9341      var is = tinymce.is, DOM = tinymce.DOM, each = tinymce.each, walk = tinymce.walk;
9342  
9343      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.MenuItem:tinymce.ui.Control', {
9344          MenuItem : function(id, s) {
9345              this.parent(id, s);
9346              this.classPrefix = 'mceMenuItem';
9347          },
9348  
9349          setSelected : function(s) {
9350              this.setState('Selected', s);
9351              this.setAriaProperty('checked', !!s);
9352              this.selected = s;
9353          },
9354  
9355          isSelected : function() {
9356              return this.selected;
9357          },
9358  
9359          postRender : function() {
9360              var t = this;
9361              
9362              t.parent();
9363  
9364              // Set pending state
9365              if (is(t.selected))
9366                  t.setSelected(t.selected);
9367          }
9368      });
9369  })(tinymce);
9370  
9371  (function(tinymce) {
9372      var is = tinymce.is, DOM = tinymce.DOM, each = tinymce.each, walk = tinymce.walk;
9373  
9374      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.Menu:tinymce.ui.MenuItem', {
9375          Menu : function(id, s) {
9376              var t = this;
9377  
9378              t.parent(id, s);
9379              t.items = {};
9380              t.collapsed = false;
9381              t.menuCount = 0;
9382              t.onAddItem = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(this);
9383          },
9384  
9385          expand : function(d) {
9386              var t = this;
9387  
9388              if (d) {
9389                  walk(t, function(o) {
9390                      if (o.expand)
9391                          o.expand();
9392                  }, 'items', t);
9393              }
9394  
9395              t.collapsed = false;
9396          },
9397  
9398          collapse : function(d) {
9399              var t = this;
9400  
9401              if (d) {
9402                  walk(t, function(o) {
9403                      if (o.collapse)
9404                          o.collapse();
9405                  }, 'items', t);
9406              }
9407  
9408              t.collapsed = true;
9409          },
9410  
9411          isCollapsed : function() {
9412              return this.collapsed;
9413          },
9414  
9415          add : function(o) {
9416              if (!o.settings)
9417                  o = new tinymce.ui.MenuItem(o.id || DOM.uniqueId(), o);
9418  
9419              this.onAddItem.dispatch(this, o);
9420  
9421              return this.items[o.id] = o;
9422          },
9423  
9424          addSeparator : function() {
9425              return this.add({separator : true});
9426          },
9427  
9428          addMenu : function(o) {
9429              if (!o.collapse)
9430                  o = this.createMenu(o);
9431  
9432              this.menuCount++;
9433  
9434              return this.add(o);
9435          },
9436  
9437          hasMenus : function() {
9438              return this.menuCount !== 0;
9439          },
9440  
9441          remove : function(o) {
9442              delete this.items[o.id];
9443          },
9444  
9445          removeAll : function() {
9446              var t = this;
9447  
9448              walk(t, function(o) {
9449                  if (o.removeAll)
9450                      o.removeAll();
9451                  else
9452                      o.remove();
9453  
9454                  o.destroy();
9455              }, 'items', t);
9456  
9457              t.items = {};
9458          },
9459  
9460          createMenu : function(o) {
9461              var m = new tinymce.ui.Menu(o.id || DOM.uniqueId(), o);
9462  
9463              m.onAddItem.add(this.onAddItem.dispatch, this.onAddItem);
9464  
9465              return m;
9466          }
9467      });
9468  })(tinymce);
9469  (function(tinymce) {
9470      var is = tinymce.is, DOM = tinymce.DOM, each = tinymce.each, Event = tinymce.dom.Event, Element = tinymce.dom.Element;
9471  
9472      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.DropMenu:tinymce.ui.Menu', {
9473          DropMenu : function(id, s) {
9474              s = s || {};
9475              s.container = s.container || DOM.doc.body;
9476              s.offset_x = s.offset_x || 0;
9477              s.offset_y = s.offset_y || 0;
9478              s.vp_offset_x = s.vp_offset_x || 0;
9479              s.vp_offset_y = s.vp_offset_y || 0;
9480  
9481              if (is(s.icons) && !s.icons)
9482                  s['class'] += ' mceNoIcons';
9483  
9484              this.parent(id, s);
9485              this.onShowMenu = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(this);
9486              this.onHideMenu = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(this);
9487              this.classPrefix = 'mceMenu';
9488          },
9489  
9490          createMenu : function(s) {
9491              var t = this, cs = t.settings, m;
9492  
9493              s.container = s.container || cs.container;
9494              s.parent = t;
9495              s.constrain = s.constrain || cs.constrain;
9496              s['class'] = s['class'] || cs['class'];
9497              s.vp_offset_x = s.vp_offset_x || cs.vp_offset_x;
9498              s.vp_offset_y = s.vp_offset_y || cs.vp_offset_y;
9499              s.keyboard_focus = cs.keyboard_focus;
9500              m = new tinymce.ui.DropMenu(s.id || DOM.uniqueId(), s);
9501  
9502              m.onAddItem.add(t.onAddItem.dispatch, t.onAddItem);
9503  
9504              return m;
9505          },
9506          
9507          focus : function() {
9508              var t = this;
9509              if (t.keyboardNav) {
9510                  t.keyboardNav.focus();
9511              }
9512          },
9513  
9514          update : function() {
9515              var t = this, s = t.settings, tb = DOM.get('menu_' + t.id + '_tbl'), co = DOM.get('menu_' + t.id + '_co'), tw, th;
9516  
9517              tw = s.max_width ? Math.min(tb.clientWidth, s.max_width) : tb.clientWidth;
9518              th = s.max_height ? Math.min(tb.clientHeight, s.max_height) : tb.clientHeight;
9519  
9520              if (!DOM.boxModel)
9521                  t.element.setStyles({width : tw + 2, height : th + 2});
9522              else
9523                  t.element.setStyles({width : tw, height : th});
9524  
9525              if (s.max_width)
9526                  DOM.setStyle(co, 'width', tw);
9527  
9528              if (s.max_height) {
9529                  DOM.setStyle(co, 'height', th);
9530  
9531                  if (tb.clientHeight < s.max_height)
9532                      DOM.setStyle(co, 'overflow', 'hidden');
9533              }
9534          },
9535  
9536          showMenu : function(x, y, px) {
9537              var t = this, s = t.settings, co, vp = DOM.getViewPort(), w, h, mx, my, ot = 2, dm, tb, cp = t.classPrefix;
9538  
9539              t.collapse(1);
9540  
9541              if (t.isMenuVisible)
9542                  return;
9543  
9544              if (!t.rendered) {
9545                  co = DOM.add(t.settings.container, t.renderNode());
9546  
9547                  each(t.items, function(o) {
9548                      o.postRender();
9549                  });
9550  
9551                  t.element = new Element('menu_' + t.id, {blocker : 1, container : s.container});
9552              } else
9553                  co = DOM.get('menu_' + t.id);
9554  
9555              // Move layer out of sight unless it's Opera since it scrolls to top of page due to an bug
9556              if (!tinymce.isOpera)
9557                  DOM.setStyles(co, {left : -0xFFFF , top : -0xFFFF});
9558  
9559              DOM.show(co);
9560              t.update();
9561  
9562              x += s.offset_x || 0;
9563              y += s.offset_y || 0;
9564              vp.w -= 4;
9565              vp.h -= 4;
9566  
9567              // Move inside viewport if not submenu
9568              if (s.constrain) {
9569                  w = co.clientWidth - ot;
9570                  h = co.clientHeight - ot;
9571                  mx = vp.x + vp.w;
9572                  my = vp.y + vp.h;
9573  
9574                  if ((x + s.vp_offset_x + w) > mx)
9575                      x = px ? px - w : Math.max(0, (mx - s.vp_offset_x) - w);
9576  
9577                  if ((y + s.vp_offset_y + h) > my)
9578                      y = Math.max(0, (my - s.vp_offset_y) - h);
9579              }
9580  
9581              DOM.setStyles(co, {left : x , top : y});
9582              t.element.update();
9583  
9584              t.isMenuVisible = 1;
9585              t.mouseClickFunc = Event.add(co, 'click', function(e) {
9586                  var m;
9587  
9588                  e = e.target;
9589  
9590                  if (e && (e = DOM.getParent(e, 'tr')) && !DOM.hasClass(e, cp + 'ItemSub')) {
9591                      m = t.items[e.id];
9592  
9593                      if (m.isDisabled())
9594                          return;
9595  
9596                      dm = t;
9597  
9598                      while (dm) {
9599                          if (dm.hideMenu)
9600                              dm.hideMenu();
9601  
9602                          dm = dm.settings.parent;
9603                      }
9604  
9605                      if (m.settings.onclick)
9606                          m.settings.onclick(e);
9607  
9608                      return Event.cancel(e); // Cancel to fix onbeforeunload problem
9609                  }
9610              });
9611  
9612              if (t.hasMenus()) {
9613                  t.mouseOverFunc = Event.add(co, 'mouseover', function(e) {
9614                      var m, r, mi;
9615  
9616                      e = e.target;
9617                      if (e && (e = DOM.getParent(e, 'tr'))) {
9618                          m = t.items[e.id];
9619  
9620                          if (t.lastMenu)
9621                              t.lastMenu.collapse(1);
9622  
9623                          if (m.isDisabled())
9624                              return;
9625  
9626                          if (e && DOM.hasClass(e, cp + 'ItemSub')) {
9627                              //p = DOM.getPos(s.container);
9628                              r = DOM.getRect(e);
9629                              m.showMenu((r.x + r.w - ot), r.y - ot, r.x);
9630                              t.lastMenu = m;
9631                              DOM.addClass(DOM.get(m.id).firstChild, cp + 'ItemActive');
9632                          }
9633                      }
9634                  });
9635              }
9636              
9637              Event.add(co, 'keydown', t._keyHandler, t);
9638  
9639              t.onShowMenu.dispatch(t);
9640  
9641              if (s.keyboard_focus) { 
9642                  t._setupKeyboardNav(); 
9643              }
9644          },
9645  
9646          hideMenu : function(c) {
9647              var t = this, co = DOM.get('menu_' + t.id), e;
9648  
9649              if (!t.isMenuVisible)
9650                  return;
9651  
9652              if (t.keyboardNav) t.keyboardNav.destroy();
9653              Event.remove(co, 'mouseover', t.mouseOverFunc);
9654              Event.remove(co, 'click', t.mouseClickFunc);
9655              Event.remove(co, 'keydown', t._keyHandler);
9656              DOM.hide(co);
9657              t.isMenuVisible = 0;
9658  
9659              if (!c)
9660                  t.collapse(1);
9661  
9662              if (t.element)
9663                  t.element.hide();
9664  
9665              if (e = DOM.get(t.id))
9666                  DOM.removeClass(e.firstChild, t.classPrefix + 'ItemActive');
9667  
9668              t.onHideMenu.dispatch(t);
9669          },
9670  
9671          add : function(o) {
9672              var t = this, co;
9673  
9674              o = t.parent(o);
9675  
9676              if (t.isRendered && (co = DOM.get('menu_' + t.id)))
9677                  t._add(DOM.select('tbody', co)[0], o);
9678  
9679              return o;
9680          },
9681  
9682          collapse : function(d) {
9683              this.parent(d);
9684              this.hideMenu(1);
9685          },
9686  
9687          remove : function(o) {
9688              DOM.remove(o.id);
9689              this.destroy();
9690  
9691              return this.parent(o);
9692          },
9693  
9694          destroy : function() {
9695              var t = this, co = DOM.get('menu_' + t.id);
9696  
9697              if (t.keyboardNav) t.keyboardNav.destroy();
9698              Event.remove(co, 'mouseover', t.mouseOverFunc);
9699              Event.remove(DOM.select('a', co), 'focus', t.mouseOverFunc);
9700              Event.remove(co, 'click', t.mouseClickFunc);
9701              Event.remove(co, 'keydown', t._keyHandler);
9702  
9703              if (t.element)
9704                  t.element.remove();
9705  
9706              DOM.remove(co);
9707          },
9708  
9709          renderNode : function() {
9710              var t = this, s = t.settings, n, tb, co, w;
9711  
9712              w = DOM.create('div', {role: 'listbox', id : 'menu_' + t.id, 'class' : s['class'], 'style' : 'position:absolute;left:0;top:0;z-index:200000;outline:0'});
9713              if (t.settings.parent) {
9714                  DOM.setAttrib(w, 'aria-parent', 'menu_' + t.settings.parent.id);
9715              }
9716              co = DOM.add(w, 'div', {role: 'presentation', id : 'menu_' + t.id + '_co', 'class' : t.classPrefix + (s['class'] ? ' ' + s['class'] : '')});
9717              t.element = new Element('menu_' + t.id, {blocker : 1, container : s.container});
9718  
9719              if (s.menu_line)
9720                  DOM.add(co, 'span', {'class' : t.classPrefix + 'Line'});
9721  
9722  //            n = DOM.add(co, 'div', {id : 'menu_' + t.id + '_co', 'class' : 'mceMenuContainer'});
9723              n = DOM.add(co, 'table', {role: 'presentation', id : 'menu_' + t.id + '_tbl', border : 0, cellPadding : 0, cellSpacing : 0});
9724              tb = DOM.add(n, 'tbody');
9725  
9726              each(t.items, function(o) {
9727                  t._add(tb, o);
9728              });
9729  
9730              t.rendered = true;
9731  
9732              return w;
9733          },
9734  
9735          // Internal functions
9736          _setupKeyboardNav : function(){
9737              var contextMenu, menuItems, t=this; 
9738              contextMenu = DOM.get('menu_' + t.id);
9739              menuItems = DOM.select('a[role=option]', 'menu_' + t.id);
9740              menuItems.splice(0,0,contextMenu);
9741              t.keyboardNav = new tinymce.ui.KeyboardNavigation({
9742                  root: 'menu_' + t.id,
9743                  items: menuItems,
9744                  onCancel: function() {
9745                      t.hideMenu();
9746                  },
9747                  enableUpDown: true
9748              });
9749              contextMenu.focus();
9750          },
9751  
9752          _keyHandler : function(evt) {
9753              var t = this, e;
9754              switch (evt.keyCode) {
9755                  case 37: // Left
9756                      if (t.settings.parent) {
9757                          t.hideMenu();
9758                          t.settings.parent.focus();
9759                          Event.cancel(evt);
9760                      }
9761                      break;
9762                  case 39: // Right
9763                      if (t.mouseOverFunc)
9764                          t.mouseOverFunc(evt);
9765                      break;
9766              }
9767          },
9768  
9769          _add : function(tb, o) {
9770              var n, s = o.settings, a, ro, it, cp = this.classPrefix, ic;
9771  
9772              if (s.separator) {
9773                  ro = DOM.add(tb, 'tr', {id : o.id, 'class' : cp + 'ItemSeparator'});
9774                  DOM.add(ro, 'td', {'class' : cp + 'ItemSeparator'});
9775  
9776                  if (n = ro.previousSibling)
9777                      DOM.addClass(n, 'mceLast');
9778  
9779                  return;
9780              }
9781  
9782              n = ro = DOM.add(tb, 'tr', {id : o.id, 'class' : cp + 'Item ' + cp + 'ItemEnabled'});
9783              n = it = DOM.add(n, s.titleItem ? 'th' : 'td');
9784              n = a = DOM.add(n, 'a', {id: o.id + '_aria',  role: s.titleItem ? 'presentation' : 'option', href : 'javascript:;', onclick : "return false;", onmousedown : 'return false;'});
9785  
9786              if (s.parent) {
9787                  DOM.setAttrib(a, 'aria-haspopup', 'true');
9788                  DOM.setAttrib(a, 'aria-owns', 'menu_' + o.id);
9789              }
9790  
9791              DOM.addClass(it, s['class']);
9792  //            n = DOM.add(n, 'span', {'class' : 'item'});
9793  
9794              ic = DOM.add(n, 'span', {'class' : 'mceIcon' + (s.icon ? ' mce_' + s.icon : '')});
9795  
9796              if (s.icon_src)
9797                  DOM.add(ic, 'img', {src : s.icon_src});
9798  
9799              n = DOM.add(n, s.element || 'span', {'class' : 'mceText', title : o.settings.title}, o.settings.title);
9800  
9801              if (o.settings.style)
9802                  DOM.setAttrib(n, 'style', o.settings.style);
9803  
9804              if (tb.childNodes.length == 1)
9805                  DOM.addClass(ro, 'mceFirst');
9806  
9807              if ((n = ro.previousSibling) && DOM.hasClass(n, cp + 'ItemSeparator'))
9808                  DOM.addClass(ro, 'mceFirst');
9809  
9810              if (o.collapse)
9811                  DOM.addClass(ro, cp + 'ItemSub');
9812  
9813              if (n = ro.previousSibling)
9814                  DOM.removeClass(n, 'mceLast');
9815  
9816              DOM.addClass(ro, 'mceLast');
9817          }
9818      });
9819  })(tinymce);
9820  (function(tinymce) {
9821      var DOM = tinymce.DOM;
9822  
9823      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.Button:tinymce.ui.Control', {
9824          Button : function(id, s, ed) {
9825              this.parent(id, s, ed);
9826              this.classPrefix = 'mceButton';
9827          },
9828  
9829          renderHTML : function() {
9830              var cp = this.classPrefix, s = this.settings, h, l;
9831  
9832              l = DOM.encode(s.label || '');
9833              h = '<a role="button" id="' + this.id + '" href="javascript:;" class="' + cp + ' ' + cp + 'Enabled ' + s['class'] + (l ? ' ' + cp + 'Labeled' : '') +'" onmousedown="return false;" onclick="return false;" aria-labelledby="' + this.id + '_voice" title="' + DOM.encode(s.title) + '">';
9834              if (s.image && !(this.editor  &&this.editor.forcedHighContrastMode) )
9835                  h += '<img class="mceIcon" src="' + s.image + '" alt="' + DOM.encode(s.title) + '" />' + l;
9836              else
9837                  h += '<span class="mceIcon ' + s['class'] + '"></span>' + (l ? '<span class="' + cp + 'Label">' + l + '</span>' : '');
9838  
9839              h += '<span class="mceVoiceLabel mceIconOnly" style="display: none;" id="' + this.id + '_voice">' + s.title + '</span>'; 
9840              h += '</a>';
9841              return h;
9842          },
9843  
9844          postRender : function() {
9845              var t = this, s = t.settings, bookmark;
9846  
9847              // In IE a large image that occupies the entire editor area will be deselected when a button is clicked, so
9848              // need to keep the selection in case the selection is lost
9849              if (tinymce.isIE && t.editor) {
9850                  tinymce.dom.Event.add(t.id, 'mousedown', function(e) {
9851                      bookmark = t.editor.selection.getBookmark();
9852                  });
9853              }
9854              tinymce.dom.Event.add(t.id, 'click', function(e) {
9855                  if (!t.isDisabled()) {
9856                      // restore the selection in case the selection is lost in IE
9857                      if (tinymce.isIE && t.editor && bookmark) {
9858                          tinymce.activeEditor.selection.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
9859                      }
9860                      return s.onclick.call(s.scope, e);
9861                  }
9862              });
9863              tinymce.dom.Event.add(t.id, 'keyup', function(e) {
9864                  if (!t.isDisabled() && e.keyCode==tinymce.VK.SPACEBAR)
9865                      return s.onclick.call(s.scope, e);
9866              });
9867          }
9868      });
9869  })(tinymce);
9870  
9871  (function(tinymce) {
9872      var DOM = tinymce.DOM, Event = tinymce.dom.Event, each = tinymce.each, Dispatcher = tinymce.util.Dispatcher;
9873  
9874      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.ListBox:tinymce.ui.Control', {
9875          ListBox : function(id, s, ed) {
9876              var t = this;
9877  
9878              t.parent(id, s, ed);
9879  
9880              t.items = [];
9881  
9882              t.onChange = new Dispatcher(t);
9883  
9884              t.onPostRender = new Dispatcher(t);
9885  
9886              t.onAdd = new Dispatcher(t);
9887  
9888              t.onRenderMenu = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(this);
9889  
9890              t.classPrefix = 'mceListBox';
9891          },
9892  
9893          select : function(va) {
9894              var t = this, fv, f;
9895  
9896              if (va == undefined)
9897                  return t.selectByIndex(-1);
9898  
9899              // Is string or number make function selector
9900              if (va && va.call)
9901                  f = va;
9902              else {
9903                  f = function(v) {
9904                      return v == va;
9905                  };
9906              }
9907  
9908              // Do we need to do something?
9909              if (va != t.selectedValue) {
9910                  // Find item
9911                  each(t.items, function(o, i) {
9912                      if (f(o.value)) {
9913                          fv = 1;
9914                          t.selectByIndex(i);
9915                          return false;
9916                      }
9917                  });
9918  
9919                  if (!fv)
9920                      t.selectByIndex(-1);
9921              }
9922          },
9923  
9924          selectByIndex : function(idx) {
9925              var t = this, e, o, label;
9926  
9927              if (idx != t.selectedIndex) {
9928                  e = DOM.get(t.id + '_text');
9929                  label = DOM.get(t.id + '_voiceDesc');
9930                  o = t.items[idx];
9931  
9932                  if (o) {
9933                      t.selectedValue = o.value;
9934                      t.selectedIndex = idx;
9935                      DOM.setHTML(e, DOM.encode(o.title));
9936                      DOM.setHTML(label, t.settings.title + " - " + o.title);
9937                      DOM.removeClass(e, 'mceTitle');
9938                      DOM.setAttrib(t.id, 'aria-valuenow', o.title);
9939                  } else {
9940                      DOM.setHTML(e, DOM.encode(t.settings.title));
9941                      DOM.setHTML(label, DOM.encode(t.settings.title));
9942                      DOM.addClass(e, 'mceTitle');
9943                      t.selectedValue = t.selectedIndex = null;
