9944                      DOM.setAttrib(t.id, 'aria-valuenow', t.settings.title);
9945                  }
9946                  e = 0;
9947              }
9948          },
9949  
9950          add : function(n, v, o) {
9951              var t = this;
9952  
9953              o = o || {};
9954              o = tinymce.extend(o, {
9955                  title : n,
9956                  value : v
9957              });
9958  
9959              t.items.push(o);
9960              t.onAdd.dispatch(t, o);
9961          },
9962  
9963          getLength : function() {
9964              return this.items.length;
9965          },
9966  
9967          renderHTML : function() {
9968              var h = '', t = this, s = t.settings, cp = t.classPrefix;
9969  
9970              h = '<span role="listbox" aria-haspopup="true" aria-labelledby="' + t.id +'_voiceDesc" aria-describedby="' + t.id + '_voiceDesc"><table role="presentation" tabindex="0" id="' + t.id + '" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="' + cp + ' ' + cp + 'Enabled' + (s['class'] ? (' ' + s['class']) : '') + '"><tbody><tr>';
9971              h += '<td>' + DOM.createHTML('span', {id: t.id + '_voiceDesc', 'class': 'voiceLabel', style:'display:none;'}, t.settings.title); 
9972              h += DOM.createHTML('a', {id : t.id + '_text', tabindex : -1, href : 'javascript:;', 'class' : 'mceText', onclick : "return false;", onmousedown : 'return false;'}, DOM.encode(t.settings.title)) + '</td>';
9973              h += '<td>' + DOM.createHTML('a', {id : t.id + '_open', tabindex : -1, href : 'javascript:;', 'class' : 'mceOpen', onclick : "return false;", onmousedown : 'return false;'}, '<span><span style="display:none;" class="mceIconOnly" aria-hidden="true">\u25BC</span></span>') + '</td>';
9974              h += '</tr></tbody></table></span>';
9975  
9976              return h;
9977          },
9978  
9979          showMenu : function() {
9980              var t = this, p2, e = DOM.get(this.id), m;
9981  
9982              if (t.isDisabled() || t.items.length == 0)
9983                  return;
9984  
9985              if (t.menu && t.menu.isMenuVisible)
9986                  return t.hideMenu();
9987  
9988              if (!t.isMenuRendered) {
9989                  t.renderMenu();
9990                  t.isMenuRendered = true;
9991              }
9992  
9993              p2 = DOM.getPos(e);
9994  
9995              m = t.menu;
9996              m.settings.offset_x = p2.x;
9997              m.settings.offset_y = p2.y;
9998              m.settings.keyboard_focus = !tinymce.isOpera; // Opera is buggy when it comes to auto focus
9999  
10000              // Select in menu
10001              if (t.oldID)
10002                  m.items[t.oldID].setSelected(0);
10003  
10004              each(t.items, function(o) {
10005                  if (o.value === t.selectedValue) {
10006                      m.items[o.id].setSelected(1);
10007                      t.oldID = o.id;
10008                  }
10009              });
10010  
10011              m.showMenu(0, e.clientHeight);
10012  
10013              Event.add(DOM.doc, 'mousedown', t.hideMenu, t);
10014              DOM.addClass(t.id, t.classPrefix + 'Selected');
10015  
10016              //DOM.get(t.id + '_text').focus();
10017          },
10018  
10019          hideMenu : function(e) {
10020              var t = this;
10021  
10022              if (t.menu && t.menu.isMenuVisible) {
10023                  DOM.removeClass(t.id, t.classPrefix + 'Selected');
10024  
10025                  // Prevent double toogles by canceling the mouse click event to the button
10026                  if (e && e.type == "mousedown" && (e.target.id == t.id + '_text' || e.target.id == t.id + '_open'))
10027                      return;
10028  
10029                  if (!e || !DOM.getParent(e.target, '.mceMenu')) {
10030                      DOM.removeClass(t.id, t.classPrefix + 'Selected');
10031                      Event.remove(DOM.doc, 'mousedown', t.hideMenu, t);
10032                      t.menu.hideMenu();
10033                  }
10034              }
10035          },
10036  
10037          renderMenu : function() {
10038              var t = this, m;
10039  
10040              m = t.settings.control_manager.createDropMenu(t.id + '_menu', {
10041                  menu_line : 1,
10042                  'class' : t.classPrefix + 'Menu mceNoIcons',
10043                  max_width : 150,
10044                  max_height : 150
10045              });
10046  
10047              m.onHideMenu.add(function() {
10048                  t.hideMenu();
10049                  t.focus();
10050              });
10051  
10052              m.add({
10053                  title : t.settings.title,
10054                  'class' : 'mceMenuItemTitle',
10055                  onclick : function() {
10056                      if (t.settings.onselect('') !== false)
10057                          t.select(''); // Must be runned after
10058                  }
10059              });
10060  
10061              each(t.items, function(o) {
10062                  // No value then treat it as a title
10063                  if (o.value === undefined) {
10064                      m.add({
10065                          title : o.title,
10066                          role : "option",
10067                          'class' : 'mceMenuItemTitle',
10068                          onclick : function() {
10069                              if (t.settings.onselect('') !== false)
10070                                  t.select(''); // Must be runned after
10071                          }
10072                      });
10073                  } else {
10074                      o.id = DOM.uniqueId();
10075                      o.role= "option";
10076                      o.onclick = function() {
10077                          if (t.settings.onselect(o.value) !== false)
10078                              t.select(o.value); // Must be runned after
10079                      };
10080  
10081                      m.add(o);
10082                  }
10083              });
10084  
10085              t.onRenderMenu.dispatch(t, m);
10086              t.menu = m;
10087          },
10088  
10089          postRender : function() {
10090              var t = this, cp = t.classPrefix;
10091  
10092              Event.add(t.id, 'click', t.showMenu, t);
10093              Event.add(t.id, 'keydown', function(evt) {
10094                  if (evt.keyCode == 32) { // Space
10095                      t.showMenu(evt);
10096                      Event.cancel(evt);
10097                  }
10098              });
10099              Event.add(t.id, 'focus', function() {
10100                  if (!t._focused) {
10101                      t.keyDownHandler = Event.add(t.id, 'keydown', function(e) {
10102                          if (e.keyCode == 40) {
10103                              t.showMenu();
10104                              Event.cancel(e);
10105                          }
10106                      });
10107                      t.keyPressHandler = Event.add(t.id, 'keypress', function(e) {
10108                          var v;
10109                          if (e.keyCode == 13) {
10110                              // Fake select on enter
10111                              v = t.selectedValue;
10112                              t.selectedValue = null; // Needs to be null to fake change
10113                              Event.cancel(e);
10114                              t.settings.onselect(v);
10115                          }
10116                      });
10117                  }
10118  
10119                  t._focused = 1;
10120              });
10121              Event.add(t.id, 'blur', function() {
10122                  Event.remove(t.id, 'keydown', t.keyDownHandler);
10123                  Event.remove(t.id, 'keypress', t.keyPressHandler);
10124                  t._focused = 0;
10125              });
10126  
10127              // Old IE doesn't have hover on all elements
10128              if (tinymce.isIE6 || !DOM.boxModel) {
10129                  Event.add(t.id, 'mouseover', function() {
10130                      if (!DOM.hasClass(t.id, cp + 'Disabled'))
10131                          DOM.addClass(t.id, cp + 'Hover');
10132                  });
10133  
10134                  Event.add(t.id, 'mouseout', function() {
10135                      if (!DOM.hasClass(t.id, cp + 'Disabled'))
10136                          DOM.removeClass(t.id, cp + 'Hover');
10137                  });
10138              }
10139  
10140              t.onPostRender.dispatch(t, DOM.get(t.id));
10141          },
10142  
10143          destroy : function() {
10144              this.parent();
10145  
10146              Event.clear(this.id + '_text');
10147              Event.clear(this.id + '_open');
10148          }
10149      });
10150  })(tinymce);
10151  
10152  (function(tinymce) {
10153      var DOM = tinymce.DOM, Event = tinymce.dom.Event, each = tinymce.each, Dispatcher = tinymce.util.Dispatcher;
10154  
10155      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.NativeListBox:tinymce.ui.ListBox', {
10156          NativeListBox : function(id, s) {
10157              this.parent(id, s);
10158              this.classPrefix = 'mceNativeListBox';
10159          },
10160  
10161          setDisabled : function(s) {
10162              DOM.get(this.id).disabled = s;
10163              this.setAriaProperty('disabled', s);
10164          },
10165  
10166          isDisabled : function() {
10167              return DOM.get(this.id).disabled;
10168          },
10169  
10170          select : function(va) {
10171              var t = this, fv, f;
10172  
10173              if (va == undefined)
10174                  return t.selectByIndex(-1);
10175  
10176              // Is string or number make function selector
10177              if (va && va.call)
10178                  f = va;
10179              else {
10180                  f = function(v) {
10181                      return v == va;
10182                  };
10183              }
10184  
10185              // Do we need to do something?
10186              if (va != t.selectedValue) {
10187                  // Find item
10188                  each(t.items, function(o, i) {
10189                      if (f(o.value)) {
10190                          fv = 1;
10191                          t.selectByIndex(i);
10192                          return false;
10193                      }
10194                  });
10195  
10196                  if (!fv)
10197                      t.selectByIndex(-1);
10198              }
10199          },
10200  
10201          selectByIndex : function(idx) {
10202              DOM.get(this.id).selectedIndex = idx + 1;
10203              this.selectedValue = this.items[idx] ? this.items[idx].value : null;
10204          },
10205  
10206          add : function(n, v, a) {
10207              var o, t = this;
10208  
10209              a = a || {};
10210              a.value = v;
10211  
10212              if (t.isRendered())
10213                  DOM.add(DOM.get(this.id), 'option', a, n);
10214  
10215              o = {
10216                  title : n,
10217                  value : v,
10218                  attribs : a
10219              };
10220  
10221              t.items.push(o);
10222              t.onAdd.dispatch(t, o);
10223          },
10224  
10225          getLength : function() {
10226              return this.items.length;
10227          },
10228  
10229          renderHTML : function() {
10230              var h, t = this;
10231  
10232              h = DOM.createHTML('option', {value : ''}, '-- ' + t.settings.title + ' --');
10233  
10234              each(t.items, function(it) {
10235                  h += DOM.createHTML('option', {value : it.value}, it.title);
10236              });
10237  
10238              h = DOM.createHTML('select', {id : t.id, 'class' : 'mceNativeListBox', 'aria-labelledby': t.id + '_aria'}, h);
10239              h += DOM.createHTML('span', {id : t.id + '_aria', 'style': 'display: none'}, t.settings.title);
10240              return h;
10241          },
10242  
10243          postRender : function() {
10244              var t = this, ch, changeListenerAdded = true;
10245  
10246              t.rendered = true;
10247  
10248  			function onChange(e) {
10249                  var v = t.items[e.target.selectedIndex - 1];
10250  
10251                  if (v && (v = v.value)) {
10252                      t.onChange.dispatch(t, v);
10253  
10254                      if (t.settings.onselect)
10255                          t.settings.onselect(v);
10256                  }
10257              };
10258  
10259              Event.add(t.id, 'change', onChange);
10260  
10261              // Accessibility keyhandler
10262              Event.add(t.id, 'keydown', function(e) {
10263                  var bf;
10264  
10265                  Event.remove(t.id, 'change', ch);
10266                  changeListenerAdded = false;
10267  
10268                  bf = Event.add(t.id, 'blur', function() {
10269                      if (changeListenerAdded) return;
10270                      changeListenerAdded = true;
10271                      Event.add(t.id, 'change', onChange);
10272                      Event.remove(t.id, 'blur', bf);
10273                  });
10274  
10275                  //prevent default left and right keys on chrome - so that the keyboard navigation is used.
10276                  if (tinymce.isWebKit && (e.keyCode==37 ||e.keyCode==39)) {
10277                      return Event.prevent(e);
10278                  }
10279                  
10280                  if (e.keyCode == 13 || e.keyCode == 32) {
10281                      onChange(e);
10282                      return Event.cancel(e);
10283                  }
10284              });
10285  
10286              t.onPostRender.dispatch(t, DOM.get(t.id));
10287          }
10288      });
10289  })(tinymce);
10290  
10291  (function(tinymce) {
10292      var DOM = tinymce.DOM, Event = tinymce.dom.Event, each = tinymce.each;
10293  
10294      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.MenuButton:tinymce.ui.Button', {
10295          MenuButton : function(id, s, ed) {
10296              this.parent(id, s, ed);
10297  
10298              this.onRenderMenu = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(this);
10299  
10300              s.menu_container = s.menu_container || DOM.doc.body;
10301          },
10302  
10303          showMenu : function() {
10304              var t = this, p1, p2, e = DOM.get(t.id), m;
10305  
10306              if (t.isDisabled())
10307                  return;
10308  
10309              if (!t.isMenuRendered) {
10310                  t.renderMenu();
10311                  t.isMenuRendered = true;
10312              }
10313  
10314              if (t.isMenuVisible)
10315                  return t.hideMenu();
10316  
10317              p1 = DOM.getPos(t.settings.menu_container);
10318              p2 = DOM.getPos(e);
10319  
10320              m = t.menu;
10321              m.settings.offset_x = p2.x;
10322              m.settings.offset_y = p2.y;
10323              m.settings.vp_offset_x = p2.x;
10324              m.settings.vp_offset_y = p2.y;
10325              m.settings.keyboard_focus = t._focused;
10326              m.showMenu(0, e.clientHeight);
10327  
10328              Event.add(DOM.doc, 'mousedown', t.hideMenu, t);
10329              t.setState('Selected', 1);
10330  
10331              t.isMenuVisible = 1;
10332          },
10333  
10334          renderMenu : function() {
10335              var t = this, m;
10336  
10337              m = t.settings.control_manager.createDropMenu(t.id + '_menu', {
10338                  menu_line : 1,
10339                  'class' : this.classPrefix + 'Menu',
10340                  icons : t.settings.icons
10341              });
10342  
10343              m.onHideMenu.add(function() {
10344                  t.hideMenu();
10345                  t.focus();
10346              });
10347  
10348              t.onRenderMenu.dispatch(t, m);
10349              t.menu = m;
10350          },
10351  
10352          hideMenu : function(e) {
10353              var t = this;
10354  
10355              // Prevent double toogles by canceling the mouse click event to the button
10356              if (e && e.type == "mousedown" && DOM.getParent(e.target, function(e) {return e.id === t.id || e.id === t.id + '_open';}))
10357                  return;
10358  
10359              if (!e || !DOM.getParent(e.target, '.mceMenu')) {
10360                  t.setState('Selected', 0);
10361                  Event.remove(DOM.doc, 'mousedown', t.hideMenu, t);
10362                  if (t.menu)
10363                      t.menu.hideMenu();
10364              }
10365  
10366              t.isMenuVisible = 0;
10367          },
10368  
10369          postRender : function() {
10370              var t = this, s = t.settings;
10371  
10372              Event.add(t.id, 'click', function() {
10373                  if (!t.isDisabled()) {
10374                      if (s.onclick)
10375                          s.onclick(t.value);
10376  
10377                      t.showMenu();
10378                  }
10379              });
10380          }
10381      });
10382  })(tinymce);
10383  
10384  (function(tinymce) {
10385      var DOM = tinymce.DOM, Event = tinymce.dom.Event, each = tinymce.each;
10386  
10387      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.SplitButton:tinymce.ui.MenuButton', {
10388          SplitButton : function(id, s, ed) {
10389              this.parent(id, s, ed);
10390              this.classPrefix = 'mceSplitButton';
10391          },
10392  
10393          renderHTML : function() {
10394              var h, t = this, s = t.settings, h1;
10395  
10396              h = '<tbody><tr>';
10397  
10398              if (s.image)
10399                  h1 = DOM.createHTML('img ', {src : s.image, role: 'presentation', 'class' : 'mceAction ' + s['class']});
10400              else
10401                  h1 = DOM.createHTML('span', {'class' : 'mceAction ' + s['class']}, '');
10402  
10403              h1 += DOM.createHTML('span', {'class': 'mceVoiceLabel mceIconOnly', id: t.id + '_voice', style: 'display:none;'}, s.title);
10404              h += '<td >' + DOM.createHTML('a', {role: 'button', id : t.id + '_action', tabindex: '-1', href : 'javascript:;', 'class' : 'mceAction ' + s['class'], onclick : "return false;", onmousedown : 'return false;', title : s.title}, h1) + '</td>';
10405      
10406              h1 = DOM.createHTML('span', {'class' : 'mceOpen ' + s['class']}, '<span style="display:none;" class="mceIconOnly" aria-hidden="true">\u25BC</span>');
10407              h += '<td >' + DOM.createHTML('a', {role: 'button', id : t.id + '_open', tabindex: '-1', href : 'javascript:;', 'class' : 'mceOpen ' + s['class'], onclick : "return false;", onmousedown : 'return false;', title : s.title}, h1) + '</td>';
10408  
10409              h += '</tr></tbody>';
10410              h = DOM.createHTML('table', { role: 'presentation',   'class' : 'mceSplitButton mceSplitButtonEnabled ' + s['class'], cellpadding : '0', cellspacing : '0', title : s.title}, h);
10411              return DOM.createHTML('div', {id : t.id, role: 'button', tabindex: '0', 'aria-labelledby': t.id + '_voice', 'aria-haspopup': 'true'}, h);
10412          },
10413  
10414          postRender : function() {
10415              var t = this, s = t.settings, activate;
10416  
10417              if (s.onclick) {
10418                  activate = function(evt) {
10419                      if (!t.isDisabled()) {
10420                          s.onclick(t.value);
10421                          Event.cancel(evt);
10422                      }
10423                  };
10424                  Event.add(t.id + '_action', 'click', activate);
10425                  Event.add(t.id, ['click', 'keydown'], function(evt) {
10426                      var DOM_VK_SPACE = 32, DOM_VK_ENTER = 14, DOM_VK_RETURN = 13, DOM_VK_UP = 38, DOM_VK_DOWN = 40;
10427                      if ((evt.keyCode === 32 || evt.keyCode === 13 || evt.keyCode === 14) && !evt.altKey && !evt.ctrlKey && !evt.metaKey) {
10428                          activate();
10429                          Event.cancel(evt);
10430                      } else if (evt.type === 'click' || evt.keyCode === DOM_VK_DOWN) {
10431                          t.showMenu();
10432                          Event.cancel(evt);
10433                      }
10434                  });
10435              }
10436  
10437              Event.add(t.id + '_open', 'click', function (evt) {
10438                  t.showMenu();
10439                  Event.cancel(evt);
10440              });
10441              Event.add([t.id, t.id + '_open'], 'focus', function() {t._focused = 1;});
10442              Event.add([t.id, t.id + '_open'], 'blur', function() {t._focused = 0;});
10443  
10444              // Old IE doesn't have hover on all elements
10445              if (tinymce.isIE6 || !DOM.boxModel) {
10446                  Event.add(t.id, 'mouseover', function() {
10447                      if (!DOM.hasClass(t.id, 'mceSplitButtonDisabled'))
10448                          DOM.addClass(t.id, 'mceSplitButtonHover');
10449                  });
10450  
10451                  Event.add(t.id, 'mouseout', function() {
10452                      if (!DOM.hasClass(t.id, 'mceSplitButtonDisabled'))
10453                          DOM.removeClass(t.id, 'mceSplitButtonHover');
10454                  });
10455              }
10456          },
10457  
10458          destroy : function() {
10459              this.parent();
10460  
10461              Event.clear(this.id + '_action');
10462              Event.clear(this.id + '_open');
10463              Event.clear(this.id);
10464          }
10465      });
10466  })(tinymce);
10467  
10468  (function(tinymce) {
10469      var DOM = tinymce.DOM, Event = tinymce.dom.Event, is = tinymce.is, each = tinymce.each;
10470  
10471      tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.ColorSplitButton:tinymce.ui.SplitButton', {
10472          ColorSplitButton : function(id, s, ed) {
10473              var t = this;
10474  
10475              t.parent(id, s, ed);
10476  
10477              t.settings = s = tinymce.extend({
10478                  colors : '000000,993300,333300,003300,003366,000080,333399,333333,800000,FF6600,808000,008000,008080,0000FF,666699,808080,FF0000,FF9900,99CC00,339966,33CCCC,3366FF,800080,999999,FF00FF,FFCC00,FFFF00,00FF00,00FFFF,00CCFF,993366,C0C0C0,FF99CC,FFCC99,FFFF99,CCFFCC,CCFFFF,99CCFF,CC99FF,FFFFFF',
10479                  grid_width : 8,
10480                  default_color : '#888888'
10481              }, t.settings);
10482  
10483              t.onShowMenu = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(t);
10484  
10485              t.onHideMenu = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(t);
10486  
10487              t.value = s.default_color;
10488          },
10489  
10490          showMenu : function() {
10491              var t = this, r, p, e, p2;
10492  
10493              if (t.isDisabled())
10494                  return;
10495  
10496              if (!t.isMenuRendered) {
10497                  t.renderMenu();
10498                  t.isMenuRendered = true;
10499              }
10500  
10501              if (t.isMenuVisible)
10502                  return t.hideMenu();
10503  
10504              e = DOM.get(t.id);
10505              DOM.show(t.id + '_menu');
10506              DOM.addClass(e, 'mceSplitButtonSelected');
10507              p2 = DOM.getPos(e);
10508              DOM.setStyles(t.id + '_menu', {
10509                  left : p2.x,
10510                  top : p2.y + e.clientHeight,
10511                  zIndex : 200000
10512              });
10513              e = 0;
10514  
10515              Event.add(DOM.doc, 'mousedown', t.hideMenu, t);
10516              t.onShowMenu.dispatch(t);
10517  
10518              if (t._focused) {
10519                  t._keyHandler = Event.add(t.id + '_menu', 'keydown', function(e) {
10520                      if (e.keyCode == 27)
10521                          t.hideMenu();
10522                  });
10523  
10524                  DOM.select('a', t.id + '_menu')[0].focus(); // Select first link
10525              }
10526  
10527              t.isMenuVisible = 1;
10528          },
10529  
10530          hideMenu : function(e) {
10531              var t = this;
10532  
10533              if (t.isMenuVisible) {
10534                  // Prevent double toogles by canceling the mouse click event to the button
10535                  if (e && e.type == "mousedown" && DOM.getParent(e.target, function(e) {return e.id === t.id + '_open';}))
10536                      return;
10537  
10538                  if (!e || !DOM.getParent(e.target, '.mceSplitButtonMenu')) {
10539                      DOM.removeClass(t.id, 'mceSplitButtonSelected');
10540                      Event.remove(DOM.doc, 'mousedown', t.hideMenu, t);
10541                      Event.remove(t.id + '_menu', 'keydown', t._keyHandler);
10542                      DOM.hide(t.id + '_menu');
10543                  }
10544  
10545                  t.isMenuVisible = 0;
10546                  t.onHideMenu.dispatch();
10547              }
10548          },
10549  
10550          renderMenu : function() {
10551              var t = this, m, i = 0, s = t.settings, n, tb, tr, w, context;
10552  
10553              w = DOM.add(s.menu_container, 'div', {role: 'listbox', id : t.id + '_menu', 'class' : s['menu_class'] + ' ' + s['class'], style : 'position:absolute;left:0;top:-1000px;'});
10554              m = DOM.add(w, 'div', {'class' : s['class'] + ' mceSplitButtonMenu'});
10555              DOM.add(m, 'span', {'class' : 'mceMenuLine'});
10556  
10557              n = DOM.add(m, 'table', {role: 'presentation', 'class' : 'mceColorSplitMenu'});
10558              tb = DOM.add(n, 'tbody');
10559  
10560              // Generate color grid
10561              i = 0;
10562              each(is(s.colors, 'array') ? s.colors : s.colors.split(','), function(c) {
10563                  c = c.replace(/^#/, '');
10564  
10565                  if (!i--) {
10566                      tr = DOM.add(tb, 'tr');
10567                      i = s.grid_width - 1;
10568                  }
10569  
10570                  n = DOM.add(tr, 'td');
10571                  var settings = {
10572                      href : 'javascript:;',
10573                      style : {
10574                          backgroundColor : '#' + c
10575                      },
10576                      'title': t.editor.getLang('colors.' + c, c),
10577                      'data-mce-color' : '#' + c
10578                  };
10579  
10580                  // adding a proper ARIA role = button causes JAWS to read things incorrectly on IE.
10581                  if (!tinymce.isIE ) {
10582                      settings['role']= 'option';
10583                  }
10584  
10585                  n = DOM.add(n, 'a', settings);
10586  
10587                  if (t.editor.forcedHighContrastMode) {
10588                      n = DOM.add(n, 'canvas', { width: 16, height: 16, 'aria-hidden': 'true' });
10589                      if (n.getContext && (context = n.getContext("2d"))) {
10590                          context.fillStyle = '#' + c;
10591                          context.fillRect(0, 0, 16, 16);
10592                      } else {
10593                          // No point leaving a canvas element around if it's not supported for drawing on anyway.
10594                          DOM.remove(n);
10595                      }
10596                  }
10597              });
10598  
10599              if (s.more_colors_func) {
10600                  n = DOM.add(tb, 'tr');
10601                  n = DOM.add(n, 'td', {colspan : s.grid_width, 'class' : 'mceMoreColors'});
10602                  n = DOM.add(n, 'a', {role: 'option', id : t.id + '_more', href : 'javascript:;', onclick : 'return false;', 'class' : 'mceMoreColors'}, s.more_colors_title);
10603  
10604                  Event.add(n, 'click', function(e) {
10605                      s.more_colors_func.call(s.more_colors_scope || this);
10606                      return Event.cancel(e); // Cancel to fix onbeforeunload problem
10607                  });
10608              }
10609  
10610              DOM.addClass(m, 'mceColorSplitMenu');
10611              
10612              new tinymce.ui.KeyboardNavigation({
10613                  root: t.id + '_menu',
10614                  items: DOM.select('a', t.id + '_menu'),
10615                  onCancel: function() {
10616                      t.hideMenu();
10617                      t.focus();
10618                  }
10619              });
10620  
10621              // Prevent IE from scrolling and hindering click to occur #4019
10622              Event.add(t.id + '_menu', 'mousedown', function(e) {return Event.cancel(e);});
10623  
10624              Event.add(t.id + '_menu', 'click', function(e) {
10625                  var c;
10626  
10627                  e = DOM.getParent(e.target, 'a', tb);
10628  
10629                  if (e && e.nodeName.toLowerCase() == 'a' && (c = e.getAttribute('data-mce-color')))
10630                      t.setColor(c);
10631  
10632                  return Event.cancel(e); // Prevent IE auto save warning
10633              });
10634  
10635              return w;
10636          },
10637  
10638          setColor : function(c) {
10639              this.displayColor(c);
10640              this.hideMenu();
10641              this.settings.onselect(c);
10642          },
10643          
10644          displayColor : function(c) {
10645              var t = this;
10646  
10647              DOM.setStyle(t.id + '_preview', 'backgroundColor', c);
10648  
10649              t.value = c;
10650          },
10651  
10652          postRender : function() {
10653              var t = this, id = t.id;
10654  
10655              t.parent();
10656              DOM.add(id + '_action', 'div', {id : id + '_preview', 'class' : 'mceColorPreview'});
10657              DOM.setStyle(t.id + '_preview', 'backgroundColor', t.value);
10658          },
10659  
10660          destroy : function() {
10661              this.parent();
10662  
10663              Event.clear(this.id + '_menu');
10664              Event.clear(this.id + '_more');
10665              DOM.remove(this.id + '_menu');
10666          }
10667      });
10668  })(tinymce);
10669  
10670  (function(tinymce) {
10671  // Shorten class names
10672  var dom = tinymce.DOM, each = tinymce.each, Event = tinymce.dom.Event;
10673  tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.ToolbarGroup:tinymce.ui.Container', {
10674      renderHTML : function() {
10675          var t = this, h = [], controls = t.controls, each = tinymce.each, settings = t.settings;
10676  
10677          h.push('<div id="' + t.id + '" role="group" aria-labelledby="' + t.id + '_voice">');
10678          //TODO: ACC test this out - adding a role = application for getting the landmarks working well.
10679          h.push("<span role='application'>");
10680          h.push('<span id="' + t.id + '_voice" class="mceVoiceLabel" style="display:none;">' + dom.encode(settings.name) + '</span>');
10681          each(controls, function(toolbar) {
10682              h.push(toolbar.renderHTML());
10683          });
10684          h.push("</span>");
10685          h.push('</div>');
10686  
10687          return h.join('');
10688      },
10689      
10690      focus : function() {
10691          var t = this;
10692          dom.get(t.id).focus();
10693      },
10694      
10695      postRender : function() {
10696          var t = this, items = [];
10697  
10698          each(t.controls, function(toolbar) {
10699              each (toolbar.controls, function(control) {
10700                  if (control.id) {
10701                      items.push(control);
10702                  }
10703              });
10704          });
10705  
10706          t.keyNav = new tinymce.ui.KeyboardNavigation({
10707              root: t.id,
10708              items: items,
10709              onCancel: function() {
10710                  //Move focus if webkit so that navigation back will read the item.
10711                  if (tinymce.isWebKit) {
10712                      dom.get(t.editor.id+"_ifr").focus();
10713                  }
10714                  t.editor.focus();
10715              },
10716              excludeFromTabOrder: !t.settings.tab_focus_toolbar
10717          });
10718      },
10719      
10720      destroy : function() {
10721          var self = this;
10722  
10723          self.parent();
10724          self.keyNav.destroy();
10725          Event.clear(self.id);
10726      }
10727  });
10728  })(tinymce);
10729  
10730  (function(tinymce) {
10731  // Shorten class names
10732  var dom = tinymce.DOM, each = tinymce.each;
10733  tinymce.create('tinymce.ui.Toolbar:tinymce.ui.Container', {
10734      renderHTML : function() {
10735          var t = this, h = '', c, co, s = t.settings, i, pr, nx, cl;
10736  
10737          cl = t.controls;
10738          for (i=0; i<cl.length; i++) {
10739              // Get current control, prev control, next control and if the control is a list box or not
10740              co = cl[i];
10741              pr = cl[i - 1];
10742              nx = cl[i + 1];
10743  
10744              // Add toolbar start
10745              if (i === 0) {
10746                  c = 'mceToolbarStart';
10747  
10748                  if (co.Button)
10749                      c += ' mceToolbarStartButton';
10750                  else if (co.SplitButton)
10751                      c += ' mceToolbarStartSplitButton';
10752                  else if (co.ListBox)
10753                      c += ' mceToolbarStartListBox';
10754  
10755                  h += dom.createHTML('td', {'class' : c}, dom.createHTML('span', null, '<!-- IE -->'));
10756              }
10757  
10758              // Add toolbar end before list box and after the previous button
10759              // This is to fix the o2k7 editor skins
10760              if (pr && co.ListBox) {
10761                  if (pr.Button || pr.SplitButton)
10762                      h += dom.createHTML('td', {'class' : 'mceToolbarEnd'}, dom.createHTML('span', null, '<!-- IE -->'));
10763              }
10764  
10765              // Render control HTML
10766  
10767              // IE 8 quick fix, needed to propertly generate a hit area for anchors
10768              if (dom.stdMode)
10769                  h += '<td style="position: relative">' + co.renderHTML() + '</td>';
10770              else
10771                  h += '<td>' + co.renderHTML() + '</td>';
10772  
10773              // Add toolbar start after list box and before the next button
10774              // This is to fix the o2k7 editor skins
10775              if (nx && co.ListBox) {
10776                  if (nx.Button || nx.SplitButton)
10777                      h += dom.createHTML('td', {'class' : 'mceToolbarStart'}, dom.createHTML('span', null, '<!-- IE -->'));
10778              }
10779          }
10780  
10781          c = 'mceToolbarEnd';
10782  
10783          if (co.Button)
10784              c += ' mceToolbarEndButton';
10785          else if (co.SplitButton)
10786              c += ' mceToolbarEndSplitButton';
10787          else if (co.ListBox)
10788              c += ' mceToolbarEndListBox';
10789  
10790          h += dom.createHTML('td', {'class' : c}, dom.createHTML('span', null, '<!-- IE -->'));
10791  
10792          return dom.createHTML('table', {id : t.id, 'class' : 'mceToolbar' + (s['class'] ? ' ' + s['class'] : ''), cellpadding : '0', cellspacing : '0', align : t.settings.align || '', role: 'presentation', tabindex: '-1'}, '<tbody><tr>' + h + '</tr></tbody>');
10793      }
10794  });
10795  })(tinymce);
10796  
10797  (function(tinymce) {
10798      var Dispatcher = tinymce.util.Dispatcher, each = tinymce.each;
10799  
10800      tinymce.create('tinymce.AddOnManager', {
10801          AddOnManager : function() {
10802              var self = this;
10803  
10804              self.items = [];
10805              self.urls = {};
10806              self.lookup = {};
10807              self.onAdd = new Dispatcher(self);
10808          },
10809  
10810          get : function(n) {
10811              if (this.lookup[n]) {
10812                  return this.lookup[n].instance;
10813              } else {
10814                  return undefined;
10815              }
10816          },
10817  
10818          dependencies : function(n) {
10819              var result;
10820              if (this.lookup[n]) {
10821                  result = this.lookup[n].dependencies;
10822              }
10823              return result || [];
10824          },
10825  
10826          requireLangPack : function(n) {
10827              var s = tinymce.settings;
10828  
10829              if (s && s.language && s.language_load !== false)
10830                  tinymce.ScriptLoader.add(this.urls[n] + '/langs/' + s.language + '.js');
10831          },
10832  
10833          add : function(id, o, dependencies) {
10834              this.items.push(o);
10835              this.lookup[id] = {instance:o, dependencies:dependencies};
10836              this.onAdd.dispatch(this, id, o);
10837  
10838              return o;
10839          },
10840          createUrl: function(baseUrl, dep) {
10841              if (typeof dep === "object") {
10842                  return dep
10843              } else {
10844                  return {prefix: baseUrl.prefix, resource: dep, suffix: baseUrl.suffix};
10845              }
10846          },
10847  
10848          addComponents: function(pluginName, scripts) {
10849              var pluginUrl = this.urls[pluginName];
10850              tinymce.each(scripts, function(script){
10851                  tinymce.ScriptLoader.add(pluginUrl+"/"+script);    
10852              });
10853          },
10854  
10855          load : function(n, u, cb, s) {
10856              var t = this, url = u;
10857  
10858  			function loadDependencies() {
10859                  var dependencies = t.dependencies(n);
10860                  tinymce.each(dependencies, function(dep) {
10861                      var newUrl = t.createUrl(u, dep);
10862                      t.load(newUrl.resource, newUrl, undefined, undefined);
10863                  });
10864                  if (cb) {
10865                      if (s) {
10866                          cb.call(s);
10867                      } else {
10868                          cb.call(tinymce.ScriptLoader);
10869                      }
10870                  }
10871              }
10872  
10873              if (t.urls[n])
10874                  return;
10875              if (typeof u === "object")
10876                  url = u.prefix + u.resource + u.suffix;
10877  
10878              if (url.indexOf('/') != 0 && url.indexOf('://') == -1)
10879                  url = tinymce.baseURL + '/' + url;
10880  
10881              t.urls[n] = url.substring(0, url.lastIndexOf('/'));
10882  
10883              if (t.lookup[n]) {
10884                  loadDependencies();
10885              } else {
10886                  tinymce.ScriptLoader.add(url, loadDependencies, s);
10887              }
10888          }
10889      });
10890  
10891      // Create plugin and theme managers
10892      tinymce.PluginManager = new tinymce.AddOnManager();
10893      tinymce.ThemeManager = new tinymce.AddOnManager();
10894  }(tinymce));
10895  
10896  (function(tinymce) {
10897      // Shorten names
10898      var each = tinymce.each, extend = tinymce.extend,
10899          DOM = tinymce.DOM, Event = tinymce.dom.Event,
10900          ThemeManager = tinymce.ThemeManager, PluginManager = tinymce.PluginManager,
10901          explode = tinymce.explode,
10902          Dispatcher = tinymce.util.Dispatcher, undefined, instanceCounter = 0;
10903  
10904      // Setup some URLs where the editor API is located and where the document is
10905      tinymce.documentBaseURL = window.location.href.replace(/[\?#].*$/, '').replace(/[\/\\][^\/]+$/, '');
10906      if (!/[\/\\]$/.test(tinymce.documentBaseURL))
10907          tinymce.documentBaseURL += '/';
10908  
10909      tinymce.baseURL = new tinymce.util.URI(tinymce.documentBaseURL).toAbsolute(tinymce.baseURL);
10910  
10911      tinymce.baseURI = new tinymce.util.URI(tinymce.baseURL);
10912  
10913      // Add before unload listener
10914      // This was required since IE was leaking memory if you added and removed beforeunload listeners
10915      // with attachEvent/detatchEvent so this only adds one listener and instances can the attach to the onBeforeUnload event
10916      tinymce.onBeforeUnload = new Dispatcher(tinymce);
10917  
10918      // Must be on window or IE will leak if the editor is placed in frame or iframe
10919      Event.add(window, 'beforeunload', function(e) {
10920          tinymce.onBeforeUnload.dispatch(tinymce, e);
10921      });
10922  
10923      tinymce.onAddEditor = new Dispatcher(tinymce);
10924  
10925      tinymce.onRemoveEditor = new Dispatcher(tinymce);
10926  
10927      tinymce.EditorManager = extend(tinymce, {
10928          editors : [],
10929  
10930          i18n : {},
10931  
10932          activeEditor : null,
10933  
10934          init : function(s) {
10935              var t = this, pl, sl = tinymce.ScriptLoader, e, el = [], ed;
10936  
10937  			function execCallback(se, n, s) {
10938                  var f = se[n];
10939  
10940                  if (!f)
10941                      return;
10942  
10943                  if (tinymce.is(f, 'string')) {
10944                      s = f.replace(/\.\w+$/, '');
10945                      s = s ? tinymce.resolve(s) : 0;
10946                      f = tinymce.resolve(f);
10947                  }
10948  
10949                  return f.apply(s || this, Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 2));
10950              };
10951  
10952              s = extend({
10953                  theme : "simple",
10954                  language : "en"
10955              }, s);
10956  
10957              t.settings = s;
10958  
10959              // Legacy call
10960              Event.add(document, 'init', function() {
10961                  var l, co;
10962  
10963                  execCallback(s, 'onpageload');
10964  
10965                  switch (s.mode) {
10966                      case "exact":
10967                          l = s.elements || '';
10968  
10969                          if(l.length > 0) {
10970                              each(explode(l), function(v) {
10971                                  if (DOM.get(v)) {
10972                                      ed = new tinymce.Editor(v, s);
10973                                      el.push(ed);
10974                                      ed.render(1);
10975                                  } else {
10976                                      each(document.forms, function(f) {
10977                                          each(f.elements, function(e) {
10978                                              if (e.name === v) {
10979                                                  v = 'mce_editor_' + instanceCounter++;
10980                                                  DOM.setAttrib(e, 'id', v);
10981  
10982                                                  ed = new tinymce.Editor(v, s);
10983                                                  el.push(ed);
10984                                                  ed.render(1);
10985                                              }
10986                                          });
10987                                      });
10988                                  }
10989                              });
10990                          }
10991                          break;
10992  
10993                      case "textareas":
10994                      case "specific_textareas":
10995  						function hasClass(n, c) {
10996                              return c.constructor === RegExp ? c.test(n.className) : DOM.hasClass(n, c);
10997                          };
10998  
10999                          each(DOM.select('textarea'), function(v) {
11000                              if (s.editor_deselector && hasClass(v, s.editor_deselector))
11001                                  return;
11002  
11003                              if (!s.editor_selector || hasClass(v, s.editor_selector)) {
11004                                  // Can we use the name
11005                                  e = DOM.get(v.name);
11006                                  if (!v.id && !e)
11007                                      v.id = v.name;
11008  
11009                                  // Generate unique name if missing or already exists
11010                                  if (!v.id || t.get(v.id))
11011                                      v.id = DOM.uniqueId();
11012  
11013                                  ed = new tinymce.Editor(v.id, s);
11014                                  el.push(ed);
11015                                  ed.render(1);
11016                              }
11017                          });
11018                          break;
11019                  }
11020  
11021                  // Call onInit when all editors are initialized
11022                  if (s.oninit) {
11023                      l = co = 0;
11024  
11025                      each(el, function(ed) {
11026                          co++;
11027  
11028                          if (!ed.initialized) {
11029                              // Wait for it
11030                              ed.onInit.add(function() {
11031                                  l++;
11032  
11033                                  // All done
11034                                  if (l == co)
11035                                      execCallback(s, 'oninit');
11036                              });
11037                          } else
11038                              l++;
11039  
11040                          // All done
11041                          if (l == co)
11042                              execCallback(s, 'oninit');                    
11043                      });
11044                  }
11045              });
11046          },
11047  
11048          get : function(id) {
11049              if (id === undefined)
11050                  return this.editors;
11051  
11052              return this.editors[id];
11053          },
11054  
11055          getInstanceById : function(id) {
11056              return this.get(id);
11057          },
11058  
11059          add : function(editor) {
11060              var self = this, editors = self.editors;
11061  
11062              // Add named and index editor instance
11063              editors[editor.id] = editor;
11064              editors.push(editor);
11065  
11066              self._setActive(editor);
11067              self.onAddEditor.dispatch(self, editor);
11068  
11069  
11070              return editor;
11071          },
11072  
11073          remove : function(editor) {
11074              var t = this, i, editors = t.editors;
11075  
11076              // Not in the collection
11077              if (!editors[editor.id])
11078                  return null;
11079  
11080              delete editors[editor.id];
11081  
11082              for (i = 0; i < editors.length; i++) {
11083                  if (editors[i] == editor) {
11084                      editors.splice(i, 1);
11085                      break;
11086                  }
11087              }
11088  
11089              // Select another editor since the active one was removed
11090              if (t.activeEditor == editor)
11091                  t._setActive(editors[0]);
11092  
11093              editor.destroy();
11094              t.onRemoveEditor.dispatch(t, editor);
11095  
11096              return editor;
11097          },
11098  
11099          execCommand : function(c, u, v) {
11100              var t = this, ed = t.get(v), w;
11101  
11102              // Manager commands
11103              switch (c) {
11104                  case "mceFocus":
11105                      ed.focus();
11106                      return true;
11107  
11108                  case "mceAddEditor":
11109                  case "mceAddControl":
11110                      if (!t.get(v))
11111                          new tinymce.Editor(v, t.settings).render();
11112  
11113                      return true;
11114  
11115                  case "mceAddFrameControl":
11116                      w = v.window;
11117  
11118                      // Add tinyMCE global instance and tinymce namespace to specified window
11119                      w.tinyMCE = tinyMCE;
11120                      w.tinymce = tinymce;
11121  
11122                      tinymce.DOM.doc = w.document;
11123                      tinymce.DOM.win = w;
11124  
11125                      ed = new tinymce.Editor(v.element_id, v);
11126                      ed.render();
11127  
11128                      // Fix IE memory leaks
11129                      if (tinymce.isIE) {
11130  						function clr() {
11131                              ed.destroy();
11132                              w.detachEvent('onunload', clr);
11133                              w = w.tinyMCE = w.tinymce = null; // IE leak
11134                          };
11135  
11136                          w.attachEvent('onunload', clr);
11137                      }
11138  
11139                      v.page_window = null;
11140  
11141                      return true;
11142  
11143                  case "mceRemoveEditor":
11144                  case "mceRemoveControl":
11145                      if (ed)
11146                          ed.remove();
11147  
11148                      return true;
11149  
11150                  case 'mceToggleEditor':
11151                      if (!ed) {
11152                          t.execCommand('mceAddControl', 0, v);
11153                          return true;
11154                      }
11155  
11156                      if (ed.isHidden())
11157                          ed.show();
11158                      else
11159                          ed.hide();
11160  
11161                      return true;
11162              }
11163  
11164              // Run command on active editor
11165              if (t.activeEditor)
11166                  return t.activeEditor.execCommand(c, u, v);
11167  
11168              return false;
11169          },
11170  
11171          execInstanceCommand : function(id, c, u, v) {
11172              var ed = this.get(id);
11173  
11174              if (ed)
11175                  return ed.execCommand(c, u, v);
11176  
11177              return false;
11178          },
11179  
11180          triggerSave : function() {
11181              each(this.editors, function(e) {
11182                  e.save();
11183              });
11184          },
11185  
11186          addI18n : function(p, o) {
11187              var lo, i18n = this.i18n;
11188  
11189              if (!tinymce.is(p, 'string')) {
11190                  each(p, function(o, lc) {
11191                      each(o, function(o, g) {
11192                          each(o, function(o, k) {
11193                              if (g === 'common')
11194                                  i18n[lc + '.' + k] = o;
11195                              else
11196                                  i18n[lc + '.' + g + '.' + k] = o;
11197                          });
11198                      });
11199                  });
11200              } else {
11201                  each(o, function(o, k) {
11202                      i18n[p + '.' + k] = o;
11203                  });
11204              }
11205          },
11206  
11207          // Private methods
11208  
11209          _setActive : function(editor) {
11210              this.selectedInstance = this.activeEditor = editor;
11211          }
11212      });
11213  })(tinymce);
11214  
11215  (function(tinymce) {
11216      // Shorten these names
11217      var DOM = tinymce.DOM, Event = tinymce.dom.Event, extend = tinymce.extend,
11218          Dispatcher = tinymce.util.Dispatcher, each = tinymce.each, isGecko = tinymce.isGecko,
11219          isIE = tinymce.isIE, isWebKit = tinymce.isWebKit, is = tinymce.is,
11220          ThemeManager = tinymce.ThemeManager, PluginManager = tinymce.PluginManager,
11221          inArray = tinymce.inArray, grep = tinymce.grep, explode = tinymce.explode, VK = tinymce.VK;
11222  
11223      tinymce.create('tinymce.Editor', {
11224          Editor : function(id, s) {
11225              var t = this;
11226  
11227              t.id = t.editorId = id;
11228  
11229              t.execCommands = {};
11230              t.queryStateCommands = {};
11231              t.queryValueCommands = {};
11232  
11233              t.isNotDirty = false;
11234  
11235              t.plugins = {};
11236  
11237              // Add events to the editor
11238              each([
11239                  'onPreInit',
11240  
11241                  'onBeforeRenderUI',
11242  
11243                  'onPostRender',
11244  
11245                  'onLoad',
11246  
11247                  'onInit',
11248  
11249                  'onRemove',
11250  
11251                  'onActivate',
11252  
11253                  'onDeactivate',
11254  
11255                  'onClick',
11256  
11257                  'onEvent',
11258  
11259                  'onMouseUp',
11260  
11261                  'onMouseDown',
11262  
11263                  'onDblClick',
11264  
11265                  'onKeyDown',
11266  
11267                  'onKeyUp',
11268  
11269                  'onKeyPress',
11270  
11271                  'onContextMenu',
11272  
11273                  'onSubmit',
11274  
11275                  'onReset',
11276  
11277                  'onPaste',
11278  
11279                  'onPreProcess',
11280  
11281                  'onPostProcess',
11282  
11283                  'onBeforeSetContent',
11284  
11285                  'onBeforeGetContent',
11286  
11287                  'onSetContent',
11288  
11289                  'onGetContent',
11290  
11291                  'onLoadContent',
11292  
11293                  'onSaveContent',
11294  
11295                  'onNodeChange',
11296  
11297                  'onChange',
11298  
11299                  'onBeforeExecCommand',
11300  
11301                  'onExecCommand',
11302  
11303                  'onUndo',
11304  
11305                  'onRedo',
11306  
11307                  'onVisualAid',
11308  
11309                  'onSetProgressState',
11310  
11311                  'onSetAttrib'
11312              ], function(e) {
11313                  t[e] = new Dispatcher(t);
11314              });
11315  
11316              t.settings = s = extend({
11317                  id : id,
11318                  language : 'en',
11319                  docs_language : 'en',
11320                  theme : 'simple',
11321                  skin : 'default',
11322                  delta_width : 0,
11323                  delta_height : 0,
11324                  popup_css : '',
11325                  plugins : '',
11326                  document_base_url : tinymce.documentBaseURL,
11327                  add_form_submit_trigger : 1,
11328                  submit_patch : 1,
11329                  add_unload_trigger : 1,
11330                  convert_urls : 1,
11331                  relative_urls : 1,
11332                  remove_script_host : 1,
11333                  table_inline_editing : 0,
11334                  object_resizing : 1,
11335                  cleanup : 1,
11336                  accessibility_focus : 1,
11337                  custom_shortcuts : 1,
11338                  custom_undo_redo_keyboard_shortcuts : 1,
11339                  custom_undo_redo_restore_selection : 1,
11340                  custom_undo_redo : 1,
11341                  doctype : tinymce.isIE6 ? '<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">' : '<!DOCTYPE>', // Use old doctype on IE 6 to avoid horizontal scroll
11342                  visual_table_class : 'mceItemTable',
11343                  visual : 1,
11344                  font_size_style_values : 'xx-small,x-small,small,medium,large,x-large,xx-large',
11345                  font_size_legacy_values : 'xx-small,small,medium,large,x-large,xx-large,300%', // See: http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS2/fonts.html#propdef-font-size
11346                  apply_source_formatting : 1,
11347                  directionality : 'ltr',
11348                  forced_root_block : 'p',
11349                  hidden_input : 1,
11350                  padd_empty_editor : 1,
11351                  render_ui : 1,
11352                  init_theme : 1,
11353                  force_p_newlines : 1,
11354                  indentation : '30px',
11355                  keep_styles : 1,
11356                  fix_table_elements : 1,
11357                  inline_styles : 1,
11358                  convert_fonts_to_spans : true,
11359                  indent : 'simple',
11360                  indent_before : 'p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,blockquote,div,title,style,pre,script,td,ul,li,area,table,thead,tfoot,tbody,tr',
11361                  indent_after : 'p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,blockquote,div,title,style,pre,script,td,ul,li,area,table,thead,tfoot,tbody,tr',
11362                  validate : true,
11363                  entity_encoding : 'named',
11364                  url_converter : t.convertURL,
11365                  url_converter_scope : t,
11366                  ie7_compat : true
11367              }, s);
11368  
11369              t.documentBaseURI = new tinymce.util.URI(s.document_base_url || tinymce.documentBaseURL, {
11370                  base_uri : tinyMCE.baseURI
11371              });
11372  
11373              t.baseURI = tinymce.baseURI;
11374  
11375              t.contentCSS = [];
11376  
11377              // Call setup
11378              t.execCallback('setup', t);
11379          },
11380  
11381          render : function(nst) {
11382              var t = this, s = t.settings, id = t.id, sl = tinymce.ScriptLoader;
11383  
11384              // Page is not loaded yet, wait for it
11385              if (!Event.domLoaded) {
11386                  Event.add(document, 'init', function() {
11387                      t.render();
11388                  });
11389                  return;
11390              }
11391  
11392              tinyMCE.settings = s;
11393  
11394              // Element not found, then skip initialization
11395              if (!t.getElement())
11396                  return;
11397  
11398              // Is a iPad/iPhone and not on iOS5, then skip initialization. We need to sniff 
11399              // here since the browser says it has contentEditable support but there is no visible
11400              // caret We will remove this check ones Apple implements full contentEditable support
11401              if (tinymce.isIDevice && !tinymce.isIOS5)
11402                  return;
11403  
11404              // Add hidden input for non input elements inside form elements
11405              if (!/TEXTAREA|INPUT/i.test(t.getElement().nodeName) && s.hidden_input && DOM.getParent(id, 'form'))
11406                  DOM.insertAfter(DOM.create('input', {type : 'hidden', name : id}), id);
11407  
11408              if (tinymce.WindowManager)
11409                  t.windowManager = new tinymce.WindowManager(t);
11410  
11411              if (s.encoding == 'xml') {
11412                  t.onGetContent.add(function(ed, o) {
11413                      if (o.save)
11414                          o.content = DOM.encode(o.content);
11415                  });
11416              }
11417  
11418              if (s.add_form_submit_trigger) {
11419                  t.onSubmit.addToTop(function() {
11420                      if (t.initialized) {
11421                          t.save();
11422                          t.isNotDirty = 1;
11423                      }
11424                  });
11425              }
11426  
11427              if (s.add_unload_trigger) {
11428                  t._beforeUnload = tinyMCE.onBeforeUnload.add(function() {
11429                      if (t.initialized && !t.destroyed && !t.isHidden())
11430                          t.save({format : 'raw', no_events : true});
11431                  });
11432              }
11433  
11434              tinymce.addUnload(t.destroy, t);
11435  
11436              if (s.submit_patch) {
11437                  t.onBeforeRenderUI.add(function() {
11438                      var n = t.getElement().form;
11439  
11440                      if (!n)
11441                          return;
11442  
11443                      // Already patched
11444                      if (n._mceOldSubmit)
11445                          return;
11446  
11447                      // Check page uses id="submit" or name="submit" for it's submit button
11448                      if (!n.submit.nodeType && !n.submit.length) {
11449                          t.formElement = n;
11450                          n._mceOldSubmit = n.submit;
11451                          n.submit = function() {
11452                              // Save all instances
11453                              tinymce.triggerSave();
11454                              t.isNotDirty = 1;
11455  
11456                              return t.formElement._mceOldSubmit(t.formElement);
11457                          };
11458                      }
11459  
11460                      n = null;
11461                  });
11462              }
11463  
11464              // Load scripts
11465  			function loadScripts() {
11466                  if (s.language && s.language_load !== false)
11467                      sl.add(tinymce.baseURL + '/langs/' + s.language + '.js');
11468  
11469                  if (s.theme && s.theme.charAt(0) != '-' && !ThemeManager.urls[s.theme])
11470                      ThemeManager.load(s.theme, 'themes/' + s.theme + '/editor_template' + tinymce.suffix + '.js');
11471  
11472                  each(explode(s.plugins), function(p) {
11473                      if (p &&!PluginManager.urls[p]) {
11474                          if (p.charAt(0) == '-') {
11475                              p = p.substr(1, p.length);
11476                              var dependencies = PluginManager.dependencies(p);
11477                              each(dependencies, function(dep) {
11478                                  var defaultSettings = {prefix:'plugins/', resource: dep, suffix:'/editor_plugin' + tinymce.suffix + '.js'};
11479                                  var dep = PluginManager.createUrl(defaultSettings, dep);
11480                                  PluginManager.load(dep.resource, dep);
11481                                  
11482                              });
11483                          } else {
11484                              // Skip safari plugin, since it is removed as of 3.3b1
11485                              if (p == 'safari') {
11486                                  return;
11487                              }
11488                              PluginManager.load(p, {prefix:'plugins/', resource: p, suffix:'/editor_plugin' + tinymce.suffix + '.js'});
11489                          }
11490                      }
11491                  });
11492  
11493                  // Init when que is loaded
11494                  sl.loadQueue(function() {
11495                      if (!t.removed)
11496                          t.init();
11497                  });
11498              };
11499  
11500              loadScripts();
11501          },
11502  
11503          init : function() {
11504              var n, t = this, s = t.settings, w, h, e = t.getElement(), o, ti, u, bi, bc, re, i, initializedPlugins = [];
11505  
11506              tinymce.add(t);
11507  
11508              s.aria_label = s.aria_label || DOM.getAttrib(e, 'aria-label', t.getLang('aria.rich_text_area'));
11509  
11510              if (s.theme) {
11511                  s.theme = s.theme.replace(/-/, '');
11512                  o = ThemeManager.get(s.theme);
11513                  t.theme = new o();
11514  
11515                  if (t.theme.init && s.init_theme)
11516                      t.theme.init(t, ThemeManager.urls[s.theme] || tinymce.documentBaseURL.replace(/\/$/, ''));
11517              }
11518  			function initPlugin(p) {
11519                  var c = PluginManager.get(p), u = PluginManager.urls[p] || tinymce.documentBaseURL.replace(/\/$/, ''), po;
11520                  if (c && tinymce.inArray(initializedPlugins,p) === -1) {
11521                      each(PluginManager.dependencies(p), function(dep){
11522                          initPlugin(dep);
11523                      });
11524                      po = new c(t, u);
11525  
11526                      t.plugins[p] = po;
11527  
11528                      if (po.init) {
11529                          po.init(t, u);
11530                          initializedPlugins.push(p);
11531                      }
11532                  }
11533              }
11534              
11535              // Create all plugins
11536              each(explode(s.plugins.replace(/\-/g, '')), initPlugin);
11537  
11538              // Setup popup CSS path(s)
11539              if (s.popup_css !== false) {
11540                  if (s.popup_css)
11541                      s.popup_css = t.documentBaseURI.toAbsolute(s.popup_css);
11542                  else
11543                      s.popup_css = t.baseURI.toAbsolute("themes/" + s.theme + "/skins/" + s.skin + "/dialog.css");
11544              }
11545  
11546              if (s.popup_css_add)
11547                  s.popup_css += ',' + t.documentBaseURI.toAbsolute(s.popup_css_add);
11548  
11549              t.controlManager = new tinymce.ControlManager(t);
11550  
11551              if (s.custom_undo_redo) {
11552                  t.onBeforeExecCommand.add(function(ed, cmd, ui, val, a) {
11553                      if (cmd != 'Undo' && cmd != 'Redo' && cmd != 'mceRepaint' && (!a || !a.skip_undo))
11554                          t.undoManager.beforeChange();
11555                  });
11556  
11557                  t.onExecCommand.add(function(ed, cmd, ui, val, a) {
11558                      if (cmd != 'Undo' && cmd != 'Redo' && cmd != 'mceRepaint' && (!a || !a.skip_undo))
11559                          t.undoManager.add();
11560                  });
11561              }
11562  
11563              t.onExecCommand.add(function(ed, c) {
11564                  // Don't refresh the select lists until caret move
11565                  if (!/^(FontName|FontSize)$/.test(c))
11566                      t.nodeChanged();
11567              });
11568  
11569              // Remove ghost selections on images and tables in Gecko
11570              if (isGecko) {
11571  				function repaint(a, o) {
11572                      if (!o || !o.initial)
11573                          t.execCommand('mceRepaint');
11574                  };
11575  
11576                  t.onUndo.add(repaint);
11577                  t.onRedo.add(repaint);
11578                  t.onSetContent.add(repaint);
11579              }
11580  
11581              // Enables users to override the control factory
11582              t.onBeforeRenderUI.dispatch(t, t.controlManager);
11583  
11584              // Measure box
11585              if (s.render_ui) {
11586                  w = s.width || e.style.width || e.offsetWidth;
11587                  h = s.height || e.style.height || e.offsetHeight;
11588                  t.orgDisplay = e.style.display;
11589                  re = /^[0-9\.]+(|px)$/i;
11590  
11591                  if (re.test('' + w))
11592                      w = Math.max(parseInt(w) + (o.deltaWidth || 0), 100);
11593  
11594                  if (re.test('' + h))
11595                      h = Math.max(parseInt(h) + (o.deltaHeight || 0), 100);
11596  
11597                  // Render UI
11598                  o = t.theme.renderUI({
11599                      targetNode : e,
11600                      width : w,
11601                      height : h,
11602                      deltaWidth : s.delta_width,
11603                      deltaHeight : s.delta_height
11604                  });
11605  
11606                  t.editorContainer = o.editorContainer;
11607              }
11608  
11609  
11610              // User specified a document.domain value
11611              if (document.domain && location.hostname != document.domain)
11612                  tinymce.relaxedDomain = document.domain;
11613  
11614              // Resize editor
11615              DOM.setStyles(o.sizeContainer || o.editorContainer, {
11616                  width : w,
11617                  height : h
11618              });
11619  
11620              // Load specified content CSS last
11621              if (s.content_css) {
11622                  tinymce.each(explode(s.content_css), function(u) {
11623                      t.contentCSS.push(t.documentBaseURI.toAbsolute(u));
11624                  });
11625              }
11626  
11627              h = (o.iframeHeight || h) + (typeof(h) == 'number' ? (o.deltaHeight || 0) : '');
11628              if (h < 100)
11629                  h = 100;
11630  
11631              t.iframeHTML = s.doctype + '<html><head xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">';
11632  
11633              // We only need to override paths if we have to
11634              // IE has a bug where it remove site absolute urls to relative ones if this is specified
11635              if (s.document_base_url != tinymce.documentBaseURL)
11636                  t.iframeHTML += '<base href="' + t.documentBaseURI.getURI() + '" />';
11637  
11638              // IE8 doesn't support carets behind images setting ie7_compat would force IE8+ to run in IE7 compat mode.
11639              if (s.ie7_compat)
11640                  t.iframeHTML += '<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=7" />';
11641              else
11642                  t.iframeHTML += '<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />';
11643  
11644              t.iframeHTML += '<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />';
11645  
11646              // Load the CSS by injecting them into the HTML this will reduce "flicker"
11647              for (i = 0; i < t.contentCSS.length; i++) {
11648                  t.iframeHTML += '<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="' + t.contentCSS[i] + '" />';
11649              }
11650  
11651              bi = s.body_id || 'tinymce';
11652              if (bi.indexOf('=') != -1) {
11653                  bi = t.getParam('body_id', '', 'hash');
11654                  bi = bi[t.id] || bi;
11655              }
11656  
11657              bc = s.body_class || '';
11658              if (bc.indexOf('=') != -1) {
11659                  bc = t.getParam('body_class', '', 'hash');
11660                  bc = bc[t.id] || '';
11661              }
11662  
11663              t.iframeHTML += '</head><body id="' + bi + '" class="mceContentBody ' + bc + '" onload="window.parent.tinyMCE.get(\'' + t.id + '\').onLoad.dispatch();"><br></body></html>';
11664  
11665              // Domain relaxing enabled, then set document domain
11666              if (tinymce.relaxedDomain && (isIE || (tinymce.isOpera && parseFloat(opera.version()) < 11))) {
11667                  // We need to write the contents here in IE since multiple writes messes up refresh button and back button
11668                  u = 'javascript:(function(){document.open();document.domain="' + document.domain + '";var ed = window.parent.tinyMCE.get("' + t.id + '");document.write(ed.iframeHTML);document.close();ed.setupIframe();})()';
11669              }
11670  
11671              // Create iframe
11672              // TODO: ACC add the appropriate description on this.
11673              n = DOM.add(o.iframeContainer, 'iframe', { 
11674                  id : t.id + "_ifr",
11675                  src : u || 'javascript:""', // Workaround for HTTPS warning in IE6/7
11676                  frameBorder : '0',
11677                  allowTransparency : "true",
11678                  title : s.aria_label,
11679                  style : {
11680                      width : '100%',
11681                      height : h,
11682                      display : 'block' // Important for Gecko to render the iframe correctly
11683                  }
11684              });
11685  
11686              t.contentAreaContainer = o.iframeContainer;
11687              DOM.get(o.editorContainer).style.display = t.orgDisplay;
11688              DOM.get(t.id).style.display = 'none';
11689              DOM.setAttrib(t.id, 'aria-hidden', true);
11690  
11691              if (!tinymce.relaxedDomain || !u)
11692                  t.setupIframe();
11693  
11694              e = n = o = null; // Cleanup
11695          },
11696  
11697          setupIframe : function() {
11698              var t = this, s = t.settings, e = DOM.get(t.id), d = t.getDoc(), h, b;
11699  
11700              // Setup iframe body
11701              if (!isIE || !tinymce.relaxedDomain) {
11702                  d.open();
11703                  d.write(t.iframeHTML);
11704                  d.close();
11705  
11706                  if (tinymce.relaxedDomain)
11707                      d.domain = tinymce.relaxedDomain;
11708              }
11709  
11710              // It will not steal focus while setting contentEditable
11711              b = t.getBody();
11712              b.disabled = true;
11713  
11714              if (!s.readonly)
11715                  b.contentEditable = true;
11716  
11717              b.disabled = false;
11718  
11719              t.schema = new tinymce.html.Schema(s);
11720  
11721              t.dom = new tinymce.dom.DOMUtils(t.getDoc(), {
11722                  keep_values : true,
11723                  url_converter : t.convertURL,
11724                  url_converter_scope : t,
11725                  hex_colors : s.force_hex_style_colors,
11726                  class_filter : s.class_filter,
11727                  update_styles : 1,
11728                  fix_ie_paragraphs : 1,
11729                  schema : t.schema
11730              });
11731  
11732              t.parser = new tinymce.html.DomParser(s, t.schema);
11733  
11734              // Force anchor names closed, unless the setting "allow_html_in_named_anchor" is explicitly included.
11735              if (!t.settings.allow_html_in_named_anchor) {
11736                  t.parser.addAttributeFilter('name', function(nodes, name) {
11737                      var i = nodes.length, sibling, prevSibling, parent, node;
11738      
11739                      while (i--) {
11740                          node = nodes[i];
11741                          if (node.name === 'a' && node.firstChild) {
11742                              parent = node.parent;
11743      
11744                              // Move children after current node
11745                              sibling = node.lastChild;
11746                              do {
11747                                  prevSibling = sibling.prev;
11748                                  parent.insert(sibling, node);
11749                                  sibling = prevSibling;
11750                              } while (sibling);
11751                          }
11752                      }
11753                  });
11754              }
11755  
11756              // Convert src and href into data-mce-src, data-mce-href and data-mce-style
11757              t.parser.addAttributeFilter('src,href,style', function(nodes, name) {
11758                  var i = nodes.length, node, dom = t.dom, value, internalName;
11759  
11760                  while (i--) {
11761                      node = nodes[i];
11762                      value = node.attr(name);
11763                      internalName = 'data-mce-' + name;
11764  
11765                      // Add internal attribute if we need to we don't on a refresh of the document
11766                      if (!node.attributes.map[internalName]) {    
11767                          if (name === "style")
11768                              node.attr(internalName, dom.serializeStyle(dom.parseStyle(value), node.name));
11769                          else
11770                              node.attr(internalName, t.convertURL(value, name, node.name));
11771                      }
11772                  }
11773              });
11774  
11775              // Keep scripts from executing
11776              t.parser.addNodeFilter('script', function(nodes, name) {
11777                  var i = nodes.length, node;
11778  
11779                  while (i--) {
11780                      node = nodes[i];
11781                      node.attr('type', 'mce-' + (node.attr('type') || 'text/javascript'));
11782                  }
11783              });
11784  
11785              t.parser.addNodeFilter('#cdata', function(nodes, name) {
11786                  var i = nodes.length, node;
11787  
11788                  while (i--) {
11789                      node = nodes[i];
11790                      node.type = 8;
11791                      node.name = '#comment';
11792                      node.value = '[CDATA[' + node.value + ']]';
11793                  }
11794              });
11795  
11796              t.parser.addNodeFilter('p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,div', function(nodes, name) {
11797                  var i = nodes.length, node, nonEmptyElements = t.schema.getNonEmptyElements();
11798  
11799                  while (i--) {
11800                      node = nodes[i];
11801  
11802                      if (node.isEmpty(nonEmptyElements))
11803                          node.empty().append(new tinymce.html.Node('br', 1)).shortEnded = true;
11804                  }
11805              });
11806  
11807              t.serializer = new tinymce.dom.Serializer(s, t.dom, t.schema);
11808  
11809              t.selection = new tinymce.dom.Selection(t.dom, t.getWin(), t.serializer);
11810  
11811              t.formatter = new tinymce.Formatter(this);
11812  
11813              // Register default formats
11814              t.formatter.register({
11815                  alignleft : [
11816                      {selector : 'p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,td,th,div,ul,ol,li', styles : {textAlign : 'left'}},
11817                      {selector : 'img,table', collapsed : false, styles : {'float' : 'left'}}
11818                  ],
11819  
11820                  aligncenter : [
11821                      {selector : 'p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,td,th,div,ul,ol,li', styles : {textAlign : 'center'}},
11822                      {selector : 'img', collapsed : false, styles : {display : 'block', marginLeft : 'auto', marginRight : 'auto'}},
11823                      {selector : 'table', collapsed : false, styles : {marginLeft : 'auto', marginRight : 'auto'}}
11824                  ],
11825  
11826                  alignright : [
11827                      {selector : 'p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,td,th,div,ul,ol,li', styles : {textAlign : 'right'}},
11828                      {selector : 'img,table', collapsed : false, styles : {'float' : 'right'}}
11829                  ],
11830  
11831                  alignfull : [
11832                      {selector : 'p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,td,th,div,ul,ol,li', styles : {textAlign : 'justify'}}
11833                  ],
11834  
11835                  bold : [
11836                      {inline : 'strong', remove : 'all'},
11837                      {inline : 'span', styles : {fontWeight : 'bold'}},
11838                      {inline : 'b', remove : 'all'}
