11839                  ],
11840  
11841                  italic : [
11842                      {inline : 'em', remove : 'all'},
11843                      {inline : 'span', styles : {fontStyle : 'italic'}},
11844                      {inline : 'i', remove : 'all'}
11845                  ],
11846  
11847                  underline : [
11848                      {inline : 'span', styles : {textDecoration : 'underline'}, exact : true},
11849                      {inline : 'u', remove : 'all'}
11850                  ],
11851  
11852                  strikethrough : [
11853                      {inline : 'span', styles : {textDecoration : 'line-through'}, exact : true},
11854                      {inline : 'strike', remove : 'all'}
11855                  ],
11856  
11857                  forecolor : {inline : 'span', styles : {color : '%value'}, wrap_links : false},
11858                  hilitecolor : {inline : 'span', styles : {backgroundColor : '%value'}, wrap_links : false},
11859                  fontname : {inline : 'span', styles : {fontFamily : '%value'}},
11860                  fontsize : {inline : 'span', styles : {fontSize : '%value'}},
11861                  fontsize_class : {inline : 'span', attributes : {'class' : '%value'}},
11862                  blockquote : {block : 'blockquote', wrapper : 1, remove : 'all'},
11863                  subscript : {inline : 'sub'},
11864                  superscript : {inline : 'sup'},
11865  
11866                  link : {inline : 'a', selector : 'a', remove : 'all', split : true, deep : true,
11867                      onmatch : function(node) {
11868                          return true;
11869                      },
11870  
11871                      onformat : function(elm, fmt, vars) {
11872                          each(vars, function(value, key) {
11873                              t.dom.setAttrib(elm, key, value);
11874                          });
11875                      }
11876                  },
11877  
11878                  removeformat : [
11879                      {selector : 'b,strong,em,i,font,u,strike', remove : 'all', split : true, expand : false, block_expand : true, deep : true},
11880                      {selector : 'span', attributes : ['style', 'class'], remove : 'empty', split : true, expand : false, deep : true},
11881                      {selector : '*', attributes : ['style', 'class'], split : false, expand : false, deep : true}
11882                  ]
11883              });
11884  
11885              // Register default block formats
11886              each('p h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6 div address pre div code dt dd samp'.split(/\s/), function(name) {
11887                  t.formatter.register(name, {block : name, remove : 'all'});
11888              });
11889  
11890              // Register user defined formats
11891              t.formatter.register(t.settings.formats);
11892  
11893              t.undoManager = new tinymce.UndoManager(t);
11894  
11895              // Pass through
11896              t.undoManager.onAdd.add(function(um, l) {
11897                  if (um.hasUndo())
11898                      return t.onChange.dispatch(t, l, um);
11899              });
11900  
11901              t.undoManager.onUndo.add(function(um, l) {
11902                  return t.onUndo.dispatch(t, l, um);
11903              });
11904  
11905              t.undoManager.onRedo.add(function(um, l) {
11906                  return t.onRedo.dispatch(t, l, um);
11907              });
11908  
11909              t.forceBlocks = new tinymce.ForceBlocks(t, {
11910                  forced_root_block : s.forced_root_block
11911              });
11912  
11913              t.editorCommands = new tinymce.EditorCommands(t);
11914  
11915              // Pass through
11916              t.serializer.onPreProcess.add(function(se, o) {
11917                  return t.onPreProcess.dispatch(t, o, se);
11918              });
11919  
11920              t.serializer.onPostProcess.add(function(se, o) {
11921                  return t.onPostProcess.dispatch(t, o, se);
11922              });
11923  
11924              t.onPreInit.dispatch(t);
11925  
11926              if (!s.gecko_spellcheck)
11927                  t.getBody().spellcheck = 0;
11928  
11929              if (!s.readonly)
11930                  t._addEvents();
11931  
11932              t.controlManager.onPostRender.dispatch(t, t.controlManager);
11933              t.onPostRender.dispatch(t);
11934  
11935              t.quirks = new tinymce.util.Quirks(this);
11936  
11937              if (s.directionality)
11938                  t.getBody().dir = s.directionality;
11939  
11940              if (s.nowrap)
11941                  t.getBody().style.whiteSpace = "nowrap";
11942  
11943              if (s.handle_node_change_callback) {
11944                  t.onNodeChange.add(function(ed, cm, n) {
11945                      t.execCallback('handle_node_change_callback', t.id, n, -1, -1, true, t.selection.isCollapsed());
11946                  });
11947              }
11948  
11949              if (s.save_callback) {
11950                  t.onSaveContent.add(function(ed, o) {
11951                      var h = t.execCallback('save_callback', t.id, o.content, t.getBody());
11952  
11953                      if (h)
11954                          o.content = h;
11955                  });
11956              }
11957  
11958              if (s.onchange_callback) {
11959                  t.onChange.add(function(ed, l) {
11960                      t.execCallback('onchange_callback', t, l);
11961                  });
11962              }
11963  
11964              if (s.protect) {
11965                  t.onBeforeSetContent.add(function(ed, o) {
11966                      if (s.protect) {
11967                          each(s.protect, function(pattern) {
11968                              o.content = o.content.replace(pattern, function(str) {
11969                                  return '<!--mce:protected ' + escape(str) + '-->';
11970                              });
11971                          });
11972                      }
11973                  });
11974              }
11975  
11976              if (s.convert_newlines_to_brs) {
11977                  t.onBeforeSetContent.add(function(ed, o) {
11978                      if (o.initial)
11979                          o.content = o.content.replace(/\r?\n/g, '<br />');
11980                  });
11981              }
11982  
11983              if (s.preformatted) {
11984                  t.onPostProcess.add(function(ed, o) {
11985                      o.content = o.content.replace(/^\s*<pre.*?>/, '');
11986                      o.content = o.content.replace(/<\/pre>\s*$/, '');
11987  
11988                      if (o.set)
11989                          o.content = '<pre class="mceItemHidden">' + o.content + '</pre>';
11990                  });
11991              }
11992  
11993              if (s.verify_css_classes) {
11994                  t.serializer.attribValueFilter = function(n, v) {
11995                      var s, cl;
11996  
11997                      if (n == 'class') {
11998                          // Build regexp for classes
11999                          if (!t.classesRE) {
12000                              cl = t.dom.getClasses();
12001  
12002                              if (cl.length > 0) {
12003                                  s = '';
12004  
12005                                  each (cl, function(o) {
12006                                      s += (s ? '|' : '') + o['class'];
12007                                  });
12008  
12009                                  t.classesRE = new RegExp('(' + s + ')', 'gi');
12010                              }
12011                          }
12012  
12013                          return !t.classesRE || /(\bmceItem\w+\b|\bmceTemp\w+\b)/g.test(v) || t.classesRE.test(v) ? v : '';
12014                      }
12015  
12016                      return v;
12017                  };
12018              }
12019  
12020              if (s.cleanup_callback) {
12021                  t.onBeforeSetContent.add(function(ed, o) {
12022                      o.content = t.execCallback('cleanup_callback', 'insert_to_editor', o.content, o);
12023                  });
12024  
12025                  t.onPreProcess.add(function(ed, o) {
12026                      if (o.set)
12027                          t.execCallback('cleanup_callback', 'insert_to_editor_dom', o.node, o);
12028  
12029                      if (o.get)
12030                          t.execCallback('cleanup_callback', 'get_from_editor_dom', o.node, o);
12031                  });
12032  
12033                  t.onPostProcess.add(function(ed, o) {
12034                      if (o.set)
12035                          o.content = t.execCallback('cleanup_callback', 'insert_to_editor', o.content, o);
12036  
12037                      if (o.get)                        
12038                          o.content = t.execCallback('cleanup_callback', 'get_from_editor', o.content, o);
12039                  });
12040              }
12041  
12042              if (s.save_callback) {
12043                  t.onGetContent.add(function(ed, o) {
12044                      if (o.save)
12045                          o.content = t.execCallback('save_callback', t.id, o.content, t.getBody());
12046                  });
12047              }
12048  
12049              if (s.handle_event_callback) {
12050                  t.onEvent.add(function(ed, e, o) {
12051                      if (t.execCallback('handle_event_callback', e, ed, o) === false)
12052                          Event.cancel(e);
12053                  });
12054              }
12055  
12056              // Add visual aids when new contents is added
12057              t.onSetContent.add(function() {
12058                  t.addVisual(t.getBody());
12059              });
12060  
12061              // Remove empty contents
12062              if (s.padd_empty_editor) {
12063                  t.onPostProcess.add(function(ed, o) {
12064                      o.content = o.content.replace(/^(<p[^>]*>(&nbsp;|&#160;|\s|\u00a0|)<\/p>[\r\n]*|<br \/>[\r\n]*)$/, '');
12065                  });
12066              }
12067  
12068              if (isGecko) {
12069                  // Fix gecko link bug, when a link is placed at the end of block elements there is
12070                  // no way to move the caret behind the link. This fix adds a bogus br element after the link
12071  				function fixLinks(ed, o) {
12072                      each(ed.dom.select('a'), function(n) {
12073                          var pn = n.parentNode;
12074  
12075                          if (ed.dom.isBlock(pn) && pn.lastChild === n)
12076                              ed.dom.add(pn, 'br', {'data-mce-bogus' : 1});
12077                      });
12078                  };
12079  
12080                  t.onExecCommand.add(function(ed, cmd) {
12081                      if (cmd === 'CreateLink')
12082                          fixLinks(ed);
12083                  });
12084  
12085                  t.onSetContent.add(t.selection.onSetContent.add(fixLinks));
12086              }
12087  
12088              t.load({initial : true, format : 'html'});
12089              t.startContent = t.getContent({format : 'raw'});
12090              t.undoManager.add();
12091              t.initialized = true;
12092  
12093              t.onInit.dispatch(t);
12094              t.execCallback('setupcontent_callback', t.id, t.getBody(), t.getDoc());
12095              t.execCallback('init_instance_callback', t);
12096              t.focus(true);
12097              t.nodeChanged({initial : 1});
12098  
12099              // Load specified content CSS last
12100              each(t.contentCSS, function(u) {
12101                  t.dom.loadCSS(u);
12102              });
12103  
12104              // Handle auto focus
12105              if (s.auto_focus) {
12106                  setTimeout(function () {
12107                      var ed = tinymce.get(s.auto_focus);
12108  
12109                      ed.selection.select(ed.getBody(), 1);
12110                      ed.selection.collapse(1);
12111                      ed.getBody().focus();
12112                      ed.getWin().focus();
12113                  }, 100);
12114              }
12115  
12116              e = null;
12117          },
12118  
12119  
12120          focus : function(sf) {
12121              var oed, t = this, selection = t.selection, ce = t.settings.content_editable, ieRng, controlElm, doc = t.getDoc();
12122  
12123              if (!sf) {
12124                  // Get selected control element
12125                  ieRng = selection.getRng();
12126                  if (ieRng.item) {
12127                      controlElm = ieRng.item(0);
12128                  }
12129  
12130                  t._refreshContentEditable();
12131  
12132                  // Is not content editable
12133                  if (!ce)
12134                      t.getWin().focus();
12135  
12136                  // Focus the body as well since it's contentEditable
12137                  if (tinymce.isGecko) {
12138                      t.getBody().focus();
12139                  }
12140  
12141                  // Restore selected control element
12142                  // This is needed when for example an image is selected within a
12143                  // layer a call to focus will then remove the control selection
12144                  if (controlElm && controlElm.ownerDocument == doc) {
12145                      ieRng = doc.body.createControlRange();
12146                      ieRng.addElement(controlElm);
12147                      ieRng.select();
12148                  }
12149  
12150              }
12151  
12152              if (tinymce.activeEditor != t) {
12153                  if ((oed = tinymce.activeEditor) != null)
12154                      oed.onDeactivate.dispatch(oed, t);
12155  
12156                  t.onActivate.dispatch(t, oed);
12157              }
12158  
12159              tinymce._setActive(t);
12160          },
12161  
12162          execCallback : function(n) {
12163              var t = this, f = t.settings[n], s;
12164  
12165              if (!f)
12166                  return;
12167  
12168              // Look through lookup
12169              if (t.callbackLookup && (s = t.callbackLookup[n])) {
12170                  f = s.func;
12171                  s = s.scope;
12172              }
12173  
12174              if (is(f, 'string')) {
12175                  s = f.replace(/\.\w+$/, '');
12176                  s = s ? tinymce.resolve(s) : 0;
12177                  f = tinymce.resolve(f);
12178                  t.callbackLookup = t.callbackLookup || {};
12179                  t.callbackLookup[n] = {func : f, scope : s};
12180              }
12181  
12182              return f.apply(s || t, Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1));
12183          },
12184  
12185          translate : function(s) {
12186              var c = this.settings.language || 'en', i18n = tinymce.i18n;
12187  
12188              if (!s)
12189                  return '';
12190  
12191              return i18n[c + '.' + s] || s.replace(/{\#([^}]+)\}/g, function(a, b) {
12192                  return i18n[c + '.' + b] || '{#' + b + '}';
12193              });
12194          },
12195  
12196          getLang : function(n, dv) {
12197              return tinymce.i18n[(this.settings.language || 'en') + '.' + n] || (is(dv) ? dv : '{#' + n + '}');
12198          },
12199  
12200          getParam : function(n, dv, ty) {
12201              var tr = tinymce.trim, v = is(this.settings[n]) ? this.settings[n] : dv, o;
12202  
12203              if (ty === 'hash') {
12204                  o = {};
12205  
12206                  if (is(v, 'string')) {
12207                      each(v.indexOf('=') > 0 ? v.split(/[;,](?![^=;,]*(?:[;,]|$))/) : v.split(','), function(v) {
12208                          v = v.split('=');
12209  
12210                          if (v.length > 1)
12211                              o[tr(v[0])] = tr(v[1]);
12212                          else
12213                              o[tr(v[0])] = tr(v);
12214                      });
12215                  } else
12216                      o = v;
12217  
12218                  return o;
12219              }
12220  
12221              return v;
12222          },
12223  
12224          nodeChanged : function(o) {
12225              var t = this, s = t.selection, n = s.getStart() || t.getBody();
12226  
12227              // Fix for bug #1896577 it seems that this can not be fired while the editor is loading
12228              if (t.initialized) {
12229                  o = o || {};
12230                  n = isIE && n.ownerDocument != t.getDoc() ? t.getBody() : n; // Fix for IE initial state
12231  
12232                  // Get parents and add them to object
12233                  o.parents = [];
12234                  t.dom.getParent(n, function(node) {
12235                      if (node.nodeName == 'BODY')
12236                          return true;
12237  
12238                      o.parents.push(node);
12239                  });
12240  
12241                  t.onNodeChange.dispatch(
12242                      t,
12243                      o ? o.controlManager || t.controlManager : t.controlManager,
12244                      n,
12245                      s.isCollapsed(),
12246                      o
12247                  );
12248              }
12249          },
12250  
12251          addButton : function(n, s) {
12252              var t = this;
12253  
12254              t.buttons = t.buttons || {};
12255              t.buttons[n] = s;
12256          },
12257  
12258          addCommand : function(name, callback, scope) {
12259              this.execCommands[name] = {func : callback, scope : scope || this};
12260          },
12261  
12262          addQueryStateHandler : function(name, callback, scope) {
12263              this.queryStateCommands[name] = {func : callback, scope : scope || this};
12264          },
12265  
12266          addQueryValueHandler : function(name, callback, scope) {
12267              this.queryValueCommands[name] = {func : callback, scope : scope || this};
12268          },
12269  
12270          addShortcut : function(pa, desc, cmd_func, sc) {
12271              var t = this, c;
12272  
12273              if (!t.settings.custom_shortcuts)
12274                  return false;
12275  
12276              t.shortcuts = t.shortcuts || {};
12277  
12278              if (is(cmd_func, 'string')) {
12279                  c = cmd_func;
12280  
12281                  cmd_func = function() {
12282                      t.execCommand(c, false, null);
12283                  };
12284              }
12285  
12286              if (is(cmd_func, 'object')) {
12287                  c = cmd_func;
12288  
12289                  cmd_func = function() {
12290                      t.execCommand(c[0], c[1], c[2]);
12291                  };
12292              }
12293  
12294              each(explode(pa), function(pa) {
12295                  var o = {
12296                      func : cmd_func,
12297                      scope : sc || this,
12298                      desc : desc,
12299                      alt : false,
12300                      ctrl : false,
12301                      shift : false
12302                  };
12303  
12304                  each(explode(pa, '+'), function(v) {
12305                      switch (v) {
12306                          case 'alt':
12307                          case 'ctrl':
12308                          case 'shift':
12309                              o[v] = true;
12310                              break;
12311  
12312                          default:
12313                              o.charCode = v.charCodeAt(0);
12314                              o.keyCode = v.toUpperCase().charCodeAt(0);
12315                      }
12316                  });
12317  
12318                  t.shortcuts[(o.ctrl ? 'ctrl' : '') + ',' + (o.alt ? 'alt' : '') + ',' + (o.shift ? 'shift' : '') + ',' + o.keyCode] = o;
12319              });
12320  
12321              return true;
12322          },
12323  
12324          execCommand : function(cmd, ui, val, a) {
12325              var t = this, s = 0, o, st;
12326  
12327              if (!/^(mceAddUndoLevel|mceEndUndoLevel|mceBeginUndoLevel|mceRepaint|SelectAll)$/.test(cmd) && (!a || !a.skip_focus))
12328                  t.focus();
12329  
12330              o = {};
12331              t.onBeforeExecCommand.dispatch(t, cmd, ui, val, o);
12332              if (o.terminate)
12333                  return false;
12334  
12335              // Command callback
12336              if (t.execCallback('execcommand_callback', t.id, t.selection.getNode(), cmd, ui, val)) {
12337                  t.onExecCommand.dispatch(t, cmd, ui, val, a);
12338                  return true;
12339              }
12340  
12341              // Registred commands
12342              if (o = t.execCommands[cmd]) {
12343                  st = o.func.call(o.scope, ui, val);
12344  
12345                  // Fall through on true
12346                  if (st !== true) {
12347                      t.onExecCommand.dispatch(t, cmd, ui, val, a);
12348                      return st;
12349                  }
12350              }
12351  
12352              // Plugin commands
12353              each(t.plugins, function(p) {
12354                  if (p.execCommand && p.execCommand(cmd, ui, val)) {
12355                      t.onExecCommand.dispatch(t, cmd, ui, val, a);
12356                      s = 1;
12357                      return false;
12358                  }
12359              });
12360  
12361              if (s)
12362                  return true;
12363  
12364              // Theme commands
12365              if (t.theme && t.theme.execCommand && t.theme.execCommand(cmd, ui, val)) {
12366                  t.onExecCommand.dispatch(t, cmd, ui, val, a);
12367                  return true;
12368              }
12369  
12370              // Editor commands
12371              if (t.editorCommands.execCommand(cmd, ui, val)) {
12372                  t.onExecCommand.dispatch(t, cmd, ui, val, a);
12373                  return true;
12374              }
12375  
12376              // Browser commands
12377              t.getDoc().execCommand(cmd, ui, val);
12378              t.onExecCommand.dispatch(t, cmd, ui, val, a);
12379          },
12380  
12381          queryCommandState : function(cmd) {
12382              var t = this, o, s;
12383  
12384              // Is hidden then return undefined
12385              if (t._isHidden())
12386                  return;
12387  
12388              // Registred commands
12389              if (o = t.queryStateCommands[cmd]) {
12390                  s = o.func.call(o.scope);
12391  
12392                  // Fall though on true
12393                  if (s !== true)
12394                      return s;
12395              }
12396  
12397              // Registred commands
12398              o = t.editorCommands.queryCommandState(cmd);
12399              if (o !== -1)
12400                  return o;
12401  
12402              // Browser commands
12403              try {
12404                  return this.getDoc().queryCommandState(cmd);
12405              } catch (ex) {
12406                  // Fails sometimes see bug: 1896577
12407              }
12408          },
12409  
12410          queryCommandValue : function(c) {
12411              var t = this, o, s;
12412  
12413              // Is hidden then return undefined
12414              if (t._isHidden())
12415                  return;
12416  
12417              // Registred commands
12418              if (o = t.queryValueCommands[c]) {
12419                  s = o.func.call(o.scope);
12420  
12421                  // Fall though on true
12422                  if (s !== true)
12423                      return s;
12424              }
12425  
12426              // Registred commands
12427              o = t.editorCommands.queryCommandValue(c);
12428              if (is(o))
12429                  return o;
12430  
12431              // Browser commands
12432              try {
12433                  return this.getDoc().queryCommandValue(c);
12434              } catch (ex) {
12435                  // Fails sometimes see bug: 1896577
12436              }
12437          },
12438  
12439          show : function() {
12440              var t = this;
12441  
12442              DOM.show(t.getContainer());
12443              DOM.hide(t.id);
12444              t.load();
12445          },
12446  
12447          hide : function() {
12448              var t = this, d = t.getDoc();
12449  
12450              // Fixed bug where IE has a blinking cursor left from the editor
12451              if (isIE && d)
12452                  d.execCommand('SelectAll');
12453  
12454              // We must save before we hide so Safari doesn't crash
12455              t.save();
12456              DOM.hide(t.getContainer());
12457              DOM.setStyle(t.id, 'display', t.orgDisplay);
12458          },
12459  
12460          isHidden : function() {
12461              return !DOM.isHidden(this.id);
12462          },
12463  
12464          setProgressState : function(b, ti, o) {
12465              this.onSetProgressState.dispatch(this, b, ti, o);
12466  
12467              return b;
12468          },
12469  
12470          load : function(o) {
12471              var t = this, e = t.getElement(), h;
12472  
12473              if (e) {
12474                  o = o || {};
12475                  o.load = true;
12476  
12477                  // Double encode existing entities in the value
12478                  h = t.setContent(is(e.value) ? e.value : e.innerHTML, o);
12479                  o.element = e;
12480  
12481                  if (!o.no_events)
12482                      t.onLoadContent.dispatch(t, o);
12483  
12484                  o.element = e = null;
12485  
12486                  return h;
12487              }
12488          },
12489  
12490          save : function(o) {
12491              var t = this, e = t.getElement(), h, f;
12492  
12493              if (!e || !t.initialized)
12494                  return;
12495  
12496              o = o || {};
12497              o.save = true;
12498  
12499              // Add undo level will trigger onchange event
12500              if (!o.no_events) {
12501                  t.undoManager.typing = false;
12502                  t.undoManager.add();
12503              }
12504  
12505              o.element = e;
12506              h = o.content = t.getContent(o);
12507  
12508              if (!o.no_events)
12509                  t.onSaveContent.dispatch(t, o);
12510  
12511              h = o.content;
12512  
12513              if (!/TEXTAREA|INPUT/i.test(e.nodeName)) {
12514                  e.innerHTML = h;
12515  
12516                  // Update hidden form element
12517                  if (f = DOM.getParent(t.id, 'form')) {
12518                      each(f.elements, function(e) {
12519                          if (e.name == t.id) {
12520                              e.value = h;
12521                              return false;
12522                          }
12523                      });
12524                  }
12525              } else
12526                  e.value = h;
12527  
12528              o.element = e = null;
12529  
12530              return h;
12531          },
12532  
12533          setContent : function(content, args) {
12534              var self = this, rootNode, body = self.getBody(), forcedRootBlockName;
12535  
12536              // Setup args object
12537              args = args || {};
12538              args.format = args.format || 'html';
12539              args.set = true;
12540              args.content = content;
12541  
12542              // Do preprocessing
12543              if (!args.no_events)
12544                  self.onBeforeSetContent.dispatch(self, args);
12545  
12546              content = args.content;
12547  
12548              // Padd empty content in Gecko and Safari. Commands will otherwise fail on the content
12549              // It will also be impossible to place the caret in the editor unless there is a BR element present
12550              if (!tinymce.isIE && (content.length === 0 || /^\s+$/.test(content))) {
12551                  forcedRootBlockName = self.settings.forced_root_block;
12552                  if (forcedRootBlockName)
12553                      content = '<' + forcedRootBlockName + '><br data-mce-bogus="1"></' + forcedRootBlockName + '>';
12554                  else
12555                      content = '<br data-mce-bogus="1">';
12556  
12557                  body.innerHTML = content;
12558                  self.selection.select(body, true);
12559                  self.selection.collapse(true);
12560                  return;
12561              }
12562  
12563              // Parse and serialize the html
12564              if (args.format !== 'raw') {
12565                  content = new tinymce.html.Serializer({}, self.schema).serialize(
12566                      self.parser.parse(content)
12567                  );
12568              }
12569  
12570              // Set the new cleaned contents to the editor
12571              args.content = tinymce.trim(content);
12572              self.dom.setHTML(body, args.content);
12573  
12574              // Do post processing
12575              if (!args.no_events)
12576                  self.onSetContent.dispatch(self, args);
12577  
12578              self.selection.normalize();
12579  
12580              return args.content;
12581          },
12582  
12583          getContent : function(args) {
12584              var self = this, content;
12585  
12586              // Setup args object
12587              args = args || {};
12588              args.format = args.format || 'html';
12589              args.get = true;
12590  
12591              // Do preprocessing
12592              if (!args.no_events)
12593                  self.onBeforeGetContent.dispatch(self, args);
12594  
12595              // Get raw contents or by default the cleaned contents
12596              if (args.format == 'raw')
12597                  content = self.getBody().innerHTML;
12598              else
12599                  content = self.serializer.serialize(self.getBody(), args);
12600  
12601              args.content = tinymce.trim(content);
12602  
12603              // Do post processing
12604              if (!args.no_events)
12605                  self.onGetContent.dispatch(self, args);
12606  
12607              return args.content;
12608          },
12609  
12610          isDirty : function() {
12611              var self = this;
12612  
12613              return tinymce.trim(self.startContent) != tinymce.trim(self.getContent({format : 'raw', no_events : 1})) && !self.isNotDirty;
12614          },
12615  
12616          getContainer : function() {
12617              var t = this;
12618  
12619              if (!t.container)
12620                  t.container = DOM.get(t.editorContainer || t.id + '_parent');
12621  
12622              return t.container;
12623          },
12624  
12625          getContentAreaContainer : function() {
12626              return this.contentAreaContainer;
12627          },
12628  
12629          getElement : function() {
12630              return DOM.get(this.settings.content_element || this.id);
12631          },
12632  
12633          getWin : function() {
12634              var t = this, e;
12635  
12636              if (!t.contentWindow) {
12637                  e = DOM.get(t.id + "_ifr");
12638  
12639                  if (e)
12640                      t.contentWindow = e.contentWindow;
12641              }
12642  
12643              return t.contentWindow;
12644          },
12645  
12646          getDoc : function() {
12647              var t = this, w;
12648  
12649              if (!t.contentDocument) {
12650                  w = t.getWin();
12651  
12652                  if (w)
12653                      t.contentDocument = w.document;
12654              }
12655  
12656              return t.contentDocument;
12657          },
12658  
12659          getBody : function() {
12660              return this.bodyElement || this.getDoc().body;
12661          },
12662  
12663          convertURL : function(u, n, e) {
12664              var t = this, s = t.settings;
12665  
12666              // Use callback instead
12667              if (s.urlconverter_callback)
12668                  return t.execCallback('urlconverter_callback', u, e, true, n);
12669  
12670              // Don't convert link href since thats the CSS files that gets loaded into the editor also skip local file URLs
12671              if (!s.convert_urls || (e && e.nodeName == 'LINK') || u.indexOf('file:') === 0)
12672                  return u;
12673  
12674              // Convert to relative
12675              if (s.relative_urls)
12676                  return t.documentBaseURI.toRelative(u);
12677  
12678              // Convert to absolute
12679              u = t.documentBaseURI.toAbsolute(u, s.remove_script_host);
12680  
12681              return u;
12682          },
12683  
12684          addVisual : function(e) {
12685              var t = this, s = t.settings;
12686  
12687              e = e || t.getBody();
12688  
12689              if (!is(t.hasVisual))
12690                  t.hasVisual = s.visual;
12691  
12692              each(t.dom.select('table,a', e), function(e) {
12693                  var v;
12694  
12695                  switch (e.nodeName) {
12696                      case 'TABLE':
12697                          v = t.dom.getAttrib(e, 'border');
12698  
12699                          if (!v || v == '0') {
12700                              if (t.hasVisual)
12701                                  t.dom.addClass(e, s.visual_table_class);
12702                              else
12703                                  t.dom.removeClass(e, s.visual_table_class);
12704                          }
12705  
12706                          return;
12707  
12708                      case 'A':
12709                          v = t.dom.getAttrib(e, 'name');
12710  
12711                          if (v) {
12712                              if (t.hasVisual)
12713                                  t.dom.addClass(e, 'mceItemAnchor');
12714                              else
12715                                  t.dom.removeClass(e, 'mceItemAnchor');
12716                          }
12717  
12718                          return;
12719                  }
12720              });
12721  
12722              t.onVisualAid.dispatch(t, e, t.hasVisual);
12723          },
12724  
12725          remove : function() {
12726              var t = this, e = t.getContainer();
12727  
12728              t.removed = 1; // Cancels post remove event execution
12729              t.hide();
12730  
12731              t.execCallback('remove_instance_callback', t);
12732              t.onRemove.dispatch(t);
12733  
12734              // Clear all execCommand listeners this is required to avoid errors if the editor was removed inside another command
12735              t.onExecCommand.listeners = [];
12736  
12737              tinymce.remove(t);
12738              DOM.remove(e);
12739          },
12740  
12741          destroy : function(s) {
12742              var t = this;
12743  
12744              // One time is enough
12745              if (t.destroyed)
12746                  return;
12747  
12748              if (!s) {
12749                  tinymce.removeUnload(t.destroy);
12750                  tinyMCE.onBeforeUnload.remove(t._beforeUnload);
12751  
12752                  // Manual destroy
12753                  if (t.theme && t.theme.destroy)
12754                      t.theme.destroy();
12755  
12756                  // Destroy controls, selection and dom
12757                  t.controlManager.destroy();
12758                  t.selection.destroy();
12759                  t.dom.destroy();
12760  
12761                  // Remove all events
12762  
12763                  // Don't clear the window or document if content editable
12764                  // is enabled since other instances might still be present
12765                  if (!t.settings.content_editable) {
12766                      Event.clear(t.getWin());
12767                      Event.clear(t.getDoc());
12768                  }
12769  
12770                  Event.clear(t.getBody());
12771                  Event.clear(t.formElement);
12772              }
12773  
12774              if (t.formElement) {
12775                  t.formElement.submit = t.formElement._mceOldSubmit;
12776                  t.formElement._mceOldSubmit = null;
12777              }
12778  
12779              t.contentAreaContainer = t.formElement = t.container = t.settings.content_element = t.bodyElement = t.contentDocument = t.contentWindow = null;
12780  
12781              if (t.selection)
12782                  t.selection = t.selection.win = t.selection.dom = t.selection.dom.doc = null;
12783  
12784              t.destroyed = 1;
12785          },
12786  
12787          // Internal functions
12788  
12789          _addEvents : function() {
12790              // 'focus', 'blur', 'dblclick', 'beforedeactivate', submit, reset
12791              var t = this, i, s = t.settings, dom = t.dom, lo = {
12792                  mouseup : 'onMouseUp',
12793                  mousedown : 'onMouseDown',
12794                  click : 'onClick',
12795                  keyup : 'onKeyUp',
12796                  keydown : 'onKeyDown',
12797                  keypress : 'onKeyPress',
12798                  submit : 'onSubmit',
12799                  reset : 'onReset',
12800                  contextmenu : 'onContextMenu',
12801                  dblclick : 'onDblClick',
12802                  paste : 'onPaste' // Doesn't work in all browsers yet
12803              };
12804  
12805  			function eventHandler(e, o) {
12806                  var ty = e.type;
12807  
12808                  // Don't fire events when it's removed
12809                  if (t.removed)
12810                      return;
12811  
12812                  // Generic event handler
12813                  if (t.onEvent.dispatch(t, e, o) !== false) {
12814                      // Specific event handler
12815                      t[lo[e.fakeType || e.type]].dispatch(t, e, o);
12816                  }
12817              };
12818  
12819              // Add DOM events
12820              each(lo, function(v, k) {
12821                  switch (k) {
12822                      case 'contextmenu':
12823                          dom.bind(t.getDoc(), k, eventHandler);
12824                          break;
12825  
12826                      case 'paste':
12827                          dom.bind(t.getBody(), k, function(e) {
12828                              eventHandler(e);
12829                          });
12830                          break;
12831  
12832                      case 'submit':
12833                      case 'reset':
12834                          dom.bind(t.getElement().form || DOM.getParent(t.id, 'form'), k, eventHandler);
12835                          break;
12836  
12837                      default:
12838                          dom.bind(s.content_editable ? t.getBody() : t.getDoc(), k, eventHandler);
12839                  }
12840              });
12841  
12842              dom.bind(s.content_editable ? t.getBody() : (isGecko ? t.getDoc() : t.getWin()), 'focus', function(e) {
12843                  t.focus(true);
12844              });
12845  
12846  
12847              // Fixes bug where a specified document_base_uri could result in broken images
12848              // This will also fix drag drop of images in Gecko
12849              if (tinymce.isGecko) {
12850                  dom.bind(t.getDoc(), 'DOMNodeInserted', function(e) {
12851                      var v;
12852  
12853                      e = e.target;
12854  
12855                      if (e.nodeType === 1 && e.nodeName === 'IMG' && (v = e.getAttribute('data-mce-src')))
12856                          e.src = t.documentBaseURI.toAbsolute(v);
12857                  });
12858              }
12859  
12860              // Set various midas options in Gecko
12861              if (isGecko) {
12862  				function setOpts() {
12863                      var t = this, d = t.getDoc(), s = t.settings;
12864  
12865                      if (isGecko && !s.readonly) {
12866                          t._refreshContentEditable();
12867  
12868                          try {
12869                              // Try new Gecko method
12870                              d.execCommand("styleWithCSS", 0, false);
12871                          } catch (ex) {
12872                              // Use old method
12873                              if (!t._isHidden())
12874                                  try {d.execCommand("useCSS", 0, true);} catch (ex) {}
12875                          }
12876  
12877                          if (!s.table_inline_editing)
12878                              try {d.execCommand('enableInlineTableEditing', false, false);} catch (ex) {}
12879  
12880                          if (!s.object_resizing)
12881                              try {d.execCommand('enableObjectResizing', false, false);} catch (ex) {}
12882                      }
12883                  };
12884  
12885                  t.onBeforeExecCommand.add(setOpts);
12886                  t.onMouseDown.add(setOpts);
12887              }
12888  
12889              // Add node change handlers
12890              t.onMouseUp.add(t.nodeChanged);
12891              //t.onClick.add(t.nodeChanged);
12892              t.onKeyUp.add(function(ed, e) {
12893                  var c = e.keyCode;
12894  
12895                  if ((c >= 33 && c <= 36) || (c >= 37 && c <= 40) || c == 13 || c == 45 || c == 46 || c == 8 || (tinymce.isMac && (c == 91 || c == 93)) || e.ctrlKey)
12896                      t.nodeChanged();
12897              });
12898  
12899  
12900              // Add block quote deletion handler
12901              t.onKeyDown.add(function(ed, e) {
12902                  if (e.keyCode != VK.BACKSPACE)
12903                      return;
12904  
12905                  var rng = ed.selection.getRng();
12906                  if (!rng.collapsed)
12907                      return;
12908  
12909                  var n = rng.startContainer;
12910                  var offset = rng.startOffset;
12911  
12912                  while (n && n.nodeType && n.nodeType != 1 && n.parentNode)
12913                      n = n.parentNode;
12914  
12915                  // Is the cursor at the beginning of a blockquote?
12916                  if (n && n.parentNode && n.parentNode.tagName === 'BLOCKQUOTE' && n.parentNode.firstChild == n && offset == 0) {
12917                      // Remove the blockquote
12918                      ed.formatter.toggle('blockquote', null, n.parentNode);
12919  
12920                      // Move the caret to the beginning of n
12921                      rng.setStart(n, 0);
12922                      rng.setEnd(n, 0);
12923                      ed.selection.setRng(rng);
12924                      ed.selection.collapse(false);
12925                  }
12926              });
12927  
12928  
12929  
12930              // Add reset handler
12931              t.onReset.add(function() {
12932                  t.setContent(t.startContent, {format : 'raw'});
12933              });
12934  
12935              // Add shortcuts
12936              if (s.custom_shortcuts) {
12937                  if (s.custom_undo_redo_keyboard_shortcuts) {
12938                      t.addShortcut('ctrl+z', t.getLang('undo_desc'), 'Undo');
12939                      t.addShortcut('ctrl+y', t.getLang('redo_desc'), 'Redo');
12940                  }
12941  
12942                  // Add default shortcuts for gecko
12943                  t.addShortcut('ctrl+b', t.getLang('bold_desc'), 'Bold');
12944                  t.addShortcut('ctrl+i', t.getLang('italic_desc'), 'Italic');
12945                  t.addShortcut('ctrl+u', t.getLang('underline_desc'), 'Underline');
12946  
12947                  // BlockFormat shortcuts keys
12948                  for (i=1; i<=6; i++)
12949                      t.addShortcut('ctrl+' + i, '', ['FormatBlock', false, 'h' + i]);
12950  
12951                  t.addShortcut('ctrl+7', '', ['FormatBlock', false, 'p']);
12952                  t.addShortcut('ctrl+8', '', ['FormatBlock', false, 'div']);
12953                  t.addShortcut('ctrl+9', '', ['FormatBlock', false, 'address']);
12954  
12955  				function find(e) {
12956                      var v = null;
12957  
12958                      if (!e.altKey && !e.ctrlKey && !e.metaKey)
12959                          return v;
12960  
12961                      each(t.shortcuts, function(o) {
12962                          if (tinymce.isMac && o.ctrl != e.metaKey)
12963                              return;
12964                          else if (!tinymce.isMac && o.ctrl != e.ctrlKey)
12965                              return;
12966  
12967                          if (o.alt != e.altKey)
12968                              return;
12969  
12970                          if (o.shift != e.shiftKey)
12971                              return;
12972  
12973                          if (e.keyCode == o.keyCode || (e.charCode && e.charCode == o.charCode)) {
12974                              v = o;
12975                              return false;
12976                          }
12977                      });
12978  
12979                      return v;
12980                  };
12981  
12982                  t.onKeyUp.add(function(ed, e) {
12983                      var o = find(e);
12984  
12985                      if (o)
12986                          return Event.cancel(e);
12987                  });
12988  
12989                  t.onKeyPress.add(function(ed, e) {
12990                      var o = find(e);
12991  
12992                      if (o)
12993                          return Event.cancel(e);
12994                  });
12995  
12996                  t.onKeyDown.add(function(ed, e) {
12997                      var o = find(e);
12998  
12999                      if (o) {
13000                          o.func.call(o.scope);
13001                          return Event.cancel(e);
13002                      }
13003                  });
13004              }
13005  
13006              if (tinymce.isIE) {
13007                  // Fix so resize will only update the width and height attributes not the styles of an image
13008                  // It will also block mceItemNoResize items
13009                  dom.bind(t.getDoc(), 'controlselect', function(e) {
13010                      var re = t.resizeInfo, cb;
13011  
13012                      e = e.target;
13013  
13014                      // Don't do this action for non image elements
13015                      if (e.nodeName !== 'IMG')
13016                          return;
13017  
13018                      if (re)
13019                          dom.unbind(re.node, re.ev, re.cb);
13020  
13021                      if (!dom.hasClass(e, 'mceItemNoResize')) {
13022                          ev = 'resizeend';
13023                          cb = dom.bind(e, ev, function(e) {
13024                              var v;
13025  
13026                              e = e.target;
13027  
13028                              if (v = dom.getStyle(e, 'width')) {
13029                                  dom.setAttrib(e, 'width', v.replace(/[^0-9%]+/g, ''));
13030                                  dom.setStyle(e, 'width', '');
13031                              }
13032  
13033                              if (v = dom.getStyle(e, 'height')) {
13034                                  dom.setAttrib(e, 'height', v.replace(/[^0-9%]+/g, ''));
13035                                  dom.setStyle(e, 'height', '');
13036                              }
13037                          });
13038                      } else {
13039                          ev = 'resizestart';
13040                          cb = dom.bind(e, 'resizestart', Event.cancel, Event);
13041                      }
13042  
13043                      re = t.resizeInfo = {
13044                          node : e,
13045                          ev : ev,
13046                          cb : cb
13047                      };
13048                  });
13049              }
13050  
13051              if (tinymce.isOpera) {
13052                  t.onClick.add(function(ed, e) {
13053                      Event.prevent(e);
13054                  });
13055              }
13056  
13057              // Add custom undo/redo handlers
13058              if (s.custom_undo_redo) {
13059  				function addUndo() {
13060                      t.undoManager.typing = false;
13061                      t.undoManager.add();
13062                  };
13063  
13064                  dom.bind(t.getDoc(), 'focusout', function(e) {
13065                      if (!t.removed && t.undoManager.typing)
13066                          addUndo();
13067                  });
13068  
13069                  // Add undo level when contents is drag/dropped within the editor
13070                  t.dom.bind(t.dom.getRoot(), 'dragend', function(e) {
13071                      addUndo();
13072                  });
13073  
13074                  t.onKeyUp.add(function(ed, e) {
13075                      var keyCode = e.keyCode;
13076  
13077                      if ((keyCode >= 33 && keyCode <= 36) || (keyCode >= 37 && keyCode <= 40) || keyCode == 13 || keyCode == 45 || e.ctrlKey)
13078                          addUndo();
13079                  });
13080  
13081                  t.onKeyDown.add(function(ed, e) {
13082                      var keyCode = e.keyCode, sel;
13083  
13084                      if (keyCode == 8) {
13085                          sel = t.getDoc().selection;
13086  
13087                          // Fix IE control + backspace browser bug
13088                          if (sel && sel.createRange && sel.createRange().item) {
13089                              t.undoManager.beforeChange();
13090                              ed.dom.remove(sel.createRange().item(0));
13091                              addUndo();
13092  
13093                              return Event.cancel(e);
13094                          }
13095                      }
13096  
13097                      // Is caracter positon keys left,right,up,down,home,end,pgdown,pgup,enter
13098                      if ((keyCode >= 33 && keyCode <= 36) || (keyCode >= 37 && keyCode <= 40) || keyCode == 13 || keyCode == 45) {
13099                          // Add position before enter key is pressed, used by IE since it still uses the default browser behavior
13100                          // Todo: Remove this once we normalize enter behavior on IE
13101                          if (tinymce.isIE && keyCode == 13)
13102                              t.undoManager.beforeChange();
13103  
13104                          if (t.undoManager.typing)
13105                              addUndo();
13106  
13107                          return;
13108                      }
13109  
13110                      // If key isn't shift,ctrl,alt,capslock,metakey
13111                      if ((keyCode < 16 || keyCode > 20) && keyCode != 224 && keyCode != 91 && !t.undoManager.typing) {
13112                          t.undoManager.beforeChange();
13113                          t.undoManager.typing = true;
13114                          t.undoManager.add();
13115                      }
13116                  });
13117  
13118                  t.onMouseDown.add(function() {
13119                      if (t.undoManager.typing)
13120                          addUndo();
13121                  });
13122              }
13123  
13124              // Bug fix for FireFox keeping styles from end of selection instead of start.
13125              if (tinymce.isGecko) {
13126  				function getAttributeApplyFunction() {
13127                      var template = t.dom.getAttribs(t.selection.getStart().cloneNode(false));
13128  
13129                      return function() {
13130                          var target = t.selection.getStart();
13131  
13132                          if (target !== t.getBody()) {
13133                              t.dom.setAttrib(target, "style", null);
13134  
13135                          each(template, function(attr) {
13136                              target.setAttributeNode(attr.cloneNode(true));
13137                          });
13138                          }
13139                      };
13140                  }
13141  
13142  				function isSelectionAcrossElements() {
13143                      var s = t.selection;
13144  
13145                      return !s.isCollapsed() && s.getStart() != s.getEnd();
13146                  }
13147  
13148                  t.onKeyPress.add(function(ed, e) {
13149                      var applyAttributes;
13150  
13151                      if ((e.keyCode == 8 || e.keyCode == 46) && isSelectionAcrossElements()) {
13152                          applyAttributes = getAttributeApplyFunction();
13153                          t.getDoc().execCommand('delete', false, null);
13154                          applyAttributes();
13155  
13156                          return Event.cancel(e);
13157                      }
13158                  });
13159  
13160                  t.dom.bind(t.getDoc(), 'cut', function(e) {
13161                      var applyAttributes;
13162  
13163                      if (isSelectionAcrossElements()) {
13164                          applyAttributes = getAttributeApplyFunction();
13165                          t.onKeyUp.addToTop(Event.cancel, Event);
13166  
13167                          setTimeout(function() {
13168                              applyAttributes();
13169                              t.onKeyUp.remove(Event.cancel, Event);
13170                          }, 0);
13171                      }
13172                  });
13173              }
13174          },
13175  
13176          _refreshContentEditable : function() {
13177              var self = this, body, parent;
13178  
13179              // Check if the editor was hidden and the re-initalize contentEditable mode by removing and adding the body again
13180              if (self._isHidden()) {
13181                  body = self.getBody();
13182                  parent = body.parentNode;
13183  
13184                  parent.removeChild(body);
13185                  parent.appendChild(body);
13186  
13187                  body.focus();
13188              }
13189          },
13190  
13191          _isHidden : function() {
13192              var s;
13193  
13194              if (!isGecko)
13195                  return 0;
13196  
13197              // Weird, wheres that cursor selection?
13198              s = this.selection.getSel();
13199              return (!s || !s.rangeCount || s.rangeCount == 0);
13200          }
13201      });
13202  })(tinymce);
13203  
13204  (function(tinymce) {
13205      // Added for compression purposes
13206      var each = tinymce.each, undefined, TRUE = true, FALSE = false;
13207  
13208      tinymce.EditorCommands = function(editor) {
13209          var dom = editor.dom,
13210              selection = editor.selection,
13211              commands = {state: {}, exec : {}, value : {}},
13212              settings = editor.settings,
13213              formatter = editor.formatter,
13214              bookmark;
13215  
13216  		function execCommand(command, ui, value) {
13217              var func;
13218  
13219              command = command.toLowerCase();
13220              if (func = commands.exec[command]) {
13221                  func(command, ui, value);
13222                  return TRUE;
13223              }
13224  
13225              return FALSE;
13226          };
13227  
13228  		function queryCommandState(command) {
13229              var func;
13230  
13231              command = command.toLowerCase();
13232              if (func = commands.state[command])
13233                  return func(command);
13234  
13235              return -1;
13236          };
13237  
13238  		function queryCommandValue(command) {
13239              var func;
13240  
13241              command = command.toLowerCase();
13242              if (func = commands.value[command])
13243                  return func(command);
13244  
13245              return FALSE;
13246          };
13247  
13248  		function addCommands(command_list, type) {
13249              type = type || 'exec';
13250  
13251              each(command_list, function(callback, command) {
13252                  each(command.toLowerCase().split(','), function(command) {
13253                      commands[type][command] = callback;
13254                  });
13255              });
13256          };
13257  
13258          // Expose public methods
13259          tinymce.extend(this, {
13260              execCommand : execCommand,
13261              queryCommandState : queryCommandState,
13262              queryCommandValue : queryCommandValue,
13263              addCommands : addCommands
13264          });
13265  
13266          // Private methods
13267  
13268  		function execNativeCommand(command, ui, value) {
13269              if (ui === undefined)
13270                  ui = FALSE;
13271  
13272              if (value === undefined)
13273                  value = null;
13274  
13275              return editor.getDoc().execCommand(command, ui, value);
13276          };
13277  
13278  		function isFormatMatch(name) {
13279              return formatter.match(name);
13280          };
13281  
13282  		function toggleFormat(name, value) {
13283              formatter.toggle(name, value ? {value : value} : undefined);
13284          };
13285  
13286  		function storeSelection(type) {
13287              bookmark = selection.getBookmark(type);
13288          };
13289  
13290  		function restoreSelection() {
13291              selection.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
13292          };
13293  
13294          // Add execCommand overrides
13295          addCommands({
13296              // Ignore these, added for compatibility
13297              'mceResetDesignMode,mceBeginUndoLevel' : function() {},
13298  
13299              // Add undo manager logic
13300              'mceEndUndoLevel,mceAddUndoLevel' : function() {
13301                  editor.undoManager.add();
13302              },
13303  
13304              'Cut,Copy,Paste' : function(command) {
13305                  var doc = editor.getDoc(), failed;
13306  
13307                  // Try executing the native command
13308                  try {
13309                      execNativeCommand(command);
13310                  } catch (ex) {
13311                      // Command failed
13312                      failed = TRUE;
13313                  }
13314  
13315                  // Present alert message about clipboard access not being available
13316                  if (failed || !doc.queryCommandSupported(command)) {
13317                      if (tinymce.isGecko) {
13318                          editor.windowManager.confirm(editor.getLang('clipboard_msg'), function(state) {
13319                              if (state)
13320                                  open('http://www.mozilla.org/editor/midasdemo/securityprefs.html', '_blank');
13321                          });
13322                      } else
13323                          editor.windowManager.alert(editor.getLang('clipboard_no_support'));
13324                  }
13325              },
13326  
13327              // Override unlink command
13328              unlink : function(command) {
13329                  if (selection.isCollapsed())
13330                      selection.select(selection.getNode());
13331  
13332                  execNativeCommand(command);
13333                  selection.collapse(FALSE);
13334              },
13335  
13336              // Override justify commands to use the text formatter engine
13337              'JustifyLeft,JustifyCenter,JustifyRight,JustifyFull' : function(command) {
13338                  var align = command.substring(7);
13339  
13340                  // Remove all other alignments first
13341                  each('left,center,right,full'.split(','), function(name) {
13342                      if (align != name)
13343                          formatter.remove('align' + name);
13344                  });
13345  
13346                  toggleFormat('align' + align);
13347                  execCommand('mceRepaint');
13348              },
13349  
13350              // Override list commands to fix WebKit bug
13351              'InsertUnorderedList,InsertOrderedList' : function(command) {
13352                  var listElm, listParent;
13353  
13354                  execNativeCommand(command);
13355  
13356                  // WebKit produces lists within block elements so we need to split them
13357                  // we will replace the native list creation logic to custom logic later on
13358                  // TODO: Remove this when the list creation logic is removed
13359                  listElm = dom.getParent(selection.getNode(), 'ol,ul');
13360                  if (listElm) {
13361                      listParent = listElm.parentNode;
13362  
13363                      // If list is within a text block then split that block
13364                      if (/^(H[1-6]|P|ADDRESS|PRE)$/.test(listParent.nodeName)) {
13365                          storeSelection();
13366                          dom.split(listParent, listElm);
13367                          restoreSelection();
13368                      }
13369                  }
13370              },
13371  
13372              // Override commands to use the text formatter engine
13373              'Bold,Italic,Underline,Strikethrough,Superscript,Subscript' : function(command) {
13374                  toggleFormat(command);
13375              },
13376  
13377              // Override commands to use the text formatter engine
13378              'ForeColor,HiliteColor,FontName' : function(command, ui, value) {
13379                  toggleFormat(command, value);
13380              },
13381  
13382              FontSize : function(command, ui, value) {
13383                  var fontClasses, fontSizes;
13384  
13385                  // Convert font size 1-7 to styles
13386                  if (value >= 1 && value <= 7) {
13387                      fontSizes = tinymce.explode(settings.font_size_style_values);
13388                      fontClasses = tinymce.explode(settings.font_size_classes);
13389  
13390                      if (fontClasses)
13391                          value = fontClasses[value - 1] || value;
13392                      else
13393                          value = fontSizes[value - 1] || value;
13394                  }
13395  
13396                  toggleFormat(command, value);
13397              },
13398  
13399              RemoveFormat : function(command) {
13400                  formatter.remove(command);
13401              },
13402  
13403              mceBlockQuote : function(command) {
13404                  toggleFormat('blockquote');
13405              },
13406  
13407              FormatBlock : function(command, ui, value) {
13408                  return toggleFormat(value || 'p');
13409              },
13410  
13411              mceCleanup : function() {
13412                  var bookmark = selection.getBookmark();
13413  
13414                  editor.setContent(editor.getContent({cleanup : TRUE}), {cleanup : TRUE});
13415  
13416                  selection.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
13417              },
13418  
13419              mceRemoveNode : function(command, ui, value) {
13420                  var node = value || selection.getNode();
13421  
13422                  // Make sure that the body node isn't removed
13423                  if (node != editor.getBody()) {
13424                      storeSelection();
13425                      editor.dom.remove(node, TRUE);
13426                      restoreSelection();
13427                  }
13428              },
13429  
13430              mceSelectNodeDepth : function(command, ui, value) {
13431                  var counter = 0;
13432  
13433                  dom.getParent(selection.getNode(), function(node) {
13434                      if (node.nodeType == 1 && counter++ == value) {
13435                          selection.select(node);
13436                          return FALSE;
13437                      }
13438                  }, editor.getBody());
13439              },
13440  
13441              mceSelectNode : function(command, ui, value) {
13442                  selection.select(value);
13443              },
13444  
13445              mceInsertContent : function(command, ui, value) {
13446                  var parser, serializer, parentNode, rootNode, fragment, args,
13447                      marker, nodeRect, viewPortRect, rng, node, node2, bookmarkHtml, viewportBodyElement;
13448  
13449                  //selection.normalize();
13450  
13451                  // Setup parser and serializer
13452                  parser = editor.parser;
13453                  serializer = new tinymce.html.Serializer({}, editor.schema);
13454                  bookmarkHtml = '<span id="mce_marker" data-mce-type="bookmark">\uFEFF</span>';
13455  
13456                  // Run beforeSetContent handlers on the HTML to be inserted
13457                  args = {content: value, format: 'html'};
13458                  selection.onBeforeSetContent.dispatch(selection, args);
13459                  value = args.content;
13460  
13461                  // Add caret at end of contents if it's missing
13462                  if (value.indexOf('{$caret}') == -1)
13463                      value += '{$caret}';
13464  
13465                  // Replace the caret marker with a span bookmark element
13466                  value = value.replace(/\{\$caret\}/, bookmarkHtml);
13467  
13468                  // Insert node maker where we will insert the new HTML and get it's parent
13469                  if (!selection.isCollapsed())
13470                      editor.getDoc().execCommand('Delete', false, null);
13471  
13472                  parentNode = selection.getNode();
13473  
13474                  // Parse the fragment within the context of the parent node
13475                  args = {context : parentNode.nodeName.toLowerCase()};
13476                  fragment = parser.parse(value, args);
13477  
13478                  // Move the caret to a more suitable location
13479                  node = fragment.lastChild;
13480                  if (node.attr('id') == 'mce_marker') {
13481                      marker = node;
13482  
13483                      for (node = node.prev; node; node = node.walk(true)) {
13484                          if (node.type == 3 || !dom.isBlock(node.name)) {
13485                              node.parent.insert(marker, node, node.name === 'br');
13486                              break;
13487                          }
13488                      }
13489                  }
13490  
13491                  // If parser says valid we can insert the contents into that parent
13492                  if (!args.invalid) {
13493                      value = serializer.serialize(fragment);
13494  
13495                      // Check if parent is empty or only has one BR element then set the innerHTML of that parent
13496                      node = parentNode.firstChild;
13497                      node2 = parentNode.lastChild;
13498                      if (!node || (node === node2 && node.nodeName === 'BR'))
13499                          dom.setHTML(parentNode, value);
13500                      else
13501                          selection.setContent(value);
13502                  } else {
13503                      // If the fragment was invalid within that context then we need
13504                      // to parse and process the parent it's inserted into
13505  
13506                      // Insert bookmark node and get the parent
13507                      selection.setContent(bookmarkHtml);
13508                      parentNode = editor.selection.getNode();
13509                      rootNode = editor.getBody();
13510  
13511                      // Opera will return the document node when selection is in root
13512                      if (parentNode.nodeType == 9)
13513                          parentNode = node = rootNode;
13514                      else
13515                          node = parentNode;
13516  
13517                      // Find the ancestor just before the root element
13518                      while (node !== rootNode) {
13519                          parentNode = node;
13520                          node = node.parentNode;
13521                      }
13522  
13523                      // Get the outer/inner HTML depending on if we are in the root and parser and serialize that
13524                      value = parentNode == rootNode ? rootNode.innerHTML : dom.getOuterHTML(parentNode);
13525                      value = serializer.serialize(
13526                          parser.parse(
13527                              // Need to replace by using a function since $ in the contents would otherwise be a problem
13528                              value.replace(/<span (id="mce_marker"|id=mce_marker).+?<\/span>/i, function() {
13529                                  return serializer.serialize(fragment);
13530                              })
13531                          )
13532                      );
13533  
13534                      // Set the inner/outer HTML depending on if we are in the root or not
13535                      if (parentNode == rootNode)
13536                          dom.setHTML(rootNode, value);
13537                      else
13538                          dom.setOuterHTML(parentNode, value);
13539                  }
13540  
13541                  marker = dom.get('mce_marker');
13542  
13543                  // Scroll range into view scrollIntoView on element can't be used since it will scroll the main view port as well
13544                  nodeRect = dom.getRect(marker);
13545                  viewPortRect = dom.getViewPort(editor.getWin());
13546  
13547                  // Check if node is out side the viewport if it is then scroll to it
13548                  if ((nodeRect.y + nodeRect.h > viewPortRect.y + viewPortRect.h || nodeRect.y < viewPortRect.y) ||
13549                      (nodeRect.x > viewPortRect.x + viewPortRect.w || nodeRect.x < viewPortRect.x)) {
13550                      viewportBodyElement = tinymce.isIE ? editor.getDoc().documentElement : editor.getBody();
13551                      viewportBodyElement.scrollLeft = nodeRect.x;
13552                      viewportBodyElement.scrollTop = nodeRect.y - viewPortRect.h + 25;
13553                  }
13554  
13555                  // Move selection before marker and remove it
13556                  rng = dom.createRng();
13557  
13558                  // If previous sibling is a text node set the selection to the end of that node
13559                  node = marker.previousSibling;
13560                  if (node && node.nodeType == 3) {
13561                      rng.setStart(node, node.nodeValue.length);
13562                  } else {
13563                      // If the previous sibling isn't a text node or doesn't exist set the selection before the marker node
13564                      rng.setStartBefore(marker);
13565                      rng.setEndBefore(marker);
13566                  }
13567  
13568                  // Remove the marker node and set the new range
13569                  dom.remove(marker);
13570                  selection.setRng(rng);
13571  
13572                  // Dispatch after event and add any visual elements needed
13573                  selection.onSetContent.dispatch(selection, args);
13574                  editor.addVisual();
13575              },
13576  
13577              mceInsertRawHTML : function(command, ui, value) {
13578                  selection.setContent('tiny_mce_marker');
13579                  editor.setContent(editor.getContent().replace(/tiny_mce_marker/g, function() { return value }));
13580              },
13581  
13582              mceSetContent : function(command, ui, value) {
13583                  editor.setContent(value);
13584              },
13585  
13586              'Indent,Outdent' : function(command) {
13587                  var intentValue, indentUnit, value;
13588  
13589                  // Setup indent level
13590                  intentValue = settings.indentation;
13591                  indentUnit = /[a-z%]+$/i.exec(intentValue);
13592                  intentValue = parseInt(intentValue);
13593  
13594                  if (!queryCommandState('InsertUnorderedList') && !queryCommandState('InsertOrderedList')) {
13595                      each(selection.getSelectedBlocks(), function(element) {
13596                          if (command == 'outdent') {
13597                              value = Math.max(0, parseInt(element.style.paddingLeft || 0) - intentValue);
13598                              dom.setStyle(element, 'paddingLeft', value ? value + indentUnit : '');
13599                          } else
13600                              dom.setStyle(element, 'paddingLeft', (parseInt(element.style.paddingLeft || 0) + intentValue) + indentUnit);
13601                      });
13602                  } else
13603                      execNativeCommand(command);
13604              },
13605  
13606              mceRepaint : function() {
13607                  var bookmark;
13608  
13609                  if (tinymce.isGecko) {
13610                      try {
13611                          storeSelection(TRUE);
13612  
13613                          if (selection.getSel())
13614                              selection.getSel().selectAllChildren(editor.getBody());
13615  
13616                          selection.collapse(TRUE);
13617                          restoreSelection();
13618                      } catch (ex) {
13619                          // Ignore
13620                      }
13621                  }
13622              },
13623  
13624              mceToggleFormat : function(command, ui, value) {
13625                  formatter.toggle(value);
13626              },
13627  
13628              InsertHorizontalRule : function() {
13629                  editor.execCommand('mceInsertContent', false, '<hr />');
13630              },
13631  
13632              mceToggleVisualAid : function() {
13633                  editor.hasVisual = !editor.hasVisual;
13634                  editor.addVisual();
13635              },
13636  
13637              mceReplaceContent : function(command, ui, value) {
13638                  editor.execCommand('mceInsertContent', false, value.replace(/\{\$selection\}/g, selection.getContent({format : 'text'})));
13639              },
13640  
13641              mceInsertLink : function(command, ui, value) {
13642                  var anchor;
13643  
13644                  if (typeof(value) == 'string')
13645                      value = {href : value};
13646  
13647                  anchor = dom.getParent(selection.getNode(), 'a');
13648  
13649                  // Spaces are never valid in URLs and it's a very common mistake for people to make so we fix it here.
13650                  value.href = value.href.replace(' ', '%20');
13651  
13652                  // Remove existing links if there could be child links or that the href isn't specified
13653                  if (!anchor || !value.href) {
13654                      formatter.remove('link');
13655                  }        
13656  
13657                  // Apply new link to selection
13658                  if (value.href) {
13659                      formatter.apply('link', value, anchor);
13660                  }
13661              },
13662  
13663              selectAll : function() {
13664                  var root = dom.getRoot(), rng = dom.createRng();
13665  
13666                  rng.setStart(root, 0);
13667                  rng.setEnd(root, root.childNodes.length);
13668  
13669                  editor.selection.setRng(rng);
13670              }
13671          });
13672  
13673          // Add queryCommandState overrides
13674          addCommands({
13675              // Override justify commands
13676              'JustifyLeft,JustifyCenter,JustifyRight,JustifyFull' : function(command) {
13677                  var name = 'align' + command.substring(7);
13678                  // Use Formatter.matchNode instead of Formatter.match so that we don't match on parent node. This fixes bug where for both left
13679                  // and right align buttons can be active. This could occur when selected nodes have align right and the parent has align left.
13680                  var nodes = selection.isCollapsed() ? [selection.getNode()] : selection.getSelectedBlocks();
13681                  var matches = tinymce.map(nodes, function(node) {
13682                      return !!formatter.matchNode(node, name);
13683                  });
13684                  return tinymce.inArray(matches, TRUE) !== -1;
13685              },
13686  
13687              'Bold,Italic,Underline,Strikethrough,Superscript,Subscript' : function(command) {
13688                  return isFormatMatch(command);
13689              },
13690  
13691              mceBlockQuote : function() {
13692                  return isFormatMatch('blockquote');
13693              },
13694  
13695              Outdent : function() {
13696                  var node;
13697  
13698                  if (settings.inline_styles) {
13699                      if ((node = dom.getParent(selection.getStart(), dom.isBlock)) && parseInt(node.style.paddingLeft) > 0)
13700                          return TRUE;
13701  
13702                      if ((node = dom.getParent(selection.getEnd(), dom.isBlock)) && parseInt(node.style.paddingLeft) > 0)
13703                          return TRUE;
13704                  }
13705  
13706                  return queryCommandState('InsertUnorderedList') || queryCommandState('InsertOrderedList') || (!settings.inline_styles && !!dom.getParent(selection.getNode(), 'BLOCKQUOTE'));
13707              },
13708  
13709              'InsertUnorderedList,InsertOrderedList' : function(command) {
13710                  return dom.getParent(selection.getNode(), command == 'insertunorderedlist' ? 'UL' : 'OL');
13711              }
13712          }, 'state');
13713  
13714          // Add queryCommandValue overrides
13715          addCommands({
13716              'FontSize,FontName' : function(command) {
13717                  var value = 0, parent;
13718  
13719                  if (parent = dom.getParent(selection.getNode(), 'span')) {
13720                      if (command == 'fontsize')
13721                          value = parent.style.fontSize;
13722                      else
13723                          value = parent.style.fontFamily.replace(/, /g, ',').replace(/[\'\"]/g, '').toLowerCase();
13724                  }
13725  
13726                  return value;
13727              }
