13728          }, 'value');
13729  
13730          // Add undo manager logic
13731          if (settings.custom_undo_redo) {
13732              addCommands({
13733                  Undo : function() {
13734                      editor.undoManager.undo();
13735                  },
13736  
13737                  Redo : function() {
13738                      editor.undoManager.redo();
13739                  }
13740              });
13741          }
13742      };
13743  })(tinymce);
13744  
13745  (function(tinymce) {
13746      var Dispatcher = tinymce.util.Dispatcher;
13747  
13748      tinymce.UndoManager = function(editor) {
13749          var self, index = 0, data = [], beforeBookmark;
13750  
13751  		function getContent() {
13752              return tinymce.trim(editor.getContent({format : 'raw', no_events : 1}));
13753          };
13754  
13755          return self = {
13756              typing : false,
13757  
13758              onAdd : new Dispatcher(self),
13759  
13760              onUndo : new Dispatcher(self),
13761  
13762              onRedo : new Dispatcher(self),
13763  
13764              beforeChange : function() {
13765                  beforeBookmark = editor.selection.getBookmark(2, true);
13766              },
13767  
13768              add : function(level) {
13769                  var i, settings = editor.settings, lastLevel;
13770  
13771                  level = level || {};
13772                  level.content = getContent();
13773  
13774                  // Add undo level if needed
13775                  lastLevel = data[index];
13776                  if (lastLevel && lastLevel.content == level.content)
13777                      return null;
13778  
13779                  // Set before bookmark on previous level
13780                  if (data[index])
13781                      data[index].beforeBookmark = beforeBookmark;
13782  
13783                  // Time to compress
13784                  if (settings.custom_undo_redo_levels) {
13785                      if (data.length > settings.custom_undo_redo_levels) {
13786                          for (i = 0; i < data.length - 1; i++)
13787                              data[i] = data[i + 1];
13788  
13789                          data.length--;
13790                          index = data.length;
13791                      }
13792                  }
13793  
13794                  // Get a non intrusive normalized bookmark
13795                  level.bookmark = editor.selection.getBookmark(2, true);
13796  
13797                  // Crop array if needed
13798                  if (index < data.length - 1)
13799                      data.length = index + 1;
13800  
13801                  data.push(level);
13802                  index = data.length - 1;
13803  
13804                  self.onAdd.dispatch(self, level);
13805                  editor.isNotDirty = 0;
13806  
13807                  return level;
13808              },
13809  
13810              undo : function() {
13811                  var level, i;
13812  
13813                  if (self.typing) {
13814                      self.add();
13815                      self.typing = false;
13816                  }
13817  
13818                  if (index > 0) {
13819                      level = data[--index];
13820  
13821                      editor.setContent(level.content, {format : 'raw'});
13822                      editor.selection.moveToBookmark(level.beforeBookmark);
13823  
13824                      self.onUndo.dispatch(self, level);
13825                  }
13826  
13827                  return level;
13828              },
13829  
13830              redo : function() {
13831                  var level;
13832  
13833                  if (index < data.length - 1) {
13834                      level = data[++index];
13835  
13836                      editor.setContent(level.content, {format : 'raw'});
13837                      editor.selection.moveToBookmark(level.bookmark);
13838  
13839                      self.onRedo.dispatch(self, level);
13840                  }
13841  
13842                  return level;
13843              },
13844  
13845              clear : function() {
13846                  data = [];
13847                  index = 0;
13848                  self.typing = false;
13849              },
13850  
13851              hasUndo : function() {
13852                  return index > 0 || this.typing;
13853              },
13854  
13855              hasRedo : function() {
13856                  return index < data.length - 1 && !this.typing;
13857              }
13858          };
13859      };
13860  })(tinymce);
13861  
13862  (function(tinymce) {
13863      // Shorten names
13864      var Event = tinymce.dom.Event,
13865          isIE = tinymce.isIE,
13866          isGecko = tinymce.isGecko,
13867          isOpera = tinymce.isOpera,
13868          each = tinymce.each,
13869          extend = tinymce.extend,
13870          TRUE = true,
13871          FALSE = false;
13872  
13873  	function cloneFormats(node) {
13874          var clone, temp, inner;
13875  
13876          do {
13877              if (/^(SPAN|STRONG|B|EM|I|FONT|STRIKE|U)$/.test(node.nodeName)) {
13878                  if (clone) {
13879                      temp = node.cloneNode(false);
13880                      temp.appendChild(clone);
13881                      clone = temp;
13882                  } else {
13883                      clone = inner = node.cloneNode(false);
13884                  }
13885  
13886                  clone.removeAttribute('id');
13887              }
13888          } while (node = node.parentNode);
13889  
13890          if (clone)
13891              return {wrapper : clone, inner : inner};
13892      };
13893  
13894      // Checks if the selection/caret is at the end of the specified block element
13895  	function isAtEnd(rng, par) {
13896          var rng2 = par.ownerDocument.createRange();
13897  
13898          rng2.setStart(rng.endContainer, rng.endOffset);
13899          rng2.setEndAfter(par);
13900  
13901          // Get number of characters to the right of the cursor if it's zero then we are at the end and need to merge the next block element
13902          return rng2.cloneContents().textContent.length == 0;
13903      };
13904  
13905  	function splitList(selection, dom, li) {
13906          var listBlock, block;
13907  
13908          if (dom.isEmpty(li)) {
13909              listBlock = dom.getParent(li, 'ul,ol');
13910  
13911              if (!dom.getParent(listBlock.parentNode, 'ul,ol')) {
13912                  dom.split(listBlock, li);
13913                  block = dom.create('p', 0, '<br data-mce-bogus="1" />');
13914                  dom.replace(block, li);
13915                  selection.select(block, 1);
13916              }
13917  
13918              return FALSE;
13919          }
13920  
13921          return TRUE;
13922      };
13923  
13924      tinymce.create('tinymce.ForceBlocks', {
13925          ForceBlocks : function(ed) {
13926              var t = this, s = ed.settings, elm;
13927  
13928              t.editor = ed;
13929              t.dom = ed.dom;
13930              elm = (s.forced_root_block || 'p').toLowerCase();
13931              s.element = elm.toUpperCase();
13932  
13933              ed.onPreInit.add(t.setup, t);
13934          },
13935  
13936          setup : function() {
13937              var t = this, ed = t.editor, s = ed.settings, dom = ed.dom, selection = ed.selection, blockElements = ed.schema.getBlockElements();
13938  
13939              // Force root blocks
13940              if (s.forced_root_block) {
13941  				function addRootBlocks() {
13942                      var node = selection.getStart(), rootNode = ed.getBody(), rng, startContainer, startOffset, endContainer, endOffset, rootBlockNode, tempNode, offset = -0xFFFFFF;
13943  
13944                      if (!node || node.nodeType !== 1)
13945                          return;
13946  
13947                      // Check if node is wrapped in block
13948                      while (node != rootNode) {
13949                          if (blockElements[node.nodeName])
13950                              return;
13951  
13952                          node = node.parentNode;
13953                      }
13954  
13955                      // Get current selection
13956                      rng = selection.getRng();
13957                      if (rng.setStart) {
13958                          startContainer = rng.startContainer;
13959                          startOffset = rng.startOffset;
13960                          endContainer = rng.endContainer;
13961                          endOffset = rng.endOffset;
13962                      } else {
13963                          // Force control range into text range
13964                          if (rng.item) {
13965                              rng = ed.getDoc().body.createTextRange();
13966                              rng.moveToElementText(rng.item(0));
13967                          }
13968  
13969                          tmpRng = rng.duplicate();
13970                          tmpRng.collapse(true);
13971                          startOffset = tmpRng.move('character', offset) * -1;
13972  
13973                          if (!tmpRng.collapsed) {
13974                              tmpRng = rng.duplicate();
13975                              tmpRng.collapse(false);
13976                              endOffset = (tmpRng.move('character', offset) * -1) - startOffset;
13977                          }
13978                      }
13979  
13980                      // Wrap non block elements and text nodes
13981                      for (node = rootNode.firstChild; node; node) {
13982                          if (node.nodeType === 3 || (node.nodeType == 1 && !blockElements[node.nodeName])) {
13983                              if (!rootBlockNode) {
13984                                  rootBlockNode = dom.create(s.forced_root_block);
13985                                  node.parentNode.insertBefore(rootBlockNode, node);
13986                              }
13987  
13988                              tempNode = node;
13989                              node = node.nextSibling;
13990                              rootBlockNode.appendChild(tempNode);
13991                          } else {
13992                              rootBlockNode = null;
13993                              node = node.nextSibling;
13994                          }
13995                      }
13996  
13997                      if (rng.setStart) {
13998                          rng.setStart(startContainer, startOffset);
13999                          rng.setEnd(endContainer, endOffset);
14000                          selection.setRng(rng);
14001                      } else {
14002                          try {
14003                              rng = ed.getDoc().body.createTextRange();
14004                              rng.moveToElementText(rootNode);
14005                              rng.collapse(true);
14006                              rng.moveStart('character', startOffset);
14007  
14008                              if (endOffset > 0)
14009                                  rng.moveEnd('character', endOffset);
14010  
14011                              rng.select();
14012                          } catch (ex) {
14013                              // Ignore
14014                          }
14015                      }
14016  
14017                      ed.nodeChanged();
14018                  };
14019  
14020                  ed.onKeyUp.add(addRootBlocks);
14021                  ed.onClick.add(addRootBlocks);
14022              }
14023  
14024              if (s.force_br_newlines) {
14025                  // Force IE to produce BRs on enter
14026                  if (isIE) {
14027                      ed.onKeyPress.add(function(ed, e) {
14028                          var n;
14029  
14030                          if (e.keyCode == 13 && selection.getNode().nodeName != 'LI') {
14031                              selection.setContent('<br id="__" /> ', {format : 'raw'});
14032                              n = dom.get('__');
14033                              n.removeAttribute('id');
14034                              selection.select(n);
14035                              selection.collapse();
14036                              return Event.cancel(e);
14037                          }
14038                      });
14039                  }
14040              }
14041  
14042              if (s.force_p_newlines) {
14043                  if (!isIE) {
14044                      ed.onKeyPress.add(function(ed, e) {
14045                          if (e.keyCode == 13 && !e.shiftKey && !t.insertPara(e))
14046                              Event.cancel(e);
14047                      });
14048                  } else {
14049                      // Ungly hack to for IE to preserve the formatting when you press
14050                      // enter at the end of a block element with formatted contents
14051                      // This logic overrides the browsers default logic with
14052                      // custom logic that enables us to control the output
14053                      tinymce.addUnload(function() {
14054                          t._previousFormats = 0; // Fix IE leak
14055                      });
14056  
14057                      ed.onKeyPress.add(function(ed, e) {
14058                          t._previousFormats = 0;
14059  
14060                          // Clone the current formats, this will later be applied to the new block contents
14061                          if (e.keyCode == 13 && !e.shiftKey && ed.selection.isCollapsed() && s.keep_styles)
14062                              t._previousFormats = cloneFormats(ed.selection.getStart());
14063                      });
14064  
14065                      ed.onKeyUp.add(function(ed, e) {
14066                          // Let IE break the element and the wrap the new caret location in the previous formats
14067                          if (e.keyCode == 13 && !e.shiftKey) {
14068                              var parent = ed.selection.getStart(), fmt = t._previousFormats;
14069  
14070                              // Parent is an empty block
14071                              if (!parent.hasChildNodes() && fmt) {
14072                                  parent = dom.getParent(parent, dom.isBlock);
14073  
14074                                  if (parent && parent.nodeName != 'LI') {
14075                                      parent.innerHTML = '';
14076  
14077                                      if (t._previousFormats) {
14078                                          parent.appendChild(fmt.wrapper);
14079                                          fmt.inner.innerHTML = '\uFEFF';
14080                                      } else
14081                                          parent.innerHTML = '\uFEFF';
14082  
14083                                      selection.select(parent, 1);
14084                                      selection.collapse(true);
14085                                      ed.getDoc().execCommand('Delete', false, null);
14086                                      t._previousFormats = 0;
14087                                  }
14088                              }
14089                          }
14090                      });
14091                  }
14092  
14093                  if (isGecko) {
14094                      ed.onKeyDown.add(function(ed, e) {
14095                          if ((e.keyCode == 8 || e.keyCode == 46) && !e.shiftKey)
14096                              t.backspaceDelete(e, e.keyCode == 8);
14097                      });
14098                  }
14099              }
14100  
14101              // Workaround for missing shift+enter support, http://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=16973
14102              if (tinymce.isWebKit) {
14103  				function insertBr(ed) {
14104                      var rng = selection.getRng(), br, div = dom.create('div', null, ' '), divYPos, vpHeight = dom.getViewPort(ed.getWin()).h;
14105  
14106                      // Insert BR element
14107                      rng.insertNode(br = dom.create('br'));
14108  
14109                      // Place caret after BR
14110                      rng.setStartAfter(br);
14111                      rng.setEndAfter(br);
14112                      selection.setRng(rng);
14113  
14114                      // Could not place caret after BR then insert an nbsp entity and move the caret
14115                      if (selection.getSel().focusNode == br.previousSibling) {
14116                          selection.select(dom.insertAfter(dom.doc.createTextNode('\u00a0'), br));
14117                          selection.collapse(TRUE);
14118                      }
14119  
14120                      // Create a temporary DIV after the BR and get the position as it
14121                      // seems like getPos() returns 0 for text nodes and BR elements.
14122                      dom.insertAfter(div, br);
14123                      divYPos = dom.getPos(div).y;
14124                      dom.remove(div);
14125  
14126                      // Scroll to new position, scrollIntoView can't be used due to bug: http://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=16117
14127                      if (divYPos > vpHeight) // It is not necessary to scroll if the DIV is inside the view port.
14128                          ed.getWin().scrollTo(0, divYPos);
14129                  };
14130  
14131                  ed.onKeyPress.add(function(ed, e) {
14132                      if (e.keyCode == 13 && (e.shiftKey || (s.force_br_newlines && !dom.getParent(selection.getNode(), 'h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,ol,ul')))) {
14133                          insertBr(ed);
14134                          Event.cancel(e);
14135                      }
14136                  });
14137              }
14138  
14139              // IE specific fixes
14140              if (isIE) {
14141                  // Replaces IE:s auto generated paragraphs with the specified element name
14142                  if (s.element != 'P') {
14143                      ed.onKeyPress.add(function(ed, e) {
14144                          t.lastElm = selection.getNode().nodeName;
14145                      });
14146  
14147                      ed.onKeyUp.add(function(ed, e) {
14148                          var bl, n = selection.getNode(), b = ed.getBody();
14149  
14150                          if (b.childNodes.length === 1 && n.nodeName == 'P') {
14151                              n = dom.rename(n, s.element);
14152                              selection.select(n);
14153                              selection.collapse();
14154                              ed.nodeChanged();
14155                          } else if (e.keyCode == 13 && !e.shiftKey && t.lastElm != 'P') {
14156                              bl = dom.getParent(n, 'p');
14157  
14158                              if (bl) {
14159                                  dom.rename(bl, s.element);
14160                                  ed.nodeChanged();
14161                              }
14162                          }
14163                      });
14164                  }
14165              }
14166          },
14167  
14168          getParentBlock : function(n) {
14169              var d = this.dom;
14170  
14171              return d.getParent(n, d.isBlock);
14172          },
14173  
14174          insertPara : function(e) {
14175              var t = this, ed = t.editor, dom = ed.dom, d = ed.getDoc(), se = ed.settings, s = ed.selection.getSel(), r = s.getRangeAt(0), b = d.body;
14176              var rb, ra, dir, sn, so, en, eo, sb, eb, bn, bef, aft, sc, ec, n, vp = dom.getViewPort(ed.getWin()), y, ch, car;
14177  
14178              ed.undoManager.beforeChange();
14179  
14180              // If root blocks are forced then use Operas default behavior since it's really good
14181  // Removed due to bug: #1853816
14182  //            if (se.forced_root_block && isOpera)
14183  //                return TRUE;
14184  
14185              // Setup before range
14186              rb = d.createRange();
14187  
14188              // If is before the first block element and in body, then move it into first block element
14189              rb.setStart(s.anchorNode, s.anchorOffset);
14190              rb.collapse(TRUE);
14191  
14192              // Setup after range
14193              ra = d.createRange();
14194  
14195              // If is before the first block element and in body, then move it into first block element
14196              ra.setStart(s.focusNode, s.focusOffset);
14197              ra.collapse(TRUE);
14198  
14199              // Setup start/end points
14200              dir = rb.compareBoundaryPoints(rb.START_TO_END, ra) < 0;
14201              sn = dir ? s.anchorNode : s.focusNode;
14202              so = dir ? s.anchorOffset : s.focusOffset;
14203              en = dir ? s.focusNode : s.anchorNode;
14204              eo = dir ? s.focusOffset : s.anchorOffset;
14205  
14206              // If selection is in empty table cell
14207              if (sn === en && /^(TD|TH)$/.test(sn.nodeName)) {
14208                  if (sn.firstChild.nodeName == 'BR')
14209                      dom.remove(sn.firstChild); // Remove BR
14210  
14211                  // Create two new block elements
14212                  if (sn.childNodes.length == 0) {
14213                      ed.dom.add(sn, se.element, null, '<br />');
14214                      aft = ed.dom.add(sn, se.element, null, '<br />');
14215                  } else {
14216                      n = sn.innerHTML;
14217                      sn.innerHTML = '';
14218                      ed.dom.add(sn, se.element, null, n);
14219                      aft = ed.dom.add(sn, se.element, null, '<br />');
14220                  }
14221  
14222                  // Move caret into the last one
14223                  r = d.createRange();
14224                  r.selectNodeContents(aft);
14225                  r.collapse(1);
14226                  ed.selection.setRng(r);
14227  
14228                  return FALSE;
14229              }
14230  
14231              // If the caret is in an invalid location in FF we need to move it into the first block
14232              if (sn == b && en == b && b.firstChild && ed.dom.isBlock(b.firstChild)) {
14233                  sn = en = sn.firstChild;
14234                  so = eo = 0;
14235                  rb = d.createRange();
14236                  rb.setStart(sn, 0);
14237                  ra = d.createRange();
14238                  ra.setStart(en, 0);
14239              }
14240  
14241              // If the body is totally empty add a BR element this might happen on webkit
14242              if (!d.body.hasChildNodes()) {
14243                  d.body.appendChild(dom.create('br'));
14244              }
14245  
14246              // Never use body as start or end node
14247              sn = sn.nodeName == "HTML" ? d.body : sn; // Fix for Opera bug: https://bugs.opera.com/show_bug.cgi?id=273224&comments=yes
14248              sn = sn.nodeName == "BODY" ? sn.firstChild : sn;
14249              en = en.nodeName == "HTML" ? d.body : en; // Fix for Opera bug: https://bugs.opera.com/show_bug.cgi?id=273224&comments=yes
14250              en = en.nodeName == "BODY" ? en.firstChild : en;
14251  
14252              // Get start and end blocks
14253              sb = t.getParentBlock(sn);
14254              eb = t.getParentBlock(en);
14255              bn = sb ? sb.nodeName : se.element; // Get block name to create
14256  
14257              // Return inside list use default browser behavior
14258              if (n = t.dom.getParent(sb, 'li,pre')) {
14259                  if (n.nodeName == 'LI')
14260                      return splitList(ed.selection, t.dom, n);
14261  
14262                  return TRUE;
14263              }
14264  
14265              // If caption or absolute layers then always generate new blocks within
14266              if (sb && (sb.nodeName == 'CAPTION' || /absolute|relative|fixed/gi.test(dom.getStyle(sb, 'position', 1)))) {
14267                  bn = se.element;
14268                  sb = null;
14269              }
14270  
14271              // If caption or absolute layers then always generate new blocks within
14272              if (eb && (eb.nodeName == 'CAPTION' || /absolute|relative|fixed/gi.test(dom.getStyle(sb, 'position', 1)))) {
14273                  bn = se.element;
14274                  eb = null;
14275              }
14276  
14277              // Use P instead
14278              if (/(TD|TABLE|TH|CAPTION)/.test(bn) || (sb && bn == "DIV" && /left|right/gi.test(dom.getStyle(sb, 'float', 1)))) {
14279                  bn = se.element;
14280                  sb = eb = null;
14281              }
14282  
14283              // Setup new before and after blocks
14284              bef = (sb && sb.nodeName == bn) ? sb.cloneNode(0) : ed.dom.create(bn);
14285              aft = (eb && eb.nodeName == bn) ? eb.cloneNode(0) : ed.dom.create(bn);
14286  
14287              // Remove id from after clone
14288              aft.removeAttribute('id');
14289  
14290              // Is header and cursor is at the end, then force paragraph under
14291              if (/^(H[1-6])$/.test(bn) && isAtEnd(r, sb))
14292                  aft = ed.dom.create(se.element);
14293  
14294              // Find start chop node
14295              n = sc = sn;
14296              do {
14297                  if (n == b || n.nodeType == 9 || t.dom.isBlock(n) || /(TD|TABLE|TH|CAPTION)/.test(n.nodeName))
14298                      break;
14299  
14300                  sc = n;
14301              } while ((n = n.previousSibling ? n.previousSibling : n.parentNode));
14302  
14303              // Find end chop node
14304              n = ec = en;
14305              do {
14306                  if (n == b || n.nodeType == 9 || t.dom.isBlock(n) || /(TD|TABLE|TH|CAPTION)/.test(n.nodeName))
14307                      break;
14308  
14309                  ec = n;
14310              } while ((n = n.nextSibling ? n.nextSibling : n.parentNode));
14311  
14312              // Place first chop part into before block element
14313              if (sc.nodeName == bn)
14314                  rb.setStart(sc, 0);
14315              else
14316                  rb.setStartBefore(sc);
14317  
14318              rb.setEnd(sn, so);
14319              bef.appendChild(rb.cloneContents() || d.createTextNode('')); // Empty text node needed for Safari
14320  
14321              // Place secnd chop part within new block element
14322              try {
14323                  ra.setEndAfter(ec);
14324              } catch(ex) {
14325                  //console.debug(s.focusNode, s.focusOffset);
14326              }
14327  
14328              ra.setStart(en, eo);
14329              aft.appendChild(ra.cloneContents() || d.createTextNode('')); // Empty text node needed for Safari
14330  
14331              // Create range around everything
14332              r = d.createRange();
14333              if (!sc.previousSibling && sc.parentNode.nodeName == bn) {
14334                  r.setStartBefore(sc.parentNode);
14335              } else {
14336                  if (rb.startContainer.nodeName == bn && rb.startOffset == 0)
14337                      r.setStartBefore(rb.startContainer);
14338                  else
14339                      r.setStart(rb.startContainer, rb.startOffset);
14340              }
14341  
14342              if (!ec.nextSibling && ec.parentNode.nodeName == bn)
14343                  r.setEndAfter(ec.parentNode);
14344              else
14345                  r.setEnd(ra.endContainer, ra.endOffset);
14346  
14347              // Delete and replace it with new block elements
14348              r.deleteContents();
14349  
14350              if (isOpera)
14351                  ed.getWin().scrollTo(0, vp.y);
14352  
14353              // Never wrap blocks in blocks
14354              if (bef.firstChild && bef.firstChild.nodeName == bn)
14355                  bef.innerHTML = bef.firstChild.innerHTML;
14356  
14357              if (aft.firstChild && aft.firstChild.nodeName == bn)
14358                  aft.innerHTML = aft.firstChild.innerHTML;
14359  
14360  			function appendStyles(e, en) {
14361                  var nl = [], nn, n, i;
14362  
14363                  e.innerHTML = '';
14364  
14365                  // Make clones of style elements
14366                  if (se.keep_styles) {
14367                      n = en;
14368                      do {
14369                          // We only want style specific elements
14370                          if (/^(SPAN|STRONG|B|EM|I|FONT|STRIKE|U)$/.test(n.nodeName)) {
14371                              nn = n.cloneNode(FALSE);
14372                              dom.setAttrib(nn, 'id', ''); // Remove ID since it needs to be unique
14373                              nl.push(nn);
14374                          }
14375                      } while (n = n.parentNode);
14376                  }
14377  
14378                  // Append style elements to aft
14379                  if (nl.length > 0) {
14380                      for (i = nl.length - 1, nn = e; i >= 0; i--)
14381                          nn = nn.appendChild(nl[i]);
14382  
14383                      // Padd most inner style element
14384                      nl[0].innerHTML = isOpera ? '\u00a0' : '<br />'; // Extra space for Opera so that the caret can move there
14385                      return nl[0]; // Move caret to most inner element
14386                  } else
14387                      e.innerHTML = isOpera ? '\u00a0' : '<br />'; // Extra space for Opera so that the caret can move there
14388              };
14389                  
14390              // Padd empty blocks
14391              if (dom.isEmpty(bef))
14392                  appendStyles(bef, sn);
14393  
14394              // Fill empty afterblook with current style
14395              if (dom.isEmpty(aft))
14396                  car = appendStyles(aft, en);
14397  
14398              // Opera needs this one backwards for older versions
14399              if (isOpera && parseFloat(opera.version()) < 9.5) {
14400                  r.insertNode(bef);
14401                  r.insertNode(aft);
14402              } else {
14403                  r.insertNode(aft);
14404                  r.insertNode(bef);
14405              }
14406  
14407              // Normalize
14408              aft.normalize();
14409              bef.normalize();
14410  
14411              // Move cursor and scroll into view
14412              ed.selection.select(aft, true);
14413              ed.selection.collapse(true);
14414  
14415              // scrollIntoView seems to scroll the parent window in most browsers now including FF 3.0b4 so it's time to stop using it and do it our selfs
14416              y = ed.dom.getPos(aft).y;
14417              //ch = aft.clientHeight;
14418  
14419              // Is element within viewport
14420              if (y < vp.y || y + 25 > vp.y + vp.h) {
14421                  ed.getWin().scrollTo(0, y < vp.y ? y : y - vp.h + 25); // Needs to be hardcoded to roughly one line of text if a huge text block is broken into two blocks
14422  
14423                  /*console.debug(
14424                      'Element: y=' + y + ', h=' + ch + ', ' +
14425                      'Viewport: y=' + vp.y + ", h=" + vp.h + ', bottom=' + (vp.y + vp.h)
14426                  );*/
14427              }
14428  
14429              ed.undoManager.add();
14430  
14431              return FALSE;
14432          },
14433  
14434          backspaceDelete : function(e, bs) {
14435              var t = this, ed = t.editor, b = ed.getBody(), dom = ed.dom, n, se = ed.selection, r = se.getRng(), sc = r.startContainer, n, w, tn, walker;
14436  
14437              // Delete when caret is behind a element doesn't work correctly on Gecko see #3011651
14438              if (!bs && r.collapsed && sc.nodeType == 1 && r.startOffset == sc.childNodes.length) {
14439                  walker = new tinymce.dom.TreeWalker(sc.lastChild, sc);
14440  
14441                  // Walk the dom backwards until we find a text node
14442                  for (n = sc.lastChild; n; n = walker.prev()) {
14443                      if (n.nodeType == 3) {
14444                          r.setStart(n, n.nodeValue.length);
14445                          r.collapse(true);
14446                          se.setRng(r);
14447                          return;
14448                      }
14449                  }
14450              }
14451  
14452              // The caret sometimes gets stuck in Gecko if you delete empty paragraphs
14453              // This workaround removes the element by hand and moves the caret to the previous element
14454              if (sc && ed.dom.isBlock(sc) && !/^(TD|TH)$/.test(sc.nodeName) && bs) {
14455                  if (sc.childNodes.length == 0 || (sc.childNodes.length == 1 && sc.firstChild.nodeName == 'BR')) {
14456                      // Find previous block element
14457                      n = sc;
14458                      while ((n = n.previousSibling) && !ed.dom.isBlock(n)) ;
14459  
14460                      if (n) {
14461                          if (sc != b.firstChild) {
14462                              // Find last text node
14463                              w = ed.dom.doc.createTreeWalker(n, NodeFilter.SHOW_TEXT, null, FALSE);
14464                              while (tn = w.nextNode())
14465                                  n = tn;
14466  
14467                              // Place caret at the end of last text node
14468                              r = ed.getDoc().createRange();
14469                              r.setStart(n, n.nodeValue ? n.nodeValue.length : 0);
14470                              r.setEnd(n, n.nodeValue ? n.nodeValue.length : 0);
14471                              se.setRng(r);
14472  
14473                              // Remove the target container
14474                              ed.dom.remove(sc);
14475                          }
14476  
14477                          return Event.cancel(e);
14478                      }
14479                  }
14480              }
14481          }
14482      });
14483  })(tinymce);
14484  
14485  (function(tinymce) {
14486      // Shorten names
14487      var DOM = tinymce.DOM, Event = tinymce.dom.Event, each = tinymce.each, extend = tinymce.extend;
14488  
14489      tinymce.create('tinymce.ControlManager', {
14490          ControlManager : function(ed, s) {
14491              var t = this, i;
14492  
14493              s = s || {};
14494              t.editor = ed;
14495              t.controls = {};
14496              t.onAdd = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(t);
14497              t.onPostRender = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(t);
14498              t.prefix = s.prefix || ed.id + '_';
14499              t._cls = {};
14500  
14501              t.onPostRender.add(function() {
14502                  each(t.controls, function(c) {
14503                      c.postRender();
14504                  });
14505              });
14506          },
14507  
14508          get : function(id) {
14509              return this.controls[this.prefix + id] || this.controls[id];
14510          },
14511  
14512          setActive : function(id, s) {
14513              var c = null;
14514  
14515              if (c = this.get(id))
14516                  c.setActive(s);
14517  
14518              return c;
14519          },
14520  
14521          setDisabled : function(id, s) {
14522              var c = null;
14523  
14524              if (c = this.get(id))
14525                  c.setDisabled(s);
14526  
14527              return c;
14528          },
14529  
14530          add : function(c) {
14531              var t = this;
14532  
14533              if (c) {
14534                  t.controls[c.id] = c;
14535                  t.onAdd.dispatch(c, t);
14536              }
14537  
14538              return c;
14539          },
14540  
14541          createControl : function(n) {
14542              var c, t = this, ed = t.editor;
14543  
14544              each(ed.plugins, function(p) {
14545                  if (p.createControl) {
14546                      c = p.createControl(n, t);
14547  
14548                      if (c)
14549                          return false;
14550                  }
14551              });
14552  
14553              switch (n) {
14554                  case "|":
14555                  case "separator":
14556                      return t.createSeparator();
14557              }
14558  
14559              if (!c && ed.buttons && (c = ed.buttons[n]))
14560                  return t.createButton(n, c);
14561  
14562              return t.add(c);
14563          },
14564  
14565          createDropMenu : function(id, s, cc) {
14566              var t = this, ed = t.editor, c, bm, v, cls;
14567  
14568              s = extend({
14569                  'class' : 'mceDropDown',
14570                  constrain : ed.settings.constrain_menus
14571              }, s);
14572  
14573              s['class'] = s['class'] + ' ' + ed.getParam('skin') + 'Skin';
14574              if (v = ed.getParam('skin_variant'))
14575                  s['class'] += ' ' + ed.getParam('skin') + 'Skin' + v.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + v.substring(1);
14576  
14577              id = t.prefix + id;
14578              cls = cc || t._cls.dropmenu || tinymce.ui.DropMenu;
14579              c = t.controls[id] = new cls(id, s);
14580              c.onAddItem.add(function(c, o) {
14581                  var s = o.settings;
14582  
14583                  s.title = ed.getLang(s.title, s.title);
14584  
14585                  if (!s.onclick) {
14586                      s.onclick = function(v) {
14587                          if (s.cmd)
14588                              ed.execCommand(s.cmd, s.ui || false, s.value);
14589                      };
14590                  }
14591              });
14592  
14593              ed.onRemove.add(function() {
14594                  c.destroy();
14595              });
14596  
14597              // Fix for bug #1897785, #1898007
14598              if (tinymce.isIE) {
14599                  c.onShowMenu.add(function() {
14600                      // IE 8 needs focus in order to store away a range with the current collapsed caret location
14601                      ed.focus();
14602  
14603                      bm = ed.selection.getBookmark(1);
14604                  });
14605  
14606                  c.onHideMenu.add(function() {
14607                      if (bm) {
14608                          ed.selection.moveToBookmark(bm);
14609                          bm = 0;
14610                      }
14611                  });
14612              }
14613  
14614              return t.add(c);
14615          },
14616  
14617          createListBox : function(id, s, cc) {
14618              var t = this, ed = t.editor, cmd, c, cls;
14619  
14620              if (t.get(id))
14621                  return null;
14622  
14623              s.title = ed.translate(s.title);
14624              s.scope = s.scope || ed;
14625  
14626              if (!s.onselect) {
14627                  s.onselect = function(v) {
14628                      ed.execCommand(s.cmd, s.ui || false, v || s.value);
14629                  };
14630              }
14631  
14632              s = extend({
14633                  title : s.title,
14634                  'class' : 'mce_' + id,
14635                  scope : s.scope,
14636                  control_manager : t
14637              }, s);
14638  
14639              id = t.prefix + id;
14640  
14641  
14642  			function useNativeListForAccessibility(ed) {
14643                  return ed.settings.use_accessible_selects && !tinymce.isGecko
14644              }
14645  
14646              if (ed.settings.use_native_selects || useNativeListForAccessibility(ed))
14647                  c = new tinymce.ui.NativeListBox(id, s);
14648              else {
14649                  cls = cc || t._cls.listbox || tinymce.ui.ListBox;
14650                  c = new cls(id, s, ed);
14651              }
14652  
14653              t.controls[id] = c;
14654  
14655              // Fix focus problem in Safari
14656              if (tinymce.isWebKit) {
14657                  c.onPostRender.add(function(c, n) {
14658                      // Store bookmark on mousedown
14659                      Event.add(n, 'mousedown', function() {
14660                          ed.bookmark = ed.selection.getBookmark(1);
14661                      });
14662  
14663                      // Restore on focus, since it might be lost
14664                      Event.add(n, 'focus', function() {
14665                          ed.selection.moveToBookmark(ed.bookmark);
14666                          ed.bookmark = null;
14667                      });
14668                  });
14669              }
14670  
14671              if (c.hideMenu)
14672                  ed.onMouseDown.add(c.hideMenu, c);
14673  
14674              return t.add(c);
14675          },
14676  
14677          createButton : function(id, s, cc) {
14678              var t = this, ed = t.editor, o, c, cls;
14679  
14680              if (t.get(id))
14681                  return null;
14682  
14683              s.title = ed.translate(s.title);
14684              s.label = ed.translate(s.label);
14685              s.scope = s.scope || ed;
14686  
14687              if (!s.onclick && !s.menu_button) {
14688                  s.onclick = function() {
14689                      ed.execCommand(s.cmd, s.ui || false, s.value);
14690                  };
14691              }
14692  
14693              s = extend({
14694                  title : s.title,
14695                  'class' : 'mce_' + id,
14696                  unavailable_prefix : ed.getLang('unavailable', ''),
14697                  scope : s.scope,
14698                  control_manager : t
14699              }, s);
14700  
14701              id = t.prefix + id;
14702  
14703              if (s.menu_button) {
14704                  cls = cc || t._cls.menubutton || tinymce.ui.MenuButton;
14705                  c = new cls(id, s, ed);
14706                  ed.onMouseDown.add(c.hideMenu, c);
14707              } else {
14708                  cls = t._cls.button || tinymce.ui.Button;
14709                  c = new cls(id, s, ed);
14710              }
14711  
14712              return t.add(c);
14713          },
14714  
14715          createMenuButton : function(id, s, cc) {
14716              s = s || {};
14717              s.menu_button = 1;
14718  
14719              return this.createButton(id, s, cc);
14720          },
14721  
14722          createSplitButton : function(id, s, cc) {
14723              var t = this, ed = t.editor, cmd, c, cls;
14724  
14725              if (t.get(id))
14726                  return null;
14727  
14728              s.title = ed.translate(s.title);
14729              s.scope = s.scope || ed;
14730  
14731              if (!s.onclick) {
14732                  s.onclick = function(v) {
14733                      ed.execCommand(s.cmd, s.ui || false, v || s.value);
14734                  };
14735              }
14736  
14737              if (!s.onselect) {
14738                  s.onselect = function(v) {
14739                      ed.execCommand(s.cmd, s.ui || false, v || s.value);
14740                  };
14741              }
14742  
14743              s = extend({
14744                  title : s.title,
14745                  'class' : 'mce_' + id,
14746                  scope : s.scope,
14747                  control_manager : t
14748              }, s);
14749  
14750              id = t.prefix + id;
14751              cls = cc || t._cls.splitbutton || tinymce.ui.SplitButton;
14752              c = t.add(new cls(id, s, ed));
14753              ed.onMouseDown.add(c.hideMenu, c);
14754  
14755              return c;
14756          },
14757  
14758          createColorSplitButton : function(id, s, cc) {
14759              var t = this, ed = t.editor, cmd, c, cls, bm;
14760  
14761              if (t.get(id))
14762                  return null;
14763  
14764              s.title = ed.translate(s.title);
14765              s.scope = s.scope || ed;
14766  
14767              if (!s.onclick) {
14768                  s.onclick = function(v) {
14769                      if (tinymce.isIE)
14770                          bm = ed.selection.getBookmark(1);
14771  
14772                      ed.execCommand(s.cmd, s.ui || false, v || s.value);
14773                  };
14774              }
14775  
14776              if (!s.onselect) {
14777                  s.onselect = function(v) {
14778                      ed.execCommand(s.cmd, s.ui || false, v || s.value);
14779                  };
14780              }
14781  
14782              s = extend({
14783                  title : s.title,
14784                  'class' : 'mce_' + id,
14785                  'menu_class' : ed.getParam('skin') + 'Skin',
14786                  scope : s.scope,
14787                  more_colors_title : ed.getLang('more_colors')
14788              }, s);
14789  
14790              id = t.prefix + id;
14791              cls = cc || t._cls.colorsplitbutton || tinymce.ui.ColorSplitButton;
14792              c = new cls(id, s, ed);
14793              ed.onMouseDown.add(c.hideMenu, c);
14794  
14795              // Remove the menu element when the editor is removed
14796              ed.onRemove.add(function() {
14797                  c.destroy();
14798              });
14799  
14800              // Fix for bug #1897785, #1898007
14801              if (tinymce.isIE) {
14802                  c.onShowMenu.add(function() {
14803                      // IE 8 needs focus in order to store away a range with the current collapsed caret location
14804                      ed.focus();
14805                      bm = ed.selection.getBookmark(1);
14806                  });
14807  
14808                  c.onHideMenu.add(function() {
14809                      if (bm) {
14810                          ed.selection.moveToBookmark(bm);
14811                          bm = 0;
14812                      }
14813                  });
14814              }
14815  
14816              return t.add(c);
14817          },
14818  
14819          createToolbar : function(id, s, cc) {
14820              var c, t = this, cls;
14821  
14822              id = t.prefix + id;
14823              cls = cc || t._cls.toolbar || tinymce.ui.Toolbar;
14824              c = new cls(id, s, t.editor);
14825  
14826              if (t.get(id))
14827                  return null;
14828  
14829              return t.add(c);
14830          },
14831          
14832          createToolbarGroup : function(id, s, cc) {
14833              var c, t = this, cls;
14834              id = t.prefix + id;
14835              cls = cc || this._cls.toolbarGroup || tinymce.ui.ToolbarGroup;
14836              c = new cls(id, s, t.editor);
14837              
14838              if (t.get(id))
14839                  return null;
14840              
14841              return t.add(c);
14842          },
14843  
14844          createSeparator : function(cc) {
14845              var cls = cc || this._cls.separator || tinymce.ui.Separator;
14846  
14847              return new cls();
14848          },
14849  
14850          setControlType : function(n, c) {
14851              return this._cls[n.toLowerCase()] = c;
14852          },
14853      
14854          destroy : function() {
14855              each(this.controls, function(c) {
14856                  c.destroy();
14857              });
14858  
14859              this.controls = null;
14860          }
14861      });
14862  })(tinymce);
14863  
14864  (function(tinymce) {
14865      var Dispatcher = tinymce.util.Dispatcher, each = tinymce.each, isIE = tinymce.isIE, isOpera = tinymce.isOpera;
14866  
14867      tinymce.create('tinymce.WindowManager', {
14868          WindowManager : function(ed) {
14869              var t = this;
14870  
14871              t.editor = ed;
14872              t.onOpen = new Dispatcher(t);
14873              t.onClose = new Dispatcher(t);
14874              t.params = {};
14875              t.features = {};
14876          },
14877  
14878          open : function(s, p) {
14879              var t = this, f = '', x, y, mo = t.editor.settings.dialog_type == 'modal', w, sw, sh, vp = tinymce.DOM.getViewPort(), u;
14880  
14881              // Default some options
14882              s = s || {};
14883              p = p || {};
14884              sw = isOpera ? vp.w : screen.width; // Opera uses windows inside the Opera window
14885              sh = isOpera ? vp.h : screen.height;
14886              s.name = s.name || 'mc_' + new Date().getTime();
14887              s.width = parseInt(s.width || 320);
14888              s.height = parseInt(s.height || 240);
14889              s.resizable = true;
14890              s.left = s.left || parseInt(sw / 2.0) - (s.width / 2.0);
14891              s.top = s.top || parseInt(sh / 2.0) - (s.height / 2.0);
14892              p.inline = false;
14893              p.mce_width = s.width;
14894              p.mce_height = s.height;
14895              p.mce_auto_focus = s.auto_focus;
14896  
14897              if (mo) {
14898                  if (isIE) {
14899                      s.center = true;
14900                      s.help = false;
14901                      s.dialogWidth = s.width + 'px';
14902                      s.dialogHeight = s.height + 'px';
14903                      s.scroll = s.scrollbars || false;
14904                  }
14905              }
14906  
14907              // Build features string
14908              each(s, function(v, k) {
14909                  if (tinymce.is(v, 'boolean'))
14910                      v = v ? 'yes' : 'no';
14911  
14912                  if (!/^(name|url)$/.test(k)) {
14913                      if (isIE && mo)
14914                          f += (f ? ';' : '') + k + ':' + v;
14915                      else
14916                          f += (f ? ',' : '') + k + '=' + v;
14917                  }
14918              });
14919  
14920              t.features = s;
14921              t.params = p;
14922              t.onOpen.dispatch(t, s, p);
14923  
14924              u = s.url || s.file;
14925              u = tinymce._addVer(u);
14926  
14927              try {
14928                  if (isIE && mo) {
14929                      w = 1;
14930                      window.showModalDialog(u, window, f);
14931                  } else
14932                      w = window.open(u, s.name, f);
14933              } catch (ex) {
14934                  // Ignore
14935              }
14936  
14937              if (!w)
14938                  alert(t.editor.getLang('popup_blocked'));
14939          },
14940  
14941          close : function(w) {
14942              w.close();
14943              this.onClose.dispatch(this);
14944          },
14945  
14946          createInstance : function(cl, a, b, c, d, e) {
14947              var f = tinymce.resolve(cl);
14948  
14949              return new f(a, b, c, d, e);
14950          },
14951  
14952          confirm : function(t, cb, s, w) {
14953              w = w || window;
14954  
14955              cb.call(s || this, w.confirm(this._decode(this.editor.getLang(t, t))));
14956          },
14957  
14958          alert : function(tx, cb, s, w) {
14959              var t = this;
14960  
14961              w = w || window;
14962              w.alert(t._decode(t.editor.getLang(tx, tx)));
14963  
14964              if (cb)
14965                  cb.call(s || t);
14966          },
14967  
14968          resizeBy : function(dw, dh, win) {
14969              win.resizeBy(dw, dh);
14970          },
14971  
14972          // Internal functions
14973  
14974          _decode : function(s) {
14975              return tinymce.DOM.decode(s).replace(/\\n/g, '\n');
14976          }
14977      });
14978  }(tinymce));
14979  (function(tinymce) {
14980      tinymce.Formatter = function(ed) {
14981          var formats = {},
14982              each = tinymce.each,
14983              dom = ed.dom,
14984              selection = ed.selection,
14985              TreeWalker = tinymce.dom.TreeWalker,
14986              rangeUtils = new tinymce.dom.RangeUtils(dom),
14987              isValid = ed.schema.isValidChild,
14988              isBlock = dom.isBlock,
14989              forcedRootBlock = ed.settings.forced_root_block,
14990              nodeIndex = dom.nodeIndex,
14991              INVISIBLE_CHAR = '\uFEFF',
14992              MCE_ATTR_RE = /^(src|href|style)$/,
14993              FALSE = false,
14994              TRUE = true,
14995              undefined;
14996  
14997  		function isArray(obj) {
14998              return obj instanceof Array;
14999          };
15000  
15001  		function getParents(node, selector) {
15002              return dom.getParents(node, selector, dom.getRoot());
15003          };
15004  
15005  		function isCaretNode(node) {
15006              return node.nodeType === 1 && (node.face === 'mceinline' || node.style.fontFamily === 'mceinline');
15007          };
15008  
15009          // Public functions
15010  
15011  		function get(name) {
15012              return name ? formats[name] : formats;
15013          };
15014  
15015  		function register(name, format) {
15016              if (name) {
15017                  if (typeof(name) !== 'string') {
15018                      each(name, function(format, name) {
15019                          register(name, format);
15020                      });
15021                  } else {
15022                      // Force format into array and add it to internal collection
15023                      format = format.length ? format : [format];
15024  
15025                      each(format, function(format) {
15026                          // Set deep to false by default on selector formats this to avoid removing
15027                          // alignment on images inside paragraphs when alignment is changed on paragraphs
15028                          if (format.deep === undefined)
15029                              format.deep = !format.selector;
15030  
15031                          // Default to true
15032                          if (format.split === undefined)
15033                              format.split = !format.selector || format.inline;
15034  
15035                          // Default to true
15036                          if (format.remove === undefined && format.selector && !format.inline)
15037                              format.remove = 'none';
15038  
15039                          // Mark format as a mixed format inline + block level
15040                          if (format.selector && format.inline) {
15041                              format.mixed = true;
15042                              format.block_expand = true;
15043                          }
15044  
15045                          // Split classes if needed
15046                          if (typeof(format.classes) === 'string')
15047                              format.classes = format.classes.split(/\s+/);
15048                      });
15049  
15050                      formats[name] = format;
15051                  }
15052              }
15053          };
15054  
15055          var getTextDecoration = function(node) {
15056              var decoration;
15057  
15058              ed.dom.getParent(node, function(n) {
15059                  decoration = ed.dom.getStyle(n, 'text-decoration');
15060                  return decoration && decoration !== 'none';
15061              });
15062  
15063              return decoration;
15064          };
15065  
15066          var processUnderlineAndColor = function(node) {
15067              var textDecoration;
15068              if (node.nodeType === 1 && node.parentNode && node.parentNode.nodeType === 1) {
15069                  textDecoration = getTextDecoration(node.parentNode);
15070                  if (ed.dom.getStyle(node, 'color') && textDecoration) {
15071                      ed.dom.setStyle(node, 'text-decoration', textDecoration);
15072                  } else if (ed.dom.getStyle(node, 'textdecoration') === textDecoration) {
15073                      ed.dom.setStyle(node, 'text-decoration', null);
15074                  }
15075              }
15076          };
15077  
15078  		function apply(name, vars, node) {
15079              var formatList = get(name), format = formatList[0], bookmark, rng, i, isCollapsed = selection.isCollapsed();
15080  
15081  			function setElementFormat(elm, fmt) {
15082                  fmt = fmt || format;
15083  
15084                  if (elm) {
15085                      if (fmt.onformat) {
15086                          fmt.onformat(elm, fmt, vars, node);
15087                      }
15088  
15089                      each(fmt.styles, function(value, name) {
15090                          dom.setStyle(elm, name, replaceVars(value, vars));
15091                      });
15092  
15093                      each(fmt.attributes, function(value, name) {
15094                          dom.setAttrib(elm, name, replaceVars(value, vars));
15095                      });
15096  
15097                      each(fmt.classes, function(value) {
15098                          value = replaceVars(value, vars);
15099  
15100                          if (!dom.hasClass(elm, value))
15101                              dom.addClass(elm, value);
15102                      });
15103                  }
15104              };
15105  			function adjustSelectionToVisibleSelection() {
15106  				function findSelectionEnd(start, end) {
15107                      var walker = new TreeWalker(end);
15108                      for (node = walker.current(); node; node = walker.prev()) {
15109                          if (node.childNodes.length > 1 || node == start) {
15110                              return node;
15111                          }
15112                      }
15113                  };
15114  
15115                  // Adjust selection so that a end container with a end offset of zero is not included in the selection
15116                  // as this isn't visible to the user.
15117                  var rng = ed.selection.getRng();
15118                  var start = rng.startContainer;
15119                  var end = rng.endContainer;
15120  
15121                  if (start != end && rng.endOffset == 0) {
15122                      var newEnd = findSelectionEnd(start, end);
15123                      var endOffset = newEnd.nodeType == 3 ? newEnd.length : newEnd.childNodes.length;
15124  
15125                      rng.setEnd(newEnd, endOffset);
15126                  }
15127  
15128                  return rng;
15129              }
15130              
15131  			function applyStyleToList(node, bookmark, wrapElm, newWrappers, process){
15132                  var nodes = [], listIndex = -1, list, startIndex = -1, endIndex = -1, currentWrapElm;
15133                  
15134                  // find the index of the first child list.
15135                  each(node.childNodes, function(n, index) {
15136                      if (n.nodeName === "UL" || n.nodeName === "OL") {
15137                          listIndex = index;
15138                          list = n;
15139                          return false;
15140                      }
15141                  });
15142                  
15143                  // get the index of the bookmarks
15144                  each(node.childNodes, function(n, index) {
15145                      if (n.nodeName === "SPAN" && dom.getAttrib(n, "data-mce-type") == "bookmark") {
15146                          if (n.id == bookmark.id + "_start") {
15147                              startIndex = index;
15148                          } else if (n.id == bookmark.id + "_end") {
15149                              endIndex = index;
15150                          }
15151                      }
15152                  });
15153                  
15154                  // if the selection spans across an embedded list, or there isn't an embedded list - handle processing normally
15155                  if (listIndex <= 0 || (startIndex < listIndex && endIndex > listIndex)) {
15156                      each(tinymce.grep(node.childNodes), process);
15157                      return 0;
15158                  } else {
15159                      currentWrapElm = wrapElm.cloneNode(FALSE);
15160                      
15161                      // create a list of the nodes on the same side of the list as the selection
15162                      each(tinymce.grep(node.childNodes), function(n, index) {
15163                          if ((startIndex < listIndex && index < listIndex) || (startIndex > listIndex && index > listIndex)) {
15164                              nodes.push(n); 
15165                              n.parentNode.removeChild(n);
15166                          }
15167                      });
15168                      
15169                      // insert the wrapping element either before or after the list.
15170                      if (startIndex < listIndex) {
15171                          node.insertBefore(currentWrapElm, list);
15172                      } else if (startIndex > listIndex) {
15173                          node.insertBefore(currentWrapElm, list.nextSibling);
15174                      }
15175                      
15176                      // add the new nodes to the list.
15177                      newWrappers.push(currentWrapElm);
15178  
15179                      each(nodes, function(node) {
15180                          currentWrapElm.appendChild(node);
15181                      });
15182  
15183                      return currentWrapElm;
15184                  }
15185              };
15186              
15187  			function applyRngStyle(rng, bookmark, node_specific) {
15188                  var newWrappers = [], wrapName, wrapElm;
15189  
15190                  // Setup wrapper element
15191                  wrapName = format.inline || format.block;
15192                  wrapElm = dom.create(wrapName);
15193                  setElementFormat(wrapElm);
15194  
15195                  rangeUtils.walk(rng, function(nodes) {
15196                      var currentWrapElm;
15197  
15198  					function process(node) {
15199                          var nodeName = node.nodeName.toLowerCase(), parentName = node.parentNode.nodeName.toLowerCase(), found;
15200  
15201                          // Stop wrapping on br elements
15202                          if (isEq(nodeName, 'br')) {
15203                              currentWrapElm = 0;
15204  
15205                              // Remove any br elements when we wrap things
15206                              if (format.block)
15207                                  dom.remove(node);
15208  
15209                              return;
15210                          }
15211  
15212                          // If node is wrapper type
15213                          if (format.wrapper && matchNode(node, name, vars)) {
15214                              currentWrapElm = 0;
15215                              return;
15216                          }
15217  
15218                          // Can we rename the block
15219                          if (format.block && !format.wrapper && isTextBlock(nodeName)) {
15220                              node = dom.rename(node, wrapName);
15221                              setElementFormat(node);
15222                              newWrappers.push(node);
15223                              currentWrapElm = 0;
15224                              return;
15225                          }
15226  
15227                          // Handle selector patterns
15228                          if (format.selector) {
15229                              // Look for matching formats
15230                              each(formatList, function(format) {
15231                                  // Check collapsed state if it exists
15232                                  if ('collapsed' in format && format.collapsed !== isCollapsed) {
15233                                      return;
15234                                  }
15235  
15236                                  if (dom.is(node, format.selector) && !isCaretNode(node)) {
15237                                      setElementFormat(node, format);
15238                                      found = true;
15239                                  }
15240                              });
15241  
15242                              // Continue processing if a selector match wasn't found and a inline element is defined
15243                              if (!format.inline || found) {
15244                                  currentWrapElm = 0;
15245                                  return;
15246                              }
15247                          }
15248  
15249                          // Is it valid to wrap this item
15250                          if (isValid(wrapName, nodeName) && isValid(parentName, wrapName) &&
15251                                  !(!node_specific && node.nodeType === 3 && node.nodeValue.length === 1 && node.nodeValue.charCodeAt(0) === 65279) && node.id !== '_mce_caret') {
15252                              // Start wrapping
15253                              if (!currentWrapElm) {
15254                                  // Wrap the node
15255                                  currentWrapElm = wrapElm.cloneNode(FALSE);
15256                                  node.parentNode.insertBefore(currentWrapElm, node);
15257                                  newWrappers.push(currentWrapElm);
15258                              }
15259  
15260                              currentWrapElm.appendChild(node);
15261                          } else if (nodeName == 'li' && bookmark) {
15262                              // Start wrapping - if we are in a list node and have a bookmark, then we will always begin by wrapping in a new element.
15263                              currentWrapElm = applyStyleToList(node, bookmark, wrapElm, newWrappers, process);
15264                          } else {
15265                              // Start a new wrapper for possible children
15266                              currentWrapElm = 0;
15267  
15268                              each(tinymce.grep(node.childNodes), process);
15269  
15270                              // End the last wrapper
15271                              currentWrapElm = 0;
15272                          }
15273                      };
15274  
15275                      // Process siblings from range
15276                      each(nodes, process);
15277                  });
15278  
15279                  // Wrap links inside as well, for example color inside a link when the wrapper is around the link
15280                  if (format.wrap_links === false) {
15281                      each(newWrappers, function(node) {
15282  						function process(node) {
15283                              var i, currentWrapElm, children;
15284  
15285                              if (node.nodeName === 'A') {
15286                                  currentWrapElm = wrapElm.cloneNode(FALSE);
15287                                  newWrappers.push(currentWrapElm);
15288  
15289                                  children = tinymce.grep(node.childNodes);
15290                                  for (i = 0; i < children.length; i++)
15291                                      currentWrapElm.appendChild(children[i]);
15292  
15293                                  node.appendChild(currentWrapElm);
15294                              }
15295  
15296                              each(tinymce.grep(node.childNodes), process);
15297                          };
15298  
15299                          process(node);
15300                      });
15301                  }
15302  
15303                  // Cleanup
15304                  each(newWrappers, function(node) {
15305                      var childCount;
15306  
15307  					function getChildCount(node) {
15308                          var count = 0;
15309  
15310                          each(node.childNodes, function(node) {
15311                              if (!isWhiteSpaceNode(node) && !isBookmarkNode(node))
15312                                  count++;
15313                          });
15314  
15315                          return count;
15316                      };
15317  
15318  					function mergeStyles(node) {
15319                          var child, clone;
15320  
15321                          each(node.childNodes, function(node) {
15322                              if (node.nodeType == 1 && !isBookmarkNode(node) && !isCaretNode(node)) {
15323                                  child = node;
15324                                  return FALSE; // break loop
15325                              }
15326                          });
15327  
15328                          // If child was found and of the same type as the current node
15329                          if (child && matchName(child, format)) {
15330                              clone = child.cloneNode(FALSE);
15331                              setElementFormat(clone);
15332  
15333                              dom.replace(clone, node, TRUE);
15334                              dom.remove(child, 1);
15335                          }
15336  
15337                          return clone || node;
15338                      };
15339  
15340                      childCount = getChildCount(node);
15341  
15342                      // Remove empty nodes but only if there is multiple wrappers and they are not block
15343                      // elements so never remove single <h1></h1> since that would remove the currrent empty block element where the caret is at
15344                      if ((newWrappers.length > 1 || !isBlock(node)) && childCount === 0) {
15345                          dom.remove(node, 1);
15346                          return;
15347                      }
15348  
15349                      if (format.inline || format.wrapper) {
15350                          // Merges the current node with it's children of similar type to reduce the number of elements
15351                          if (!format.exact && childCount === 1)
15352                              node = mergeStyles(node);
15353  
15354                          // Remove/merge children
15355                          each(formatList, function(format) {
15356                              // Merge all children of similar type will move styles from child to parent
15357                              // this: <span style="color:red"><b><span style="color:red; font-size:10px">text</span></b></span>
15358                              // will become: <span style="color:red"><b><span style="font-size:10px">text</span></b></span>
15359                              each(dom.select(format.inline, node), function(child) {
15360                                  var parent;
15361  
15362                                  // When wrap_links is set to false we don't want
15363                                  // to remove the format on children within links
15364                                  if (format.wrap_links === false) {
15365                                      parent = child.parentNode;
15366  
15367                                      do {
15368                                          if (parent.nodeName === 'A')
15369                                              return;
15370                                      } while (parent = parent.parentNode);
15371                                  }
15372  
15373                                  removeFormat(format, vars, child, format.exact ? child : null);
15374                              });
15375                          });
15376  
15377                          // Remove child if direct parent is of same type
15378                          if (matchNode(node.parentNode, name, vars)) {
15379                              dom.remove(node, 1);
15380                              node = 0;
15381                              return TRUE;
15382                          }
15383  
15384                          // Look for parent with similar style format
15385                          if (format.merge_with_parents) {
15386                              dom.getParent(node.parentNode, function(parent) {
15387                                  if (matchNode(parent, name, vars)) {
15388                                      dom.remove(node, 1);
15389                                      node = 0;
15390                                      return TRUE;
15391                                  }
15392                              });
15393                          }
15394  
15395                          // Merge next and previous siblings if they are similar <b>text</b><b>text</b> becomes <b>texttext</b>
15396                          if (node && format.merge_siblings !== false) {
15397                              node = mergeSiblings(getNonWhiteSpaceSibling(node), node);
15398                              node = mergeSiblings(node, getNonWhiteSpaceSibling(node, TRUE));
15399                          }
15400                      }
15401                  });
15402              };
15403  
15404              if (format) {
15405                  if (node) {
15406                      if (node.nodeType) {
15407                          rng = dom.createRng();
15408                          rng.setStartBefore(node);
15409                          rng.setEndAfter(node);
15410                          applyRngStyle(expandRng(rng, formatList), null, true);
15411                      } else {
15412                          applyRngStyle(node, null, true);
15413                      }
15414                  } else {
15415                      if (!isCollapsed || !format.inline || dom.select('td.mceSelected,th.mceSelected').length) {
15416                          // Obtain selection node before selection is unselected by applyRngStyle()
15417                          var curSelNode = ed.selection.getNode();
15418  
15419                          // Apply formatting to selection
15420                          ed.selection.setRng(adjustSelectionToVisibleSelection());
15421                          bookmark = selection.getBookmark();
15422                          applyRngStyle(expandRng(selection.getRng(TRUE), formatList), bookmark);
15423  
15424                          // Colored nodes should be underlined so that the color of the underline matches the text color.
15425                          if (format.styles && (format.styles.color || format.styles.textDecoration)) {
15426                              tinymce.walk(curSelNode, processUnderlineAndColor, 'childNodes');
15427                              processUnderlineAndColor(curSelNode);
15428                          }
15429  
15430                          selection.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
15431                          moveStart(selection.getRng(TRUE));
15432                          ed.nodeChanged();
15433                      } else
15434                          performCaretAction('apply', name, vars);
15435                  }
15436              }
15437          };
15438  
15439  		function remove(name, vars, node) {
15440              var formatList = get(name), format = formatList[0], bookmark, i, rng;
15441  
15442              // Merges the styles for each node
15443  			function process(node) {
15444                  var children, i, l;
15445  
15446                  // Grab the children first since the nodelist might be changed
15447                  children = tinymce.grep(node.childNodes);
15448  
15449                  // Process current node
15450                  for (i = 0, l = formatList.length; i < l; i++) {
15451                      if (removeFormat(formatList[i], vars, node, node))
15452                          break;
15453                  }
15454  
15455                  // Process the children
15456                  if (format.deep) {
15457                      for (i = 0, l = children.length; i < l; i++)
15458                          process(children[i]);
15459                  }
15460              };
15461  
15462  			function findFormatRoot(container) {
15463                  var formatRoot;
15464  
15465                  // Find format root
15466                  each(getParents(container.parentNode).reverse(), function(parent) {
15467                      var format;
15468  
15469                      // Find format root element
15470                      if (!formatRoot && parent.id != '_start' && parent.id != '_end') {
15471                          // Is the node matching the format we are looking for
15472                          format = matchNode(parent, name, vars);
15473                          if (format && format.split !== false)
15474                              formatRoot = parent;
15475                      }
15476                  });
15477  
15478                  return formatRoot;
15479              };
15480  
15481  			function wrapAndSplit(format_root, container, target, split) {
15482                  var parent, clone, lastClone, firstClone, i, formatRootParent;
15483  
15484                  // Format root found then clone formats and split it
15485                  if (format_root) {
15486                      formatRootParent = format_root.parentNode;
15487  
15488                      for (parent = container.parentNode; parent && parent != formatRootParent; parent = parent.parentNode) {
15489                          clone = parent.cloneNode(FALSE);
15490  
15491                          for (i = 0; i < formatList.length; i++) {
15492                              if (removeFormat(formatList[i], vars, clone, clone)) {
15493                                  clone = 0;
15494                                  break;
15495                              }
15496                          }
15497  
15498                          // Build wrapper node
15499                          if (clone) {
15500                              if (lastClone)
15501                                  clone.appendChild(lastClone);
15502  
15503                              if (!firstClone)
15504                                  firstClone = clone;
15505  
15506                              lastClone = clone;
15507                          }
15508                      }
15509  
15510                      // Never split block elements if the format is mixed
15511                      if (split && (!format.mixed || !isBlock(format_root)))
15512                          container = dom.split(format_root, container);
15513  
15514                      // Wrap container in cloned formats
15515                      if (lastClone) {
15516                          target.parentNode.insertBefore(lastClone, target);
15517                          firstClone.appendChild(target);
15518                      }
15519                  }
15520  
15521                  return container;
15522              };
15523  
15524  			function splitToFormatRoot(container) {
15525                  return wrapAndSplit(findFormatRoot(container), container, container, true);
15526              };
15527  
15528  			function unwrap(start) {
15529                  var node = dom.get(start ? '_start' : '_end'),
15530                      out = node[start ? 'firstChild' : 'lastChild'];
15531
