15532                  // If the end is placed within the start the result will be removed
15533                  // So this checks if the out node is a bookmark node if it is it
15534                  // checks for another more suitable node
15535                  if (isBookmarkNode(out))
15536                      out = out[start ? 'firstChild' : 'lastChild'];
15537  
15538                  dom.remove(node, true);
15539  
15540                  return out;
15541              };
15542  
15543  			function removeRngStyle(rng) {
15544                  var startContainer, endContainer;
15545  
15546                  rng = expandRng(rng, formatList, TRUE);
15547  
15548                  if (format.split) {
15549                      startContainer = getContainer(rng, TRUE);
15550                      endContainer = getContainer(rng);
15551  
15552                      if (startContainer != endContainer) {
15553                          // Wrap start/end nodes in span element since these might be cloned/moved
15554                          startContainer = wrap(startContainer, 'span', {id : '_start', 'data-mce-type' : 'bookmark'});
15555                          endContainer = wrap(endContainer, 'span', {id : '_end', 'data-mce-type' : 'bookmark'});
15556  
15557                          // Split start/end
15558                          splitToFormatRoot(startContainer);
15559                          splitToFormatRoot(endContainer);
15560  
15561                          // Unwrap start/end to get real elements again
15562                          startContainer = unwrap(TRUE);
15563                          endContainer = unwrap();
15564                      } else
15565                          startContainer = endContainer = splitToFormatRoot(startContainer);
15566  
15567                      // Update range positions since they might have changed after the split operations
15568                      rng.startContainer = startContainer.parentNode;
15569                      rng.startOffset = nodeIndex(startContainer);
15570                      rng.endContainer = endContainer.parentNode;
15571                      rng.endOffset = nodeIndex(endContainer) + 1;
15572                  }
15573  
15574                  // Remove items between start/end
15575                  rangeUtils.walk(rng, function(nodes) {
15576                      each(nodes, function(node) {
15577                          process(node);
15578  
15579                          // Remove parent span if it only contains text-decoration: underline, yet a parent node is also underlined.
15580                          if (node.nodeType === 1 && ed.dom.getStyle(node, 'text-decoration') === 'underline' && node.parentNode && getTextDecoration(node.parentNode) === 'underline') {
15581                              removeFormat({'deep': false, 'exact': true, 'inline': 'span', 'styles': {'textDecoration' : 'underline'}}, null, node);
15582                          }
15583                      });
15584                  });
15585              };
15586  
15587              // Handle node
15588              if (node) {
15589                  if (node.nodeType) {
15590                      rng = dom.createRng();
15591                      rng.setStartBefore(node);
15592                      rng.setEndAfter(node);
15593                      removeRngStyle(rng);
15594                  } else {
15595                      removeRngStyle(node);
15596                  }
15597  
15598                  return;
15599              }
15600  
15601              if (!selection.isCollapsed() || !format.inline || dom.select('td.mceSelected,th.mceSelected').length) {
15602                  bookmark = selection.getBookmark();
15603                  removeRngStyle(selection.getRng(TRUE));
15604                  selection.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
15605  
15606                  // Check if start element still has formatting then we are at: "<b>text|</b>text" and need to move the start into the next text node
15607                  if (format.inline && match(name, vars, selection.getStart())) {
15608                      moveStart(selection.getRng(true));
15609                  }
15610  
15611                  ed.nodeChanged();
15612              } else
15613                  performCaretAction('remove', name, vars);
15614  
15615              // When you remove formatting from a table cell in WebKit (cell, not the contents of a cell) there is a rendering issue with column width
15616              if (tinymce.isWebKit) {
15617                  ed.execCommand('mceCleanup');
15618              }
15619          };
15620  
15621  		function toggle(name, vars, node) {
15622              var fmt = get(name);
15623  
15624              if (match(name, vars, node) && (!('toggle' in fmt[0]) || fmt[0]['toggle']))
15625                  remove(name, vars, node);
15626              else
15627                  apply(name, vars, node);
15628          };
15629  
15630  		function matchNode(node, name, vars, similar) {
15631              var formatList = get(name), format, i, classes;
15632  
15633  			function matchItems(node, format, item_name) {
15634                  var key, value, items = format[item_name], i;
15635  
15636                  // Custom match
15637                  if (format.onmatch) {
15638                      return format.onmatch(node, format, item_name);
15639                  }
15640  
15641                  // Check all items
15642                  if (items) {
15643                      // Non indexed object
15644                      if (items.length === undefined) {
15645                          for (key in items) {
15646                              if (items.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
15647                                  if (item_name === 'attributes')
15648                                      value = dom.getAttrib(node, key);
15649                                  else
15650                                      value = getStyle(node, key);
15651  
15652                                  if (similar && !value && !format.exact)
15653                                      return;
15654  
15655                                  if ((!similar || format.exact) && !isEq(value, replaceVars(items[key], vars)))
15656                                      return;
15657                              }
15658                          }
15659                      } else {
15660                          // Only one match needed for indexed arrays
15661                          for (i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
15662                              if (item_name === 'attributes' ? dom.getAttrib(node, items[i]) : getStyle(node, items[i]))
15663                                  return format;
15664                          }
15665                      }
15666                  }
15667  
15668                  return format;
15669              };
15670  
15671              if (formatList && node) {
15672                  // Check each format in list
15673                  for (i = 0; i < formatList.length; i++) {
15674                      format = formatList[i];
15675  
15676                      // Name name, attributes, styles and classes
15677                      if (matchName(node, format) && matchItems(node, format, 'attributes') && matchItems(node, format, 'styles')) {
15678                          // Match classes
15679                          if (classes = format.classes) {
15680                              for (i = 0; i < classes.length; i++) {
15681                                  if (!dom.hasClass(node, classes[i]))
15682                                      return;
15683                              }
15684                          }
15685  
15686                          return format;
15687                      }
15688                  }
15689              }
15690          };
15691  
15692  		function match(name, vars, node) {
15693              var startNode;
15694  
15695  			function matchParents(node) {
15696                  // Find first node with similar format settings
15697                  node = dom.getParent(node, function(node) {
15698                      return !!matchNode(node, name, vars, true);
15699                  });
15700  
15701                  // Do an exact check on the similar format element
15702                  return matchNode(node, name, vars);
15703              };
15704  
15705              // Check specified node
15706              if (node)
15707                  return matchParents(node);
15708  
15709              // Check selected node
15710              node = selection.getNode();
15711              if (matchParents(node))
15712                  return TRUE;
15713  
15714              // Check start node if it's different
15715              startNode = selection.getStart();
15716              if (startNode != node) {
15717                  if (matchParents(startNode))
15718                      return TRUE;
15719              }
15720  
15721              return FALSE;
15722          };
15723  
15724  		function matchAll(names, vars) {
15725              var startElement, matchedFormatNames = [], checkedMap = {}, i, ni, name;
15726  
15727              // Check start of selection for formats
15728              startElement = selection.getStart();
15729              dom.getParent(startElement, function(node) {
15730                  var i, name;
15731  
15732                  for (i = 0; i < names.length; i++) {
15733                      name = names[i];
15734  
15735                      if (!checkedMap[name] && matchNode(node, name, vars)) {
15736                          checkedMap[name] = true;
15737                          matchedFormatNames.push(name);
15738                      }
15739                  }
15740              });
15741  
15742              return matchedFormatNames;
15743          };
15744  
15745  		function canApply(name) {
15746              var formatList = get(name), startNode, parents, i, x, selector;
15747  
15748              if (formatList) {
15749                  startNode = selection.getStart();
15750                  parents = getParents(startNode);
15751  
15752                  for (x = formatList.length - 1; x >= 0; x--) {
15753                      selector = formatList[x].selector;
15754  
15755                      // Format is not selector based, then always return TRUE
15756                      if (!selector)
15757                          return TRUE;
15758  
15759                      for (i = parents.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
15760                          if (dom.is(parents[i], selector))
15761                              return TRUE;
15762                      }
15763                  }
15764              }
15765  
15766              return FALSE;
15767          };
15768  
15769          // Expose to public
15770          tinymce.extend(this, {
15771              get : get,
15772              register : register,
15773              apply : apply,
15774              remove : remove,
15775              toggle : toggle,
15776              match : match,
15777              matchAll : matchAll,
15778              matchNode : matchNode,
15779              canApply : canApply
15780          });
15781  
15782          // Private functions
15783  
15784  		function matchName(node, format) {
15785              // Check for inline match
15786              if (isEq(node, format.inline))
15787                  return TRUE;
15788  
15789              // Check for block match
15790              if (isEq(node, format.block))
15791                  return TRUE;
15792  
15793              // Check for selector match
15794              if (format.selector)
15795                  return dom.is(node, format.selector);
15796          };
15797  
15798  		function isEq(str1, str2) {
15799              str1 = str1 || '';
15800              str2 = str2 || '';
15801  
15802              str1 = '' + (str1.nodeName || str1);
15803              str2 = '' + (str2.nodeName || str2);
15804  
15805              return str1.toLowerCase() == str2.toLowerCase();
15806          };
15807  
15808  		function getStyle(node, name) {
15809              var styleVal = dom.getStyle(node, name);
15810  
15811              // Force the format to hex
15812              if (name == 'color' || name == 'backgroundColor')
15813                  styleVal = dom.toHex(styleVal);
15814  
15815              // Opera will return bold as 700
15816              if (name == 'fontWeight' && styleVal == 700)
15817                  styleVal = 'bold';
15818  
15819              return '' + styleVal;
15820          };
15821  
15822  		function replaceVars(value, vars) {
15823              if (typeof(value) != "string")
15824                  value = value(vars);
15825              else if (vars) {
15826                  value = value.replace(/%(\w+)/g, function(str, name) {
15827                      return vars[name] || str;
15828                  });
15829              }
15830  
15831              return value;
15832          };
15833  
15834  		function isWhiteSpaceNode(node) {
15835              return node && node.nodeType === 3 && /^([\t \r\n]+|)$/.test(node.nodeValue);
15836          };
15837  
15838  		function wrap(node, name, attrs) {
15839              var wrapper = dom.create(name, attrs);
15840  
15841              node.parentNode.insertBefore(wrapper, node);
15842              wrapper.appendChild(node);
15843  
15844              return wrapper;
15845          };
15846  
15847  		function expandRng(rng, format, remove) {
15848              var startContainer = rng.startContainer,
15849                  startOffset = rng.startOffset,
15850                  endContainer = rng.endContainer,
15851                  endOffset = rng.endOffset, sibling, lastIdx, leaf, endPoint;
15852  
15853              // This function walks up the tree if there is no siblings before/after the node
15854  			function findParentContainer(start) {
15855                  var container, parent, child, sibling, siblingName;
15856  
15857                  container = parent = start ? startContainer : endContainer;
15858                  siblingName = start ? 'previousSibling' : 'nextSibling';
15859                  root = dom.getRoot();
15860  
15861                  // If it's a text node and the offset is inside the text
15862                  if (container.nodeType == 3 && !isWhiteSpaceNode(container)) {
15863                      if (start ? startOffset > 0 : endOffset < container.nodeValue.length) {
15864                          return container;
15865                      }
15866                  }
15867  
15868                  for (;;) {
15869                      // Stop expanding on block elements or root depending on format
15870                      if (parent == root || (!format[0].block_expand && isBlock(parent)))
15871                          return parent;
15872  
15873                      // Walk left/right
15874                      for (sibling = parent[siblingName]; sibling; sibling = sibling[siblingName]) {
15875                          if (!isBookmarkNode(sibling) && !isWhiteSpaceNode(sibling)) {
15876                              return parent;
15877                          }
15878                      }
15879  
15880                      // Check if we can move up are we at root level or body level
15881                      parent = parent.parentNode;
15882                  }
15883  
15884                  return container;
15885              };
15886  
15887              // This function walks down the tree to find the leaf at the selection.
15888              // The offset is also returned as if node initially a leaf, the offset may be in the middle of the text node.
15889  			function findLeaf(node, offset) {
15890                  if (offset === undefined)
15891                      offset = node.nodeType === 3 ? node.length : node.childNodes.length;
15892                  while (node && node.hasChildNodes()) {
15893                      node = node.childNodes[offset];
15894                      if (node)
15895                          offset = node.nodeType === 3 ? node.length : node.childNodes.length;
15896                  }
15897                  return { node: node, offset: offset };
15898              }
15899  
15900              // If index based start position then resolve it
15901              if (startContainer.nodeType == 1 && startContainer.hasChildNodes()) {
15902                  lastIdx = startContainer.childNodes.length - 1;
15903                  startContainer = startContainer.childNodes[startOffset > lastIdx ? lastIdx : startOffset];
15904  
15905                  if (startContainer.nodeType == 3)
15906                      startOffset = 0;
15907              }
15908  
15909              // If index based end position then resolve it
15910              if (endContainer.nodeType == 1 && endContainer.hasChildNodes()) {
15911                  lastIdx = endContainer.childNodes.length - 1;
15912                  endContainer = endContainer.childNodes[endOffset > lastIdx ? lastIdx : endOffset - 1];
15913  
15914                  if (endContainer.nodeType == 3)
15915                      endOffset = endContainer.nodeValue.length;
15916              }
15917  
15918              // Exclude bookmark nodes if possible
15919              if (isBookmarkNode(startContainer.parentNode) || isBookmarkNode(startContainer)) {
15920                  startContainer = isBookmarkNode(startContainer) ? startContainer : startContainer.parentNode;
15921                  startContainer = startContainer.nextSibling || startContainer;
15922  
15923                  if (startContainer.nodeType == 3)
15924                      startOffset = 0;
15925              }
15926  
15927              if (isBookmarkNode(endContainer.parentNode) || isBookmarkNode(endContainer)) {
15928                  endContainer = isBookmarkNode(endContainer) ? endContainer : endContainer.parentNode;
15929                  endContainer = endContainer.previousSibling || endContainer;
15930  
15931                  if (endContainer.nodeType == 3)
15932                      endOffset = endContainer.length;
15933              }
15934  
15935              if (format[0].inline) {
15936                  if (rng.collapsed) {
15937  					function findWordEndPoint(container, offset, start) {
15938                          var walker, node, pos, lastTextNode;
15939  
15940  						function findSpace(node, offset) {
15941                              var pos, pos2, str = node.nodeValue;
15942  
15943                              if (typeof(offset) == "undefined") {
15944                                  offset = start ? str.length : 0;
15945                              }
15946  
15947                              if (start) {
15948                                  pos = str.lastIndexOf(' ', offset);
15949                                  pos2 = str.lastIndexOf('\u00a0', offset);
15950                                  pos = pos > pos2 ? pos : pos2;
15951  
15952                                  // Include the space on remove to avoid tag soup
15953                                  if (pos !== -1 && !remove) {
15954                                      pos++;
15955                                  }
15956                              } else {
15957                                  pos = str.indexOf(' ', offset);
15958                                  pos2 = str.indexOf('\u00a0', offset);
15959                                  pos = pos !== -1 && (pos2 === -1 || pos < pos2) ? pos : pos2;
15960                              }
15961  
15962                              return pos;
15963                          };
15964  
15965                          if (container.nodeType === 3) {
15966                              pos = findSpace(container, offset);
15967  
15968                              if (pos !== -1) {
15969                                  return {container : container, offset : pos};
15970                              }
15971  
15972                              lastTextNode = container;
15973                          }
15974  
15975                          // Walk the nodes inside the block
15976                          walker = new TreeWalker(container, dom.getParent(container, isBlock) || ed.getBody());
15977                          while (node = walker[start ? 'prev' : 'next']()) {
15978                              if (node.nodeType === 3) {
15979                                  lastTextNode = node;
15980                                  pos = findSpace(node);
15981  
15982                                  if (pos !== -1) {
15983                                      return {container : node, offset : pos};
15984                                  }
15985                              } else if (isBlock(node)) {
15986                                  break;
15987                              }
15988                          }
15989  
15990                          if (lastTextNode) {
15991                              if (start) {
15992                                  offset = 0;
15993                              } else {
15994                                  offset = lastTextNode.length;
15995                              }
15996  
15997                              return {container: lastTextNode, offset: offset};
15998                          }
15999                      }
16000  
16001                      // Expand left to closest word boundery
16002                      endPoint = findWordEndPoint(startContainer, startOffset, true);
16003                      if (endPoint) {
16004                          startContainer = endPoint.container;
16005                          startOffset = endPoint.offset;
16006                      }
16007  
16008                      // Expand right to closest word boundery
16009                      endPoint = findWordEndPoint(endContainer, endOffset);
16010                      if (endPoint) {
16011                          endContainer = endPoint.container;
16012                          endOffset = endPoint.offset;
16013                      }
16014                  }
16015  
16016                  // Avoid applying formatting to a trailing space.
16017                  leaf = findLeaf(endContainer, endOffset);
16018                  if (leaf.node) {
16019                      while (leaf.node && leaf.offset === 0 && leaf.node.previousSibling)
16020                          leaf = findLeaf(leaf.node.previousSibling);
16021  
16022                      if (leaf.node && leaf.offset > 0 && leaf.node.nodeType === 3 &&
16023                              leaf.node.nodeValue.charAt(leaf.offset - 1) === ' ') {
16024  
16025                          if (leaf.offset > 1) {
16026                              endContainer = leaf.node;
16027                              endContainer.splitText(leaf.offset - 1);
16028                          } else if (leaf.node.previousSibling) {
16029                              // TODO: Figure out why this is in here
16030                              //endContainer = leaf.node.previousSibling;
16031                          }
16032                      }
16033                  }
16034              }
16035  
16036              // Move start/end point up the tree if the leaves are sharp and if we are in different containers
16037              // Example * becomes !: !<p><b><i>*text</i><i>text*</i></b></p>!
16038              // This will reduce the number of wrapper elements that needs to be created
16039              // Move start point up the tree
16040              if (format[0].inline || format[0].block_expand) {
16041                  if (!format[0].inline || (startContainer.nodeType != 3 || startOffset === 0)) {
16042                      startContainer = findParentContainer(true);
16043                  }
16044  
16045                  if (!format[0].inline || (endContainer.nodeType != 3 || endOffset === endContainer.nodeValue.length)) {
16046                      endContainer = findParentContainer();
16047                  }
16048              }
16049  
16050              // Expand start/end container to matching selector
16051              if (format[0].selector && format[0].expand !== FALSE && !format[0].inline) {
16052  				function findSelectorEndPoint(container, sibling_name) {
16053                      var parents, i, y, curFormat;
16054  
16055                      if (container.nodeType == 3 && container.nodeValue.length == 0 && container[sibling_name])
16056                          container = container[sibling_name];
16057  
16058                      parents = getParents(container);
16059                      for (i = 0; i < parents.length; i++) {
16060                          for (y = 0; y < format.length; y++) {
16061                              curFormat = format[y];
16062  
16063                              // If collapsed state is set then skip formats that doesn't match that
16064                              if ("collapsed" in curFormat && curFormat.collapsed !== rng.collapsed)
16065                                  continue;
16066  
16067                              if (dom.is(parents[i], curFormat.selector))
16068                                  return parents[i];
16069                          }
16070                      }
16071  
16072                      return container;
16073                  };
16074  
16075                  // Find new startContainer/endContainer if there is better one
16076                  startContainer = findSelectorEndPoint(startContainer, 'previousSibling');
16077                  endContainer = findSelectorEndPoint(endContainer, 'nextSibling');
16078              }
16079  
16080              // Expand start/end container to matching block element or text node
16081              if (format[0].block || format[0].selector) {
16082  				function findBlockEndPoint(container, sibling_name, sibling_name2) {
16083                      var node;
16084  
16085                      // Expand to block of similar type
16086                      if (!format[0].wrapper)
16087                          node = dom.getParent(container, format[0].block);
16088  
16089                      // Expand to first wrappable block element or any block element
16090                      if (!node)
16091                          node = dom.getParent(container.nodeType == 3 ? container.parentNode : container, isBlock);
16092  
16093                      // Exclude inner lists from wrapping
16094                      if (node && format[0].wrapper)
16095                          node = getParents(node, 'ul,ol').reverse()[0] || node;
16096  
16097                      // Didn't find a block element look for first/last wrappable element
16098                      if (!node) {
16099                          node = container;
16100  
16101                          while (node[sibling_name] && !isBlock(node[sibling_name])) {
16102                              node = node[sibling_name];
16103  
16104                              // Break on BR but include it will be removed later on
16105                              // we can't remove it now since we need to check if it can be wrapped
16106                              if (isEq(node, 'br'))
16107                                  break;
16108                          }
16109                      }
16110  
16111                      return node || container;
16112                  };
16113  
16114                  // Find new startContainer/endContainer if there is better one
16115                  startContainer = findBlockEndPoint(startContainer, 'previousSibling');
16116                  endContainer = findBlockEndPoint(endContainer, 'nextSibling');
16117  
16118                  // Non block element then try to expand up the leaf
16119                  if (format[0].block) {
16120                      if (!isBlock(startContainer))
16121                          startContainer = findParentContainer(true);
16122  
16123                      if (!isBlock(endContainer))
16124                          endContainer = findParentContainer();
16125                  }
16126              }
16127  
16128              // Setup index for startContainer
16129              if (startContainer.nodeType == 1) {
16130                  startOffset = nodeIndex(startContainer);
16131                  startContainer = startContainer.parentNode;
16132              }
16133  
16134              // Setup index for endContainer
16135              if (endContainer.nodeType == 1) {
16136                  endOffset = nodeIndex(endContainer) + 1;
16137                  endContainer = endContainer.parentNode;
16138              }
16139  
16140              // Return new range like object
16141              return {
16142                  startContainer : startContainer,
16143                  startOffset : startOffset,
16144                  endContainer : endContainer,
16145                  endOffset : endOffset
16146              };
16147          }
16148  
16149  		function removeFormat(format, vars, node, compare_node) {
16150              var i, attrs, stylesModified;
16151  
16152              // Check if node matches format
16153              if (!matchName(node, format))
16154                  return FALSE;
16155  
16156              // Should we compare with format attribs and styles
16157              if (format.remove != 'all') {
16158                  // Remove styles
16159                  each(format.styles, function(value, name) {
16160                      value = replaceVars(value, vars);
16161  
16162                      // Indexed array
16163                      if (typeof(name) === 'number') {
16164                          name = value;
16165                          compare_node = 0;
16166                      }
16167  
16168                      if (!compare_node || isEq(getStyle(compare_node, name), value))
16169                          dom.setStyle(node, name, '');
16170  
16171                      stylesModified = 1;
16172                  });
16173  
16174                  // Remove style attribute if it's empty
16175                  if (stylesModified && dom.getAttrib(node, 'style') == '') {
16176                      node.removeAttribute('style');
16177                      node.removeAttribute('data-mce-style');
16178                  }
16179  
16180                  // Remove attributes
16181                  each(format.attributes, function(value, name) {
16182                      var valueOut;
16183  
16184                      value = replaceVars(value, vars);
16185  
16186                      // Indexed array
16187                      if (typeof(name) === 'number') {
16188                          name = value;
16189                          compare_node = 0;
16190                      }
16191  
16192                      if (!compare_node || isEq(dom.getAttrib(compare_node, name), value)) {
16193                          // Keep internal classes
16194                          if (name == 'class') {
16195                              value = dom.getAttrib(node, name);
16196                              if (value) {
16197                                  // Build new class value where everything is removed except the internal prefixed classes
16198                                  valueOut = '';
16199                                  each(value.split(/\s+/), function(cls) {
16200                                      if (/mce\w+/.test(cls))
16201                                          valueOut += (valueOut ? ' ' : '') + cls;
16202                                  });
16203  
16204                                  // We got some internal classes left
16205                                  if (valueOut) {
16206                                      dom.setAttrib(node, name, valueOut);
16207                                      return;
16208                                  }
16209                              }
16210                          }
16211  
16212                          // IE6 has a bug where the attribute doesn't get removed correctly
16213                          if (name == "class")
16214                              node.removeAttribute('className');
16215  
16216                          // Remove mce prefixed attributes
16217                          if (MCE_ATTR_RE.test(name))
16218                              node.removeAttribute('data-mce-' + name);
16219  
16220                          node.removeAttribute(name);
16221                      }
16222                  });
16223  
16224                  // Remove classes
16225                  each(format.classes, function(value) {
16226                      value = replaceVars(value, vars);
16227  
16228                      if (!compare_node || dom.hasClass(compare_node, value))
16229                          dom.removeClass(node, value);
16230                  });
16231  
16232                  // Check for non internal attributes
16233                  attrs = dom.getAttribs(node);
16234                  for (i = 0; i < attrs.length; i++) {
16235                      if (attrs[i].nodeName.indexOf('_') !== 0)
16236                          return FALSE;
16237                  }
16238              }
16239  
16240              // Remove the inline child if it's empty for example <b> or <span>
16241              if (format.remove != 'none') {
16242                  removeNode(node, format);
16243                  return TRUE;
16244              }
16245          };
16246  
16247  		function removeNode(node, format) {
16248              var parentNode = node.parentNode, rootBlockElm;
16249  
16250              if (format.block) {
16251                  if (!forcedRootBlock) {
16252  					function find(node, next, inc) {
16253                          node = getNonWhiteSpaceSibling(node, next, inc);
16254  
16255                          return !node || (node.nodeName == 'BR' || isBlock(node));
16256                      };
16257  
16258                      // Append BR elements if needed before we remove the block
16259                      if (isBlock(node) && !isBlock(parentNode)) {
16260                          if (!find(node, FALSE) && !find(node.firstChild, TRUE, 1))
16261                              node.insertBefore(dom.create('br'), node.firstChild);
16262  
16263                          if (!find(node, TRUE) && !find(node.lastChild, FALSE, 1))
16264                              node.appendChild(dom.create('br'));
16265                      }
16266                  } else {
16267                      // Wrap the block in a forcedRootBlock if we are at the root of document
16268                      if (parentNode == dom.getRoot()) {
16269                          if (!format.list_block || !isEq(node, format.list_block)) {
16270                              each(tinymce.grep(node.childNodes), function(node) {
16271                                  if (isValid(forcedRootBlock, node.nodeName.toLowerCase())) {
16272                                      if (!rootBlockElm)
16273                                          rootBlockElm = wrap(node, forcedRootBlock);
16274                                      else
16275                                          rootBlockElm.appendChild(node);
16276                                  } else
16277                                      rootBlockElm = 0;
16278                              });
16279                          }
16280                      }
16281                  }
16282              }
16283  
16284              // Never remove nodes that isn't the specified inline element if a selector is specified too
16285              if (format.selector && format.inline && !isEq(format.inline, node))
16286                  return;
16287  
16288              dom.remove(node, 1);
16289          };
16290  
16291  		function getNonWhiteSpaceSibling(node, next, inc) {
16292              if (node) {
16293                  next = next ? 'nextSibling' : 'previousSibling';
16294  
16295                  for (node = inc ? node : node[next]; node; node = node[next]) {
16296                      if (node.nodeType == 1 || !isWhiteSpaceNode(node))
16297                          return node;
16298                  }
16299              }
16300          };
16301  
16302  		function isBookmarkNode(node) {
16303              return node && node.nodeType == 1 && node.getAttribute('data-mce-type') == 'bookmark';
16304          };
16305  
16306  		function mergeSiblings(prev, next) {
16307              var marker, sibling, tmpSibling;
16308  
16309  			function compareElements(node1, node2) {
16310                  // Not the same name
16311                  if (node1.nodeName != node2.nodeName)
16312                      return FALSE;
16313  
16314  				function getAttribs(node) {
16315                      var attribs = {};
16316  
16317                      each(dom.getAttribs(node), function(attr) {
16318                          var name = attr.nodeName.toLowerCase();
16319  
16320                          // Don't compare internal attributes or style
16321                          if (name.indexOf('_') !== 0 && name !== 'style')
16322                              attribs[name] = dom.getAttrib(node, name);
16323                      });
16324  
16325                      return attribs;
16326                  };
16327  
16328  				function compareObjects(obj1, obj2) {
16329                      var value, name;
16330  
16331                      for (name in obj1) {
16332                          // Obj1 has item obj2 doesn't have
16333                          if (obj1.hasOwnProperty(name)) {
16334                              value = obj2[name];
16335  
16336                              // Obj2 doesn't have obj1 item
16337                              if (value === undefined)
16338                                  return FALSE;
16339  
16340                              // Obj2 item has a different value
16341                              if (obj1[name] != value)
16342                                  return FALSE;
16343  
16344                              // Delete similar value
16345                              delete obj2[name];
16346                          }
16347                      }
16348  
16349                      // Check if obj 2 has something obj 1 doesn't have
16350                      for (name in obj2) {
16351                          // Obj2 has item obj1 doesn't have
16352                          if (obj2.hasOwnProperty(name))
16353                              return FALSE;
16354                      }
16355  
16356                      return TRUE;
16357                  };
16358  
16359                  // Attribs are not the same
16360                  if (!compareObjects(getAttribs(node1), getAttribs(node2)))
16361                      return FALSE;
16362  
16363                  // Styles are not the same
16364                  if (!compareObjects(dom.parseStyle(dom.getAttrib(node1, 'style')), dom.parseStyle(dom.getAttrib(node2, 'style'))))
16365                      return FALSE;
16366  
16367                  return TRUE;
16368              };
16369  
16370              // Check if next/prev exists and that they are elements
16371              if (prev && next) {
16372  				function findElementSibling(node, sibling_name) {
16373                      for (sibling = node; sibling; sibling = sibling[sibling_name]) {
16374                          if (sibling.nodeType == 3 && sibling.nodeValue.length !== 0)
16375                              return node;
16376  
16377                          if (sibling.nodeType == 1 && !isBookmarkNode(sibling))
16378                              return sibling;
16379                      }
16380  
16381                      return node;
16382                  };
16383  
16384                  // If previous sibling is empty then jump over it
16385                  prev = findElementSibling(prev, 'previousSibling');
16386                  next = findElementSibling(next, 'nextSibling');
16387  
16388                  // Compare next and previous nodes
16389                  if (compareElements(prev, next)) {
16390                      // Append nodes between
16391                      for (sibling = prev.nextSibling; sibling && sibling != next;) {
16392                          tmpSibling = sibling;
16393                          sibling = sibling.nextSibling;
16394                          prev.appendChild(tmpSibling);
16395                      }
16396  
16397                      // Remove next node
16398                      dom.remove(next);
16399  
16400                      // Move children into prev node
16401                      each(tinymce.grep(next.childNodes), function(node) {
16402                          prev.appendChild(node);
16403                      });
16404  
16405                      return prev;
16406                  }
16407              }
16408  
16409              return next;
16410          };
16411  
16412  		function isTextBlock(name) {
16413              return /^(h[1-6]|p|div|pre|address|dl|dt|dd)$/.test(name);
16414          };
16415  
16416  		function getContainer(rng, start) {
16417              var container, offset, lastIdx, walker;
16418  
16419              container = rng[start ? 'startContainer' : 'endContainer'];
16420              offset = rng[start ? 'startOffset' : 'endOffset'];
16421  
16422              if (container.nodeType == 1) {
16423                  lastIdx = container.childNodes.length - 1;
16424  
16425                  if (!start && offset)
16426                      offset--;
16427  
16428                  container = container.childNodes[offset > lastIdx ? lastIdx : offset];
16429              }
16430  
16431              // If start text node is excluded then walk to the next node
16432              if (container.nodeType === 3 && start && offset >= container.nodeValue.length) {
16433                  container = new TreeWalker(container, ed.getBody()).next() || container;
16434              }
16435  
16436              // If end text node is excluded then walk to the previous node
16437              if (container.nodeType === 3 && !start && offset == 0) {
16438                  container = new TreeWalker(container, ed.getBody()).prev() || container;
16439              }
16440  
16441              return container;
16442          };
16443  
16444  		function performCaretAction(type, name, vars) {
16445              var invisibleChar, caretContainerId = '_mce_caret', debug = ed.settings.caret_debug;
16446  
16447              // Setup invisible character use zero width space on Gecko since it doesn't change the heigt of the container
16448              invisibleChar = tinymce.isGecko ? '\u200B' : INVISIBLE_CHAR;
16449  
16450              // Creates a caret container bogus element
16451  			function createCaretContainer(fill) {
16452                  var caretContainer = dom.create('span', {id: caretContainerId, 'data-mce-bogus': true, style: debug ? 'color:red' : ''});
16453  
16454                  if (fill) {
16455                      caretContainer.appendChild(ed.getDoc().createTextNode(invisibleChar));
16456                  }
16457  
16458                  return caretContainer;
16459              };
16460  
16461  			function isCaretContainerEmpty(node, nodes) {
16462                  while (node) {
16463                      if ((node.nodeType === 3 && node.nodeValue !== invisibleChar) || node.childNodes.length > 1) {
16464                          return false;
16465                      }
16466  
16467                      // Collect nodes
16468                      if (nodes && node.nodeType === 1) {
16469                          nodes.push(node);
16470                      }
16471  
16472                      node = node.firstChild;
16473                  }
16474  
16475                  return true;
16476              };
16477              
16478              // Returns any parent caret container element
16479  			function getParentCaretContainer(node) {
16480                  while (node) {
16481                      if (node.id === caretContainerId) {
16482                          return node;
16483                      }
16484  
16485                      node = node.parentNode;
16486                  }
16487              };
16488  
16489              // Finds the first text node in the specified node
16490  			function findFirstTextNode(node) {
16491                  var walker;
16492  
16493                  if (node) {
16494                      walker = new TreeWalker(node, node);
16495  
16496                      for (node = walker.current(); node; node = walker.next()) {
16497                          if (node.nodeType === 3) {
16498                              return node;
16499                          }
16500                      }
16501                  }
16502              };
16503  
16504              // Removes the caret container for the specified node or all on the current document
16505  			function removeCaretContainer(node, move_caret) {
16506                  var child, rng;
16507  
16508                  if (!node) {
16509                      node = getParentCaretContainer(selection.getStart());
16510  
16511                      if (!node) {
16512                          while (node = dom.get(caretContainerId)) {
16513                              removeCaretContainer(node, false);
16514                          }
16515                      }
16516                  } else {
16517                      rng = selection.getRng(true);
16518  
16519                      if (isCaretContainerEmpty(node)) {
16520                          if (move_caret !== false) {
16521                              rng.setStartBefore(node);
16522                              rng.setEndBefore(node);
16523                          }
16524  
16525                          dom.remove(node);
16526                      } else {
16527                          child = findFirstTextNode(node);
16528  
16529                          if (child.nodeValue.charAt(0) === INVISIBLE_CHAR) {
16530                              child = child.deleteData(0, 1);
16531                          }
16532  
16533                          dom.remove(node, 1);
16534                      }
16535  
16536                      selection.setRng(rng);
16537                  }
16538              };
16539              
16540              // Applies formatting to the caret postion
16541  			function applyCaretFormat() {
16542                  var rng, caretContainer, textNode, offset, bookmark, container, text;
16543  
16544                  rng = selection.getRng(true);
16545                  offset = rng.startOffset;
16546                  container = rng.startContainer;
16547                  text = container.nodeValue;
16548  
16549                  caretContainer = getParentCaretContainer(selection.getStart());
16550                  if (caretContainer) {
16551                      textNode = findFirstTextNode(caretContainer);
16552                  }
16553  
16554                  // Expand to word is caret is in the middle of a text node and the char before/after is a alpha numeric character
16555                  if (text && offset > 0 && offset < text.length && /\w/.test(text.charAt(offset)) && /\w/.test(text.charAt(offset - 1))) {
16556                      // Get bookmark of caret position
16557                      bookmark = selection.getBookmark();
16558  
16559                      // Collapse bookmark range (WebKit)
16560                      rng.collapse(true);
16561  
16562                      // Expand the range to the closest word and split it at those points
16563                      rng = expandRng(rng, get(name));
16564                      rng = rangeUtils.split(rng);
16565  
16566                      // Apply the format to the range
16567                      apply(name, vars, rng);
16568  
16569                      // Move selection back to caret position
16570                      selection.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
16571                  } else {
16572                      if (!caretContainer || textNode.nodeValue !== invisibleChar) {
16573                          caretContainer = createCaretContainer(true);
16574                          textNode = caretContainer.firstChild;
16575  
16576                          rng.insertNode(caretContainer);
16577                          offset = 1;
16578  
16579                          apply(name, vars, caretContainer);
16580                      } else {
16581                          apply(name, vars, caretContainer);
16582                      }
16583  
16584                      // Move selection to text node
16585                      selection.setCursorLocation(textNode, offset);
16586                  }
16587              };
16588  
16589  			function removeCaretFormat() {
16590                  var rng = selection.getRng(true), container, offset, bookmark,
16591                      hasContentAfter, node, formatNode, parents = [], i, caretContainer;
16592  
16593                  container = rng.startContainer;
16594                  offset = rng.startOffset;
16595                  node = container;
16596  
16597                  if (container.nodeType == 3) {
16598                      if (offset != container.nodeValue.length || container.nodeValue === invisibleChar) {
16599                          hasContentAfter = true;
16600                      }
16601  
16602                      node = node.parentNode;
16603                  }
16604  
16605                  while (node) {
16606                      if (matchNode(node, name, vars)) {
16607                          formatNode = node;
16608                          break;
16609                      }
16610  
16611                      if (node.nextSibling) {
16612                          hasContentAfter = true;
16613                      }
16614  
16615                      parents.push(node);
16616                      node = node.parentNode;
16617                  }
16618  
16619                  // Node doesn't have the specified format
16620                  if (!formatNode) {
16621                      return;
16622                  }
16623  
16624                  // Is there contents after the caret then remove the format on the element
16625                  if (hasContentAfter) {
16626                      // Get bookmark of caret position
16627                      bookmark = selection.getBookmark();
16628  
16629                      // Collapse bookmark range (WebKit)
16630                      rng.collapse(true);
16631  
16632                      // Expand the range to the closest word and split it at those points
16633                      rng = expandRng(rng, get(name), true);
16634                      rng = rangeUtils.split(rng);
16635  
16636                      // Remove the format from the range
16637                      remove(name, vars, rng);
16638  
16639                      // Move selection back to caret position
16640                      selection.moveToBookmark(bookmark);
16641                  } else {
16642                      caretContainer = createCaretContainer();
16643  
16644                      node = caretContainer;
16645                      for (i = parents.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
16646                          node.appendChild(parents[i].cloneNode(false));
16647                          node = node.firstChild;
16648                      }
16649  
16650                      // Insert invisible character into inner most format element
16651                      node.appendChild(dom.doc.createTextNode(invisibleChar));
16652                      node = node.firstChild;
16653  
16654                      // Insert caret container after the formated node
16655                      dom.insertAfter(caretContainer, formatNode);
16656  
16657                      // Move selection to text node
16658                      selection.setCursorLocation(node, 1);
16659                  }
16660              };
16661  
16662              // Only bind the caret events once
16663              if (!self._hasCaretEvents) {
16664                  // Mark current caret container elements as bogus when getting the contents so we don't end up with empty elements
16665                  ed.onBeforeGetContent.addToTop(function() {
16666                      var nodes = [], i;
16667  
16668                      if (isCaretContainerEmpty(getParentCaretContainer(selection.getStart()), nodes)) {
16669                          // Mark children
16670                          i = nodes.length;
16671                          while (i--) {
16672                              dom.setAttrib(nodes[i], 'data-mce-bogus', '1');
16673                          }
16674                      }
16675                  });
16676  
16677                  // Remove caret container on mouse up and on key up
16678                  tinymce.each('onMouseUp onKeyUp'.split(' '), function(name) {
16679                      ed[name].addToTop(function() {
16680                          removeCaretContainer();
16681                      });
16682                  });
16683  
16684                  // Remove caret container on keydown and it's a backspace, enter or left/right arrow keys
16685                  ed.onKeyDown.addToTop(function(ed, e) {
16686                      var keyCode = e.keyCode;
16687  
16688                      if (keyCode == 8 || keyCode == 37 || keyCode == 39) {
16689                          removeCaretContainer(getParentCaretContainer(selection.getStart()));
16690                      }
16691                  });
16692  
16693                  self._hasCaretEvents = true;
16694              }
16695  
16696              // Do apply or remove caret format
16697              if (type == "apply") {
16698                  applyCaretFormat();
16699              } else {
16700                  removeCaretFormat();
16701              }
16702          };
16703  
16704  		function moveStart(rng) {
16705              var container = rng.startContainer,
16706                      offset = rng.startOffset,
16707                      walker, node, nodes, tmpNode;
16708  
16709              // Convert text node into index if possible
16710              if (container.nodeType == 3 && offset >= container.nodeValue.length - 1) {
16711                  container = container.parentNode;
16712                  offset = nodeIndex(container) + 1;
16713              }
16714  
16715              // Move startContainer/startOffset in to a suitable node
16716              if (container.nodeType == 1) {
16717                  nodes = container.childNodes;
16718                  container = nodes[Math.min(offset, nodes.length - 1)];
16719                  walker = new TreeWalker(container);
16720  
16721                  // If offset is at end of the parent node walk to the next one
16722                  if (offset > nodes.length - 1)
16723                      walker.next();
16724  
16725                  for (node = walker.current(); node; node = walker.next()) {
16726                      if (node.nodeType == 3 && !isWhiteSpaceNode(node)) {
16727                          // IE has a "neat" feature where it moves the start node into the closest element
16728                          // we can avoid this by inserting an element before it and then remove it after we set the selection
16729                          tmpNode = dom.create('a', null, INVISIBLE_CHAR);
16730                          node.parentNode.insertBefore(tmpNode, node);
16731  
16732                          // Set selection and remove tmpNode
16733                          rng.setStart(node, 0);
16734                          selection.setRng(rng);
16735                          dom.remove(tmpNode);
16736  
16737                          return;
16738                      }
16739                  }
16740              }
16741          };
16742  
16743      };
16744  })(tinymce);
16745  
16746  tinymce.onAddEditor.add(function(tinymce, ed) {
16747      var filters, fontSizes, dom, settings = ed.settings;
16748  
16749      if (settings.inline_styles) {
16750          fontSizes = tinymce.explode(settings.font_size_legacy_values);
16751  
16752  		function replaceWithSpan(node, styles) {
16753              tinymce.each(styles, function(value, name) {
16754                  if (value)
16755                      dom.setStyle(node, name, value);
16756              });
16757  
16758              dom.rename(node, 'span');
16759          };
16760  
16761          filters = {
16762              font : function(dom, node) {
16763                  replaceWithSpan(node, {
16764                      backgroundColor : node.style.backgroundColor,
16765                      color : node.color,
16766                      fontFamily : node.face,
16767                      fontSize : fontSizes[parseInt(node.size) - 1]
16768                  });
16769              },
16770  
16771              u : function(dom, node) {
16772                  replaceWithSpan(node, {
16773                      textDecoration : 'underline'
16774                  });
16775              },
16776  
16777              strike : function(dom, node) {
16778                  replaceWithSpan(node, {
16779                      textDecoration : 'line-through'
16780                  });
16781              }
16782          };
16783  
16784  		function convert(editor, params) {
16785              dom = editor.dom;
16786  
16787              if (settings.convert_fonts_to_spans) {
16788                  tinymce.each(dom.select('font,u,strike', params.node), function(node) {
16789                      filters[node.nodeName.toLowerCase()](ed.dom, node);
16790                  });
16791              }
16792          };
16793  
16794          ed.onPreProcess.add(convert);
16795          ed.onSetContent.add(convert);
16796  
16797          ed.onInit.add(function() {
16798              ed.selection.onSetContent.add(convert);
16799          });
16800      }
16801  });
16802

title

Description

Body
